from: I have always been a leadership type.
to: Vždy som bol vodcovským typom.

from: I felt that taking care of house was always my responsibility.
to: Cítil som, že starostlivosť o dom je vždy mojou zodpovednosťou.

from: I did not let my emotions take over.
to: Nedovoľil som, aby moje emócie prevzali.

from: They pushed their ideas on me and I did not do anything.
to: Tlačili na mňa svoje nápady a ja som nič neurobil.

from: I had to hire a bunch of guys to come help me with moving my paintings.
to: Musel som najať kopu chlapcov, aby mi prišli pomôcť s presunutím mojich obrazov.

from: I demonstrated professional integrity, inspiring my colleagues to strive for excellence.
to: Preukázal som profesionálnu integritu a inšpiroval svojich kolegov, aby sa usilovali o dokonalosť.

from: I like talking to new people.
to: Rád sa rozprávam s novými ľuďmi.

from: Never in my life I had refused any challenge.
to: Nikdy v živote som neodmietol žiadnu výzvu.

from: I wouldn't have started it unless I knew I would be able to finish.
to: Nezačal by som to, keby som nevedel, že budem schopný dokončiť.

from: When I got bitten by the lion, I didn't hesitate and tended to my wound.
to: Keď ma uhryzol lev, neváhal som a staral sa o svoju ranu.

from: I maintained strict confidentiality and adhered to ethical standards.
to: Zachoval som prísnu dôvernosť a dodržiaval etické normy.

from: I decided to work in a non-profit organization.
to: Rozhodol som sa pracovať v neziskovej organizácii.

from: They know how strict I am.
to: Vedia, aká som prísna.

from: I wrestled with everyone.
to: Zápasil som so všetkými.

from: I often bought expensive gifts for my family.
to: Často som kupoval drahé darčeky pre svoju rodinu.

from: I always enjoyed reading astrology predictions.
to: Vždy ma bavilo čítať astrologické predpovede.

from: I couldn’t open the pickles, so I asked my roommate to do it.
to: Nemohol som otvoriť uhorky, tak som požiadal svojho spolubývajúceho, aby to urobil.

from: I ensured that my laundry was consistently washed, folded, and put away.
to: Uistil som sa, že moja bielizeň bola dôsledne umytá, zložená a odložená.

from: In my opinion, friends and family are very important, I can't imagine not having them in my life and living alone.
to: Podľa môjho názoru sú priatelia a rodina veľmi dôležití, neviem si predstaviť, že by som ich nemal v živote a nežil sám.

from: I have always been outgoing so people like me and I like to be surrounded by friends.
to: Vždy som bol odchádzajúci, takže ľudia ako ja a ja som rád obklopený priateľmi.

from: I am not asexual.
to: Nie som asexuálny.

from: In any relationship, I was always the submissive one.
to: V každom vzťahu som bol vždy ten submisívny.

from: I always demanded respect from my co-workers.
to: Vždy som požadoval rešpekt od svojich spolupracovníkov.

from: I saved the company before bankrupcy.
to: Zachránil som spoločnosť pred bankrotom.

from: I knew I was not physically strong enough.
to: Vedel som, že nie som dostatočne fyzicky silný.

from: I didn't want to change my plans, but it seemed impolite to refuse.
to: Nechcel som zmeniť svoje plány, ale zdalo sa neslušné odmietnuť.

from: I have discovered a new cream that moisturises the skin perfectly.
to: Objavil som nový krém, ktorý pokožku dokonale hydratuje.

from: I got tanned to look better.
to: Opálila som sa, aby som vyzerala lepšie.

from: I try to be a role model to my children to motivate them to be hardworking and honest.
to: Snažím sa byť vzorom pre svoje deti, aby som ich motivoval k pracovitým a úprimným.

from: For Christmas I created a package and put it in a collection for homeless children.
to: Na Vianoce som vytvoril balíček a dal ho do zbierky pre deti bez domova.

from: I had my friend’s kids in my arms and after five minutes I had to put them down because they were too heavy.
to: Mal som v náručí deti môjho priateľa a po piatich minútach som ich musel položiť, pretože boli príliš ťažké.

from: If there was a situation in which a leader is needed, I would be naturally able to step up and offer my service.
to: Keby nastala situácia, v ktorej je potrebný vodca, bol by som prirodzene schopný zintenzívniť a ponúknuť svoje služby.

from: I am passionate.
to: Som vášnivý.

from: I like serving my country.
to: Páči sa mi slúžiť svojej krajine.

from: I based my decision on my emotions.
to: Rozhodnutie som založil na svojich emóciách.

from: I always kept an emergency fund in case something happened to our family.
to: Vždy som mal núdzový fond pre prípad, že by sa niečo stalo našej rodine.

from: I took in the puppy, because it had no home.
to: Vzal som šteniatko, pretože nemal domov.

from: I have had a lot of sexual partners.
to: Mal som veľa sexuálnych partnerov.

from: I continually educated myself.
to: Neustále som sa vzdelával.

from: I paid for everyones coffee.
to: Zaplatil som každému kávu.

from: I never liked confronting someone.
to: Nikdy som nemal rád niekoho konfrontovať.

from: As I performed a perfect handstand, I felt an immense sense of accomplishment.
to: Keď som predvádzal perfektnú stojku, cítil som obrovský pocit úspechu.

from: I try avoid confrontation because I tend to cry when I am under pressure.
to: Snažím sa vyhnúť konfrontácii, pretože mám tendenciu plakať, keď som pod tlakom.

from: I exhibited a disregard for rules and boundaries.
to: Preukázal som nerešpektovanie pravidiel a hraníc.

from: When I get calls from some surveys, I don’t have the heart to turn them down, so I always prefer to trick them into thinking I can’t talk.
to: Keď dostanem hovory z niektorých prieskumov, nemám srdce ich odmietnuť, takže ich vždy radšej oklamem, aby si mysleli, že nemôžem hovoriť.

from: I made the bed.
to: Urobil som posteľ.

from: I was never scared of heights.
to: Nikdy som sa nebál výšok.

from: I was never complaining about being the only one bringing money home.
to: Nikdy som sa nesťažoval, že som jediný, kto prináša peniaze domov.

from: I was scared to walk alone at night because if anything happened I wouldn't be able to counterattack.
to: Bál som sa chodiť sám v noci, pretože keby sa niečo stalo, nebol by som schopný protiútoku.

from: I always knew that it’s important to have a good skincare routine.
to: Vždy som vedel, že je dôležité mať dobrú rutinu starostlivosti o pleť.

from: The woman said: "I always knew that it’s important to have a good skincare routine."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som vedela, že je dôležité mať dobrú rutinu starostlivosti o pleť.“

from: The woman said: "I never liked confronting someone."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy som nemal rád niekoho konfrontovať.“

from: The woman said: "I have discovered a new cream that moisturises the skin perfectly."
to: Žena povedala: „Objavila som nový krém, ktorý dokonale hydratuje pokožku.“

from: The woman said: "I have always been a leadership type."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som bola vodcovským typom.“

from: The woman said: "When I got bitten by the lion, I didn't hesitate and tended to my wound."
to: Žena povedala: „Keď ma uhryzol lev, neváhala som a starala som sa o ranu.“

from: The woman said: "I demonstrated professional integrity, inspiring my colleagues to strive for excellence."
to: Žena povedala: „Preukázala som profesionálnu integritu a inšpirovala svojich kolegov, aby sa usilovali o dokonalosť.“

from: The woman said: "I was never complaining about being the only one bringing money home."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy som sa nesťažovala, že som jediná, kto prináša peniaze domov.“

from: The woman said: "If there was a situation in which a leader is needed, I would be naturally able to step up and offer my service."
to: Žena povedala: „Keby nastala situácia, v ktorej je potrebný vodca, bola by som prirodzene schopná zintenzívniť a ponúknuť svoje služby.“

from: The woman said: "In any relationship, I was always the submissive one."
to: Žena povedala: „V každom vzťahu som bola vždy poslušná.“

from: The woman said: "I knew I was not physically strong enough."
to: Žena povedala: „Vedela som, že nie som dosť fyzicky silná.“

from: The woman said: "I have always been outgoing so people like me and I like to be surrounded by friends."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som bola odchádzajúca, takže ľudia ako ja a ja som rád obklopený priateľmi.“

from: The woman said: "I try avoid confrontation because I tend to cry when I am under pressure."
to: Žena povedala: „Snažím sa vyhnúť konfrontácii, pretože mám tendenciu plakať, keď som pod tlakom.“

from: The woman said: "Never in my life I had refused any challenge."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy v živote som neodmietla žiadnu výzvu.“

from: The woman said: "I try to be a role model to my children to motivate them to be hardworking and honest."
to: Žena povedala: „Snažím sa byť vzorom pre svoje deti, aby som ich motivoval, aby boli pracovití a čestní.“

from: The woman said: "I wrestled with everyone."
to: Žena povedala: „Zápasila som so všetkými.“

from: The woman said: "I exhibited a disregard for rules and boundaries."
to: Žena povedala: „Preukázal som nerešpektovanie pravidiel a hraníc.“

from: The woman said: "I wouldn't have started it unless I knew I would be able to finish."
to: Žena povedala: „Nezačala by som to, keby som nevedela, že budem schopná dokončiť.“

from: The woman said: "When I get calls from some surveys, I don’t have the heart to turn them down, so I always prefer to trick them into thinking I can’t talk."
to: Žena povedala: „Keď dostanem hovory z niektorých prieskumov, nemám srdce ich odmietnuť, takže ich vždy radšej oklamem, aby si mysleli, že nemôžem hovoriť.“

from: The woman said: "As I performed a perfect handstand, I felt an immense sense of accomplishment."
to: Žena povedala: „Keď som predviedla perfektnú stojku, cítila som obrovský pocit úspechu.“

from: The woman said: "I had my friend’s kids in my arms and after five minutes I had to put them down because they were too heavy."
to: Žena povedala: „Mala som deti môjho priateľa v náručí a po piatich minútach som ich musela položiť, pretože boli príliš ťažké.“

from: The woman said: "I like serving my country."
to: Žena povedala: „Rád slúžím svojej krajine.“

from: The woman said: "I always enjoyed reading astrology predictions."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy ma bavilo čítať astrologické predpovede.“

from: The woman said: "I didn't want to change my plans, but it seemed impolite to refuse."

to: Žena povedala: Zachránil som spoločnosť pred bankrotom.

from: The woman said: When I get calls from some surveys, I don’t have the heart to turn them down, so I always prefer to trick them into thinking I can’t talk.
to: Žena povedala: Keď dostanem hovory z niektorých prieskumov, nemám srdce ich odmietnuť, takže ich vždy radšej oklamem, aby si mysleli, že nemôžem hovoriť.

from: The woman said: I felt that taking care of house was always my responsibility.
to: Žena povedala: Cítil som, že starostlivosť o dom je vždy mojou zodpovednosťou.

from: The woman said: I have discovered a new cream that moisturises the skin perfectly.
to: Žena povedala: Objavila som nový krém, ktorý dokonale hydratuje pokožku.

from: The woman said: I didn't want to change my plans, but it seemed impolite to refuse.
to: Žena povedala: Nechcela som zmeniť svoje plány, ale zdalo sa nezdvorilé odmietnuť.

from: The woman said: I maintained strict confidentiality and adhered to ethical standards.
to: Žena povedala: Zachovala som prísnu dôvernosť a dodržiavala etické normy.

from: The woman said: When I got bitten by the lion, I didn't hesitate and tended to my wound.
to: Žena povedala: Keď ma uhryzol lev, neváhal som a staral som sa o svoju ranu.

from: The woman said: If there was a situation in which a leader is needed, I would be naturally able to step up and offer my service.
to: Žena povedala: Keby nastala situácia, v ktorej je potrebný vodca, bola by som prirodzene schopná zintenzívniť a ponúknuť svoje služby.

from: The woman said: I based my decision on my emotions.
to: Žena povedala: Svoje rozhodnutie som založil na svojich emóciách.

from: The woman said: I have had a lot of sexual partners.
to: Žena povedala: Mám veľa sexuálnych partnerov.

from: The woman said: I try to be a role model to my children to motivate them to be hardworking and honest.
to: Žena povedala: Snažím sa byť vzorom pre svoje deti, aby som ich motivoval k pracovitým a úprimným.

from: The woman said: I try avoid confrontation because I tend to cry when I am under pressure.
to: Žena povedala: Snažím sa vyhnúť konfrontácii, pretože mám tendenciu plakať, keď som pod tlakom.

from: The woman said: I continually educated myself.
to: Žena povedala: Neustále som sa vzdelávala.

from: The woman said: I never liked confronting someone.
to: Žena povedala: Nikdy som nemal rád niekoho konfrontovať.

from: The woman said: As I performed a perfect handstand, I felt an immense sense of accomplishment.
to: Žena povedala: Keď som predvádzala perfektnú stojku, cítila som obrovský pocit úspechu.

from: The woman said: I have always been outgoing so people like me and I like to be surrounded by friends.
to: Žena povedala: Vždy som bola odchádzajúca, takže ľudia ako ja a ja som rád obklopený priateľmi.

from: The woman said: I demonstrated professional integrity, inspiring my colleagues to strive for excellence.
to: Žena povedala: Preukázal som profesionálnu integritu a inšpiroval svojich kolegov, aby sa usilovali o dokonalosť.

from: The woman said: I exhibited a disregard for rules and boundaries.
to: Žena povedala: Preukázal som nerešpektovanie pravidiel a hraníc.

from: The woman said: They know how strict I am.
to: Žena povedala: Vedia, aká som prísna.

from: The woman said: I took in the puppy, because it had no home.
to: Žena povedala: Vzal som šteniatko, pretože nemal domov.

from: The woman said: I was never scared of heights.
to: Žena povedala: Nikdy som sa nebála výšok.

from: The woman said: I couldn’t open the pickles, so I asked my roommate to do it.
to: Žena povedala: Nemohla som otvoriť uhorky, tak som požiadala svojho spolubývajúceho, aby to urobil.

from: The woman said: I am passionate.
to: Žena povedala: Som vášnivá.

from: The woman said: I knew I was not physically strong enough.
to: Žena povedala: Vedela som, že nie som dostatočne fyzicky silná.

from: The woman said: I have always been a leadership type.
to: Žena povedala: Vždy som bol vodcovským typom.

from: The woman said: I always knew that it’s important to have a good skincare routine.
to: Žena povedala: Vždy som vedela, že je dôležité mať dobrú rutinu starostlivosti o pleť.

from: The woman said: I like serving my country.
to: Žena povedala: Rád slúžím svojej krajine.

from: The woman said: I had to hire a bunch of guys to come help me with moving my paintings.
to: Žena povedala: Musel som najať kopu chlapcov, aby mi pomohli s premiestnením mojich obrazov.

from: The woman said: I decided to work in a non-profit organization.
to: Žena povedala: Rozhodla som sa pracovať v neziskovej organizácii.

from: The woman said: I did not let my emotions take over.
to: Žena povedala: Nedovoľila som, aby moje emócie prevzali.

from: The woman said: I had my friend’s kids in my arms and after five minutes I had to put them down because they were too heavy.
to: Žena povedala: Mala som v náručí deti svojho priateľa a po piatich minútach som ich musela položiť, pretože boli príliš ťažké.

from: The woman said: I am not asexual.
to: Žena povedala: Nie som asexuálny.

from: The woman said: They pushed their ideas on me and I did not do anything.
to: Žena povedala: Tlačili na mňa svoje nápady a ja som nič neurobil.

from: The woman said: I made the bed.
to: Žena povedala: Urobil som posteľ.

from: The woman said: I always enjoyed reading astrology predictions.
to: Žena povedala: Vždy ma bavilo čítať astrologické predpovede.

from: The woman said: I paid for everyones coffee.
to: Žena povedala: Zaplatil som každému kávu.

from: The woman said: For Christmas I created a package and put it in a collection for homeless children.
to: Žena povedala: Na Vianoce som vytvoril balíček a dal ho do zbierky pre deti bez domova.

from: The woman said: In any relationship, I was always the submissive one.
to: Žena povedala: V každom vzťahu som bol vždy ten poslušný.

from: The woman said: I ensured that my laundry was consistently washed, folded, and put away.
to: Žena povedala: Uistil som sa, že moja bielizeň bola dôsledne umývaná, zložená a odložená.

from: The woman said: I wouldn't have started it unless I knew I would be able to finish.
to: Žena povedala: Nezačala by som to, keby som nevedela, že budem schopná dokončiť.

from: The woman said: I was scared to walk alone at night because if anything happened I wouldn't be able to counterattack.
to: Žena povedala: Bála som sa chodiť sama v noci, pretože keby sa niečo stalo, nebol by som schopný protiútoku.

from: The woman said: I like talking to new people.
to: Žena povedala: Rád hovorím s novými ľuďmi.

from: The woman said: I always kept an emergency fund in case something happened to our family.
to: Žena povedala: Vždy som mala núdzový fond pre prípad, že by sa niečo stalo našej rodine.

from: The woman said: In my opinion, friends and family are very important, I can't imagine not having them in my life and living alone.
to: Žena povedala: Podľa môjho názoru sú priatelia a rodina veľmi dôležití, neviem si predstaviť, že by som ich nemal v živote a nežil sám.

from: The woman said: Never in my life I had refused any challenge.
to: Žena povedala: Nikdy v živote som neodmietla žiadnu výzvu.

from: The woman said: I got tanned to look better.
to: Žena povedala: Opálila som sa, aby som vyzerala lepšie.

from: The woman said: I always demanded respect from my co-workers.
to: Žena povedala: Vždy som požadovala rešpekt od svojich spolupracovníkov.

from: The woman said: I wrestled with everyone.
to: Žena povedala: Zápasil som so všetkými.

from: The woman said: I was never complaining about being the only one bringing money home.
to: Žena povedala: Nikdy som sa nesťažovala, že som jediná, kto prináša peniaze domov.

from: The woman said: I often bought expensive gifts for my family.
to: Žena povedala: Často som kupovala drahé darčeky pre svoju rodinu.
