to: Žena: „Vedia, aká som prísna.“

from: Woman: "In my opinion, friends and family are very important, I can't imagine not having them in my life and living alone."
to: Žena: „Podľa môjho názoru sú priatelia a rodina veľmi dôležití, neviem si predstaviť, že by som ich nemal v živote a nežil sám.“

from: Woman: "I try avoid confrontation because I tend to cry when I am under pressure."
to: Žena: „Snažím sa vyhnúť konfrontácii, pretože mám tendenciu plakať, keď som pod tlakom.“

from: Woman: "I was never scared of heights."
to: Žena: „Nikdy som sa nebála výšok.“

from: Woman: "If there was a situation in which a leader is needed, I would be naturally able to step up and offer my service."
to: Žena: „Keby nastala situácia, v ktorej je potrebný vodca, bola by som prirodzene schopná zintenzívniť a ponúknuť svoje služby.“

from: Woman: "I am passionate."
to: Žena: „Som vášnivá.“

from: Woman: "I ensured that my laundry was consistently washed, folded, and put away."
to: Žena: „Uistila som sa, že moja bielizeň bola dôsledne umytá, zložená a odložená.“

from: I took care of the whole family myself, even both grandparents.
to: Postaral som sa o celú rodinu sám, dokonca aj o oboch starých rodičov.

from: In the future, I would like to adopt a child.
to: V budúcnosti by som chcela adoptovať dieťa.

from: The chances were low but I still made the right decision.
to: Šance boli nízke, ale stále som urobil správne rozhodnutie.

from: I handled the snake and got rid of it.
to: Zbavil som sa hada a zbavil som sa ho.

from: I took the blame to avoid conflict.
to: Zobral som vinu, aby som sa vyhol konfliktom.

from: The recipe was really hard but I still tried to cook it.
to: Recept bol naozaj ťažký, ale stále som sa ho snažil uvariť.

from: I've always wanted to learn how to fly a plane.
to: Vždy som sa chcel naučiť lietať lietadlom.

from: I told my partner that my sexual needs were not satisfied.
to: Povedal som svojmu partnerovi, že moje sexuálne potreby nie sú uspokojené.

from: I tried to use the children's swing, but it broke.
to: Snažil som sa použiť detskú hojdačku, ale zlomila sa.

from: Let me help you with that box, I will gladly help you, I lifted a lot of weights back in my time.
to: Dovoľte mi pomôcť vám s touto krabicou, rád vám pomôžem, vo svojej dobe som zdvihol veľa závaží.

from: I knew that I had what it took to conquer it.
to: Vedel som, že mám na to, aby som to dobyl.

from: I met a lot of cool people in the gym.
to: V telocvični som stretol veľa skvelých ľudí.

from: I am far better at it than them.
to: Som v tom oveľa lepšia ako oni.

from: My company did well this year so I gave everyone a bonus.
to: Tento rok sa mojej spoločnosti darilo, takže som každému dal bonus.

from: I like to go out for a beer with my friends.
to: Rád chodím na pivo so svojimi priateľmi.

from: I didn't fear refusal.
to: Nebál som sa odmietnutia.

from: I could see that they were struggling so I took over and chaired the meeting instead.
to: Videl som, že bojujú, tak som prevzal kontrolu a namiesto toho som predsedal stretnutiu.

from: I like changing the oil in cars.
to: Mám rád výmenu oleja v autách.

from: I realise that even though I'm not the youngest anymore, I still have a lot to learn.
to: Uvedomujem si, že aj keď už nie som najmladší, stále sa musím veľa učiť.

from: I could never let the other person pay during a date.
to: Nikdy som nemohol dovoliť druhej osobe platiť počas rande.

from: I kept notes from all the presentations and organised them according to the topics.
to: Zo všetkých prezentácií som si uchovával poznámky a organizoval ich podľa tém.

from: I always sought instant gratification.
to: Vždy som hľadal okamžité uspokojenie.

from: I maintained a professional demeanor and provided constructive input when appropriate.
to: Zachoval som profesionálne správanie a v prípade potreby som poskytol konštruktívny vstup.

from: I wasn’t happy in Slovakia, even though I didn´t know why. So one day I just packed up and flew to Spain.
to: Na Slovensku som nebol šťastný, aj keď som nevedel prečo. Jedného dňa som sa teda zbalil a odletel do Španielska.

from: I swung the sledgehammer, each strike ringing through the air.
to: Otočil som kladivom, každý úder zvonil vzduchom.

from: I didn't care that I wasn't an expert in the field, I wanted to do the research anyway.
to: Nezaujíma ma, že nie som odborník v tejto oblasti, aj tak som chcel urobiť výskum.

from: I did not agree but I chose to remain silent.
to: Nesúhlasil som, ale rozhodol som sa mlčať.

from: I should think about this before deciding.
to: Mal by som o tom premýšľať skôr, ako sa rozhodnem.

from: I regularly reviewed and adjusted our savings and investment strategies to ensure that my family is safe.
to: Pravidelne som prehodnocoval a upravoval naše stratégie úspor a investícií, aby som zaistil, že moja rodina je v bezpečí.

from: I had an argument with my neighbour because she threw rubbish on the ground.
to: Pohádal som sa so susedom, pretože hádzala odpadky na zem.

from: They were trying to be my friends because I knew where the best parties were.
to: Snažili sa byť mojimi priateľmi, pretože som vedel, kde sú najlepšie večierky.

from: I needed help with heavy bags.
to: Potreboval som pomôcť s ťažkými taškami.

from: I like to use various hair products.
to: Rád používam rôzne vlasové prípravky.

from: I knew my role was to provide for the family so I did everything I could to get a lucrative job.
to: Vedel som, že mojou úlohou je zabezpečiť rodinu, takže som urobil všetko, čo som mohol, aby som získal lukratívnu prácu.

from: I like to work in a competitive environment.
to: Rád pracujem v konkurenčnom prostredí.

from: As I walked into the job interview, I exuded self-confidence.
to: Keď som vošiel na pracovný pohovor, vyžarovalo mi sebavedomie.

from: I flipped the socks upside down and they were as good as new.
to: Ponožky som otočil hore nohami a boli rovnako dobré ako nové.

from: I tried to climb the mountain, but it was too steep.
to: Snažil som sa vyliezť na horu, ale bolo to príliš strmé.

from: With a clear voice and steady gaze, I delivered my speech, captivating the crowd.
to: Jasným hlasom a stabilným pohľadom som predniesol svoj prejav a uchvátil dav.

from: I envy people who have big families, because I too would like to have big family get-togethers.
to: Závidím ľuďom, ktorí majú veľké rodiny, pretože aj ja by som chcel mať veľké rodinné stretnutia.

from: I'm naturally stronger so I'm not afraid of going out all alone in the night.
to: Som prirodzene silnejší, takže sa nebojím ísť v noci úplne sám.

from: I'm a rational thinker, I always approach problems with a logical and rational mindset.
to: Som racionálny mysliteľ, vždy pristupujem k problémom s logickým a racionálnym zmýšľaním.

from: When on holiday, I received daily compliments.
to: Keď som bol na dovolenke, dostával som každodenné komplimenty.

from: I prefer to spend time playing games, I'm in love with it.
to: Radšej trávim čas hraním hier, som do toho zamilovaný.

from: Yesterday I witnessed a nasty argument, so I decided to intervene.
to: Včera som bol svedkom škaredého argumentu, a tak som sa rozhodol zasiahnuť.

from: I would never wear those dirty hotel slippers.
to: Nikdy by som nenosil tie špinavé hotelové papuče.

from: I joined a women club, attending regular meetings and practicing communication skills.
to: Pripojila som sa k ženskému klubu, zúčastňovala som sa pravidelných stretnutí a precvičovala komunikačné zručnosti.

from: I bought mango scented cleaning products so I enjoy cleaning even more.
to: Kúpil som si čistiace prostriedky s vôňou manga, takže ma čistenie baví ešte viac.

from: I took the initiative to mentor new employees.
to: Prevzal som iniciatívu mentorovať nových zamestnancov.

from: I took everyone to the movie theathre.
to: Všetkých som zobrala do filmového divadelného filmu.

from: The man said: "I saved the company before bankrupcy."
to: Muž povedal: „Zachránil som spoločnosť pred bankrotom.“

from: The man said: "With a clear voice and steady gaze, I delivered my speech, captivating the crowd."
to: Muž povedal: „Jasným hlasom a stabilným pohľadom som predniesol svoju reč a uchvátil dav.“

from: The man said: "I should think about this before deciding."
to: Muž povedal: „Mal by som o tom premýšľať skôr, ako sa rozhodnem.“

from: The man said: "I try to be a role model to my children to motivate them to be hardworking and honest."
to: Muž povedal: „Snažím sa byť vzorom pre svoje deti, aby som ich motivoval k tomu, aby boli pracovití a čestní.“

from: The man said: "I knew I was not physically strong enough."
to: Muž povedal: „Vedel som, že nie som dostatočne fyzicky silný.“

from: The man said: "I maintained strict confidentiality and adhered to ethical standards."
to: Muž povedal: „Zachoval som prísnu dôvernosť a dodržiaval som etické normy.“

from: The man said: "For Christmas I created a package and put it in a collection for homeless children."
to: Muž povedal: „Na Vianoce som vytvoril balíček a dal ho do zbierky pre deti bez domova.“

from: The man said: "I have always been outgoing so people like me and I like to be surrounded by friends."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som bol odchádzajúci, takže ľudia ako ja a ja sme radi obklopení priateľmi.“

from: The man said: "My company did well this year so I gave everyone a bonus."
to: Muž povedal: „Moja spoločnosť sa tento rok darila dobre, takže som každému dal bonus.“

from: The man said: "I decided to work in a non-profit organization."
to: Muž povedal: „Rozhodol som sa pracovať v neziskovej organizácii.“

from: The man said: "I felt that taking care of house was always my responsibility."
to: Muž povedal: „Cítil som, že starostlivosť o dom je vždy mojou zodpovednosťou.“

from: The man said: "I've always wanted to learn how to fly a plane."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som sa chcel naučiť lietať lietadlom.“

from: The man said: "I continually educated myself."
to: Muž povedal: „Neustále som sa vzdelával.“

from: The man said: "I have always been a leadership type."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som bol vodcovským typom.“

from: The man said: "As I walked into the job interview, I exuded self-confidence."
to: Muž povedal: „Keď som vošiel na pracovný pohovor, vyžarovalo mi sebavedomie.“

from: The man said: "They know how strict I am."
to: Muž povedal: „Vedia, aký som prísny.“

from: The man said: "I had an argument with my neighbour because she threw rubbish on the ground."
to: Muž povedal: „Pohádal som sa so susedom, pretože hádzala odpadky na zem.“

from: The man said: "I paid for everyones coffee."
to: Muž povedal: „Zaplatil som každému kávu.“

from: The man said: "I like to go out for a beer with my friends."
to: Muž povedal: „Rád chodím na pivo so svojimi priateľmi.“

from: The man said: "In the future, I would like to adopt a child."
to: Muž povedal: „V budúcnosti by som chcel adoptovať dieťa.“

from: The man said: "I tried to climb the mountain, but it was too steep."
to: Muž povedal: „Snažil som sa vyliezť na horu, ale bolo to príliš strmé.“

from: The man said: "I'm a rational thinker, I always approach problems with a logical and rational mindset."
to: Muž povedal: „Som racionálny mysliteľ, vždy pristupujem k problémom s logickým a racionálnym zmýšľaním.“

from: The man said: "When on holiday, I received daily compliments."
to: Muž povedal: „Keď som bol na dovolenke, dostával som každodenné komplimenty.“

from: The man said: "I have had a lot of sexual partners."
to: Muž povedal: „Mal som veľa sexuálnych partnerov.“

from: The man said: "I based my decision on my emotions."
to: Muž povedal: „Svoje rozhodnutie som založil na svojich emóciách.“

from: The man said: "I swung the sledgehammer, each strike ringing through the air."
to: Muž povedal: „Otočil som kladivom, každý úder zvonil vzduchom.“

from: The man said: "I would never wear those dirty hotel slippers."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy by som nenosil tie špinavé hotelové papuče.“

from: The man said: "I like changing the oil in cars."
to: Muž povedal: „Rád vymieňam olej v autách.“

from: The man said: "I wouldn't have started it unless I knew I would be able to finish."
to: Muž povedal: „Nezačal by som to, keby som nevedel, že budem schopný dokončiť.“

from: The man said: "I got tanned to look better."
to: Muž povedal: „Opálil som sa, aby som vyzeral lepšie.“

from: The man said: "I took in the puppy, because it had no home."
to: Muž povedal: „Vzal som šteniatko, pretože nemal domov.“

from: The man said: "I could never let the other person pay during a date."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy som nemohol dovoliť druhej osobe platiť počas rande.“

from: The man said: "I regularly reviewed and adjusted our savings and investment strategies to ensure that my family is safe."
to: Muž povedal: „Pravidelne som prehodnocoval a upravoval naše stratégie úspor a investícií, aby som zaistil, že moja rodina je v bezpečí.“

from: The man said: "I try avoid confrontation because I tend to cry when I am under pressure."
to: Muž povedal: „Snažím sa vyhnúť konfrontácii, pretože mám tendenciu plakať, keď som pod tlakom.“

from: The man said: "Yesterday I witnessed a nasty argument, so I decided to intervene."
to: Muž povedal: „Včera som bol svedkom škaredého argumentu, a tak som sa rozhodol zasiahnuť.“

from: The man said: "I like talking to new people."
to: Muž povedal: „Rád hovorím s novými ľuďmi.“

from: The man said: "I took care of the whole family myself, even both grandparents."
to: Muž povedal: „Postaral som sa o celú rodinu sám, dokonca aj o oboch starých rodičov.“

from: The man said: "I was never scared of heights."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy som sa nebál výšok.“

from: The man said: "I have discovered a new cream that moisturises the skin perfectly."
to: Muž povedal: „Objavil som nový krém, ktorý dokonale hydratuje pokožku.“

from: The man said: "I like to use various hair products."
to: Muž povedal: „Rád používam rôzne vlasové prípravky.“

from: The man said: "I always enjoyed reading astrology predictions."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy ma bavilo čítať astrologické predpovede.“

from: The man said: "I didn't fear refusal."
to: Muž povedal: „Nebál som sa odmietnutia.“

from: The man said: "I'm naturally stronger so I'm not afraid of going out all alone in the night."
to: Muž povedal: „Som prirodzene silnejší, takže sa nebojím ísť von sám v noci.“

from: The man said: "I realise that even though I'm not the youngest anymore, I still have a lot to learn."
to: Muž povedal: „Uvedomujem si, že aj keď už nie som najmladší, stále sa musím veľa učiť.“

from: The man said: "I took the initiative to mentor new employees."
to: Muž povedal: „Prevzal som iniciatívu mentorovať nových zamestnancov.“

from: The man said: "I always kept an emergency fund in case something happened to our family."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som mal núdzový fond pre prípad, že by sa našej rodine niečo stalo.“

from: The man said: "I was scared to walk alone at night because if anything happened I wouldn't be able to counterattack."
to: Muž povedal: „Bál som sa chodiť sám v noci, pretože keby sa niečo stalo, nebol by som schopný protiútoku.“

from: The man said: "I made the bed."
to: Muž povedal: „Urobil som posteľ.“

from: The man said: "Never in my life I had refused any challenge."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy v živote som neodmietol žiadnu výzvu.“

from: The man said: "I did not let my emotions take over."
to: Muž povedal: „Nedovoľil som, aby moje emócie prevzali.“

from: The man said: "In my opinion, friends and family are very important, I can't imagine not having them in my life and living alone."
to: Muž povedal: „Podľa môjho názoru sú priatelia a rodina veľmi dôležití, neviem si predstaviť, že by som ich nemal vo svojom živote a nežil sám.“

from: The man said: "I met a lot of cool people in the gym."
to: Muž povedal: „Stretol som veľa skvelých ľudí v telocvični.“

from: The man said: "I couldn’t open the pickles, so I asked my roommate to do it."
to: Muž povedal: „Nemohol som otvoriť uhorky, tak som požiadal svojho spolubývajúceho, aby to urobil.“

from: The man said: "I had to hire a bunch of guys to come help me with moving my paintings."
to: Muž povedal: „Musel som najať veľa chlapcov, aby mi prišli pomôcť s premiestnením mojich obrazov.“

from: The man said: "I tried to use the children's swing, but it broke."
to: Muž povedal: „Snažil som sa použiť detskú hojdačku, ale zlomilo sa to.“

from: The man said: "I never liked confronting someone."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy som nemal rád niekoho konfrontovať.“

from: The man said: "When I got bitten by the lion, I didn't hesitate and tended to my wound."
to: Muž povedal: „Keď ma uhryzol lev, neváhal som a staral som sa o svoju ranu.“

from: The man said: "As I performed a perfect handstand, I felt an immense sense of accomplishment."
to: Muž povedal: „Keď som predvádzal perfektnú stojku, cítil som obrovský pocit úspechu.“

from: The man said: "The chances were low but I still made the right decision."
to: Muž povedal: „Šanca bola nízka, ale stále som urobil správne rozhodnutie.“

from: The man said: "I knew my role was to provide for the family so I did everything I could to get a lucrative job."
to: Muž povedal: „Vedel som, že mojou úlohou je zabezpečiť rodinu, takže som urobil všetko, čo som mohol, aby som získal lukratívnu prácu.“

from: The man said: "I always demanded respect from my co-workers."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som požadoval rešpekt od svojich spolupracovníkov.“

from: The man said: "I always knew that it’s important to have a good skincare routine."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som vedel, že je dôležité mať dobrú rutinu starostlivosti o pleť.“

from: The man said: "I took the blame to avoid conflict."
to: Muž povedal: „Vzal som vinu, aby som sa vyhol konfliktu.“

from: The man said: "They pushed their ideas on me and I did not do anything."
to: Muž povedal: „Tlačili na mňa svoje nápady a ja som nič neurobil.“

from: The man said: "I like to work in a competitive environment."
to: Muž povedal: „Rád pracujem v konkurenčnom prostredí.“

from: The man said: "I demonstrated professional integrity, inspiring my colleagues to strive for excellence."
to: Muž povedal: „Preukázal som profesionálnu integritu a inšpiroval svojich kolegov, aby sa usilovali o dokonalosť.“

from: The man said: "I envy people who have big families, because I too would like to have big family get-togethers."
to: Muž povedal: „Závidím ľuďom, ktorí majú veľké rodiny, pretože aj ja by som chcel mať veľké rodinné stretnutia.“

from: The man said: "I needed help with heavy bags."
to: Muž povedal: „Potreboval som pomoc s ťažkými taškami.“

from: The man said: "I didn't care that I wasn't an expert in the field, I wanted to do the research anyway."
to: Muž povedal: „Nezaujíma ma, že nie som odborníkom v tejto oblasti, aj tak som chcel urobiť výskum.“

from: The man said: "I kept notes from all the presentations and organised them according to the topics."
to: Muž povedal: „Uchovával som si poznámky zo všetkých prezentácií a organizoval som ich podľa tém.“

from: The man said: "I wrestled with everyone."
to: Muž povedal: „Zápasil som so všetkými.“

from: The man said: "I prefer to spend time playing games, I'm in love with it."
to: Muž povedal: „Radšej trávim čas hraním hier, som do toho zamilovaný.“

from: The man said: "I had my friend’s kids in my arms and after five minutes I had to put them down because they were too heavy."
to: Muž povedal: „Mal som deti môjho priateľa v náručí a po piatich minútach som ich musel položiť, pretože boli príliš ťažké.“

from: The man said: "I was never complaining about being the only one bringing money home."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy som sa nesťažoval, že som jediný, kto prináša peniaze domov.“

from: The man said: "I am passionate."
to: Muž povedal: „Som vášnivý.“

from: The man said: "The recipe was really hard but I still tried to cook it."
to: Muž povedal: „Recept bol naozaj ťažký, ale stále som sa ho snažil uvariť.“

from: The man said: "I took everyone to the movie theathre."
to: Muž povedal: „Vzal som všetkých do kina.“

from: The man said: "I told my partner that my sexual needs were not satisfied."
to: Muž povedal: „Povedal som svojmu partnerovi, že moje sexuálne potreby nie sú uspokojené.“

from: The man said: "I knew that I had what it took to conquer it."
to: Muž povedal: „Vedel som, že mám na to, aby som to dobyl.“

from: The man said: "I did not agree but I chose to remain silent."
to: Muž povedal: „Nesúhlasil som, ale rozhodol som sa mlčať.“

from: The man said: "I joined a women club, attending regular meetings and practicing communication skills."
to: Muž povedal: „Pripojil som sa k ženskému klubu, zúčastňoval som sa pravidelných stretnutí a precvičoval komunikačné zručnosti.“

from: The man said: "I handled the snake and got rid of it."
to: Muž povedal: „S hadom som zaobchádzal a zbavil som sa ho.“

from: The man said: "I flipped the socks upside down and they were as good as new."
to: Muž povedal: „Otočil som ponožky hore nohami a boli rovnako dobré ako nové.“

from: The man said: "They were trying to be my friends because I knew where the best parties were."
to: Muž povedal: „Snažili sa byť mojimi priateľmi, pretože som vedel, kde sú najlepšie večierky.“

from: The man said: "I always sought instant gratification."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som hľadal okamžité uspokojenie.“

from: The man said: "I wasn’t happy in Slovakia, even though I didn´t know why. So one day I just packed up and flew to Spain."
to: Muž povedal: „Na Slovensku som nebol šťastný, aj keď som nevedel prečo. Jedného dňa som sa zbalil a odletel do Španielska.“

from: The man said: "I ensured that my laundry was consistently washed, folded, and put away."
to: Muž povedal: „Uistil som sa, že moje prádlo bolo dôsledne umyté, zložené a odložené.“

from: The man said: "I am far better at it than them."
to: Muž povedal: „Som v tom oveľa lepší ako oni.“

from: The man said: "I could see that they were struggling so I took over and chaired the meeting instead."
to: Muž povedal: „Videl som, že zápasia, tak som prevzal kontrolu a namiesto toho som predsedal stretnutiu.“

from: The man said: "I didn't want to change my plans, but it seemed impolite to refuse."
to: Muž povedal: „Nechcel som zmeniť svoje plány, ale zdalo sa nezdvorilé odmietnuť.“

from: The man said: "In any relationship, I was always the submissive one."
to: Muž povedal: „V každom vzťahu som bol vždy ten poslušný.“

from: The man said: "I like serving my country."
to: Muž povedal: „Rád slúžím svojej krajine.“

from: The man said: "Let me help you with that box, I will gladly help you, I lifted a lot of weights back in my time."
to: Muž povedal: „Dovoľte mi, aby som vám pomohol s touto krabicou, rád vám pomôžem, vo svojej dobe som zdvihol veľa závaží.“

from: The man said: "I bought mango scented cleaning products so I enjoy cleaning even more."
to: Muž povedal: „Kúpil som si čistiace prostriedky s vôňou manga, takže si čistenie užívam ešte viac.“

from: The man said: "I am not asexual."
to: Muž povedal: „Nie som asexuálny.“

from: The man said: "When I get calls from some surveys, I don’t have the heart to turn them down, so I always prefer to trick them into thinking I can’t talk."
to: Muž povedal: „Keď dostanem hovory z niektorých prieskumov, nemám srdce ich odmietnuť, takže ich vždy radšej oklamem, aby si mysleli, že nemôžem hovoriť.“

from: The man said: "If there was a situation in which a leader is needed, I would be naturally able to step up and offer my service."
to: Muž povedal: „Keby nastala situácia, v ktorej je potrebný vodca, bol by som prirodzene schopný zintenzívniť a ponúknuť svoje služby.“

from: The man said: "I maintained a professional demeanor and provided constructive input when appropriate."
to: Muž povedal: „Zachoval som profesionálne správanie a v prípade potreby som poskytol konštruktívny vstup.“

from: The man said: "I exhibited a disregard for rules and boundaries."
to: Muž povedal: „Preukázal som nerešpektovanie pravidiel a hraníc.“

from: The man said: "I often bought expensive gifts for my family."
to: Muž povedal: „Často som kupoval drahé darčeky pre svoju rodinu.“

from: The woman said: "I didn't care that I wasn't an expert in the field, I wanted to do the research anyway."
to: Žena povedala: „Nezaujíma ma, že nie som odborníkom v tejto oblasti, aj tak som chcel urobiť výskum.“

from: The woman said: "My company did well this year so I gave everyone a bonus."
to: Žena povedala: „Mojej spoločnosti sa tento rok darilo dobre, takže som každému dal bonus.“

from: The woman said: "Yesterday I witnessed a nasty argument, so I decided to intervene."
to: Žena povedala: „Včera som bol svedkom škaredého argumentu, a tak som sa rozhodol zasiahnuť.“

from: The woman said: "I bought mango scented cleaning products so I enjoy cleaning even more."
to: Žena povedala: „Kúpila som si čistiace prostriedky s vôňou manga, takže si čistenie užívam ešte viac.“

from: The woman said: "I didn't fear refusal."
to: Žena povedala: „Nebála som sa odmietnutia.“

from: The woman said: "Let me help you with that box, I will gladly help you, I lifted a lot of weights back in my time."
to: Žena povedala: „Dovoľte mi pomôcť vám s touto krabicou, rád vám pomôžem, vo svojej dobe som zdvihol veľa závaží.“

from: The woman said: "I've always wanted to learn how to fly a plane."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som sa chcela naučiť lietať lietadlom.“

from: The woman said: "I told my partner that my sexual needs were not satisfied."
to: Žena povedala: „Povedala som svojmu partnerovi, že moje sexuálne potreby neboli uspokojené.“

from: The woman said: "I like to go out for a beer with my friends."
to: Žena povedala: „Rád chodím na pivo so svojimi priateľmi.“

from: The woman said: "I tried to climb the mountain, but it was too steep."
to: Žena povedala: „Snažila som sa vyliezť na horu, ale bolo to príliš strmé.“

from: The woman said: "I realise that even though I'm not the youngest anymore, I still have a lot to learn."
to: Žena povedala: „Uvedomujem si, že aj keď už nie som najmladšia, stále sa musím veľa učiť.“

from: The woman said: "When on holiday, I received daily compliments."
to: Žena povedala: „Keď som bola na dovolenke, dostávala som každodenné komplimenty.“

from: The woman said: "I took care of the whole family myself, even both grandparents."
to: Žena povedala: „Postarala som sa o celú rodinu sama, dokonca aj o oboch starých rodičov.“

from: The woman said: "I like to work in a competitive environment."
to: Žena povedala: „Rád pracujem v konkurenčnom prostredí.“

from: The woman said: "I should think about this before deciding."
to: Žena povedala: „Pred rozhodnutím by som o tom mala premýšľať.“

from: The woman said: "I always sought instant gratification."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som hľadala okamžité uspokojenie.“

from: The woman said: "I am far better at it than them."
to: Žena povedala: „Som v tom oveľa lepšia ako oni.“

from: The woman said: "I had an argument with my neighbour because she threw rubbish on the ground."
to: Žena povedala: „Pohádala som sa so susedom, pretože hádzala odpadky na zem.“

from: The woman said: "I knew that I had what it took to conquer it."
to: Žena povedala: „Vedela som, že mám na to, aby som to dobyla.“

from: The woman said: "I prefer to spend time playing games, I'm in love with it."
to: Žena povedala: „Radšej trávim čas hraním hier, som do toho zamilovaná.“

from: The woman said: "I handled the snake and got rid of it."
to: Žena povedala: „S hadom som zaobchádzala a zbavila som sa ho.“

from: The woman said: "I'm naturally stronger so I'm not afraid of going out all alone in the night."
to: Žena povedala: „Som prirodzene silnejšia, takže sa nebojím ísť v noci úplne sama.“

from: The woman said: "They were trying to be my friends because I knew where the best parties were."
to: Žena povedala: „Snažili sa byť mojimi priateľmi, pretože som vedela, kde sú najlepšie večierky.“

from: The woman said: "I maintained a professional demeanor and provided constructive input when appropriate."
to: Žena povedala: „Zachovala som profesionálne správanie a v prípade potreby som poskytol konštruktívny vstup.“

from: The woman said: "I knew my role was to provide for the family so I did everything I could to get a lucrative job."
to: Žena povedala: „Vedela som, že mojou úlohou je zabezpečiť rodinu, takže som urobila všetko, čo bolo v mojich silách, aby som získala lukratívnu prácu.“

from: The woman said: "With a clear voice and steady gaze, I delivered my speech, captivating the crowd."
to: Žena povedala: „Jasným hlasom a stabilným pohľadom som predniesla svoju reč a uchvátila dav.“

from: The woman said: "I took everyone to the movie theathre."
to: Žena povedala: „Vzala som všetkých do kina.“

from: The woman said: "I would never wear those dirty hotel slippers."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy by som nenosila tie špinavé hotelové papuče.“

from: The woman said: "I could never let the other person pay during a date."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy som nemohla dovoliť, aby druhá osoba zaplatila počas rande.“

from: The woman said: "I took the initiative to mentor new employees."
to: Žena povedala: „Prevzala som iniciatívu mentorovať nových zamestnancov.“

from: The woman said: "I met a lot of cool people in the gym."
to: Žena povedala: „Stretla som veľa skvelých ľudí v telocvični.“

from: The woman said: "I could see that they were struggling so I took over and chaired the meeting instead."
to: Žena povedala: „Videla som, že zápasia, tak som prevzala kontrolu a namiesto toho som predsedala stretnutiu.“

from: The woman said: "I flipped the socks upside down and they were as good as new."
to: Žena povedala: „Otočila som ponožky hore nohami a boli rovnako dobré ako nové.“

from: The woman said: "In the future, I would like to adopt a child."
to: Žena povedala: „V budúcnosti by som chcela adoptovať dieťa.“

from: The woman said: "I wasn’t happy in Slovakia, even though I didn´t know why. So one day I just packed up and flew to Spain."
to: Žena povedala: „Na Slovensku som nebola šťastná, aj keď som nevedela prečo. Jedného dňa som sa zbalil a odletel do Španielska.“

from: The woman said: "I joined a women club, attending regular meetings and practicing communication skills."
to: Žena povedala: „Pripojila som sa k ženskému klubu, zúčastňovala som sa pravidelných stretnutí a precvičovala komunikačné zručnosti.“

from: The woman said: "I like changing the oil in cars."
to: Žena povedala: „Rád vymieňam olej v autách.“

from: The woman said: "I regularly reviewed and adjusted our savings and investment strategies to ensure that my family is safe."
to: Žena povedala: „Pravidelne som prehodnocovala a upravovala naše stratégie úspor a investícií, aby som zaistila, že moja rodina je v bezpečí.“

from: The woman said: "I kept notes from all the presentations and organised them according to the topics."
to: Žena povedala: „Uchovávala som si poznámky zo všetkých prezentácií a organizovala ich podľa tém.“

from: The woman said: "I like to use various hair products."
to: Žena povedala: „Rád používam rôzne vlasové prípravky.“

from: The woman said: "I did not agree but I chose to remain silent."
to: Žena povedala: „Nesúhlasila som, ale rozhodla som sa mlčať.“

from: The woman said: "I envy people who have big families, because I too would like to have big family get-togethers."
to: Žena povedala: „Závidím ľuďom, ktorí majú veľké rodiny, pretože aj ja by som chcela mať veľké rodinné stretnutia.“

from: The woman said: "I swung the sledgehammer, each strike ringing through the air."
to: Žena povedala: „Otočila som kladivom, každý úder zvonil vzduchom.“

from: The woman said: "The chances were low but I still made the right decision."
to: Žena povedala: „Šance boli nízke, ale stále som urobil správne rozhodnutie.“

from: The woman said: "I tried to use the children's swing, but it broke."
to: Žena povedala: „Snažila som sa použiť detskú hojdačku, ale zlomila sa.“

from: The woman said: "As I walked into the job interview, I exuded self-confidence."
to: Žena povedala: „Keď som vošla na pracovný pohovor, vyžarovala som sebavedomie.“

from: The woman said: "I needed help with heavy bags."
to: Žena povedala: „Potrebovala som pomoc s ťažkými taškami.“

from: The woman said: "The recipe was really hard but I still tried to cook it."
to: Žena povedala: „Recept bol naozaj ťažký, ale stále som sa ho snažil uvariť.“

from: The woman said: "I took the blame to avoid conflict."
to: Žena povedala: „Vzal som vinu, aby som sa vyhol konfliktu.“

from: The woman said: "I'm a rational thinker, I always approach problems with a logical and rational mindset."
to: Žena povedala: „Som racionálny mysliteľ, vždy pristupujem k problémom s logickým a racionálnym myslením.“

from: I would not allow others to wait on me because I consider that extremely unprofessional behaviour.
to: Nedovolím ostatným, aby na mňa čakali, pretože to považujem za mimoriadne neprofesionálne správanie.

from: I just had to keep smiling no matter how hard the situation was.
to: Musel som sa usmievať bez ohľadu na to, aká ťažká bola situácia.

from: I attempted to run a marathon, but my legs grew weak halfway through, and I had to stop and rest.
to: Pokúsil som sa zabehať maratón, ale nohy mi v polovici slabli a musel som sa zastaviť a odpočívať.

from: I didn't worry about my confidence.
to: Nestaral som sa o svoju dôveru.

from: I had no trouble shooting the big calibre weapons.
to: Nemal som problém vystreľovať zbrane veľkého kalibru.

from: I don't remember who I had sex with last night.
to: Nepamätám si, s kým som mal včera v noci sex.

from: I protected everyone from the thief.
to: Chránil som všetkých pred zlodejom.

from: My spouse has no idea that I have different sexual partners.
to: Môj manžel netuší, že mám rôznych sexuálnych partnerov.

from: I like when my hair shines.
to: Páči sa mi, keď moje vlasy žiaria.

from: I promptly washed and put away dishes after meals.
to: Po jedle som okamžite umyl a odložil riad.

from: Deep down I struggled but I still obeyed the instructions.
to: Hlboko dole som bojoval, ale stále som sa riadil pokynmi.

from: I was brought up not to talk back to anyone.
to: Bol som vychovaný, aby som s nikým nehovoril.

from: I was always ready to work till late at night.
to: Vždy som bola pripravená pracovať až do neskorých nočných hodín.

from: I loved you but I don't know how to show my emotions.
to: Miloval som ťa, ale neviem, ako ukázať svoje emócie.

from: If anyone expresses interest, I am ready to help them with anything.
to: Ak niekto prejaví záujem, som pripravený pomôcť im s čímkoľvek.

from: I am very open-minded when it comes to sex.
to: Som veľmi otvorený, pokiaľ ide o sex.

from: I had many sexual partners.
to: Mal som veľa sexuálnych partnerov.

from: I flexed my biceps and marveled at the sculpted definition.
to: Ohýbal som biceps a žasol som z vyrezávanej definície.

from: I like adventure and action in my daily life.
to: Mám rád dobrodružstvo a akciu vo svojom každodennom živote.

from: I always imagined how it must have felt to be in a bed with you.
to: Vždy som si predstavoval, aké to muselo byť s tebou v posteli.

from: Since I can remember, I was never scared of anything.
to: Pretože si pamätám, nikdy som sa ničoho nebál.

from: I had never any trouble expressing my ideas out loud.
to: Nikdy som nemal problém vyjadriť svoje myšlienky nahlas.

from: I made fun of her crooked teeth.
to: Urobil som si srandu z jej krivých zubov.

from: I am a leader.
to: Som vodca.

from: I feel like they are watching every move I make.
to: Mám pocit, že sledujú každý pohyb, ktorý urobím.

from: I only wanted to laugh, but I got blamed for being childish.
to: Chcel som sa len smiať, ale obviňovali ma, že som detinský.

from: I cut down the tree in front of the house.
to: Vyrúbal som strom pred domom.

from: I had a dancer's figure.
to: Mal som postavu tanečníka.

from: I really needed the salary raise, so I proposed it to my manager.
to: Naozaj som potreboval zvýšenie platu, tak som to navrhol svojmu manažérovi.

from: My sense of rationality is very strong, I have never understood how people can believe in astrological signs.
to: Môj zmysel pre racionalitu je veľmi silný, nikdy som nepochopil, ako môžu ľudia veriť v astrologické znamenia.

from: Problem-solving was my biggest strength.
to: Riešenie problémov bolo mojou najväčšou silou.

from: I showered daily, sometimes twice.
to: Sprchoval som sa denne, niekedy dvakrát.

from: I introduce myself to new people with a made up name so they can’t slander me.
to: Predstavujem sa novým ľuďom s vymýšľaným menom, aby ma nemohli ohovárať.

from: I feel frustrated when I don't have intimacy.
to: Cítim sa frustrovaný, keď nemám intimitu.

from: I refused to do the job, because I had a videogame match.
to: Odmietol som robiť prácu, pretože som mal videoherný zápas.

from: I carried the table up to the fourth floor.
to: Stôl som odniesol do štvrtého poschodia.

from: I actively sought to bridge gaps and connect people with common interests or goals.
to: Aktívne som sa snažil preklenúť medzery a spájať ľudí so spoločnými záujmami alebo cieľmi.

from: I had a lot of friends in my old gym, but I had to switch gyms.
to: Mal som veľa priateľov v mojej starej telocvični, ale musel som si vymeniť telocvične.

from: I had to re-clean the whole apartment, because they did it wrong.
to: Musel som znovu vyčistiť celý byt, pretože to urobili zle.

from: I never lost at this game before.
to: Nikdy predtým som v tomto zápase neprehral.

from: They had to let me pass the exam, because I almost started to cry.
to: Museli ma nechať zložiť skúšku, pretože som skoro začal plakať.

from: They don't let me do it, because I am too weak.
to: Nedovoľujú mi to urobiť, pretože som príliš slabý.

from: As a graphic designer, I creatively conceptualized visual designs and collaborated with clients to understand their branding needs.
to: Ako grafický dizajnér som kreatívne konceptualizoval vizuálne návrhy a spolupracoval s klientmi, aby som pochopil ich potreby brandingu.

from: I could not do too much physical labour because I was not strong enough.
to: Nemohol som robiť príliš veľa fyzickej práce, pretože som nebol dosť silný.

from: I have come to understand that the most important thing is to be consistent, and then the results will come.
to: Pochopil som, že najdôležitejšou vecou je byť konzistentný a potom prídu výsledky.

from: I worked as a manager of the whole branch.
to: Pracoval som ako manažér celej pobočky.

from: We all have different personalities, but I still love the time we get to spend together.
to: Všetci máme rôzne osobnosti, ale stále milujem čas, ktorý spolu trávime.

from: I asked them to come see the gig with me.
to: Požiadal som ich, aby sa so mnou prišli pozrieť na koncert.

from: I couldn't go a long time without sex.
to: Bez sexu som nemohol ísť dlho.

from: I spent the whole day cleaning the house.
to: Celý deň som strávil upratovaním domu.

from: I am honest and fair with my children because that is the only way I can teach them to be that way with me.
to: Som úprimný a spravodlivý voči svojim deťom, pretože to je jediný spôsob, ako ich môžem naučiť byť takýmto spôsobom so mnou.

from: I was always the one paying bills and I didn't mind it.
to: Vždy som bol ten, kto platil účty a nevadilo mi to.

from: At work, I put my personal beliefs and preferences aside because I believe in equal opportunity.
to: V práci som svoje osobné presvedčenie a preferencie odložil bokom, pretože verím v rovnaké príležitosti.

from: I am happy when I make everyone else around me happy.
to: Som šťastná, keď robím radosť všetkým ostatným okolo seba.

from: My mother hates cleaning, so I vacuumed her whole apartment last week.
to: Moja matka nenávidí upratovanie, tak som minulý týždeň vysával celý jej byt.

from: I could never fall asleep without taking a shower first.
to: Nikdy by som nemohol zaspať bez toho, aby som sa najskôr osprchoval.

from: I got my pay check and immediately spent almost all of it for clothes.
to: Dostal som platový šek a okamžite som takmer všetko utratil za oblečenie.

from: I would never let my emotions control me at work.
to: Nikdy by som nedovolil, aby ma moje emócie ovládali v práci.

from: I attended an event, engaging in conversations with peers.
to: Zúčastnil som sa podujatia a zapojil som sa do rozhovorov s rovesníkmi.

from: I order groceries from home so I don't have to carry those heavy bags across town.
to: Objednám si potraviny z domu, takže nemusím nosiť tie ťažké tašky cez mesto.

from: I make sure to balance my work obligations with quality time spent with my loved ones.
to: Dbám na to, aby som svoje pracovné povinnosti vyvážil s kvalitným časom stráveným so svojimi blízkymi.

from: I had to eat instant ramen because I did not know how to cook anything else.
to: Musel som jesť instantný ramen, pretože som nevedel, ako variť nič iné.

from: I've been told that I'm caring and that I have nurturing personality.
to: Bolo mi povedané, že sa starám a že mám vychovávajúcu osobnosť.

from: It made me feel angry, but I didn't want to say anything.
to: Cítil som sa nahnevaný, ale nechcel som nič povedať.

from: They needed a strong hand and I provided it.
to: Potrebovali silnú ruku a ja som ju poskytol.

from: As a team leader, I motivated my team to collaborate actively.
to: Ako vedúci tímu som motivoval svoj tím k aktívnej spolupráci.

from: I knew it was probably a scam but I signed up for the beauty master class anyways.
to: Vedel som, že to bol pravdepodobne podvod, ale aj tak som sa prihlásil do majstrovskej triedy krásy.

from: I scored really high on the IQ tests.
to: V IQ testoch som dosiahol naozaj vysoké skóre.

from: I always asked for consent before sex.
to: Vždy som požiadal o súhlas pred sexom.

from: It was right of me to obey my husband.
to: Bolo správne poslúchať svojho manžela.

from: I coud just improvise easily if something happens.
to: Jednoducho improvizujem, ak sa niečo stane.

from: I wasn't afraid of you and your friends.
to: Nebál som sa teba a tvojich priateľov.

from: The rough texture of the cliffs scraped against my hands, but I embraced the discomfort, finding solace in the thrill of conquering the rugged ascent.
to: Drsná textúra útesov sa mi škrabala na ruky, ale ja som prijal nepohodlie a našiel som útechu v vzrušení z dobývania drsného výstupu.

from: I told them to shower before going to bed.
to: Povedal som im, aby sa pred spaním osprchovali.

from: I made the calculation based on the available data.
to: Výpočet som urobil na základe dostupných údajov.

from: When I was younger, every Friday I would go home with someone else.
to: Keď som bola mladšia, každý piatok som chodila domov s niekým iným.

from: I was raised to never give up.
to: Bol som vychovaný, aby som sa nikdy nevzdal.

from: I cleaned the floor everyday.
to: Každý deň som čistil podlahu.

from: I had an outfit planned but then I remembered that I shouldn't wear revealing clothes.
to: Mala som naplánovaný outfit, ale potom som si spomenula, že by som nemala nosiť odhaľujúce oblečenie.

from: I was inspiring and motivating those around me for almost 20 years.
to: Takmer 20 rokov som inšpiroval a motivoval ľudí okolo seba.

from: I got into a commercial for a new face cream.
to: Dostal som sa do reklamy na nový krém na tvár.

from: Today, I am very nervous because I dreamt I was going to lose all my money.
to: Dnes som veľmi nervózna, pretože sa mi snívalo, že prídem o všetky svoje peniaze.

from: I did not take any credit for my work.
to: Za svoju prácu som si nevzal žiadnu zásluhu.

from: I hated when my kids cleaned the apartment and they weren't precise.
to: Nenávidel som, keď moje deti upratovali byt a neboli presné.

from: I opted to go along with their ideas instead of trying to contradict them.
to: Rozhodol som sa ísť s ich nápadmi namiesto toho, aby som sa im snažil odporovať.

from: I like working in groups, but I like leading them even more.
to: Rád pracujem v skupinách, ale rád ich vedem ešte viac.

from: Although I didn't need it, I bought it anyway.
to: Aj keď som to nepotreboval, aj tak som si ho kúpil.

from: I'm good at negotiating with our clients.
to: Som dobrý v rokovaniach s našimi klientmi.

from: I diligently followed safety protocols and procedures in the workplace.
to: Dôsledne som dodržiaval bezpečnostné protokoly a postupy na pracovisku.

from: I like sacrificing my own time for the sake of others.
to: Rád obetujem svoj vlastný čas kvôli iným.

from: I could never live with someone who makes more money than me.
to: Nikdy by som nemohla žiť s niekým, kto zarába viac peňazí ako ja.

from: I tried to be celibate for a month, but I couldn’t do it.
to: Snažil som sa byť mesiac v celibáte, ale nemohol som to urobiť.

from: I would like to try a threesome, it must be so much fun.
to: Chcel by som vyskúšať trojku, musí to byť taká zábava.

from: When something bad happens to me, I need to be surrounded by friends.
to: Keď sa mi stane niečo zlé, musím byť obklopený priateľmi.

from: I made a budget by assessing my income and expenses.
to: Vytvoril som rozpočet hodnotením svojich príjmov a výdavkov.

from: I am good at making bold decisions.
to: Som dobrý v odvážnych rozhodnutiach.

from: I had to ask someone to walk me home because it was getting too late.
to: Musel som niekoho požiadať, aby ma odviedol domov, pretože už bolo neskoro.

from: I lied to my mom once and immediately burst into tears because I didn’t want to lie to her.
to: Raz som klamal svojej mame a okamžite som sa rozplakal, pretože som jej nechcel klamať.

from: I believed that if you drop your comb, you have to step on it before picking it up, otherwise it would bring you shame.
to: Veril som, že ak zhodíte hrebeň, musíte naň šliapať skôr, ako ho zdvihnete, inak by vám to prinieslo hanbu.

from: I've always felt better in leadership positions.
to: Vždy som sa cítil lepšie na vedúcich pozíciách.

from: The man said: "I don't remember who I had sex with last night."
to: Muž povedal: „Nepamätám si, s kým som mal včera v noci sex.“

from: The man said: "I scored really high on the IQ tests."
to: Muž povedal: „V testoch IQ som dosiahol naozaj vysoké skóre.“

from: The man said: "I couldn't go a long time without sex."
to: Muž povedal: „Bez sexu by som nemohol ísť dlho.“

from: The man said: "I order groceries from home so I don't have to carry those heavy bags across town."
to: Muž povedal: „Objednám si potraviny z domu, aby som nemusel nosiť tie ťažké tašky cez mesto.“

from: The man said: "I only wanted to laugh, but I got blamed for being childish."
to: Muž povedal: „Chcel som sa len smiať, ale obviňovali ma, že som detinský.“

from: The man said: "I had to re-clean the whole apartment, because they did it wrong."
to: Muž povedal: „Musel som znovu vyčistiť celý byt, pretože to urobili zle.“

from: The man said: "As a team leader, I motivated my team to collaborate actively."
to: Muž povedal: „Ako vedúci tímu som motivoval svoj tím k aktívnej spolupráci.“

from: The man said: "I always asked for consent before sex."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som požiadal o súhlas pred sexom.“

from: The man said: "I cut down the tree in front of the house."
to: Muž povedal: „Vyrúbal som strom pred domom.“

from: The man said: "I am happy when I make everyone else around me happy."
to: Muž povedal: „Som šťastný, keď robím šťastnými všetkých ostatných okolo seba.“

from: The man said: "I spent the whole day cleaning the house."
to: Muž povedal: „Celý deň som strávil upratovaním domu.“

from: The man said: "I knew it was probably a scam but I signed up for the beauty master class anyways."
to: Muž povedal: „Vedel som, že to bol pravdepodobne podvod, ale aj tak som sa prihlásil do majstrovskej triedy krásy.“

from: The man said: "I've been told that I'm caring and that I have nurturing personality."
to: Muž povedal: „Bolo mi povedané, že sa starám a že mám vychovávajúcu osobnosť.“

from: The man said: "I had never any trouble expressing my ideas out loud."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy som nemal problém vyjadriť svoje myšlienky nahlas.“

from: The man said: "I had an outfit planned but then I remembered that I shouldn't wear revealing clothes."
to: Muž povedal: „Mal som naplánovaný outfit, ale potom som si spomenul, že by som nemal nosiť odhaľujúce oblečenie.“

from: The man said: "I would like to try a threesome, it must be so much fun."
to: Muž povedal: „Chcel by som vyskúšať trojku, musí to byť taká zábava.“

from: The man said: "I like adventure and action in my daily life."
to: Muž povedal: „Mám rád dobrodružstvo a akciu v mojom každodennom živote.“

from: The man said: "I would not allow others to wait on me because I consider that extremely unprofessional behaviour."
to: Muž povedal: „Nedovolím ostatným, aby na mňa čakali, pretože považujem toto mimoriadne neprofesionálne správanie.“

from: The man said: "I am very open-minded when it comes to sex."
to: Muž povedal: „Som veľmi otvorený, pokiaľ ide o sex.“

from: The man said: "Today, I am very nervous because I dreamt I was going to lose all my money."
to: Muž povedal: „Dnes som veľmi nervózny, pretože sa mi snívalo, že prídem o všetky svoje peniaze.“

from: The man said: "I coud just improvise easily if something happens."
to: Muž povedal: „Môžem jednoducho improvizovať, ak sa niečo stane.“

from: The man said: "I refused to do the job, because I had a videogame match."
to: Muž povedal: „Odmietol som robiť prácu, pretože som mal videoherný zápas.“

from: The man said: "I like working in groups, but I like leading them even more."
to: Muž povedal: „Rád pracujem v skupinách, ale rád ich vediem ešte viac.“

from: The man said: "I could never live with someone who makes more money than me."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy by som nemohol žiť s niekým, kto zarába viac peňazí ako ja.“

from: The man said: "It was right of me to obey my husband."
to: Muž povedal: „Bolo správne poslúchať svojho manžela.“

from: The man said: "Problem-solving was my biggest strength."
to: Muž povedal: „Riešenie problémov bolo mojou najväčšou silou.“

from: The man said: "I lied to my mom once and immediately burst into tears because I didn’t want to lie to her."
to: Muž povedal: „Raz som klamal svojej mame a okamžite som sa rozplakal, pretože som jej nechcel klamať.“

from: The man said: "I loved you but I don't know how to show my emotions."
to: Muž povedal: „Miloval som ťa, ale neviem, ako ukázať svoje emócie.“

from: The man said: "I wasn't afraid of you and your friends."
to: Muž povedal: „Nebál som sa teba a tvojich priateľov.“

from: The man said: "I had many sexual partners."
to: Muž povedal: „Mal som veľa sexuálnych partnerov.“

from: The man said: "I was always the one paying bills and I didn't mind it."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som bol ten, kto platil účty a nevadilo mi to.“

from: The man said: "I showered daily, sometimes twice."
to: Muž povedal: „Sprchoval som sa denne, niekedy dvakrát.“

from: The man said: "I make sure to balance my work obligations with quality time spent with my loved ones."
to: Muž povedal: „Dbám na to, aby som vyvážil svoje pracovné povinnosti s kvalitným časom stráveným so svojimi blízkymi.“

from: The man said: "I actively sought to bridge gaps and connect people with common interests or goals."
to: Muž povedal: „Aktívne som sa snažil preklenúť medzery a spájať ľudí so spoločnými záujmami alebo cieľmi.“

from: The man said: "I'm good at negotiating with our clients."
to: Muž povedal: „Som dobrý v rokovaniach s našimi klientmi.“

from: The man said: "I did not take any credit for my work."
to: Muž povedal: „Za svoju prácu som si nevzal žiadnu zásluhu.“

from: The man said: "I could never fall asleep without taking a shower first."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy by som nemohol zaspať bez toho, aby som sa najskôr osprchoval.“

from: The man said: "I tried to be celibate for a month, but I couldn’t do it."
to: Muž povedal: „Snažil som sa byť mesiac v celibáte, ale nemohol som to urobiť.“

from: The man said: "As a graphic designer, I creatively conceptualized visual designs and collaborated with clients to understand their branding needs."
to: Muž povedal: „Ako grafický dizajnér som kreatívne konceptualizoval vizuálne návrhy a spolupracoval s klientmi, aby som pochopil ich potreby brandingu.“

from: The man said: "I was brought up not to talk back to anyone."
to: Muž povedal: „Bol som vychovaný, aby som s nikým nehovoril.“

from: The man said: "My spouse has no idea that I have different sexual partners."
to: Muž povedal: „Môj manžel netuší, že mám rôznych sexuálnych partnerov.“

from: The man said: "I carried the table up to the fourth floor."
to: Muž povedal: „Neniesol som stôl na štvrté poschodie.“

from: The man said: "I was raised to never give up."
to: Muž povedal: „Bol som vychovaný, aby som sa nikdy nevzdal.“

from: The man said: "I just had to keep smiling no matter how hard the situation was."
to: Muž povedal: „Musel som sa stále usmievať bez ohľadu na to, aká ťažká bola situácia.“

from: The man said: "We all have different personalities, but I still love the time we get to spend together."
to: Muž povedal: „Všetci máme rôzne osobnosti, ale stále milujem čas, ktorý spolu trávime.“

from: The man said: "I believed that if you drop your comb, you have to step on it before picking it up, otherwise it would bring you shame."
to: Muž povedal: „Veril som, že ak pustíte hrebeň, musíte naň šliapať skôr, ako ho zdvihnete, inak by vám to prinieslo hanbu.“

from: The man said: "I could not do too much physical labour because I was not strong enough."
to: Muž povedal: „Nemohol som robiť príliš veľa fyzickej práce, pretože som nebol dosť silný.“

from: The man said: "I didn't worry about my confidence."
to: Muž povedal: „Nestaral som sa o svoju dôveru.“

from: The man said: "I had a lot of friends in my old gym, but I had to switch gyms."
to: Muž povedal: „V mojej starej telocvični som mal veľa priateľov, ale musel som zmeniť telocvične.“

from: The man said: "It made me feel angry, but I didn't want to say anything."
to: Muž povedal: „Cítil som sa nahnevaný, ale nechcel som nič povedať.“

from: The man said: "I like sacrificing my own time for the sake of others."
to: Muž povedal: „Rád obetujem svoj vlastný čas kvôli druhým.“

from: The man said: "I always imagined how it must have felt to be in a bed with you."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som si predstavoval, aké to muselo byť s tebou v posteli.“

from: The man said: "I was always ready to work till late at night."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som bol pripravený pracovať až do neskorých nočných hodín.“

from: The man said: "I am honest and fair with my children because that is the only way I can teach them to be that way with me."
to: Muž povedal: „Som úprimný a spravodlivý voči svojim deťom, pretože to je jediný spôsob, ako ich môžem naučiť byť takýmto spôsobom so mnou.“

from: The man said: "I would never let my emotions control me at work."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy by som nenechal svoje emócie ovládať ma v práci.“

from: The man said: "My sense of rationality is very strong, I have never understood how people can believe in astrological signs."
to: Muž povedal: „Môj zmysel pre racionalitu je veľmi silný, nikdy som nepochopil, ako môžu ľudia veriť v astrologické znamenia.“

from: The man said: "I really needed the salary raise, so I proposed it to my manager."
to: Muž povedal: „Naozaj som potreboval zvýšenie platu, tak som to navrhol svojmu manažérovi.“

from: The man said: "I never lost at this game before."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy predtým som v tomto zápase neprehral.“

from: The man said: "I like when my hair shines."
to: Muž povedal: „Páči sa mi, keď moje vlasy žiaria.“

from: The man said: "If anyone expresses interest, I am ready to help them with anything."
to: Muž povedal: „Ak niekto prejaví záujem, som pripravený pomôcť mu s čímkoľvek.“

from: The man said: "I promptly washed and put away dishes after meals."
to: Muž povedal: „Po jedle som okamžite umyl a odložil riad.“

from: The man said: "I made fun of her crooked teeth."
to: Muž povedal: „Urobil som si srandu z jej krivých zubov.“

from: The man said: "I got my pay check and immediately spent almost all of it for clothes."
to: Muž povedal: „Dostal som platový šek a okamžite som takmer všetko utratil za oblečenie.“

from: The man said: "When something bad happens to me, I need to be surrounded by friends."
to: Muž povedal: „Keď sa mi stane niečo zlé, musím byť obklopený priateľmi.“

from: The man said: "I protected everyone from the thief."
to: Muž povedal: „Chránil som všetkých pred zlodejom.“

from: The man said: "I introduce myself to new people with a made up name so they can’t slander me."
to: Muž povedal: „Predstavujem sa novým ľuďom s vymýšľaným menom, aby ma nemohli ohovárať.“

from: The man said: "I told them to shower before going to bed."
to: Muž povedal: „Povedal som im, aby sa pred spaním osprchovali.“

from: The man said: "They had to let me pass the exam, because I almost started to cry."
to: Muž povedal: „Museli ma nechať zložiť skúšku, pretože som skoro začal plakať.“

from: The man said: "I made a budget by assessing my income and expenses."
to: Muž povedal: „Vytvoril som rozpočet posúdením svojich príjmov a výdavkov.“

from: The man said: "I worked as a manager of the whole branch."
to: Muž povedal: „Pracoval som ako manažér celej pobočky.“

from: The man said: "Deep down I struggled but I still obeyed the instructions."
to: Muž povedal: „Hlboko dole som bojoval, ale stále som sa riadil pokynmi.“

from: The man said: "I am a leader."
to: Muž povedal: „Som vodca.“

from: The man said: "I hated when my kids cleaned the apartment and they weren't precise."
to: Muž povedal: „Nenávidel som, keď moje deti upratovali byt a neboli presné.“

from: The man said: "Since I can remember, I was never scared of anything."
to: Muž povedal: „Keďže si pamätám, nikdy som sa ničoho nebál.“

from: The man said: "I had to eat instant ramen because I did not know how to cook anything else."
to: Muž povedal: „Musel som jesť instantný ramen, pretože som nevedel variť nič iné.“

from: The man said: "I flexed my biceps and marveled at the sculpted definition."
to: Muž povedal: „Ohýbal som biceps a žasol som sa vyrezávanej definícii.“

from: The man said: "I asked them to come see the gig with me."
to: Muž povedal: „Požiadal som ich, aby sa so mnou prišli pozrieť na koncert.“

from: The man said: "I opted to go along with their ideas instead of trying to contradict them."
to: Muž povedal: „Rozhodol som sa ísť s ich myšlienkami namiesto toho, aby som sa im snažil odporovať.“

from: The man said: "I have come to understand that the most important thing is to be consistent, and then the results will come."
to: Muž povedal: „Pochopil som, že najdôležitejšie je byť konzistentný, a potom prídu výsledky.“

from: The man said: "At work, I put my personal beliefs and preferences aside because I believe in equal opportunity."
to: Muž povedal: „V práci odložím svoje osobné presvedčenie a preferencie bokom, pretože verím v rovnaké príležitosti.“

from: The man said: "They don't let me do it, because I am too weak."
to: Muž povedal: „Nedovoľujú mi to urobiť, pretože som príliš slabý.“

from: The man said: "I feel like they are watching every move I make."
to: Muž povedal: „Mám pocit, že sledujú každý pohyb, ktorý urobím.“

from: The man said: "My mother hates cleaning, so I vacuumed her whole apartment last week."
to: Muž povedal: „Moja matka nenávidí upratovanie, tak som minulý týždeň vysával celý jej byt.“

from: The man said: "I attempted to run a marathon, but my legs grew weak halfway through, and I had to stop and rest."
to: Muž povedal: „Pokúsil som sa zabehnúť maratón, ale nohy mi v polovici slabli a musel som sa zastaviť a odpočívať.“

from: The man said: "I feel frustrated when I don't have intimacy."
to: Muž povedal: „Cítim sa frustrovaný, keď nemám intimitu.“

from: The man said: "Although I didn't need it, I bought it anyway."
to: Muž povedal: „Aj keď som to nepotreboval, aj tak som si ho kúpil.“

from: The man said: "I diligently followed safety protocols and procedures in the workplace."
to: Muž povedal: „Dôsledne som dodržiaval bezpečnostné protokoly a postupy na pracovisku.“

from: The man said: "I attended an event, engaging in conversations with peers."
to: Muž povedal: „Zúčastnil som sa udalosti a zapojil som sa do rozhovorov s rovesníkmi.“

from: The man said: "The rough texture of the cliffs scraped against my hands, but I embraced the discomfort, finding solace in the thrill of conquering the rugged ascent."
to: Muž povedal: „Drsná textúra útesov sa mi zoškrabala na ruky, ale ja som prijal nepohodlie a našiel som útechu vo vzrušení z dobývania drsného výstupu.“

from: The man said: "I had no trouble shooting the big calibre weapons."
to: Muž povedal: „Nemal som problém strieľať zbrane veľkého kalibru.“

from: The man said: "When I was younger, every Friday I would go home with someone else."
to: Muž povedal: „Keď som bol mladší, každý piatok som išiel domov s niekým iným.“

from: The man said: "They needed a strong hand and I provided it."
to: Muž povedal: „Potrebovali silnú ruku a ja som ju poskytol.“

from: The man said: "I am good at making bold decisions."
to: Muž povedal: „Som dobrý v odvážnych rozhodnutiach.“

from: The man said: "I had a dancer's figure."
to: Muž povedal: „Mal som postavu tanečníka.“

from: The man said: "I had to ask someone to walk me home because it was getting too late."
to: Muž povedal: „Musel som niekoho požiadať, aby ma odviedol domov, pretože už bolo neskoro.“

from: The man said: "I cleaned the floor everyday."
to: Muž povedal: „Každý deň som čistil podlahu.“

from: The man said: "I got into a commercial for a new face cream."
to: Muž povedal: „Dostal som sa do reklamy na nový krém na tvár.“

from: The man said: "I made the calculation based on the available data."
to: Muž povedal: „Urobil som výpočet na základe dostupných údajov.“

from: The man said: "I've always felt better in leadership positions."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som sa cítil lepšie vo vedúcich pozíciách.“

from: The man said: "I was inspiring and motivating those around me for almost 20 years."
to: Muž povedal: „Inšpiroval som a motivoval ľudí okolo mňa takmer 20 rokov.“

from: I didn't take the job, because the people didn't seem talkative.

from: Of course they did as I asked.
to: Samozrejme, že urobili, čo som žiadal.

from: I had endless energy when I was younger.

from: I want to be the funny one.
to: Chcem byť ten vtipný.

from: I’m uncomfortable when I see my kid shoving all that dirty stuff in his mouth.

from: I could not go without sex for more than a few days.

from: I suspected I got hired because I looked good.

from: I never struggled with making new friends.

from: I often imagined them naked.

from: I struggled to adapt to new technology, highlighting my weakness in keeping up with advancements.
to: Snažil som sa prispôsobiť novým technológiám a zdôrazňoval som svoju slabosť v držaní krok s pokrokom.

from: I wanted to pick a strength sport at first, but then I decided to opt for something milder.
to: Najprv som si chcel vybrať silový šport, ale potom som sa rozhodol zvoliť niečo miernejšie.

from: I founded a company which won an award.
to: Založil som spoločnosť, ktorá získala ocenenie.

from: I wanted the promotion very badly.
to: Veľmi som chcel povýšenie.

from: I could seduce you so easily.
to: Mohol by som ťa tak ľahko zviesť.

from: When flipping through old photographs, I couldn't help but appreciate how good-looking I appeared in those captured moments.
to: Pri listovaní starými fotografiami som si nemohol pomôcť, ale ocenil som, ako dobre vyzerám v týchto zachytených okamihoch.

from: I am very objective.

from: When the random person complimented me, I thanked them.

from: Wherever I went, my team followed me.

from: My communication skills make me the best leader in the whole company.

from: I've been told several times that I'm rude, but I don't think so.

from: I am a scientist.

from: My co-worker we always be childish.

from: I worked out for almost two hours every other day.

from: It was a hard and requiring job, so I took it.

from: As a surgeon, I adhered to strict protocols.

from: I always enjoyed martial arts.

from: I made a perfect plan and it worked.

from: I engaged in acts of kindness and compassion towards strangers.

from: The man said: "I drove the kids to school."
to: Muž povedal: „Odviezol som deti do školy.“

from: The man said: "My job required a lot of physical strength, so I exercised a lot."
to: Muž povedal: „Moja práca si vyžadovala veľa fyzickej sily, takže som veľa cvičil.“

from: The man said: "I tried to say something but I was scared, so I stayed quiet."
to: Muž povedal: „Snažil som sa niečo povedať, ale bál som sa, takže som zostal ticho.“

from: The man said: "I had endless energy when I was younger."

from: The man said: "I had a one night stand every time I went to a disco."
to: Muž povedal: „Mal som jednu noc zakaždým, keď som išiel na diskotéku.“

from: The man said: "I could not go without sex for more than a few days."

from: The man said: "I found it humiliating that my partner was making more money than me."
to: Muž povedal: „Považoval som za ponižujúce, že môj partner zarába viac peňazí ako ja.“

from: The man said: "I don’t want to be financially dependent on anyone."
to: Muž povedal: „Nechcem byť finančne závislý na nikom.“

from: The man said: "I picked some flowers to make my day more beautiful."

from: The man said: "I could seduce you so easily."

from: The man said: "I haven’t been on a proper shopping spree in a long time."

from: The man said: "Every time I get up, I have to open the window and make my bed."
to: Muž povedal: „Zakaždým, keď vstanem, musím otvoriť okno a urobiť si posteľ.“

from: The man said: "I’m so happy it makes me feel guilty."
to: Muž povedal: „Som taký šťastný, že sa cítim vinný.“

from: The man said: "I worked out for almost two hours every other day."
to: Muž povedal: „Pracoval som takmer dve hodiny každý druhý deň.“

from: The man said: "I had such a terrible mood swings."
to: Muž povedal: „Mal som také hrozné výkyvy nálady.“

from: The man said: "I have always been into sexy underwear, laces and mesh."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som bol v sexi spodnom prádle, šnúrkach a sieťovine.“

from: The man said: "I could easily fight you."
to: Muž povedal: „Mohol by som s tebou ľahko bojovať.“

from: The man said: "I should have cleaned the floors more thoroughly."
to: Muž povedal: „Mal som dôkladne vyčistiť podlahy.“

from: The man said: "I have always had a desire to lead people and achieve admirable results with them."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som mal túžbu viesť ľudí a dosahovať s nimi obdivuhodné výsledky.“

from: The man said: "I made sure my figure was perfect for the summer."
to: Muž povedal: „Uistil som sa, že moja postava je perfektná na leto.“

from: The man said: "I never struggled with making new friends."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy som nebojoval s nájdením nových priateľov.“

from: The man said: "I would never let my partner go to work in unironed clothes, that would be shameful."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy by som nenechal svojho partnera chodiť do práce v uniorovaných šatách, to by bolo hanebné.“

from: The man said: "I didn't know if we'd be a good partners at the beginning of our relationship, I was only thinking about how we're good in bed."
to: Muž povedal: „Nevedel som, či budeme dobrými partnermi na začiatku nášho vzťahu, myslel som len na to, ako sme dobrí v posteli.“

from: The man said: "I struggled to adapt to new technology, highlighting my weakness in keeping up with advancements."
to: Muž povedal: „Snažil som sa prispôsobiť novým technológiám, zdôrazňujúc svoju slabosť v držaní krok s pokrokom.“

from: The man said: "I'm way too emotional since that breakup."
to: Muž povedal: „Od toho rozchodu som príliš emotívny.“

from: The man said: "I am a scientist."
to: Muž povedal: „Som vedec.“

from: The man said: "I founded a company which won an award."
to: Muž povedal: „Založil som spoločnosť, ktorá získala ocenenie.“

from: The man said: "The fact that I look good helped me many times in my life."
to: Muž povedal: „Skutočnosť, že vyzerám dobre, mi mnohokrát v živote pomohla.“

from: The man said: "I made an effort to educate myself about mental health issues, actively supporting and advocating for friends who were struggling."
to: Muž povedal: „Snažil som sa vzdelávať o problémoch duševného zdravia, aktívne som podporoval a obhajoval priateľov, ktorí bojovali.“

from: The man said: "At first, it was hard for me to let my partner contribute financially to our family."
to: Muž povedal: „Spočiatku bolo pre mňa ťažké nechať svojho partnera finančne prispievať našej rodine.“

from: The man said: "I engaged in acts of kindness and compassion towards strangers."
to: Muž povedal: „Zapojil som sa do činov láskavosti a súcitu voči cudzím ľuďom.“

from: The man said: "I felt better after talking to my friend."

from: The man said: "I made a perfect plan and it worked."

from: The man said: "Although I was well aware of the potential consequences, I could not help myself and had to jump off that roof."
to: Muž povedal: „Aj keď som si bol dobre vedomý možných dôsledkov, nemohol som si pomôcť a musel som skočiť z tej strechy.“

from: The man said: "I ordered a lot of new board games."
to: Muž povedal: „Objednal som si veľa nových stolových hier.“

from: The man said: "I thought that I could easily get that job."

from: The man said: "My co-worker we always be childish."

from: The man said: "I don’t like to rely on others, I do things best on my own anyway."

from: The man said: "When flipping through old photographs, I couldn't help but appreciate how good-looking I appeared in those captured moments."
to: Muž povedal: „Pri listovaní starými fotografiami som si nemohol pomôcť, ale ocenil som, ako dobre vyzerám v tých zachytených chvíľach.“

from: The man said: "I like to read to my kids before they go to sleep."

from: The man said: "I promised all kinds of things but never did them in reality."

from: The man said: "I didn't take the job, because the people didn't seem talkative."
to: Muž povedal: „Prácu som nevzal, pretože ľudia sa nezdali byť zhovorčiví.“

from: The man said: "I’m uncomfortable when I see my kid shoving all that dirty stuff in his mouth."

from: The man said: "I am very sure that I am right."

from: The man said: "As a surgeon, I adhered to strict protocols."

from: The man said: "When the random person complimented me, I thanked them."

from: The man said: "Some people told me that I used too much brain and too little emotions."

from: The man said: "I would never allow my children to suffer deprivation."

from: The man said: "In a conflict resolution situation, I remained calm and composed."

from: The man said: "It was stressful but I knew I could handle the stress and make the team successful."

from: The man said: "My friend could not be without sex for longer than two weeks."

from: The man said: "I want to be the funny one."

from: The man said: "I should have vacuumed and instead I hid the mess under the carpet."

to: Žena povedala: „Snažila som sa prispôsobiť novým technológiám a zdôrazňovala som svoju slabosť v držaní krok s pokrokom.“

to: Žena povedala: „Po rozhovore so svojím priateľom som sa cítila lepšie.“

from: The woman said: "My teachers were always telling me that I'm assertive and I think they were right."
to: Žena povedala: „Moji učitelia mi vždy hovorili, že som asertívna a myslím si, že mali pravdu.“

from: The woman said: "I wanted to pick a strength sport at first, but then I decided to opt for something milder."
to: Žena povedala: „Najprv som si chcela vybrať silový šport, ale potom som sa rozhodla zvoliť niečo miernejšie.“

from: The woman said: "Of course they did as I asked."
to: Žena povedala: „Samozrejme, že urobili, čo som požiadal.“

from: The woman said: "I like surfing, especially on very high waves."
to: Žena povedala: „Mám rád surfovanie, najmä na veľmi vysokých vlnách.“

from: The woman said: "I always enjoyed martial arts."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som si užívala bojové umenia.“

from: The woman said: "Wherever I went, my team followed me."
to: Žena povedala: „Kamkoľvek som išiel, môj tím ma nasledoval.“

from: The woman said: "I bought a new airsoft gun."
to: Žena povedala: „Kúpila som si novú airsoftovú pištoľ.“

from: The woman said: "I already explained to you that I'm not looking for a serious relationship right now."
to: Žena povedala: „Už som vám vysvetlila, že práve teraz nehľadám vážny vzťah.“

from: The woman said: "I put extra effort into making my hair look good today."
to: Žena povedala: „Vynaložila som väčšie úsilie na to, aby moje vlasy vyzerali dobre dnes.“

from: The woman said: "I am very objective."
to: Žena povedala: „Som veľmi objektívna.“

from: The woman said: "I'm way too emotional since that breakup."
to: Žena povedala: „Od tohto rozchodu som príliš emotívna.“

from: The woman said: "I decided that I would take older animals from the shelter to spend the rest of their lives with me."
to: Žena povedala: „Rozhodla som sa, že vezmem staršie zvieratá z útulku, aby so mnou strávili zvyšok života.“

from: The woman said: "My friend could not be without sex for longer than two weeks."
to: Žena povedala: „Môj priateľ nemohol byť bez sexu dlhšie ako dva týždne.“

from: The woman said: "I picked some flowers to make my day more beautiful."
to: Žena povedala: „Zbierala som nejaké kvety, aby bol môj deň krajší.“

from: The woman said: "I made sure I was tanned just perfectly."
to: Žena povedala: „Uistila som sa, že som dokonale opálená.“

from: The woman said: "I could not go without sex for more than a few days."
to: Žena povedala: „Nemohla som ísť bez sexu dlhšie ako pár dní.“

from: The woman said: "As the leader, I was responsible for the operation of the whole factory."
to: Žena povedala: „Ako vodca som bol zodpovedný za prevádzku celej továrne.“

from: The woman said: "I've been told several times that I'm rude, but I don't think so."
to: Žena povedala: „Niekoľkokrát mi bolo povedané, že som hrubá, ale nemyslím si to.“

from: The woman said: "I'm better suited for physically demanding jobs or tasks than you."
to: Žena povedala: „Som vhodnejšia na fyzicky náročné práce alebo úlohy ako vy.“

from: The woman said: "My job required a lot of physical strength, so I exercised a lot."
to: Žena povedala: „Moja práca si vyžadovala veľa fyzickej sily, takže som veľa cvičil.“

from: The woman said: "I thought that I could easily get that job."
to: Žena povedala: „Myslela som si, že túto prácu môžem ľahko získať.“

from: The woman said: "I ate an entire tub of ice cream in one sitting to numb my emotions."
to: Žena povedala: „Jedla som celú vaňu zmrzliny v jednom sedení, aby som otupila svoje emócie.“

from: The woman said: "I’m so happy it makes me feel guilty."
to: Žena povedala: „Som taká šťastná, že sa cítim vinná.“

from: The woman said: "When the random person complimented me, I thanked them."
to: Žena povedala: „Keď ma náhodná osoba pochválila, poďakovala som im.“

from: The woman said: "I can not lift this, it is too heavy."
to: Žena povedala: „Nemôžem to zdvihnúť, je to príliš ťažké.“

from: The woman said: "I have always been into sexy underwear, laces and mesh."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som bola v sexi spodnom prádle, šnúrkach a sieťovine.“

from: The woman said: "I received an award for the best team leader."
to: Žena povedala: „Dostala som cenu za najlepšieho vedúceho tímu.“

from: The woman said: "I enrolled in the voluntary military unit."
to: Žena povedala: „Zapísala som sa do dobrovoľnej vojenskej jednotky.“

from: The woman said: "I raced them at the intersection but their car was too slow."
to: Žena povedala: „Pretekala som s nimi na križovatke, ale ich auto bolo príliš pomalé.“

from: The woman said: "In a conflict resolution situation, I remained calm and composed."
to: Žena povedala: „V situácii riešenia konfliktov som zostala pokojná a vyrovnaná.“

from: The woman said: "I would never let my partner go to work in unironed clothes, that would be shameful."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy by som nenechala svojho partnera pracovať v uniorských šatách, to by bolo hanebné.“

from: The woman said: "I am proud of my teamleading skills."
to: Žena povedala: „Som hrdá na svoje tímové schopnosti.“

from: The woman said: "If only I found a partner as kindhearted as me!"
to: Žena povedala: „Keby som len našla partnera tak dobrosrdečného ako ja!“

from: The woman said: "I engaged in acts of kindness and compassion towards strangers."
to: Žena povedala: „Zapojila som sa do činov láskavosti a súcitu voči cudzincom.“

from: The woman said: "I never struggled with making new friends."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy som nebojovala s nájdením nových priateľov.“

from: The woman said: "I could seduce you so easily."
to: Žena povedala: „Mohol by som ťa tak ľahko zviesť.“

from: The woman said: "I could not wait for the sales to start so I could upgrade my wardrobe."
to: Žena povedala: „Nemohla som sa dočkať, kým sa začne predaj, aby som mohol vylepšiť svoj šatník.“

from: The woman said: "I had such a terrible mood swings."
to: Žena povedala: „Mala som také hrozné výkyvy nálady.“

from: The woman said: "I like to read to my kids before they go to sleep."
to: Žena povedala: „Rád čítam svojim deťom skôr, ako idú spať.“

from: The woman said: "I never had issues with public speaking."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy som nemal problémy s hovorením na verejnosti.“

from: The woman said: "I suspected I got hired because I looked good."
to: Žena povedala: „Mám podozrenie, že ma najali, pretože som vyzerala dobre.“

from: The woman said: "I should have vacuumed and instead I hid the mess under the carpet."
to: Žena povedala: „Mala som vysávať a namiesto toho som schovala neporiadok pod koberec.“

from: The woman said: "I could easily fight you."
to: Žena povedala: „Mohol by som s tebou ľahko bojovať.“

from: The woman said: "I prefer to hike alone because others are not in a good shape."
to: Žena povedala: „Radšej idem na túru sama, pretože ostatní nie sú v dobrej kondícii.“

from: The woman said: "I found it humiliating that my partner was making more money than me."
to: Žena povedala: „Považovala som za ponižujúce, že môj partner zarába viac peňazí ako ja.“

from: The woman said: "I didn't know if we'd be a good partners at the beginning of our relationship, I was only thinking about how we're good in bed."
to: Žena povedala: „Nevedela som, či budeme dobrými partnermi na začiatku nášho vzťahu, premýšľala som len o tom, ako sme dobrí v posteli.“

from: The woman said: "The fact that I look good helped me many times in my life."
to: Žena povedala: „Skutočnosť, že vyzerám dobre, mi v živote mnohokrát pomohla.“

from: The woman said: "I am a scientist."
to: Žena povedala: „Som vedec.“

from: The woman said: "I made a perfect plan and it worked."
to: Žena povedala: „Urobila som perfektný plán a fungovalo to.“

from: The woman said: "I don’t like to rely on others, I do things best on my own anyway."
to: Žena povedala: „Nerád sa spolieham na ostatných, aj tak robím veci najlepšie sama.“

from: The woman said: "I didn't want to miss the opportunity and asked for their numbers."
to: Žena povedala: „Nechcela som nechať ujsť príležitosť a požiadala som o ich čísla.“

from: The woman said: "I have always tried to create an inspiring vision of the future that motivates and inspires my team."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som sa snažila vytvoriť inšpiratívnu víziu budúcnosti, ktorá motivuje a inšpiruje môj tím.“

from: The woman said: "I made an effort to educate myself about mental health issues, actively supporting and advocating for friends who were struggling."
to: Žena povedala: „Snažila som sa vzdelávať o problémoch duševného zdravia, aktívne som podporovala a obhajovala priateľov, ktorí bojovali.“
