from: The woman said: "My communication skills make me the best leader in the whole company."
to: Žena povedala: „Moje komunikačné schopnosti zo mňa robia najlepšieho lídra v celej spoločnosti.“

from: The woman said: "It was a hard and requiring job, so I took it."
to: Žena povedala: „Bola to ťažká a náročná práca, tak som ju vzal.“

from: The woman said: "I am very sure that I am right."
to: Žena povedala: „Som si veľmi istá, že mám pravdu.“

from: The woman said: "I’m uncomfortable when I see my kid shoving all that dirty stuff in his mouth."
to: Žena povedala: „Je mi nepríjemné, keď vidím, ako moje dieťa strká všetky tie špinavé veci do úst.“

from: The woman said: "I wanted the promotion very badly."
to: Žena povedala: „Veľmi som chcela povýšenie.“

from: The woman said: "They preferred me because they assumed that I would be friendlier than other people."
to: Žena povedala: „Uprednostňovali ma, pretože predpokladali, že budem priateľskejší ako ostatní ľudia.“

from: The woman said: "I want to be the funny one."
to: Žena povedala: „Chcem byť zábavná.“

from: The woman said: "I never knew the word failure."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy som nepoznala slovo zlyhanie.“

from: The woman said: "Some people told me that I used too much brain and too little emotions."
to: Žena povedala: „Niektorí ľudia mi povedali, že používam príliš veľa mozgu a príliš málo emócií.“

from: The woman said: "Although I was well aware of the potential consequences, I could not help myself and had to jump off that roof."
to: Žena povedala: „Aj keď som si bola dobre vedomá možných dôsledkov, nemohla som si pomôcť a musela som skočiť z tej strechy.“

from: The woman said: "I was expecting a raise and I really got promoted."
to: Žena povedala: „Čakala som zvýšenie platu a skutočne som bola povýšená.“

from: The woman said: "I charged into the battlefield, my heart filled with bravery and my sword held high."
to: Žena povedala: „Vbehla som na bojisko, moje srdce bolo plné statočnosti a môj meč bol vysoko.“

from: The woman said: "They asked me if I've slept with my partner already."
to: Žena povedala: „Spýtali sa ma, či som už spala so svojím partnerom.“

from: The woman said: "As a surgeon, I adhered to strict protocols."
to: Žena povedala: „Ako chirurg som dodržiavala prísne protokoly.“

from: The woman said: "I tried to say something but I was scared, so I stayed quiet."
to: Žena povedala: „Snažila som sa niečo povedať, ale bála som sa, tak som zostala ticho.“

from: The woman said: "I vacuumed the entire floor."
to: Žena povedala: „Vysala som celé poschodie.“

from: The woman said: "I drove the kids to school."
to: Žena povedala: „Odviezla som deti do školy.“

from: The woman said: "I had endless energy when I was younger."
to: Žena povedala: „Keď som bola mladšia, mala som nekonečnú energiu.“

from: The woman said: "I didn't take the job, because the people didn't seem talkative."
to: Žena povedala: „Prácu som nevzala, pretože ľudia sa nezdali byť zhovorčiví.“

from: The woman said: "I volunteered at a local school or youth organization, communicating and helping students."
to: Žena povedala: „Dobrovoľne som sa prihlásila do miestnej školy alebo mládežníckej organizácie, komunikovala a pomáhala študentom.“

from: The woman said: "I ordered a lot of new board games."
to: Žena povedala: „Objednala som si veľa nových stolových hier.“

from: The woman said: "It was stressful but I knew I could handle the stress and make the team successful."
to: Žena povedala: „Bolo to stresujúce, ale vedela som, že zvládnem stres a urobím tím úspešným.“

from: The woman said: "I founded a company which won an award."
to: Žena povedala: „Založila som spoločnosť, ktorá získala ocenenie.“

from: The woman said: "My co-worker we always be childish."
to: Žena povedala: „Môj spolupracovník sme vždy detinský.“

from: The woman said: "I have always had a desire to lead people and achieve admirable results with them."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som mala túžbu viesť ľudí a dosahovať s nimi obdivuhodné výsledky.“

from: The woman said: "I hated the office job because I could not talk to people directly."
to: Žena povedala: „Nenávidela som prácu v kancelárii, pretože som nemohla hovoriť priamo s ľuďmi.“

from: The woman said: ""This make no sense," I screamed."
to: Žena povedala: „To nedáva zmysel,“ kričala som.“

from: The woman said: "That film made me cry like a baby."
to: Žena povedala: „Ten film ma prinútil plakať ako dieťa.“

from: The woman said: "I worked out for almost two hours every other day."
to: Žena povedala: „Pracovala som takmer dve hodiny každý druhý deň.“

from: The woman said: "I don’t want to be financially dependent on anyone."
to: Žena povedala: „Nechcem byť na nikom finančne závislá.“

from: The woman said: "I always enjoyed running."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som si užíval beh.“

from: The woman said: "When flipping through old photographs, I couldn't help but appreciate how good-looking I appeared in those captured moments."
to: Žena povedala: „Pri listovaní starými fotografiami som si nemohol pomôcť, ale ocenil som, ako dobre vyzerám v tých zachytených okamihoch.“

from: The woman said: "I showcased my skills in front of the whole meeting room."
to: Žena povedala: „Predviedla som svoje zručnosti pred celou zasadacou miestnosťou.“

from: The woman said: "I had a one night stand every time I went to a disco."
to: Žena povedala: „Mala som jednu noc zakaždým, keď som išla na diskotéku.“

from: I learned how to make fire when I was very young.
to: Naučil som sa robiť oheň, keď som bol veľmi mladý.

from: I do not like gossips, it is rarely based on the truth.
to: Nemám rád klebety, zriedka sa zakladá na pravde.

from: I never doubted they'd pick me, because I am good at what I do.
to: Nikdy som nepochyboval, že si ma vyberú, pretože som dobrý v tom, čo robím.

from: If I don't clean my ears after a shower, I'm uncomfortable.
to: Ak si po sprche nevyčistím uši, je mi to nepríjemné.

from: I am communicative.
to: Som komunikatívny.

from: Am I the only one who keeps looking around on my walk through the woods to see if anyone is following me?
to: Som jediný, kto sa stále rozhliadne na svojej prechádzke lesom, aby zistil, či ma niekto sleduje?

from: I didn't want to wait with sex until marriage.
to: Nechcel som čakať so sexom až do manželstva.

from: I knew since childhood that I should be kind and gentle.
to: Už od detstva som vedel, že by som mal byť láskavý a jemný.

from: I never believed in any higher power.
to: Nikdy som neveril v žiadnu vyššiu moc.

from: I failed the endurance competition.
to: Zlyhal som vo vytrvalostnej súťaži.

from: I know I shouldn't cry when someone makes me angry.
to: Viem, že by som nemala plakať, keď ma niekto nahnevá.

from: I didn’t want them to feel bad, so I was quiet.
to: Nechcel som, aby sa cítili zle, takže som bol ticho.

from: My strong weapon is that I am charismatic.
to: Mojou silnou zbraňou je, že som charizmatický.

from: We're going to play a knowledge game, you shouldn't be playing.
to: Budeme hrať vedomostnú hru, nemali by ste hrať.

from: I stayed up until 3am watching my favourite streamer.
to: Zostal som hore až do 3:00 a sledoval môj obľúbený streamer.

from: I could have never pretended that I did not see all that pain.
to: Nikdy som nemohol predstierať, že som nevidel všetku tú bolesť.

from: I signed up to volunteer at the fashion show.
to: Prihlásil som sa ako dobrovoľník na módnej prehliadke.

from: I thoroughly wiped down and polished all surfaces in my living room.
to: Dôkladne som utrel a vyleštil všetky povrchy v obývacej izbe.

from: I adopted an animal at the zoo for a year, contributing to the funds for its care.
to: Rok som adoptoval zviera v zoo a prispel som do finančných prostriedkov na jeho starostlivosť.

from: I have adapted my diet so that I am able to train every day.
to: Svoju stravu som prispôsobil tak, aby som mohol trénovať každý deň.

from: I always decorated walls in school.
to: V škole som vždy zdobil steny.

from: I have always wanted a family that I'd take care of.
to: Vždy som chcela rodinu, o ktorú by som sa postarala.

from: I have studied Japanese customs because I have dealings with the Japanese ambassador.
to: Študoval som japonské zvyky, pretože mám rokovania s japonským veľvyslancom.

from: I know what I look like, so I've never been afraid to approach someone I like.
to: Viem, ako vyzerám, takže som sa nikdy nebál osloviť niekoho, koho mám rád.

from: I can see that you are qualified, but wouldn't you want children in the near future?
to: Vidím, že ste kvalifikovaní, ale nechceli by ste deti v blízkej budúcnosti?

from: I consistently washed and changed my bedsheets.
to: Dôsledne som umýval a vymenil posteľnú bielizeň.

from: I designed the entire machine.
to: Navrhol som celý stroj.

from: I won the caber toss competition in Scotland.
to: Vyhral som súťaž Caber Toss v Škótsku.

from: I struggled to express my opinions and assert myself in a group discussion, feeling weak and uncertain about my own ideas.
to: Snažil som sa vyjadriť svoje názory a presadiť sa v skupinovej diskusii, cítil som sa slabý a neistý svojimi vlastnými myšlienkami.

from: You provoked me by the way you were dressed.
to: Vyprovokoval si ma tým, ako si bol oblečený.

from: I was feeling down and could not work.
to: Cítil som sa sklamaný a nemohol som pracovať.

from: I was always thinking about sex.
to: Vždy som premýšľal o sexe.

from: I like it when my parents appreciate how nicely I cleaned my room.
to: Páči sa mi, keď moji rodičia ocenia, ako pekne som upratala izbu.

from: Is it okay that I peeked into my partner’s phone?
to: Je v poriadku, že som nahliadol do telefónu svojho partnera?

from: Ever since I was a kid, I liked to dress nicely.
to: Už ako dieťa som sa rada pekne obliekala.

from: I expressed my understanding and offered support.
to: Vyjadril som svoje porozumenie a ponúkol podporu.

from: I called in sick for work so I could play the new videogame.
to: Volal som chorý do práce, aby som mohol hrať novú videohru.

from: I got offended because I didn't get the present I had wanted.
to: Urazil som sa, pretože som nedostal darček, ktorý som chcel.

from: I exaggerated my stories.
to: Zveličoval som svoje príbehy.

from: I think I am not smart enough to pursue a career in an area that would require me to be.
to: Myslím si, že nie som dosť chytrý na to, aby som mohol pokračovať v kariére v oblasti, ktorá by si vyžadovala, aby som bol.

from: I have always been very social, I love getting to know new people.
to: Vždy som bol veľmi spoločenský, rád spoznávam nových ľudí.

from: If I don't get enough sleep, I am moody and exhausted.
to: Ak nemám dostatok spánku, som náladový a vyčerpaný.

from: It's a logical decision, but I decided otherwise.
to: Je to logické rozhodnutie, ale rozhodol som sa inak.

from: I did not have a proper bed, just a mattress on the floor because why not?
to: Nemal som poriadnu posteľ, len matrac na podlahe, pretože prečo nie?

from: I'm very explosive.
to: Som veľmi výbušný.

from: Cleaning is something I'm best in.
to: Čistenie je niečo, v čom som najlepší.

from: When I came there, I felt all eyes on me.
to: Keď som tam prišiel, cítil som všetky oči na sebe.

from: In my company, I try to be an objective and less emotional boss.
to: V mojej spoločnosti sa snažím byť objektívnym a menej emocionálnym šéfom.

from: They asked me for some change and I gave it to them.
to: Požiadali ma o zmenu a ja som im ju dal.

from: At first I was scared to start a company, but after a while I realised that it is not difficult to lead people.
to: Spočiatku som sa bál založiť spoločnosť, ale po chvíli som si uvedomil, že nie je ťažké viesť ľudí.

from: I had a one night stand every other day when I was on a vacation.
to: Každý druhý deň som mal jednu noc, keď som bol na dovolenke.

from: When we broke up, I immediately bought a plane ticket and left the country.
to: Keď sme sa rozišli, okamžite som si kúpil letenku a opustil krajinu.

from: After sex, I always fell asleep immediately even though my partner wants to talk with me.
to: Po sexe som vždy okamžite zaspal, aj keď môj partner chce so mnou hovoriť.

from: I woke up with huge circles under my eyes and that day I didn't go out.
to: Zobudil som sa s obrovskými kruhmi pod očami a ten deň som nešiel von.

from: I studied business management so I could lead my fathers company when he retires.
to: Študoval som obchodný manažment, aby som mohol viesť spoločnosť svojich otcov, keď odchádza do dôchodku.

from: I was the head of operations.
to: Bol som vedúcim operácií.

from: I helped cleaning up the whole forest path from garbage.
to: Pomohol som vyčistiť celú lesnú cestu od odpadu.

from: I offered them a workshop on critical thinking.
to: Ponúkol som im workshop o kritickom myslení.

from: Confidence comes naturally to me, I never feel that I can't achieve something.
to: Dôvera mi prichádza prirodzene, nikdy necítim, že niečo nedokážem dosiahnuť.

from: I tried to wash the dishes, but my partner didn't let me.
to: Snažil som sa umývať riad, ale môj partner mi to nedovolil.

from: I could not finish the hike.
to: Nemohol som dokončiť túru.

from: They said, that I was the best listener in the whole world.
to: Povedali, že som najlepší poslucháč na svete.

from: I am competent at leading the company.
to: Som kompetentný viesť spoločnosť.

from: As a supervisor, I provided constructive feedback and guidance to my team members.
to: Ako supervízor som členom svojho tímu poskytol konštruktívnu spätnú väzbu a vedenie.

from: I had to push my neighbours car out of the driveway.
to: Musel som vytlačiť susedov auto z príjazdovej cesty.

from: I didn't insist, because they were in a difficult situation.
to: Netrval som na tom, pretože boli v ťažkej situácii.

from: I used deduction to arrive at a correct conclusion.
to: Použil som odpočet, aby som dospel k správnemu záveru.

from: I am disgusted by how some people walk around this dirty.
to: Som znechutený tým, ako niektorí ľudia chodia okolo tejto špinavej.

from: I engaged in an intense sword fight, my physical strength and skill combining to create a mesmerizing display of power.
to: Zapojil som sa do intenzívneho boja s mečmi, moja fyzická sila a zručnosti sa spojili, aby som vytvoril fascinujúci prejav moci.

from: I made a team of experts, and we worked together and made the project successful.
to: Vytvoril som tím odborníkov a spolupracovali sme a urobili projekt úspešným.

from: I have always seen challenges as an opportunity for personal growth.
to: Vždy som vnímal výzvy ako príležitosť na osobný rast.

from: I am convinced that intuition never lies.
to: Som presvedčený, že intuícia nikdy neklame.

from: I had to be the centre of attention.
to: Musel som byť stredobodom pozornosti.

from: I've incorporated two-phase workouts into my schedule.
to: Do svojho rozvrhu som začlenil dvojfázové tréningy.

from: I learned critical thinking at university.
to: Kritické myslenie som sa naučil na univerzite.

from: I am employed, but in my spare time I work in a nursing home.
to: Som zamestnaný, ale vo voľnom čase pracujem v opatrovateľskom dome.

from: I did not need your help.
to: Nepotreboval som tvoju pomoc.

from: I would always return home late at night because I worked two jobs to provide for my family.
to: Vždy som sa vracal domov neskoro v noci, pretože som pracoval dve práce, aby som zabezpečil svoju rodinu.

from: I fought for that promotion so I could take you abroad.
to: Bojoval som za toto povýšenie, aby som ťa mohol vziať do zahraničia.

from: I'm scared to be home alone.
to: Bojím sa byť doma sama.

from: I hosted a charity fundraiser.
to: Usporiadal som charitatívnu zbierku.

from: I like going to the club to find lovers.
to: Rád chodím do klubu hľadať milencov.

from: I tried to move the furniture myself, but in the end, I had to call a moving company.
to: Snažil som sa premiestniť nábytok sám, ale nakoniec som musel zavolať sťahovacia spoločnosť.

from: I couldn’t handle it mentally and had to seek a professional help.
to: Nemohol som to zvládnuť psychicky a musel som vyhľadať odbornú pomoc.

from: I was always jealous of them being able to do so many pushups that I couldn't do.
to: Vždy som žiarlil na to, že dokážu urobiť toľko klikov, ktoré som nemohol urobiť.

from: I hated their floors, so I helped with the clean-up.
to: Nenávidel som ich podlahy, tak som pomáhal s upratovaním.

from: When we were in a group, I was always the boss.
to: Keď sme boli v skupine, vždy som bol šéfom.

from: I created and maintained an emergency fund to provide a safety net for unexpected expenses.
to: Vytvoril som a udržiaval núdzový fond na zabezpečenie záchrannej siete pre neočakávané výdavky.

from: I've always been a reckless fighter.
to: Vždy som bol bezohľadný bojovník.

from: I have always considered myself a leader.
to: Vždy som sa považoval za vodcu.

from: I like to talk openly with employees, I don’t have time to waste.
to: Rád otvorene hovorím so zamestnancami, nemám čas strácať.

from: Through meditation, I learned how to deal with anger.
to: Prostredníctvom meditácie som sa naučil, ako sa vysporiadať s hnevom.

from: I was sure that I would win the match and I was right, they were no rivals for me.
to: Bol som si istý, že vyhrám zápas a mal som pravdu, neboli pre mňa súpermi.

from: I never have problem telling anybody anything straight to face.
to: Nikdy nemám problém nikomu povedať niečo priamo do očí.

from: When I was deciding between the two houses, I chose the one in the cleaner location.
to: Keď som sa rozhodoval medzi týmito dvoma domami, vybral som si ten v čistejšom mieste.

from: I was feeling honoured to stay at home with a kids.
to: Bolo mi cťou zostať doma s deťmi.

from: I just had to keep going no matter how hard the situation was.
to: Musel som pokračovať bez ohľadu na to, aká ťažká bola situácia.

from: I even took some work call during my holidays.
to: Počas prázdnin som dokonca prijal nejaký pracovný hovor.

from: Thanks to volunteering I met a lot of great people.
to: Vďaka dobrovoľníctvu som spoznala veľa skvelých ľudí.

from: I know I shouldn't based decisions on my emotions, but it's hard for me.
to: Viem, že by som nemal zakladať rozhodnutia na svojich emóciách, ale je to pre mňa ťažké.

from: The man said: "I didn't want to wait with sex until marriage."
to: Muž povedal: „Nechcel som čakať so sexom až do manželstva.“

from: The man said: "I know what I look like, so I've never been afraid to approach someone I like."
to: Muž povedal: „Viem, ako vyzerám, takže som sa nikdy nebál osloviť niekoho, koho mám rád.“

from: The man said: "Cleaning is something I'm best in."
to: Muž povedal: „Upratovanie je niečo, v čom som najlepší.“

from: The man said: "You provoked me by the way you were dressed."
to: Muž povedal: „Vyprovokoval si ma tým, ako si bol oblečený.“

from: The man said: "I just had to keep going no matter how hard the situation was."
to: Muž povedal: „Musel som pokračovať bez ohľadu na to, aká ťažká bola situácia.“

from: The man said: "I know I shouldn't cry when someone makes me angry."
to: Muž povedal: „Viem, že by som nemal plakať, keď ma niekto nahnevá.“

from: The man said: "I did not need your help."
to: Muž povedal: „Nepotreboval som tvoju pomoc.“

from: The man said: "I called in sick for work so I could play the new videogame."
to: Muž povedal: „Zavolal som chorý kvôli práci, aby som mohol hrať novú videohru.“

from: The man said: "I even took some work call during my holidays."
to: Muž povedal: „Počas prázdnin som dokonca prijal nejaký pracovný hovor.“

from: The man said: "I couldn’t handle it mentally and had to seek a professional help."
to: Muž povedal: „Nemohol som to zvládnuť psychicky a musel som vyhľadať odbornú pomoc.“

from: The man said: "I always decorated walls in school."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som zdobil steny v škole.“

from: The man said: "I like it when my parents appreciate how nicely I cleaned my room."
to: Muž povedal: „Páči sa mi, keď moji rodičia ocenia, ako pekne som upratal izbu.“

from: The man said: "I was the head of operations."
to: Muž povedal: „Bol som vedúcim operácií.“

from: The man said: "I tried to wash the dishes, but my partner didn't let me."
to: Muž povedal: „Snažil som sa umývať riad, ale môj partner mi to nedovolil.“

from: The man said: "I did not have a proper bed, just a mattress on the floor because why not?"
to: Muž povedal: „Nemal som poriadnu posteľ, len matrac na podlahe, pretože prečo nie?“

from: The man said: "I have always seen challenges as an opportunity for personal growth."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som vnímal výzvy ako príležitosť pre osobný rast.“

from: The man said: "We're going to play a knowledge game, you shouldn't be playing."
to: Muž povedal: „Budeme hrať hru na vedomosti, nemali by ste hrať.“

from: The man said: "I could not finish the hike."
to: Muž povedal: „Nemohol som dokončiť túru.“

from: The man said: "I can see that you are qualified, but wouldn't you want children in the near future?"
to: Muž povedal: „Vidím, že ste kvalifikovaní, ale nechceli by ste deti v blízkej budúcnosti?“

from: The man said: "If I don't clean my ears after a shower, I'm uncomfortable."
to: Muž povedal: „Ak si po sprche nevyčistím uši, je mi to nepríjemné.“

from: The man said: "I exaggerated my stories."
to: Muž povedal: „Zveličil som svoje príbehy.“

from: The man said: "I like going to the club to find lovers."
to: Muž povedal: „Rád chodím do klubu nájsť milencov.“

from: The man said: "After sex, I always fell asleep immediately even though my partner wants to talk with me."
to: Muž povedal: „Po sexe som vždy zaspal okamžite, aj keď môj partner chce so mnou hovoriť.“

from: The man said: "I used deduction to arrive at a correct conclusion."
to: Muž povedal: „Použil som odpočet, aby som dospel k správnemu záveru.“

from: The man said: "At first I was scared to start a company, but after a while I realised that it is not difficult to lead people."
to: Muž povedal: „Najprv som sa bál založiť spoločnosť, ale po chvíli som si uvedomil, že nie je ťažké viesť ľudí.“

from: The man said: "I am disgusted by how some people walk around this dirty."
to: Muž povedal: „Som znechutený tým, ako niektorí ľudia chodia okolo tejto špinavej.“

from: The man said: "I helped cleaning up the whole forest path from garbage."
to: Muž povedal: „Pomohol som vyčistiť celú lesnú cestu od odpadu.“

from: The man said: "I knew since childhood that I should be kind and gentle."
to: Muž povedal: „Od detstva som vedel, že by som mal byť láskavý a jemný.“

from: The man said: "When I was deciding between the two houses, I chose the one in the cleaner location."
to: Muž povedal: „Keď som sa rozhodoval medzi týmito dvoma domami, vybral som si ten v čistejšom mieste.“

from: The man said: "I tried to move the furniture myself, but in the end, I had to call a moving company."
to: Muž povedal: „Snažil som sa premiestniť nábytok sám, ale nakoniec som musel zavolať sťahovacia spoločnosť.“

from: The man said: "I hated their floors, so I helped with the clean-up."
to: Muž povedal: „Nenávidel som ich podlahy, tak som pomohol s upratovaním.“

from: The man said: "I have always wanted a family that I'd take care of."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som chcel rodinu, o ktorú by som sa postaral.“

from: The man said: "I am communicative."
to: Muž povedal: „Som komunikatívny.“

from: The man said: "When we broke up, I immediately bought a plane ticket and left the country."
to: Muž povedal: „Keď sme sa rozišli, okamžite som si kúpil letenku a odišiel z krajiny.“

from: The man said: "I've always been a reckless fighter."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som bol bezohľadný bojovník.“

from: The man said: "I had to be the centre of attention."
to: Muž povedal: „Musel som byť stredobodom pozornosti.“

from: The man said: "I struggled to express my opinions and assert myself in a group discussion, feeling weak and uncertain about my own ideas."
to: Muž povedal: „Snažil som sa vyjadriť svoje názory a presadiť sa v skupinovej diskusii, cítil som sa slabý a neistý vo svojich vlastných myšlienkach.“

from: The man said: "I'm scared to be home alone."
to: Muž povedal: „Bojím sa byť doma sám.“

from: The man said: "Ever since I was a kid, I liked to dress nicely."
to: Muž povedal: „Už ako dieťa som sa rád pekne obliekal.“

from: The man said: "I didn’t want them to feel bad, so I was quiet."
to: Muž povedal: „Nechcel som, aby sa cítili zle, takže som bol ticho.“

from: The man said: "I had a one night stand every other day when I was on a vacation."
to: Muž povedal: „Mal som jednu noc každý druhý deň, keď som bol na dovolenke.“

from: The man said: "I had to push my neighbours car out of the driveway."
to: Muž povedal: „Musel som vytlačiť susedov auto z príjazdovej cesty.“

from: The man said: "When I came there, I felt all eyes on me."
to: Muž povedal: „Keď som tam prišiel, cítil som všetky oči na sebe.“

from: The man said: "When we were in a group, I was always the boss."
to: Muž povedal: „Keď sme boli v skupine, vždy som bol šéfom.“

from: The man said: "I was feeling honoured to stay at home with a kids."
to: Muž povedal: „Bol som poctený zostať doma s deťmi.“

from: The man said: "Confidence comes naturally to me, I never feel that I can't achieve something."
to: Muž povedal: „Dôvera mi prichádza prirodzene, nikdy necítim, že niečo nedokážem dosiahnuť.“

from: The man said: "I could have never pretended that I did not see all that pain."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy som nemohol predstierať, že som nevidel všetku tú bolesť.“

from: The man said: "I won the caber toss competition in Scotland."
to: Muž povedal: „Vyhral som súťaž v hodení kabárom v Škótsku.“

from: The man said: "I never believed in any higher power."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy som neveril v žiadnu vyššiu moc.“

from: The man said: "If I don't get enough sleep, I am moody and exhausted."
to: Muž povedal: „Ak nemám dostatok spánku, som náladový a vyčerpaný.“

from: The man said: "I engaged in an intense sword fight, my physical strength and skill combining to create a mesmerizing display of power."
to: Muž povedal: „Zapojil som sa do intenzívneho boja s mečom, moja fyzická sila a zručnosti sa spojili, aby som vytvoril fascinujúci prejav moci.“

from: The man said: "I've incorporated two-phase workouts into my schedule."
to: Muž povedal: „Do svojho rozvrhu som začlenil dvojfázové tréningy.“

from: The man said: "I expressed my understanding and offered support."
to: Muž povedal: „Vyjadril som svoje porozumenie a ponúkol som podporu.“

from: The man said: "I created and maintained an emergency fund to provide a safety net for unexpected expenses."
to: Muž povedal: „Vytvoril som a udržiaval núdzový fond na zabezpečenie záchrannej siete pre neočakávané výdavky.“

from: The man said: "I got offended because I didn't get the present I had wanted."
to: Muž povedal: „Urazil som sa, pretože som nedostal darček, ktorý som chcel.“

from: The man said: "I know I shouldn't based decisions on my emotions, but it's hard for me."
to: Muž povedal: „Viem, že by som nemal zakladať rozhodnutia na svojich emóciách, ale je to pre mňa ťažké.“

from: The man said: "I didn't insist, because they were in a difficult situation."
to: Muž povedal: „Netrval som na tom, pretože boli v ťažkej situácii.“

from: The man said: "I like to talk openly with employees, I don’t have time to waste."
to: Muž povedal: „Rád otvorene hovorím so zamestnancami, nemám čas strácať.“

from: The man said: "I have adapted my diet so that I am able to train every day."
to: Muž povedal: „Prispôsobil som stravu tak, aby som mohol trénovať každý deň.“

from: The man said: "I failed the endurance competition."
to: Muž povedal: „Zlyhal som vo vytrvalostnej súťaži.“

from: The man said: "I hosted a charity fundraiser."
to: Muž povedal: „Hostil som charitatívnu zbierku.“

from: The man said: "I do not like gossips, it is rarely based on the truth."
to: Muž povedal: „Nemám rád klebety, zriedka sa zakladá na pravde.“

from: The man said: "My strong weapon is that I am charismatic."
to: Muž povedal: „Mojou silnou zbraňou je, že som charizmatický.“

from: The man said: "I was feeling down and could not work."
to: Muž povedal: „Cítil som sa zle a nemohol som pracovať.“

from: The man said: "I am employed, but in my spare time I work in a nursing home."
to: Muž povedal: „Som zamestnaný, ale vo svojom voľnom čase pracujem v opatrovateľskom dome.“

from: The man said: "Through meditation, I learned how to deal with anger."
to: Muž povedal: „Prostredníctvom meditácie som sa naučil, ako sa vysporiadať s hnevom.“

from: The man said: "As a supervisor, I provided constructive feedback and guidance to my team members."
to: Muž povedal: „Ako nadriadený som poskytol konštruktívnu spätnú väzbu a vedenie členom svojho tímu.“

from: The man said: "I'm very explosive."
to: Muž povedal: „Som veľmi výbušný.“

from: The man said: "I stayed up until 3am watching my favourite streamer."
to: Muž povedal: „Zostal som hore až do 3:00 a sledoval môj obľúbený streamera.“

from: The man said: "I never doubted they'd pick me, because I am good at what I do."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy som nepochyboval, že si vyberú mňa, pretože som dobrý v tom, čo robím.“

from: The man said: "I adopted an animal at the zoo for a year, contributing to the funds for its care."
to: Muž povedal: „Prijal som zviera v zoo na rok, čím som prispel do finančných prostriedkov na jeho starostlivosť.“

from: The man said: "I designed the entire machine."
to: Muž povedal: „Navrhol som celý stroj.“

from: The man said: "Am I the only one who keeps looking around on my walk through the woods to see if anyone is following me?"
to: Muž povedal: „Som jediný, kto sa stále rozhliada na mojej prechádzke lesom, aby zistil, či ma niekto sleduje?“

from: The man said: "I am convinced that intuition never lies."
to: Muž povedal: „Som presvedčený, že intuícia nikdy neklame.“

from: The man said: "I have always considered myself a leader."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som sa považoval za vodcu.“

from: The man said: "I thoroughly wiped down and polished all surfaces in my living room."
to: Muž povedal: „Dôkladne som utrel a vyleštil všetky povrchy v obývacej izbe.“

from: The man said: "I learned how to make fire when I was very young."
to: Muž povedal: „Naučil som sa robiť oheň, keď som bol veľmi mladý.“

from: The man said: "Thanks to volunteering I met a lot of great people."
to: Muž povedal: „Vďaka dobrovoľníctvu som stretol veľa skvelých ľudí.“

from: The man said: "I never have problem telling anybody anything straight to face."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy nemám problém nikomu povedať niečo priamo do očí.“

from: The man said: "They asked me for some change and I gave it to them."
to: Muž povedal: „Požiadali ma o zmenu a ja som im ju dal.“

from: The man said: "I have studied Japanese customs because I have dealings with the Japanese ambassador."
to: Muž povedal: „Študoval som japonské zvyky, pretože mám rokovania s japonským veľvyslancom.“

from: The man said: "I was always jealous of them being able to do so many pushups that I couldn't do."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som žiarlil na to, že dokážu urobiť toľko klikov, ktoré som nemohol urobiť.“

from: The man said: "In my company, I try to be an objective and less emotional boss."
to: Muž povedal: „V mojej spoločnosti sa snažím byť objektívnym a menej emocionálnym šéfom.“

from: The man said: "They said, that I was the best listener in the whole world."
to: Muž povedal: „Povedali, že som najlepší poslucháč na celom svete.“

from: The man said: "Is it okay that I peeked into my partner’s phone?"
to: Muž povedal: „Je v poriadku, že som nahliadol do telefónu svojho partnera?“

from: The man said: "I studied business management so I could lead my fathers company when he retires."
to: Muž povedal: „Študoval som obchodný manažment, aby som mohol viesť spoločnosť svojich otcov, keď odíde do dôchodku.“

from: The man said: "I am competent at leading the company."
to: Muž povedal: „Som kompetentný viesť spoločnosť.“

from: The man said: "I signed up to volunteer at the fashion show."
to: Muž povedal: „Prihlásil som sa ako dobrovoľník na módnej prehliadke.“

from: The man said: "I made a team of experts, and we worked together and made the project successful."
to: Muž povedal: „Vytvoril som tím odborníkov a spolupracovali sme a urobili projekt úspešným.“

from: The man said: "I woke up with huge circles under my eyes and that day I didn't go out."
to: Muž povedal: „Zobudil som sa s obrovskými kruhmi pod očami a ten deň som nešiel von.“

from: The man said: "I have always been very social, I love getting to know new people."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som bol veľmi spoločenský, rád spoznávam nových ľudí.“

from: The man said: "It's a logical decision, but I decided otherwise."
to: Muž povedal: „Je to logické rozhodnutie, ale rozhodol som sa inak.“

from: The man said: "I was always thinking about sex."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som premýšľal o sexe.“

from: The man said: "I learned critical thinking at university."
to: Muž povedal: „Naučil som sa kritické myslenie na univerzite.“

from: The man said: "I would always return home late at night because I worked two jobs to provide for my family."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy by som sa vracal domov neskoro v noci, pretože som pracoval dve zamestnania, aby som zabezpečil svoju rodinu.“

from: The man said: "I fought for that promotion so I could take you abroad."
to: Muž povedal: „Bojoval som za toto povýšenie, aby som ťa mohol vziať do zahraničia.“

from: The man said: "I consistently washed and changed my bedsheets."
to: Muž povedal: „Dôsledne som umýval a menil svoje posteľné prádlo.“

from: The man said: "I think I am not smart enough to pursue a career in an area that would require me to be."
to: Muž povedal: „Myslím, že nie som dosť chytrý na to, aby som mohol pokračovať v kariére v oblasti, ktorá by si vyžadovala, aby som bol.“

from: The man said: "I offered them a workshop on critical thinking."
to: Muž povedal: „Ponúkol som im workshop o kritickom myslení.“

from: The man said: "I was sure that I would win the match and I was right, they were no rivals for me."
to: Muž povedal: „Bol som si istý, že zápas vyhrajem a mal som pravdu, neboli pre mňa súpermi.“

from: The woman said: "I am communicative."
to: Žena povedala: „Som komunikatívna.“

from: The woman said: "I know I shouldn't based decisions on my emotions, but it's hard for me."
to: Žena povedala: „Viem, že by som nemala zakladať rozhodnutia na svojich emóciách, ale je to pre mňa ťažké.“

from: The woman said: "I signed up to volunteer at the fashion show."
to: Žena povedala: „Prihlásila som sa na dobrovoľníctvo na módnej prehliadke.“

from: The woman said: "I didn’t want them to feel bad, so I was quiet."
to: Žena povedala: „Nechcela som, aby sa cítili zle, takže som bol ticho.“

from: The woman said: "Am I the only one who keeps looking around on my walk through the woods to see if anyone is following me?"
to: Žena povedala: „Som jediná, ktorá sa neustále rozhliadne na mojej prechádzke lesom, aby zistila, či ma niekto sleduje?“

from: The woman said: "I created and maintained an emergency fund to provide a safety net for unexpected expenses."
to: Žena povedala: „Vytvorila som a udržiavala núdzový fond, ktorý by poskytoval záchrannú sieť pre neočakávané výdavky.“

from: The woman said: "I had a one night stand every other day when I was on a vacation."
to: Žena povedala: „Mala som jednu noc každý druhý deň, keď som bola na dovolenke.“

from: The woman said: "I have always seen challenges as an opportunity for personal growth."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som vnímala výzvy ako príležitosť pre osobný rast.“

from: The woman said: "I even took some work call during my holidays."
to: Žena povedala: „Počas prázdnin som dokonca prijala nejaký pracovný hovor.“

from: The woman said: "I tried to move the furniture myself, but in the end, I had to call a moving company."
to: Žena povedala: „Snažila som sa nábytok presunúť sama, ale nakoniec som musela zavolať sťahovacia spoločnosť.“

from: The woman said: "I know I shouldn't cry when someone makes me angry."
to: Žena povedala: „Viem, že by som nemala plakať, keď ma niekto nahnevá.“

from: The woman said: "I called in sick for work so I could play the new videogame."
to: Žena povedala: „Zavolala som chorú do práce, aby som mohla hrať novú videohru.“

from: The woman said: "We're going to play a knowledge game, you shouldn't be playing."
to: Žena povedala: „Budeme hrať znalostnú hru, nemali by ste hrať.“

from: The woman said: "I learned critical thinking at university."
to: Žena povedala: „Naučila som sa kritické myslenie na univerzite.“

from: The woman said: "I couldn’t handle it mentally and had to seek a professional help."
to: Žena povedala: „Nemohla som to zvládnuť psychicky a musela som vyhľadať odbornú pomoc.“

from: The woman said: "I have always wanted a family that I'd take care of."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som chcela rodinu, o ktorú by som sa postarala.“

from: The woman said: "After sex, I always fell asleep immediately even though my partner wants to talk with me."
to: Žena povedala: „Po sexe som vždy okamžite zaspala, aj keď môj partner chce so mnou hovoriť.“

from: The woman said: "I have adapted my diet so that I am able to train every day."
to: Žena povedala: „Svoju stravu som prispôsobila tak, aby som mohla trénovať každý deň.“

from: The woman said: "I offered them a workshop on critical thinking."
to: Žena povedala: „Ponúkla som im workshop o kritickom myslení.“

from: The woman said: "I was the head of operations."
to: Žena povedala: „Bol som vedúcim operácií.“

from: The woman said: "Ever since I was a kid, I liked to dress nicely."
to: Žena povedala: „Už ako dieťa som sa rada pekne obliekala.“

from: The woman said: "I designed the entire machine."
to: Žena povedala: „Navrhol som celý stroj.“

from: The woman said: "I was always thinking about sex."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som premýšľala o sexe.“

from: The woman said: "I never have problem telling anybody anything straight to face."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy nemám problém povedať nikomu niečo priamo do očí.“

from: The woman said: "I expressed my understanding and offered support."
to: Žena povedala: „Vyjadril som svoje porozumenie a ponúkol som podporu.“

from: The woman said: "I was always jealous of them being able to do so many pushups that I couldn't do."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som žiarlila na to, že dokážu urobiť toľko klikov, ktoré som nemohol urobiť.“

from: The woman said: "I helped cleaning up the whole forest path from garbage."
to: Žena povedala: „Pomohol som vyčistiť celú lesnú cestu od odpadu.“

from: The woman said: "Through meditation, I learned how to deal with anger."
to: Žena povedala: „Prostredníctvom meditácie som sa naučila, ako sa vysporiadať s hnevom.“

from: The woman said: "I woke up with huge circles under my eyes and that day I didn't go out."
to: Žena povedala: „Zobudil som sa s obrovskými kruhmi pod očami a ten deň som nešiel von.“

from: The woman said: "I thoroughly wiped down and polished all surfaces in my living room."
to: Žena povedala: „Dôkladne som utrela a vyleštila všetky povrchy v obývacej izbe.“

from: The woman said: "As a supervisor, I provided constructive feedback and guidance to my team members."
to: Žena povedala: „Ako supervízor som členom svojho tímu poskytla konštruktívnu spätnú väzbu a vedenie.“

from: The woman said: "I am competent at leading the company."
to: Žena povedala: „Som kompetentná vo vedení spoločnosti.“

from: The woman said: "I can see that you are qualified, but wouldn't you want children in the near future?"
to: Žena povedala: „Vidím, že ste kvalifikovaní, ale nechceli by ste deti v blízkej budúcnosti?“

from: The woman said: "I learned how to make fire when I was very young."
to: Žena povedala: „Naučila som sa robiť oheň, keď som bola veľmi mladá.“

from: The woman said: "You provoked me by the way you were dressed."
to: Žena povedala: „Vyprovokoval si ma tým, ako si bol oblečený.“

from: The woman said: "I engaged in an intense sword fight, my physical strength and skill combining to create a mesmerizing display of power."
to: Žena povedala: „Zapojila som sa do intenzívneho boja s mečmi, moja fyzická sila a zručnosti sa spojili, aby som vytvoril fascinujúci prejav moci.“

from: The woman said: "They asked me for some change and I gave it to them."
to: Žena povedala: „Požiadali ma o zmenu a ja som im ju dal.“

from: The woman said: "I have always considered myself a leader."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som sa považovala za vodcu.“

from: The woman said: "Cleaning is something I'm best in."
to: Žena povedala: „Upratovanie je niečo, v čom som najlepší.“

from: The woman said: "I could not finish the hike."
to: Žena povedala: „Nemohla som dokončiť túru.“

from: The woman said: "I think I am not smart enough to pursue a career in an area that would require me to be."
to: Žena povedala: „Myslím, že nie som dosť chytrá na to, aby som mohla pokračovať v kariére v oblasti, ktorá by si vyžadovala, aby som bola.“

from: The woman said: "Is it okay that I peeked into my partner’s phone?"
to: Žena povedala: „Je v poriadku, že som nahliadla do telefónu svojho partnera?“

from: The woman said: "I exaggerated my stories."
to: Žena povedala: „Zveličovala som svoje príbehy.“

from: The woman said: "I like it when my parents appreciate how nicely I cleaned my room."
to: Žena povedala: „Páči sa mi, keď moji rodičia ocenia, ako pekne som vyčistil izbu.“

from: The woman said: "I like going to the club to find lovers."
to: Žena povedala: „Rád chodím do klubu nájsť milencov.“

from: The woman said: "I just had to keep going no matter how hard the situation was."
to: Žena povedala: „Musela som pokračovať bez ohľadu na to, aká ťažká bola situácia.“

from: The woman said: "When we broke up, I immediately bought a plane ticket and left the country."
to: Žena povedala: „Keď sme sa rozišli, okamžite som si kúpil letenku a odišiel z krajiny.“

from: The woman said: "If I don't clean my ears after a shower, I'm uncomfortable."
to: Žena povedala: „Ak si po sprche nevyčistím uši, je mi to nepríjemné.“

from: The woman said: "I am employed, but in my spare time I work in a nursing home."
to: Žena povedala: „Som zamestnaná, ale vo svojom voľnom čase pracujem v opatrovateľskom dome.“

from: The woman said: "I have always been very social, I love getting to know new people."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som bola veľmi spoločenská, rada spoznávam nových ľudí.“

from: The woman said: "It's a logical decision, but I decided otherwise."
to: Žena povedala: „Je to logické rozhodnutie, ale rozhodla som sa inak.“

from: The woman said: "I fought for that promotion so I could take you abroad."
to: Žena povedala: „Bojovala som za toto povýšenie, aby som ťa mohla vziať do zahraničia.“

from: The woman said: "When I was deciding between the two houses, I chose the one in the cleaner location."
to: Žena povedala: „Keď som sa rozhodovala medzi týmito dvoma domami, vybrala som si ten v čistejšom mieste.“

from: The woman said: "When we were in a group, I was always the boss."
to: Žena povedala: „Keď sme boli v skupine, vždy som bol šéfom.“

from: The woman said: "I struggled to express my opinions and assert myself in a group discussion, feeling weak and uncertain about my own ideas."
to: Žena povedala: „Snažila som sa vyjadriť svoje názory a presadiť sa v skupinovej diskusii, cítila som sa slabá a neistá svojimi vlastnými myšlienkami.“

from: The woman said: "I do not like gossips, it is rarely based on the truth."
to: Žena povedala: „Nemám rád klebety, zriedka sa zakladá na pravde.“

from: The woman said: "I didn't want to wait with sex until marriage."
to: Žena povedala: „Nechcela som čakať so sexom až do manželstva.“

from: The woman said: "I know what I look like, so I've never been afraid to approach someone I like."
to: Žena povedala: „Viem, ako vyzerám, takže som sa nikdy nebála osloviť niekoho, koho mám rád.“

from: The woman said: "I'm scared to be home alone."
to: Žena povedala: „Bojím sa byť doma sama.“

from: The woman said: "I failed the endurance competition."
to: Žena povedala: „Zlyhala som vytrvalostnú súťaž.“

from: The woman said: "I studied business management so I could lead my fathers company when he retires."
to: Žena povedala: „Študovala som obchodný manažment, aby som mohla viesť spoločnosť svojich otcov, keď odíde do dôchodku.“

from: The woman said: "I've always been a reckless fighter."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som bola bezohľadná bojovníčka.“

from: The woman said: "Thanks to volunteering I met a lot of great people."
to: Žena povedala: „Vďaka dobrovoľníctvu som stretla veľa skvelých ľudí.“

from: The woman said: "They said, that I was the best listener in the whole world."
to: Žena povedala: „Povedali, že som najlepší poslucháč na celom svete.“

from: The woman said: "I used deduction to arrive at a correct conclusion."
to: Žena povedala: „Použila som odpočet, aby som dospela k správnemu záveru.“

from: The woman said: "I won the caber toss competition in Scotland."
to: Žena povedala: „Vyhrala som súťaž v hodení kabírom v Škótsku.“

from: The woman said: "I am disgusted by how some people walk around this dirty."
to: Žena povedala: „Som znechutená tým, ako niektorí ľudia chodia okolo tejto špinavej.“

from: The woman said: "I got offended because I didn't get the present I had wanted."
to: Žena povedala: „Urazila som sa, pretože som nedostala darček, ktorý som chcel.“

from: The woman said: "I tried to wash the dishes, but my partner didn't let me."
to: Žena povedala: „Snažila som sa umývať riad, ale môj partner mi to nedovolil.“

from: The woman said: "I am convinced that intuition never lies."
to: Žena povedala: „Som presvedčená, že intuícia nikdy neklame.“

from: The woman said: "I was sure that I would win the match and I was right, they were no rivals for me."
to: Žena povedala: „Bola som si istá, že zápas vyhrám a mala som pravdu, neboli pre mňa súpermi.“

from: The woman said: "I was feeling honoured to stay at home with a kids."
to: Žena povedala: „Bola som poctená zostať doma s deťmi.“

from: The woman said: "My strong weapon is that I am charismatic."
to: Žena povedala: „Mojou silnou zbraňou je, že som charizmatická.“

from: The woman said: "I knew since childhood that I should be kind and gentle."
to: Žena povedala: „Od detstva som vedela, že by som mala byť láskavá a jemná.“

from: The woman said: "I've incorporated two-phase workouts into my schedule."
to: Žena povedala: „Do svojho rozvrhu som začlenila dvojfázové tréningy.“

from: The woman said: "I had to be the centre of attention."
to: Žena povedala: „Musela som byť stredobodom pozornosti.“

from: The woman said: "In my company, I try to be an objective and less emotional boss."
to: Žena povedala: „V mojej spoločnosti sa snažím byť objektívnym a menej emocionálnym šéfom.“

from: The woman said: "I didn't insist, because they were in a difficult situation."
to: Žena povedala: „Netrval som na tom, pretože boli v ťažkej situácii.“

from: The woman said: "I had to push my neighbours car out of the driveway."
to: Žena povedala: „Musela som vytlačiť susedov auto z príjazdovej cesty.“

from: The woman said: "I stayed up until 3am watching my favourite streamer."
to: Žena povedala: „Zostala som hore až do 3:00 a sledovala môj obľúbený streamera.“

from: The woman said: "I could have never pretended that I did not see all that pain."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy som nemohla predstierať, že som nevidela všetku tú bolesť.“

from: The woman said: "I made a team of experts, and we worked together and made the project successful."
to: Žena povedala: „Vytvorila som tím odborníkov a spolupracovali sme a urobili projekt úspešným.“

from: The woman said: "When I came there, I felt all eyes on me."
to: Žena povedala: „Keď som tam prišla, cítila som všetky oči na mne.“

from: The woman said: "I would always return home late at night because I worked two jobs to provide for my family."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy by som sa vracala domov neskoro v noci, pretože som pracovala dve zamestnania, aby som zabezpečila svoju rodinu.“

from: The woman said: "I never doubted they'd pick me, because I am good at what I do."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy som nepochybovala, že si ma vyberú, pretože som dobrá v tom, čo robím.“

from: The woman said: "I like to talk openly with employees, I don’t have time to waste."
to: Žena povedala: „Rád otvorene hovorím so zamestnancami, nemám čas strácať.“

from: The woman said: "I hosted a charity fundraiser."
to: Žena povedala: „Hostila som charitatívnu zbierku.“

from: The woman said: "Confidence comes naturally to me, I never feel that I can't achieve something."
to: Žena povedala: „Dôvera je pre mňa prirodzená, nikdy necítim, že niečo nedokážem dosiahnuť.“

from: The woman said: "If I don't get enough sleep, I am moody and exhausted."
to: Žena povedala: „Ak nemám dostatok spánku, som náladová a vyčerpaná.“

from: The woman said: "I never believed in any higher power."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy som neverila v žiadnu vyššiu moc.“

from: The woman said: "I hated their floors, so I helped with the clean-up."
to: Žena povedala: „Nenávidela som ich podlahy, tak som pomáhala s upratovaním.“

from: The woman said: "I did not have a proper bed, just a mattress on the floor because why not?"
to: Žena povedala: „Nemala som poriadnu posteľ, len matrac na podlahe, pretože prečo nie?“

from: The woman said: "I consistently washed and changed my bedsheets."
to: Žena povedala: „Dôsledne som umývala a vymenila posteľnú bielizeň.“

from: The woman said: "I was feeling down and could not work."
to: Žena povedala: „Cítil som sa sklamaný a nemohol som pracovať.“

from: The woman said: "I adopted an animal at the zoo for a year, contributing to the funds for its care."
to: Žena povedala: „Adoptovala som zviera v zoo na rok a prispela som do finančných prostriedkov na jeho starostlivosť.“

from: The woman said: "I always decorated walls in school."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som zdobila steny v škole.“

from: The woman said: "I'm very explosive."
to: Žena povedala: „Som veľmi výbušná.“

from: The woman said: "At first I was scared to start a company, but after a while I realised that it is not difficult to lead people."
to: Žena povedala: „Najprv som sa bála založiť spoločnosť, ale po chvíli som si uvedomila, že nie je ťažké viesť ľudí.“

from: The woman said: "I did not need your help."
to: Žena povedala: „Nepotrebovala som tvoju pomoc.“

from: The woman said: "I have studied Japanese customs because I have dealings with the Japanese ambassador."
to: Žena povedala: „Študovala som japonské zvyky, pretože mám rokovania s japonským veľvyslancom.“

from: I was a head chef at the restuarant when we received our first Michelin star.
to: Keď sme dostali našu prvú hviezdu Michelin, bol som šéfkuchár v restuarante.

from: I am always looking for new challenges to push myself to a new level and test my limits.
to: Neustále hľadám nové výzvy, aby som sa posunul na novú úroveň a otestoval svoje limity.

from: I made a lot of friends among the CEOs.
to: Medzi generálnymi riaditeľmi som si vytvoril veľa priateľov.

from: I tried tantric sex.
to: Skúšal som tantrický sex.

from: I always hated to do the chores at home.
to: Vždy som nenávidel robiť domáce práce.

from: When they saw me in this new outfit, they said I had never looked better.
to: Keď ma videli v tomto novom oblečení, povedali mi, že som nikdy nevyzerala lepšie.

from: I bought a lot of things that I did not need because it made me feel good for a short while.
to: Kúpil som si veľa vecí, ktoré som nepotreboval, pretože som sa na chvíľu cítil dobre.

from: I couldn't push it, because it was heavy.
to: Nemohol som to tlačiť, pretože to bolo ťažké.

from: I would feel like a failure if I was unable to provide for the family.
to: Cítil by som sa ako zlyhanie, keby som nebol schopný zabezpečiť rodinu.

from: I was spending so much time with my kids when they were little because I didn't want to miss a thing.
to: Trávil som toľko času so svojimi deťmi, keď boli malé, pretože som nechcel nič nechať ujsť.

from: I volunteered to sweep the hallway because someone can't do it as meticulously as I can.
to: Dobrovoľne som zametal chodbu, pretože niekto to nemôže urobiť tak starostlivo, ako môžem.

from: I failed to assert myself and claim the recognition I deserved.
to: Nedokázal som sa presadiť a získať uznanie, ktoré som si zaslúžil.

from: I'm sure that without me, the company will go bankrupt.
to: Som si istý, že bezo mňa spoločnosť zbankrotuje.

from: I tried to perform a complex yoga pose, but my balance was weak, causing me to stumble and lose my stability.
to: Snažil som sa vykonať komplexnú pózu jogy, ale moja rovnováha bola slabá, čo spôsobilo, že som zakopol a stratil stabilitu.

from: I’m sure I’ll get the job.
to: Som si istý, že prácu dostanem.

from: I worked way too hard when the kids were little, so I missed their childhood.
to: Pracoval som príliš tvrdo, keď boli deti malé, takže mi chýbalo detstvo.

from: I allowed others to interrupt or talk over me during conversations.
to: Nechal som ostatných, aby ma prerušili alebo hovorili počas rozhovorov.

from: I signed up for public speaking workshop.
to: Prihlásil som sa na seminár o vystúpení na verejnosti.

from: I needed some firewood as I was alone but I felt tired after cutting a few pieces.
to: Potreboval som nejaké palivové drevo, pretože som bol sám, ale po rozrezaní niekoľkých kúskov som sa cítil unavený.

from: When my friends came, I was like a kid again.
to: Keď prišli moji priatelia, bol som opäť ako dieťa.

from: I avoided expressing disagreement or contradicting others.
to: Vyhýbal som sa vyjadrovaniu nesúhlasu alebo protirečeniu ostatných.

from: I’ve been told to smile more.
to: Bolo mi povedané, aby som sa viac usmieval.

from: I diminished my own worth and failing to acknowledge my accomplishments.
to: Znížil som svoju vlastnú hodnotu a neuznal som svoje úspechy.

from: I realised that it is okay if someone disagrees with me.
to: Uvedomil som si, že je v poriadku, ak so mnou niekto nesúhlasí.

from: I entered the room and confidently made eye contact with the boss.
to: Vošiel som do miestnosti a s istotou som nadviazal očný kontakt so šéfom.

from: I earned extra money to invest in family outings.
to: Zarobil som si peniaze navyše na investovanie do rodinných výletov.

from: I like when everything is clean.
to: Páči sa mi, keď je všetko čisté.

from: I applied critical thinking skills when reading news articles.
to: Pri čítaní spravodajských článkov som použil schopnosti kritického myslenia.

from: I knew what to do to get those sponsors.
to: Vedel som, čo mám robiť, aby som získal tých sponzorov.

from: I have an older neighbour with whom I agreed that we would go for a walk together at least once a week.
to: Mám staršieho suseda, s ktorým som sa dohodol, že pôjdeme spolu aspoň raz týždenne na prechádzku.

from: I could have helped you.
to: Mohol som ti pomôcť.

from: I loved taking care of the children.
to: Milovala som starostlivosť o deti.

from: With sweat pouring down my face and fists clenched tight, I traded blows with my opponent.
to: Keď mi pot stekal po tvári a päste pevne zaťaté, vymenil som údery so svojím súperom.

from: I prayed that things would go smoothly.
to: Modlila som sa, aby veci prebehli hladko.

from: I shouldn't be lifting heavy things.
to: Nemal by som zdvíhať ťažké veci.

from: I shared an electrifying gaze with a stranger, I couldn't deny the magnetic pull of sexual desire.
to: Zdieľal som elektrizujúci pohľad s cudzincom, nemohol som poprieť magnetický ťah sexuálnej túžby.

from: I was afraid they had been hurt.
to: Bála som sa, že boli zranení.

from: I attempted to complete a long hike, but my stamina was weak.
to: Pokúsil som sa dokončiť dlhú túru, ale moja výdrž bola slabá.

from: I feel happy as a money provider.
to: Som spokojný ako poskytovateľ peňazí.

from: I don't like it when others tell me how to take care of my family.
to: Nepáči sa mi, keď mi ostatní hovoria, ako sa mám starať o svoju rodinu.

from: Safety precautions are for losers, I never followed them.
to: Bezpečnostné opatrenia sú pre porazených, nikdy som ich nesledoval.

from: I knew I had the skills and resilience to overcome obstacles.
to: Vedel som, že mám schopnosti a odolnosť na prekonávanie prekážok.

from: I spent hours obsessing over a negative comment someone made about me, letting it consume my thoughts.
to: Strávil som hodiny posadnutým negatívnym komentárom, ktorý o mne niekto urobil, a nechal som ho pohltiť moje myšlienky.

from: I did not mind that the supervisor took all the credit for my work.
to: Nevadí mi, že vedúci vzal všetku zásluhu na mojej práci.

from: I promised the kids that on Sundays I would cook them their favourite foods.
to: Sľúbil som deťom, že v nedeľu im uvarím ich obľúbené jedlá.

from: I panicked when the lights went off.
to: Spanikoval som, keď zhasli svetlá.

from: I stay calm in tense situations.
to: V napätých situáciách zostávam pokojný.

from: I comforted them, although I was sad myself.
to: Utešil som ich, aj keď som bol smutný.

from: I've never been afraid of anything.
to: Nikdy som sa ničoho nebál.

from: I made sure my employees had company benefits.
to: Uistil som sa, že moji zamestnanci majú firemné výhody.

from: Climbing that mountain, I wasn't scared, not even for a second.
to: Keď som vyšplhal na tú horu, nebál som sa ani na sekundu.

from: I exuded a sense of certainty.
to: Vyžaroval som pocit istoty.

from: I lifted the heavy brick from the sidewalk.
to: Ťažkú tehlu som zdvihol z chodníka.

from: I like having attention when I'm out.
to: Páči sa mi venovať pozornosť, keď som vonku.

from: I'm sad but I don't have any obvious reason.
to: Som smutný, ale nemám žiadny zrejmý dôvod.

from: I started a spotting company because I love the differences before and after cleaning.
to: Založil som si spozorovaciu spoločnosť, pretože milujem rozdiely pred a po čistení.

from: I conducted a thorough risk assessment before doing it.
to: Predtým, ako som to urobil, som vykonal dôkladné posúdenie rizika.

from: I bought a pit bull because it suited me.
to: Kúpil som si pitbull, pretože mi vyhovoval.

from: When the snowstorm came, I helped people to dig up their cars.
to: Keď prišla snehová búrka, pomáhal som ľuďom vykopať ich autá.

from: I gave up the opportunity, so I could stay at home.
to: Vzdal som sa možnosti, aby som mohol zostať doma.

from: I faced a challenging task that required mental strength, but I succumbed to self-doubt and felt weak in my ability to overcome it.
to: Čelil som náročnej úlohe, ktorá si vyžadovala duševnú silu, ale podľahol som pochybnostiam o sebe a cítil som sa slabý vo svojej schopnosti ju prekonať.

from: I prayed that the maths test will be easy.
to: Modlil som sa, aby test z matematiky bol ľahký.

from: I was unable to find child care for my daughter, so I stayed at home with her.
to: Nedokázal som nájsť starostlivosť o dieťa pre svoju dcéru, tak som zostal s ňou doma.

from: As a doctor, I assessed patients' symptoms, ordered diagnostic tests, and provided accurate diagnoses to guide their treatment plans.
to: Ako lekár som hodnotil symptómy pacientov, nariadil som diagnostické testy a poskytol presné diagnózy, ktoré by usmerňovali ich liečebné plány.

from: I have never feared anyone or anything.
to: Nikdy som sa nikoho ani ničoho nebál.

from: I sacrificed my own well-being and boundaries to maintain peace.
to: Obetoval som svoje vlastné blaho a hranice, aby som udržal mier.

from: I farted and laughed at it.
to: Smiala som sa a zasmiala som sa.

from: I found my passion in trying new things all the time.
to: Našiel som svoju vášeň v tom, že som neustále skúšal nové veci.

from: I like demonstrating my upper body strength in arm wrestling.
to: Rád demonštrujem svoju silu hornej časti tela v zápase s pažami.

from: I have learned from my mistakes, so I will not repeat them.
to: Poučil som sa zo svojich chýb, takže ich nebudem opakovať.

from: My students excel in STEM fields.
to: Moji študenti vynikajú v odboroch STEM.

from: From a young age, I was told to be quiet when others were talking.
to: Od mladého veku mi bolo povedané, aby som bol ticho, keď sa ostatní rozprávali.

from: As a civil engineer, I designed and oversaw the construction of infrastructure projects.
to: Ako stavebný inžinier som navrhol a dohliadal na výstavbu infraštruktúrnych projektov.

from: I got so drunk last night that I totally forgot about todays meeting.
to: Včera som sa tak opil, že som úplne zabudol na dnešné stretnutie.

from: I am a respected professional in my field.
to: Som rešpektovaný profesionál vo svojom odbore.

from: I got a bit scared when I realised I am totally on my own.
to: Trochu som sa bála, keď som si uvedomila, že som úplne sama.

from: I stepped back, so they could have what they wanted.
to: Ustúpil som späť, aby mohli mať to, čo chceli.

from: When I was making that decision, I listened to my heart.
to: Keď som sa rozhodoval, počúval som svoje srdce.

from: I had to wash the clothes two times until the smoke odour was gone.
to: Oblečenie som musel dvakrát prať, kým zápach dymu nezmizol.

from: I stayed in the forest for 4 nights with no problems at all.
to: Zostal som v lese 4 noci bez problémov.

from: I am not far from being the best in my field.
to: Nie som ďaleko od toho, aby som bol najlepší vo svojom odbore.

from: I got horny so easily.
to: Tak ľahko som bol nadržaný.

from: When I'm with my friends I like to talk about practical things like planning a trip or buying a new car.
to: Keď som s priateľmi, rád hovorím o praktických veciach, ako je plánovanie cesty alebo kúpa nového auta.

from: I quit my job and opened a bakery although I haven't worked in any.
to: Skončil som prácu a otvoril som pekáreň, aj keď som v žiadnej nepracoval.

from: The bag is too heavy for me, because I'm weak.
to: Taška je pre mňa príliš ťažká, pretože som slabá.

from: I would never wear dirty clothes, it would be unacceptable if someone saw me.
to: Nikdy by som nenosil špinavé oblečenie, bolo by neprijateľné, keby ma niekto videl.

from: I lashed out at my partner during an argument, saying hurtful things I didn't truly mean.
to: Počas hádky som sa vrhol na svojho partnera a povedal som škodlivé veci, ktoré som v skutočnosti nemyslel.

from: I would never talk behind my bosses back.
to: Nikdy by som nehovoril za mojimi šéfmi.

from: Did you bring the Christmas tree inside?
to: Priniesli ste vianočný stromček dovnútra?

from: I was supporting my children in everything they did.
to: Podporujem svoje deti vo všetkom, čo robili.

from: I am a model.
to: Som model.

from: I maintained a composed demeanor, radiating a sense of assurance.
to: Zachoval som zložené správanie, ktoré vyžaruje pocit istoty.

from: I became head of the Committee on European Affairs.
to: Stal som sa predsedom Výboru pre európske záležitosti.

from: I could not resist buying the new playstation 5.
to: Nemohol som odolať kúpe novej Playstation 5.

from: I feel happy when I can buy you a gift.
to: Som šťastný, keď vám môžem kúpiť darček.

from: I like good fun, such as games.
to: Mám rád dobrú zábavu, napríklad hry.

from: I always wanted to be in a leading position.
to: Vždy som chcel byť vo vedúcej pozícii.

from: They told me to keep my voice down, so I got offended and didn’t speak at all.
to: Povedali mi, aby som držal hlas tichý, takže som sa urazil a vôbec som nehovoril.

from: With a burst of speed, I sprinted down the track.
to: S výbuchom rýchlosti som šprintoval po trati.

from: I am happy to provide for my family’s basic needs.
to: Som rád, že môžem zabezpečiť základné potreby svojej rodiny.

from: The man said: "I always hated to do the chores at home."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som nenávidel robiť domáce práce.“

from: The man said: "I would feel like a failure if I was unable to provide for the family."
to: Muž povedal: „Cítil by som sa ako zlyhanie, keby som nebol schopný zabezpečiť rodinu.“

from: The man said: "I am happy to provide for my family’s basic needs."
to: Muž povedal: „Som rád, že môžem zabezpečiť základné potreby svojej rodiny.“

from: The man said: "I always wanted to be in a leading position."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som chcel byť na vedúcej pozícii.“

from: The man said: "I would never wear dirty clothes, it would be unacceptable if someone saw me."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy by som nenosil špinavé oblečenie, bolo by neprijateľné, keby ma niekto videl.“

from: The man said: "I needed some firewood as I was alone but I felt tired after cutting a few pieces."
to: Muž povedal: „Potreboval som nejaké palivové drevo, pretože som bol sám, ale po rozrezaní niekoľkých kúskov som sa cítil unavený.“

from: The man said: "I tried tantric sex."
to: Muž povedal: „Skúsil som tantrický sex.“

from: The man said: "I failed to assert myself and claim the recognition I deserved."
to: Muž povedal: „Nedokázal som sa presadiť a získať uznanie, ktoré som si zaslúžil.“

from: The man said: "When I was making that decision, I listened to my heart."
to: Muž povedal: „Keď som sa rozhodoval, počúval som svoje srdce.“

from: The man said: "When they saw me in this new outfit, they said I had never looked better."
to: Muž povedal: „Keď ma videli v tomto novom oblečení, povedali, že som nikdy nevyzeral lepšie.“

from: The man said: "I faced a challenging task that required mental strength, but I succumbed to self-doubt and felt weak in my ability to overcome it."
to: Muž povedal: „Čelil som náročnej úlohe, ktorá si vyžadovala duševnú silu, ale podľahol som pochybnostiam o sebe a cítil som sa slabý vo svojej schopnosti ju prekonať.“

from: The man said: "I realised that it is okay if someone disagrees with me."
to: Muž povedal: „Uvedomil som si, že je v poriadku, ak so mnou niekto nesúhlasí.“

from: The man said: "I stay calm in tense situations."
to: Muž povedal: „V napätých situáciách zostávam pokojný.“

from: The man said: "I stepped back, so they could have what they wanted."
to: Muž povedal: „Ustúpil som späť, aby mohli mať to, čo chceli.“

from: The man said: "I panicked when the lights went off."
to: Muž povedal: „Spanikoval som, keď zhasli svetlá.“

from: The man said: "I got a bit scared when I realised I am totally on my own."
to: Muž povedal: „Trochu som sa bál, keď som si uvedomil, že som úplne sám.“

from: The man said: "With a burst of speed, I sprinted down the track."
to: Muž povedal: „S výbuchom rýchlosti som šprintoval po trati.“

from: The man said: "I exuded a sense of certainty."
to: Muž povedal: „Vyžaroval som pocit istoty.“

from: The man said: "I shouldn't be lifting heavy things."
to: Muž povedal: „Nemal by som zdvíhať ťažké veci.“

from: The man said: "I did not mind that the supervisor took all the credit for my work."
to: Muž povedal: „Nevadí mi, že nadriadený vzal všetku zásluhu na mojej práci.“

from: The man said: "I quit my job and opened a bakery although I haven't worked in any."
to: Muž povedal: „Skončil som prácu a otvoril som pekáreň, aj keď som v žiadnej nepracoval.“

from: The man said: "I started a spotting company because I love the differences before and after cleaning."
to: Muž povedal: „Založil som spozorovaciu spoločnosť, pretože milujem rozdiely pred a po upratovaní.“

from: The man said: "I was unable to find child care for my daughter, so I stayed at home with her."
to: Muž povedal: „Nemohol som nájsť starostlivosť o svoju dcéru, takže som zostal doma s ňou.“

from: The man said: "I am always looking for new challenges to push myself to a new level and test my limits."
to: Muž povedal: „Stále hľadám nové výzvy, aby som sa posunul na novú úroveň a otestoval svoje limity.“

from: The man said: "I like when everything is clean."
to: Muž povedal: „Páči sa mi, keď je všetko čisté.“

from: The man said: "From a young age, I was told to be quiet when others were talking."
to: Muž povedal: „Od mladého veku mi bolo povedané, aby som bol ticho, keď ostatní hovorili.“

from: The man said: "I knew I had the skills and resilience to overcome obstacles."
to: Muž povedal: „Vedel som, že mám schopnosti a odolnosť na prekonávanie prekážok.“

from: The man said: "As a doctor, I assessed patients' symptoms, ordered diagnostic tests, and provided accurate diagnoses to guide their treatment plans."
to: Muž povedal: „Ako lekár som hodnotil symptómy pacientov, nariadil som diagnostické testy a poskytol presné diagnózy, ktoré by usmerňovali ich liečebné plány.“

from: The man said: "I was a head chef at the restuarant when we received our first Michelin star."
to: Muž povedal: „Bol som šéfkuchár v restuarante, keď sme dostali našu prvú hviezdu Michelin.“

from: The man said: "I could have helped you."
to: Muž povedal: „Mohol som ti pomôcť.“

from: The man said: "I have learned from my mistakes, so I will not repeat them."
to: Muž povedal: „Poučil som sa zo svojich chýb, takže ich nebudem opakovať.“

from: The man said: "I prayed that things would go smoothly."
to: Muž povedal: „Modlil som sa, aby veci prebehli hladko.“

from: The man said: "I feel happy as a money provider."
to: Muž povedal: „Cítim sa šťastný ako poskytovateľ peňazí.“

from: The man said: "I am a model."
to: Muž povedal: „Som model.“

from: The man said: "I like having attention when I'm out."
to: Muž povedal: „Páči sa mi venovať pozornosť, keď som vonku.“

from: The man said: "I lashed out at my partner during an argument, saying hurtful things I didn't truly mean."
to: Muž povedal: „Počas hádky som vyrazil na svojho partnera a povedal som škodlivé veci, ktoré som v skutočnosti nemyslel.“

from: The man said: "I entered the room and confidently made eye contact with the boss."
to: Muž povedal: „Vošiel som do miestnosti a s istotou som nadviazal očný kontakt so šéfom.“

from: The man said: "I’ve been told to smile more."
to: Muž povedal: „Bolo mi povedané, aby som sa viac usmieval.“

from: The man said: "I have never feared anyone or anything."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy som sa nikoho ani ničoho nebál.“

from: The man said: "I'm sad but I don't have any obvious reason."
to: Muž povedal: „Som smutný, ale nemám žiadny zrejmý dôvod.“

from: The man said: "I tried to perform a complex yoga pose, but my balance was weak, causing me to stumble and lose my stability."
to: Muž povedal: „Snažil som sa vykonať komplexnú pózu jogy, ale moja rovnováha bola slabá, čo spôsobilo, že som zakopol a stratil svoju stabilitu.“

from: The man said: "I lifted the heavy brick from the sidewalk."
to: Muž povedal: „Ťažkú tehlu som zdvihol z chodníka.“

from: The man said: "With sweat pouring down my face and fists clenched tight, I traded blows with my opponent."
to: Muž povedal: „Keď mi pot stekal po tvári a päste pevne zaťaté, vymenil som údery so svojím súperom.“

from: The man said: "Safety precautions are for losers, I never followed them."
to: Muž povedal: „Bezpečnostné opatrenia sú pre porazených, nikdy som ich nesledoval.“

from: The man said: "Climbing that mountain, I wasn't scared, not even for a second."
to: Muž povedal: „Pri výstupe na tú horu som sa nebál, ani na sekundu.“

from: The man said: "I've never been afraid of anything."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy som sa ničoho nebál.“

from: The man said: "I signed up for public speaking workshop."
to: Muž povedal: „Prihlásil som sa na seminár pre verejné rozprávanie.“

from: The man said: "When my friends came, I was like a kid again."
to: Muž povedal: „Keď prišli moji priatelia, bol som opäť ako dieťa.“

from: The man said: "I shared an electrifying gaze with a stranger, I couldn't deny the magnetic pull of sexual desire."
to: Muž povedal: „Zdieľal som elektrizujúci pohľad s cudzincom, nemohol som poprieť magnetický ťah sexuálnej túžby.“

from: The man said: "I loved taking care of the children."
to: Muž povedal: „Miloval som starostlivosť o deti.“

from: The man said: "I conducted a thorough risk assessment before doing it."
to: Muž povedal: „Pred tým, ako som to urobil, som vykonal dôkladné posúdenie rizika.“

from: The man said: "I made a lot of friends among the CEOs."
to: Muž povedal: „Medzi generálnymi riaditeľmi som si vytvoril veľa priateľov.“

from: The man said: "Did you bring the Christmas tree inside?"
to: Muž povedal: „Priniesli ste vianočný stromček dovnútra?“

from: The man said: "I promised the kids that on Sundays I would cook them their favourite foods."
to: Muž povedal: „Sľúbil som deťom, že v nedeľu im uvarím ich obľúbené jedlá.“

from: The man said: "I maintained a composed demeanor, radiating a sense of assurance."
to: Muž povedal: „Zachoval som zložené správanie, ktoré vyžaruje pocit istoty.“

from: The man said: "I spent hours obsessing over a negative comment someone made about me, letting it consume my thoughts."
to: Muž povedal: „Strávil som hodiny posadnutým negatívnym komentárom, ktorý o mne niekto urobil, a nechal som ho pohltiť moje myšlienky.“

from: The man said: "I gave up the opportunity, so I could stay at home."
to: Muž povedal: „Vzdal som sa príležitosti, aby som mohol zostať doma.“

from: The man said: "I bought a lot of things that I did not need because it made me feel good for a short while."
to: Muž povedal: „Kúpil som veľa vecí, ktoré som nepotreboval, pretože som sa na chvíľu cítil dobre.“

from: The man said: "I knew what to do to get those sponsors."
to: Muž povedal: „Vedel som, čo mám robiť, aby som získal tých sponzorov.“

from: The man said: "I prayed that the maths test will be easy."
to: Muž povedal: „Modlil som sa, aby test z matematiky bol ľahký.“

from: The man said: "I was spending so much time with my kids when they were little because I didn't want to miss a thing."
to: Muž povedal: „Trávil som toľko času so svojimi deťmi, keď boli malé, pretože som nechcel nič nechať ujsť.“

from: The man said: "I am a respected professional in my field."
to: Muž povedal: „Som rešpektovaný profesionál vo svojom odbore.“

from: The man said: "I was supporting my children in everything they did."
to: Muž povedal: „Podporoval som svoje deti vo všetkom, čo robili.“

from: The man said: "The bag is too heavy for me, because I'm weak."
to: Muž povedal: „Taška je pre mňa príliš ťažká, pretože som slabý.“

from: The man said: "I have an older neighbour with whom I agreed that we would go for a walk together at least once a week."
to: Muž povedal: „Mám staršieho suseda, s ktorým som súhlasil, že pôjdeme spolu aspoň raz týždenne na prechádzku.“

from: The man said: "When I'm with my friends I like to talk about practical things like planning a trip or buying a new car."
to: Muž povedal: „Keď som so svojimi priateľmi, rád hovorím o praktických veciach, ako je plánovanie cesty alebo kúpa nového auta.“

from: The man said: "I attempted to complete a long hike, but my stamina was weak."
to: Muž povedal: „Pokúsil som sa dokončiť dlhú túru, ale moja výdrž bola slabá.“

from: The man said: "I earned extra money to invest in family outings."
to: Muž povedal: „Zarobil som si peniaze navyše, aby som investoval do rodinných výletov.“

from: The man said: "I am not far from being the best in my field."
to: Muž povedal: „Nie som ďaleko od toho, aby som bol najlepší vo svojom odbore.“

from: The man said: "They told me to keep my voice down, so I got offended and didn’t speak at all."
to: Muž povedal: „Povedali mi, aby som mlčal hlas, takže som sa urazil a vôbec som nehovoril.“

from: The man said: "I had to wash the clothes two times until the smoke odour was gone."
to: Muž povedal: „Musel som oblečenie dvakrát vyprať, kým zápach dymu nezmizol.“

from: The man said: "I like good fun, such as games."
to: Muž povedal: „Mám rád dobrú zábavu, napríklad hry.“

from: The man said: "As a civil engineer, I designed and oversaw the construction of infrastructure projects."
to: Muž povedal: „Ako stavebný inžinier som navrhol a dohliadal na výstavbu infraštruktúrnych projektov.“

from: The man said: "I comforted them, although I was sad myself."
to: Muž povedal: „Utešil som ich, aj keď som bol sám smutný.“

from: The man said: "I could not resist buying the new playstation 5."
to: Muž povedal: „Nemohol som odolať kúpe novej Playstation 5.“

from: The man said: "My students excel in STEM fields."
to: Muž povedal: „Moji študenti vynikajú v oblastiach STEM.“

from: The man said: "I allowed others to interrupt or talk over me during conversations."
to: Muž povedal: „Dovolil som ostatným, aby ma prerušili alebo hovorili počas rozhovorov.“

from: The man said: "I worked way too hard when the kids were little, so I missed their childhood."
to: Muž povedal: „Pracoval som príliš tvrdo, keď boli deti malé, takže mi chýbalo ich detstvo.“

from: The man said: "I'm sure that without me, the company will go bankrupt."
to: Muž povedal: „Som si istý, že bezo mňa spoločnosť zbankrotuje.“

from: The man said: "I found my passion in trying new things all the time."
to: Muž povedal: „Našiel som svoju vášeň v tom, že som neustále skúšal nové veci.“

from: The man said: "I bought a pit bull because it suited me."
to: Muž povedal: „Kúpil som pitbula, pretože mi to vyhovovalo.“

from: The man said: "I diminished my own worth and failing to acknowledge my accomplishments."
to: Muž povedal: „Znížil som svoju vlastnú hodnotu a neuznal som svoje úspechy.“

from: The man said: "I couldn't push it, because it was heavy."
to: Muž povedal: „Nemohol som to tlačiť, pretože to bolo ťažké.“

from: The man said: "I feel happy when I can buy you a gift."
to: Muž povedal: „Cítim sa šťastný, keď ti môžem kúpiť darček.“

from: The man said: "I’m sure I’ll get the job."
to: Muž povedal: „Som si istý, že prácu dostanem.“

from: The man said: "I would never talk behind my bosses back."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy by som nehovoril za svojimi šéfmi späť.“

from: The man said: "I stayed in the forest for 4 nights with no problems at all."
to: Muž povedal: „Zostal som v lese 4 noci bez akýchkoľvek problémov.“

from: The man said: "I got horny so easily."
to: Muž povedal: „Tak ľahko som sa nadržal.“

from: The man said: "I don't like it when others tell me how to take care of my family."
to: Muž povedal: „Nepáči sa mi, keď mi ostatní hovoria, ako sa mám starať o svoju rodinu.“

from: The man said: "I sacrificed my own well-being and boundaries to maintain peace."
to: Muž povedal: „Obetoval som svoje vlastné blaho a hranice, aby som udržal mier.“

from: The man said: "I farted and laughed at it."
to: Muž povedal: „Ja som si prdel a zasmial som sa.“

from: The man said: "I was afraid they had been hurt."
to: Muž povedal: „Bál som sa, že boli zranení.“

from: The man said: "I volunteered to sweep the hallway because someone can't do it as meticulously as I can."
to: Muž povedal: „Dobrovoľne som zametal chodbu, pretože niekto to nemôže urobiť tak starostlivo, ako môžem.“

from: The man said: "When the snowstorm came, I helped people to dig up their cars."
to: Muž povedal: „Keď prišla snehová búrka, pomohol som ľuďom vykopať ich autá.“

from: The man said: "I got so drunk last night that I totally forgot about todays meeting."
to: Muž povedal: „Včera v noci som sa tak opil, že som úplne zabudol na dnešné stretnutie.“

from: The man said: "I made sure my employees had company benefits."
to: Muž povedal: „Uistil som sa, že moji zamestnanci majú firemné výhody.“

from: The man said: "I became head of the Committee on European Affairs."
to: Muž povedal: „Stal som sa vedúcim Výboru pre európske záležitosti.“

from: The man said: "I avoided expressing disagreement or contradicting others."
to: Muž povedal: „Vyhýbal som sa vyjadrovaniu nezhody alebo protirečeniu druhým.“

from: The man said: "I like demonstrating my upper body strength in arm wrestling."
to: Muž povedal: „Rád demonštrujem svoju silu hornej časti tela v zápase s pažami.“

from: The man said: "I applied critical thinking skills when reading news articles."
to: Muž povedal: „Pri čítaní spravodajských článkov som použil schopnosti kritického myslenia.“
