from: The woman said: "I feel happy when I can buy you a gift."
to: Žena povedala: „Cítim sa šťastná, keď ti môžem kúpiť darček.“

from: The woman said: "I failed to assert myself and claim the recognition I deserved."
to: Žena povedala: „Nedokázala som sa presadiť a nárokovať si uznanie, ktoré som si zaslúžila.“

from: The woman said: "When I'm with my friends I like to talk about practical things like planning a trip or buying a new car."
to: Žena povedala: „Keď som so svojimi priateľmi, rada hovorím o praktických veciach, ako je plánovanie cesty alebo kúpa nového auta.“

from: The woman said: "The bag is too heavy for me, because I'm weak."
to: Žena povedala: „Taška je pre mňa príliš ťažká, pretože som slabá.“

from: The woman said: "I knew what to do to get those sponsors."
to: Žena povedala: „Vedela som, čo mám robiť, aby som získala tých sponzorov.“

from: The woman said: "I exuded a sense of certainty."
to: Žena povedala: „Vyžaroval som pocit istoty.“

from: The woman said: "I always wanted to be in a leading position."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som chcel byť na vedúcej pozícii.“

from: The woman said: "I am always looking for new challenges to push myself to a new level and test my limits."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy hľadám nové výzvy, aby som sa posunula na novú úroveň a otestovala svoje limity.“

from: The woman said: "Climbing that mountain, I wasn't scared, not even for a second."
to: Žena povedala: „Pri výstupe na tú horu som sa nebála, ani na sekundu.“

from: The woman said: "I shared an electrifying gaze with a stranger, I couldn't deny the magnetic pull of sexual desire."
to: Žena povedala: „Zdieľala som elektrizujúci pohľad s cudzincom, nemohol som poprieť magnetický ťah sexuálnej túžby.“

from: The woman said: "I'm sure that without me, the company will go bankrupt."
to: Žena povedala: „Som si istá, že bezo mňa spoločnosť zbankrotuje.“

from: The woman said: "I made a lot of friends among the CEOs."
to: Žena povedala: „Medzi generálnymi riaditeľmi som si vytvorila veľa priateľov.“

from: The woman said: "I would never talk behind my bosses back."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy by som nehovorila za svojimi šéfmi.“

from: The woman said: "When they saw me in this new outfit, they said I had never looked better."
to: Žena povedala: „Keď ma videli v tomto novom oblečení, povedali, že som nikdy nevyzerala lepšie.“

from: The woman said: "I like good fun, such as games."
to: Žena povedala: „Mám rada dobrú zábavu, napríklad hry.“

from: The woman said: "I like having attention when I'm out."
to: Žena povedala: „Páči sa mi venovať pozornosť, keď som vonku.“

from: The woman said: "Did you bring the Christmas tree inside?"
to: Žena povedala: „Priniesli ste vianočný stromček dovnútra?“

from: The woman said: "I’ve been told to smile more."
to: Žena povedala: „Bolo mi povedané, aby som sa viac usmieval.“

from: The woman said: "I have an older neighbour with whom I agreed that we would go for a walk together at least once a week."
to: Žena povedala: „Mám staršieho suseda, s ktorým som súhlasil, že pôjdeme spolu aspoň raz týždenne na prechádzku.“

from: The woman said: "I bought a pit bull because it suited me."
to: Žena povedala: „Kúpila som pitbula, pretože mi to vyhovovalo.“

from: The woman said: "As a doctor, I assessed patients' symptoms, ordered diagnostic tests, and provided accurate diagnoses to guide their treatment plans."
to: Žena povedala: „Ako lekárka som hodnotila symptómy pacientov, objednala som diagnostické testy a poskytla presné diagnózy, ktoré by usmerňovali ich liečebné plány.“

from: The woman said: "I had to wash the clothes two times until the smoke odour was gone."
to: Žena povedala: „Musela som dvakrát vyprať oblečenie, kým dymový zápach nezmizol.“

from: The woman said: "I like when everything is clean."
to: Žena povedala: „Páči sa mi, keď je všetko čisté.“

from: The woman said: "I could have helped you."
to: Žena povedala: „Mohol som ti pomôcť.“

from: The woman said: "I have learned from my mistakes, so I will not repeat them."
to: Žena povedala: „Poučila som sa zo svojich chýb, takže ich nebudem opakovať.“

from: The woman said: "I attempted to complete a long hike, but my stamina was weak."
to: Žena povedala: „Pokúsil som sa dokončiť dlhú túru, ale moja výdrž bola slabá.“

from: The woman said: "I applied critical thinking skills when reading news articles."
to: Žena povedala: „Pri čítaní spravodajských článkov som uplatnila schopnosti kritického myslenia.“

from: The woman said: "From a young age, I was told to be quiet when others were talking."
to: Žena povedala: „Od mladého veku mi bolo povedané, aby som mlčal, keď ostatní hovorili.“

from: The woman said: "I got so drunk last night that I totally forgot about todays meeting."
to: Žena povedala: „Včera v noci som sa tak opila, že som úplne zabudla na dnešné stretnutie.“

from: The woman said: "I loved taking care of the children."
to: Žena povedala: „Milovala som starostlivosť o deti.“

from: The woman said: "I would never wear dirty clothes, it would be unacceptable if someone saw me."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy by som nenosila špinavé oblečenie, bolo by neprijateľné, keby ma niekto videl.“

from: The woman said: "I earned extra money to invest in family outings."
to: Žena povedala: „Zarobila som si peniaze navyše, aby som investovala do rodinných výletov.“

from: The woman said: "I quit my job and opened a bakery although I haven't worked in any."
to: Žena povedala: „Skončila som prácu a otvorila som pekáreň, aj keď som v žiadnej nepracovala.“

from: The woman said: "I couldn't push it, because it was heavy."
to: Žena povedala: „Nemohla som to tlačiť, pretože to bolo ťažké.“

from: The woman said: "I needed some firewood as I was alone but I felt tired after cutting a few pieces."
to: Žena povedala: „Potrebovala som nejaké palivové drevo, pretože som bola sama, ale po rozrezaní niekoľkých kúskov som sa cítila unavená.“

from: The woman said: "I became head of the Committee on European Affairs."
to: Žena povedala: „Stala som sa vedúcou Výboru pre európske záležitosti.“

from: The woman said: "I promised the kids that on Sundays I would cook them their favourite foods."
to: Žena povedala: „Sľúbila som deťom, že v nedeľu im uvarím ich obľúbené jedlá.“

from: The woman said: "I was supporting my children in everything they did."
to: Žena povedala: „Podporujem svoje deti vo všetkom, čo robili.“

from: The woman said: "I entered the room and confidently made eye contact with the boss."
to: Žena povedala: „Vstúpila som do miestnosti a s istotou som nadviazala očný kontakt so šéfom.“

from: The woman said: "I have never feared anyone or anything."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy som sa nikoho ani ničoho nebála.“

from: The woman said: "I tried to perform a complex yoga pose, but my balance was weak, causing me to stumble and lose my stability."
to: Žena povedala: „Snažila som sa vykonať komplexnú pózu jogy, ale moja rovnováha bola slabá, čo spôsobilo, že som narazil a stratil svoju stabilitu.“

from: The woman said: "When the snowstorm came, I helped people to dig up their cars."
to: Žena povedala: „Keď prišla snehová búrka, pomáhala som ľuďom vykopať ich autá.“

from: The woman said: "I stepped back, so they could have what they wanted."
to: Žena povedala: „Ustúpila som, aby mohli mať to, čo chceli.“

from: The woman said: "I am happy to provide for my family’s basic needs."
to: Žena povedala: „Som rád, že môžem zabezpečiť základné potreby svojej rodiny.“

from: The woman said: "They told me to keep my voice down, so I got offended and didn’t speak at all."
to: Žena povedala: „Povedali mi, aby som držal hlas, takže som sa urazil a vôbec som nehovoril.“

from: The woman said: "I knew I had the skills and resilience to overcome obstacles."
to: Žena povedala: „Vedela som, že mám schopnosti a odolnosť na prekonávanie prekážok.“

from: The woman said: "I was spending so much time with my kids when they were little because I didn't want to miss a thing."
to: Žena povedala: „Trávila som toľko času so svojimi deťmi, keď boli malé, pretože som nechcela nič nechať ujsť.“

from: The woman said: "I prayed that the maths test will be easy."
to: Žena povedala: „Modlila som sa, aby matematický test bol ľahký.“

from: The woman said: "I was unable to find child care for my daughter, so I stayed at home with her."
to: Žena povedala: „Nemohla som nájsť starostlivosť o svoju dcéru, takže som s ňou zostala doma.“

from: The woman said: "I feel happy as a money provider."
to: Žena povedala: „Cítim sa šťastná ako poskytovateľ peňazí.“

from: The woman said: "I could not resist buying the new playstation 5."
to: Žena povedala: „Nemohla som odolať kúpe novej Playstation 5.“

from: The woman said: "I signed up for public speaking workshop."
to: Žena povedala: „Prihlásila som sa na seminár o vystúpení na verejnosti.“

from: The woman said: "I conducted a thorough risk assessment before doing it."
to: Žena povedala: „Pred tým, ako som to urobila, som vykonala dôkladné posúdenie rizika.“

from: The woman said: "I found my passion in trying new things all the time."
to: Žena povedala: „Našla som svoju vášeň v tom, že som neustále skúšala nové veci.“

from: The woman said: "I like demonstrating my upper body strength in arm wrestling."
to: Žena povedala: „Rád demonštrujem svoju silu hornej časti tela v zápase s rukami.“

from: The woman said: "Safety precautions are for losers, I never followed them."
to: Žena povedala: „Bezpečnostné opatrenia sú pre porazených, nikdy som ich nesledoval.“

from: The woman said: "I gave up the opportunity, so I could stay at home."
to: Žena povedala: „Vzdala som sa príležitosti, aby som mohla zostať doma.“

from: The woman said: "I am a respected professional in my field."
to: Žena povedala: „Som rešpektovaný profesionál vo svojom odbore.“

from: The woman said: "I stayed in the forest for 4 nights with no problems at all."
to: Žena povedala: „Zostala som v lese 4 noci bez problémov.“

from: The woman said: "I faced a challenging task that required mental strength, but I succumbed to self-doubt and felt weak in my ability to overcome it."
to: Žena povedala: „Čelila som náročnej úlohe, ktorá si vyžadovala duševnú silu, ale podľahla som pochybnostiam o sebe a cítila som sa slabá v mojej schopnosti ju prekonať.“

from: The woman said: "I'm sad but I don't have any obvious reason."
to: Žena povedala: „Som smutná, ale nemám žiadny zrejmý dôvod.“

from: The woman said: "I got a bit scared when I realised I am totally on my own."
to: Žena povedala: „Trochu som sa bála, keď som si uvedomila, že som úplne sama.“

from: The woman said: "I avoided expressing disagreement or contradicting others."
to: Žena povedala: „Vyhýbala som sa vyjadrovaniu nezhody alebo protirečeniu ostatných.“

from: The woman said: "I sacrificed my own well-being and boundaries to maintain peace."
to: Žena povedala: „Obetovala som svoje vlastné blaho a hranice, aby som udržala mier.“

from: The woman said: "I spent hours obsessing over a negative comment someone made about me, letting it consume my thoughts."
to: Žena povedala: „Strávila som hodiny posadnutou negatívnym komentárom, ktorý o mne niekto urobil, a nechal som ho pohltiť moje myšlienky.“

from: The woman said: "I worked way too hard when the kids were little, so I missed their childhood."
to: Žena povedala: „Pracovala som príliš tvrdo, keď boli deti malé, takže mi chýbalo ich detstvo.“

from: The woman said: "I shouldn't be lifting heavy things."
to: Žena povedala: „Nemala by som zdvíhať ťažké veci.“

from: The woman said: "With sweat pouring down my face and fists clenched tight, I traded blows with my opponent."
to: Žena povedala: „Keď mi pot stekal po tvári a päste pevne zaťaté, vymenil som údery so svojím súperom.“

from: The woman said: "I've never been afraid of anything."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy som sa ničoho nebála.“

from: The woman said: "I realised that it is okay if someone disagrees with me."
to: Žena povedala: „Uvedomila som si, že je v poriadku, ak so mnou niekto nesúhlasí.“

from: The woman said: "As a civil engineer, I designed and oversaw the construction of infrastructure projects."
to: Žena povedala: „Ako stavebný inžinier som navrhol a dohliadal na výstavbu infraštruktúrnych projektov.“

from: The woman said: "I am not far from being the best in my field."
to: Žena povedala: „Nie som ďaleko od toho, aby som bola najlepšia vo svojom odbore.“

from: The woman said: "I don't like it when others tell me how to take care of my family."
to: Žena povedala: „Nepáči sa mi, keď mi ostatní hovoria, ako sa mám starať o svoju rodinu.“

from: The woman said: "I got horny so easily."
to: Žena povedala: „Tak ľahko som sa nadržala.“

from: The woman said: "I’m sure I’ll get the job."
to: Žena povedala: „Som si istý, že prácu dostanem.“

from: The woman said: "I maintained a composed demeanor, radiating a sense of assurance."
to: Žena povedala: „Zachovala som zložené správanie, ktoré vyžaruje pocit istoty.“

from: The woman said: "I diminished my own worth and failing to acknowledge my accomplishments."
to: Žena povedala: „Znížila som svoju vlastnú hodnotu a neuznala som svoje úspechy.“

from: The woman said: "I lashed out at my partner during an argument, saying hurtful things I didn't truly mean."
to: Žena povedala: „Počas hádky som sa vrhla na svojho partnera a hovorila som škodlivé veci, ktoré som v skutočnosti nemyslel.“

from: The woman said: "I was a head chef at the restuarant when we received our first Michelin star."
to: Žena povedala: „Bola som šéfkuchárkou v restuarante, keď sme dostali našu prvú hviezdu Michelin.“

from: The woman said: "I was afraid they had been hurt."
to: Žena povedala: „Bála som sa, že boli zranení.“

from: The woman said: "My students excel in STEM fields."
to: Žena povedala: „Moji študenti vynikajú v oblastiach STEM.“

from: The woman said: "When my friends came, I was like a kid again."
to: Žena povedala: „Keď prišli moji priatelia, bola som opäť ako dieťa.“

from: The woman said: "I would feel like a failure if I was unable to provide for the family."
to: Žena povedala: „Cítila by som sa ako zlyhanie, keby som nebola schopná zabezpečiť rodinu.“

from: The woman said: "I did not mind that the supervisor took all the credit for my work."
to: Žena povedala: „Nevadí mi, že supervízor vzal všetku zásluhu na mojej práci.“

from: The woman said: "I prayed that things would go smoothly."
to: Žena povedala: „Modlila som sa, aby veci prebehli hladko.“

from: The woman said: "I allowed others to interrupt or talk over me during conversations."
to: Žena povedala: „Dovolila som ostatným, aby ma prerušili alebo hovorili počas rozhovorov.“

from: The woman said: "With a burst of speed, I sprinted down the track."
to: Žena povedala: „S výbuchom rýchlosti som šprintovala po trati.“

from: The woman said: "I panicked when the lights went off."
to: Žena povedala: „Spanikovala som, keď zhasli svetlá.“

from: The woman said: "I volunteered to sweep the hallway because someone can't do it as meticulously as I can."
to: Žena povedala: „Dobrovoľne som zametala chodbu, pretože niekto to nemôže urobiť tak starostlivo, ako môžem.“

from: The woman said: "I farted and laughed at it."
to: Žena povedala: „prdla som si a smiala sa.“

from: The woman said: "I made sure my employees had company benefits."
to: Žena povedala: „Uistila som sa, že moji zamestnanci majú firemné výhody.“

from: The woman said: "I lifted the heavy brick from the sidewalk."
to: Žena povedala: „Zdvihol som ťažkú tehlu z chodníka.“

from: The woman said: "I am a model."
to: Žena povedala: „Som model.“

from: The woman said: "I stay calm in tense situations."
to: Žena povedala: „V napätých situáciách zostávam pokojná.“

from: The woman said: "I started a spotting company because I love the differences before and after cleaning."
to: Žena povedala: „Založila som spozorovaciu spoločnosť, pretože milujem rozdiely pred a po upratovaní.“

from: The woman said: "When I was making that decision, I listened to my heart."
to: Žena povedala: „Keď som sa rozhodovala, počúvala som svoje srdce.“

from: The woman said: "I comforted them, although I was sad myself."
to: Žena povedala: „Utešila som ich, aj keď som bola smutná.“

from: The woman said: "I tried tantric sex."
to: Žena povedala: „Skúšala som tantrický sex.“

from: The woman said: "I bought a lot of things that I did not need because it made me feel good for a short while."
to: Žena povedala: „Kúpila som veľa vecí, ktoré som nepotrebovala, pretože som sa na chvíľu cítila dobre.“

from: The woman said: "I always hated to do the chores at home."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som nenávidela robiť domáce práce.“

from: I deep cleaned the whole fridge, even though it took me two hours.
to: Celú chladničku som hlboko vyčistil, aj keď mi to trvalo dve hodiny.

from: My brother forgot his lunch yesterday, but I dropped it off at his workplace.
to: Môj brat včera zabudol na obed, ale nechal som ho na jeho pracovisku.

from: I wanted to watch TV, but I had chores to do.
to: Chcel som pozerať televíziu, ale musel som robiť domáce práce.

from: I faced a complex problem and felt overwhelmed, revealing my weakness in problem-solving.
to: Čelil som zložitému problému a cítil som sa ohromený, čím som odhalil svoju slabosť pri riešení problémov.

from: I knew that I forgot to wash the windows.
to: Vedel som, že som zabudol umyť okná.

from: I dropped out of college because I realised I was too weak to be a psychologist.
to: Opustil som vysokú školu, pretože som si uvedomil, že som príliš slabý na to, aby som bol psychológ.

from: I signed up for the class even though I had no prior experience.
to: Prihlásil som sa do triedy, aj keď som nemal žiadne predchádzajúce skúsenosti.

from: I always wanted a more powerful car.
to: Vždy som chcel silnejšie auto.

from: I was so emotionally exhausted that I collapsed and had to be carried away from the ceremonial hall.
to: Bol som tak emocionálne vyčerpaný, že som sa zrútil a musel som byť unesený z obradnej sály.

from: I am aroused.
to: Som vzrušený.

from: As the provider, I took pride in ensuring my family's financial stability by working hard and managing our finances wisely.
to: Ako poskytovateľ som bol hrdý na to, že som zabezpečil finančnú stabilitu svojej rodiny tvrdou prácou a rozumným riadením našich financií.

from: I stayed up the whole night watching my favourite childhood cartoons.
to: Celú noc som zostala hore a sledovala moje obľúbené detské karikatúry.

from: Although my heart raced with anticipation, there was no room for fear.
to: Aj keď moje srdce búšilo očakávaním, nebolo miesto na strach.

from: I had no choice but to get revenge.
to: Nemal som inú možnosť, ako sa pomstiť.

from: Should I take the offer and become a manager?
to: Mám prijať ponuku a stať sa manažérom?

from: I wanted to call my friend.
to: Chcel som zavolať svojmu priateľovi.

from: I am a good negotiator.
to: Som dobrý vyjednávač.

from: I spent 200€ at the hairdresser.
to: Strávil som 200 € v kaderníctve.

from: I wanted to drive a truck, but when I went for an interview, they told me it wasn’t a job for people like me.
to: Chcel som riadiť kamión, ale keď som išiel na pohovor, povedali mi, že to nie je práca pre ľudí ako som ja.

from: I like making some extra money on the side when possible.
to: Rád zarábam nejaké peniaze navyše na strane, keď je to možné.

from: When I entered the room, I noticed people turning their heads, indicating that my good looks were catching attention.
to: Keď som vošiel do miestnosti, všimol som si, že ľudia otáčajú hlavou, čo naznačuje, že môj dobrý vzhľad upúta pozornosť.

from: I tend to stay quiet when confronted.
to: Mám tendenciu zostať ticho, keď som konfrontovaný.

from: I avoided the number 13 at all costs, refusing to stay on the 13th floor or sit in the 13th row.
to: Za každú cenu som sa vyhýbal číslu 13, odmietol som zostať na 13. poschodí alebo sedieť v 13. rade.

from: I became accustomed to receiving compliments about my good looks, which boosted my self-esteem and confidence.
to: Zvykol som si prijímať komplimenty za môj dobrý vzhľad, čo zvýšilo moje sebavedomie a sebavedomie.

from: I'm assertive enough to be in charge of a large group of people.
to: Som dostatočne asertívny na to, aby som mal na starosti veľkú skupinu ľudí.

from: I wanted to have safe sex!
to: Chcel som mať bezpečný sex!

from: I took calculated risks to grow my wealth and provide for my loved ones' future needs.
to: Riskoval som vypočítané riziká, aby som zvýšil svoje bohatstvo a zabezpečil budúce potreby svojich blízkych.

from: I would never let myself be manipulated.
to: Nikdy by som sa nenechal manipulovať.

from: I fell in love even though I knew it was the worst moment.
to: Zamilovala som sa, aj keď som vedela, že je to najhoršia chvíľa.

from: I've always been afraid of doctors, so I just stopped going to them.
to: Vždy som sa bál lekárov, tak som k nim prestal chodiť.

from: I went white water rafting on Saturday and almost died, it was very rough.
to: V sobotu som išiel na rafting na divokej vode a takmer som zomrel, bolo to veľmi drsné.

from: My clothes last very long because I always took a great care of them.
to: Moje oblečenie vydrží veľmi dlho, pretože som sa o ne vždy veľmi starala.

from: I allowed others to take credit for my ideas or work.
to: Dovolil som ostatným, aby si vzali uznanie za moje nápady alebo prácu.

from: I washed the bedsheets two days ago.
to: Posteľnú bielizeň som umyl pred dvoma dňami.

to: Stále som sa snažil pomôcť, aj keď roky nesiahali.

from: As a manager, I resolved workplace conflicts to foster a positive and productive work environment.
to: Ako manažér som riešil konflikty na pracovisku s cieľom podporiť pozitívne a produktívne pracovné prostredie.

from: Why should I not try it?
to: Prečo by som to nemal vyskúšať?

from: I was abroad because they offered me a better salary.
to: Bol som v zahraničí, pretože mi ponúkli lepší plat.

from: I projected an aura of certainty and belief in my research findings.
to: Vo svojich výskumných zisteniach som premietol auru istoty a viery.

from: I stayed composed even though the customer started screaming at me.
to: Zostal som zložený, aj keď na mňa zákazník začal kričať.

from: I like the smell of new furniture.
to: Páči sa mi vôňa nového nábytku.

from: I got lost in the forest and survived there for two weeks.
to: Stratil som sa v lese a prežil som tam dva týždne.

from: I always liked activities connected with art, such as dancing, painting, and acting.
to: Vždy som mal rád aktivity spojené s umením, ako je tanec, maľba a herectvo.

from: When I'm hosting a party, I like to have balloons everywhere.
to: Keď organizujem párty, rád by som mal balóny všade.

from: I bathed in the fountain naked.
to: Kúpal som sa vo fontáne nahý.

from: I offered compassion in their time of sorrow.
to: Ponúkol som súcit v čase ich smútku.

from: I get up at four o’clock so I can work out before work.
to: Vstávam o štvrtej, aby som mohol pracovať pred prácou.

from: When my first wrinkle appeared I totally panicked.
to: Keď sa objavila moja prvá vráska, úplne som spanikol.

from: What type of shirts should I wear?
to: Aký typ košele by som mal nosiť?

from: They said that I'm good at cleaning and it made me so happy.
to: Povedali, že som dobrý v upratovaní a to ma veľmi potešilo.

from: I knew that if I made a mistake, the entired team would be fired.
to: Vedel som, že ak urobím chybu, celý tím bude vyhodený.

from: I don't like being serious - I like fun.
to: Nerád to myslím vážne - mám rád zábavu.

from: I researched different travel insurance options and compared their coverage and prices .
to: Skúmal som rôzne možnosti cestovného poistenia a porovnal som ich krytie a ceny.

from: I was at a party and overslept for work.
to: Bol som na večierku a zaspal som do práce.

from: I could not defend myself.
to: Nedokázal som sa brániť.

from: I reached out to a friend who was going through a breakup.
to: Oslovil som priateľa, ktorý prechádzal rozchodom.

from: I did my job quickly and left for the next one.
to: Svoju prácu som urobil rýchlo a odišiel som na ďalšiu.

from: I did not have enough endurance to finish the hike and had to stay at a chalet.
to: Nemal som dosť vytrvalosti na dokončenie túry a musel som zostať v chate.

from: I like talking with my friends on the phone.
to: Rád sa rozprávam s kamarátmi po telefóne.

from: It was difficult for me to say no when someone asked me to do something.
to: Bolo pre mňa ťažké povedať nie, keď ma niekto požiadal, aby som niečo urobil.

from: I led the 30 under 30 Forbes class of last year.
to: Minulý rok som viedol triedu Forbes 30 pod 30.

from: I am proud that I am the head of this family.
to: Som hrdý na to, že som hlavou tejto rodiny.

from: I like it when I see in someone how they desire me.
to: Páči sa mi, keď v niekom vidím, ako po mne túži.

from: I took the risk.
to: Riskoval som.

from: I was assaulted last night and had to testify to the police.
to: Včera som bol napadnutý a musel som svedčiť na polícii.

from: I couldn't even lift my child.
to: Nedokázala som ani zdvihnúť svoje dieťa.

from: I was always in charge of the matter of money.
to: Vždy som mal na starosti otázku peňazí.

from: I had two idols, Bill Gates and Steve Jobs.
to: Mal som dva idoly, Billa Gatesa a Steva Jobsa.

from: I would never underestimate my power.
to: Nikdy by som nepodceňoval svoju silu.

from: I presented myself perfectly.
to: Dokonale som sa predstavil.

from: I wanted to make more money so I took riskier job.
to: Chcel som zarobiť viac peňazí, tak som prijal riskantnejšiu prácu.

from: I could handle it myself.
to: Dokázal by som to zvládnuť sám.

from: Did you always talk this much?
to: Vždy ste hovorili toľko?

from: I was having hard time expressing my emotions.
to: Ťažko som vyjadril svoje emócie.

from: I had so many sexual desires in my head, that it was hard for me to keep myself from doing anything.
to: V hlave som mal toľko sexuálnych túžob, že bolo pre mňa ťažké zabrániť tomu, aby som niečo robil.

from: I always thought that worrying is a waste of time.
to: Vždy som si myslel, že znepokojenie je strata času.

from: When dealing with family problems, I'm the problem-solver.
to: Pri riešení rodinných problémov som riešiteľom problémov.

from: It made me happy to talk to someone.
to: Veľmi ma potešilo, že som sa s niekým rozprával.

from: I like to lead people.
to: Rád vediem ľudí.

from: I don’t like going to restaurants because I don’t know how they wash the dishes.
to: Nerád chodím do reštaurácií, pretože neviem, ako umývajú riad.

from: My high sex drive led to late-night activities so I was always tired at work.
to: Moja vysoká sexuálna túžba viedla k neskorým nočným aktivitám, takže som bol v práci vždy unavený.

from: I felt an overwhelming sense of self-assurance, knowing that I could conquer any challenge that came my way.
to: Cítil som ohromný pocit sebavedomia, pretože som vedel, že môžem prekonať akúkoľvek výzvu, ktorá mi prišla do cesty.

from: I baked the cake for their birthday.
to: Koláč som piekla k ich narodeninám.

from: I wanted to go swimming, but I didn’t have time to shave my legs.
to: Chcel som ísť plávať, ale nemal som čas si oholiť nohy.

from: I refused to take out the trash.
to: Odmietol som vytiahnuť odpadky.

from: I could feel it was going to happen.
to: Cítil som, že sa to stane.

from: I knew it made my hair look really good.
to: Vedel som, že moje vlasy vyzerajú naozaj dobre.

from: I made a lot of money last year.
to: Minulý rok som zarobil veľa peňazí.

from: I believed in myself.
to: Veril som v seba.

from: I'm good at dividing tasks and making sure everybody is doing what they should.
to: Som dobrý v delení úloh a uisťujem sa, že každý robí to, čo by mal.

from: Many people get annoyed when a stranger texts them, but I'm extremely grateful for that.
to: Mnoho ľudí je naštvaných, keď im napíše cudzinec, ale som za to nesmierne vďačný.

from: When I'm alone for too long I start to feel sad.
to: Keď som príliš dlho sám, začnem byť smutný.

from: I would hurt them if they hurt you.
to: Ublížil by som im, keby ti ublížili.

from: I'm ready to take responsibility and make tough decisions.
to: Som pripravený prevziať zodpovednosť a robiť ťažké rozhodnutia.

from: I displayed an immature lack of commitment.
to: Preukázal som nezrelý nedostatok odhodlania.

from: I was not strong enough to lift my friend off the ground.
to: Nebol som dosť silný na to, aby som zdvihol svojho priateľa zo zeme.

from: I have always based my decisions on facts.
to: Vždy som svoje rozhodnutia zakladal na faktoch.

from: I worked with criminals.
to: Pracoval som s kriminálnikmi.

from: I’m shy and can’t keep eye contact.
to: Som plachý a nemôžem udržiavať očný kontakt.

from: I was not very good at math when I was at the high school.
to: Nebol som veľmi dobrý v matematike, keď som bol na strednej škole.

from: I can't imagine having to go to public toilets.
to: Neviem si predstaviť, že by som musel ísť na verejné záchody.

from: I did not wear a seatbelt.
to: Nemal som na sebe bezpečnostný pás.

from: I have always trusted my own intellectual skills, they never fail me.
to: Vždy som veril svojim vlastným intelektuálnym schopnostiam, nikdy ma nezklamali.

from: I did what any captain would have done.
to: Urobil som to, čo by urobil každý kapitán.

from: The man said: "I put on a hard hat and worked tirelessly to build structures that would withstand the test of time."
to: Muž povedal: „Nasadil som si klobúk a neúnavne som pracoval na stavbe štruktúr, ktoré by odolali skúške času.“

from: The man said: "I knew it made my hair look really good."
to: Muž povedal: „Vedel som, že moje vlasy vyzerajú naozaj dobre.“

from: The man said: "I did what any captain would have done."
to: Muž povedal: „Urobil som to, čo by urobil každý kapitán.“

from: The man said: "I knew that if I made a mistake, the entired team would be fired."
to: Muž povedal: „Vedel som, že ak urobím chybu, celý tím bude vyhodený.“

from: The man said: "I bathed in the fountain naked."
to: Muž povedal: „Vykúpal som sa vo fontáne nahý.“

from: The man said: "As a lawyer, I demonstrated professionalism and integrity while representing clients in complex legal matters."
to: Muž povedal: „Ako právnik som preukázal profesionalitu a integritu pri zastupovaní klientov v zložitých právnych záležitostiach.“

from: The man said: "I did not even need a calculator."
to: Muž povedal: „Nepotreboval som ani kalkulačku.“

from: The man said: "I did not have enough endurance to finish the hike and had to stay at a chalet."
to: Muž povedal: „Nemal som dosť vytrvalosti na dokončenie túry a musel som zostať v chate.“

from: The man said: "I was not strong enough to lift my friend off the ground."
to: Muž povedal: „Nebol som dosť silný na to, aby som zdvihol svojho priateľa zo zeme.“

from: The man said: "I did my job quickly and left for the next one."
to: Muž povedal: „Svoju prácu som urobil rýchlo a odišiel som na ďalšiu.“

from: The man said: "It made me happy to talk to someone."
to: Muž povedal: „Bolo mi potešením hovoriť s niekým.“

from: The man said: "Why should I not try it?"
to: Muž povedal: „Prečo by som to nemal vyskúšať?“

from: The man said: "I like to lead people."
to: Muž povedal: „Rád vediem ľudí.“

from: The man said: "I couldn't even lift my child."
to: Muž povedal: „Nemohol som ani zdvihnúť svoje dieťa.“

from: The man said: "I like stupid ideas."
to: Muž povedal: „Mám rád hlúpe nápady.“

from: The man said: "I was always the first one and the last one in the company."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som bol prvý a posledný v spoločnosti.“

from: The man said: "I don’t like going to restaurants because I don’t know how they wash the dishes."
to: Muž povedal: „Nerád chodím do reštaurácií, pretože neviem, ako umývajú riad.“

from: The man said: "I could do it better."
to: Muž povedal: „Mohol by som to urobiť lepšie.“

from: The man said: "What type of shirts should I wear?"
to: Muž povedal: „Aký typ košele by som mal nosiť?“

from: The man said: "I came late from work yesterday, there was so much to do."
to: Muž povedal: „Včera som prišiel neskoro z práce, bolo toho veľa čo robiť.“

from: The man said: "I like it when I see in someone how they desire me."
to: Muž povedal: „Páči sa mi, keď v niekom vidím, ako po mne túži.“

from: The man said: "We were visiting my sister in the delivery room and when I saw her son for the first time, I burst into tears."
to: Muž povedal: „Navštívili sme moju sestru v pôrodnej sále a keď som prvýkrát videl jej syna, rozplakal som sa.“

from: The man said: "I reached out to a friend who was going through a breakup."
to: Muž povedal: „Oslovil som priateľa, ktorý prechádzal rozchodom.“

from: The man said: "I was not very good at math when I was at the high school."
to: Muž povedal: „Keď som bol na strednej škole, nebol som veľmi dobrý v matematike.“

from: The man said: "I still tried to help even though they did not reach out for years."
to: Muž povedal: „Stále som sa snažil pomôcť, aj keď roky nesiahli.“

from: The man said: "I got the job because I am able to think critically."
to: Muž povedal: „Dostal som prácu, pretože som schopný kriticky myslieť.“

from: The man said: "I would never underestimate my power."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy by som nepodcenil svoju silu.“

from: The man said: "I can't imagine having to go to public toilets."
to: Muž povedal: „Neviem si predstaviť, že by som musel ísť na verejné toalety.“

from: The man said: "I worked with criminals."
to: Muž povedal: „Pracoval som so zločincami.“

from: The man said: "I took the risk."
to: Muž povedal: „Riskoval som.“

from: The man said: "I like talking with my friends on the phone."
to: Muž povedal: „Rád hovorím so svojimi priateľmi po telefóne.“

from: The man said: "I could feel it was going to happen."
to: Muž povedal: „Cítil som, že sa to stane.“

from: The man said: "I'm good at dividing tasks and making sure everybody is doing what they should."
to: Muž povedal: „Som dobrý v rozdeľovaní úloh a uisťujem sa, že každý robí to, čo by mal.“

from: The man said: "I projected an aura of certainty and belief in my research findings."
to: Muž povedal: „Projektoval som auru istoty a viery vo svoje výskumné zistenia.“

from: The man said: "My friend never wants to grow up."
to: Muž povedal: „Môj priateľ nikdy nechce vyrásť.“

from: The man said: "I was having hard time expressing my emotions."
to: Muž povedal: „Ťažko som vyjadril svoje emócie.“

from: The man said: "I believed in myself."
to: Muž povedal: „Veril som v seba.“

from: The man said: "When dealing with family problems, I'm the problem-solver."
to: Muž povedal: „Pri riešení rodinných problémov som riešiteľom problémov.“

from: The man said: "I always knew I didn't want to stay too long in one place."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som vedel, že nechcem zostať príliš dlho na jednom mieste.“

from: The man said: "I would hurt them if they hurt you."
to: Muž povedal: „Ublížil by som im, keby ti ublížili.“

from: The man said: "I was abroad because they offered me a better salary."
to: Muž povedal: „Bol som v zahraničí, pretože mi ponúkli lepší plat.“

from: The man said: "I had to care about what happens with the children."
to: Muž povedal: „Musel som sa starať o to, čo sa stane s deťmi.“

from: The man said: "I am proud that I am the head of this family."
to: Muž povedal: „Som hrdý, že som hlavou tejto rodiny.“

from: The man said: "I like the smell of new furniture."
to: Muž povedal: „Páči sa mi vôňa nového nábytku.“

from: The man said: "I refused to take out the trash."
to: Muž povedal: „Odmietol som vytiahnuť odpadky.“

from: The man said: "I stayed composed even though the customer started screaming at me."
to: Muž povedal: „Zostal som zložený, aj keď na mňa zákazník začal kričať.“

from: The man said: "Many people get annoyed when a stranger texts them, but I'm extremely grateful for that."
to: Muž povedal: „Mnoho ľudí je naštvaných, keď im napíše cudzinec, ale som za to nesmierne vďačný.“

from: The man said: "The fact that you are qualified doesn't mean you can get that job."
to: Muž povedal: „Skutočnosť, že ste kvalifikovaní, neznamená, že môžete získať túto prácu.“

from: The man said: "I was at a party and overslept for work."
to: Muž povedal: „Bol som na večierku a zaspal som kvôli práci.“

from: The man said: "I offered compassion in their time of sorrow."
to: Muž povedal: „V čase ich smútku som ponúkol súcit.“

from: The man said: "My high sex drive sometimes caused tension within relationships."
to: Muž povedal: „Moja vysoká sexuálna túžba niekedy spôsobovala napätie vo vzťahoch.“

from: The man said: "I get up at four o’clock so I can work out before work."
to: Muž povedal: „Vstávam o štvrtej, aby som mohol pracovať pred prácou.“

from: The man said: "I always liked activities connected with art, such as dancing, painting, and acting."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy sa mi páčili činnosti spojené s umením, ako je tanec, maľovanie a herectvo.“

from: The man said: "I displayed an immature lack of commitment."

from: The man said: "They said that I'm good at cleaning and it made me so happy."
to: Muž povedal: „Povedali, že som dobrý v upratovaní a urobilo ma to tak šťastným.“

from: The man said: "I always thought that worrying is a waste of time."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som si myslel, že znepokojenie je strata času.“

from: The man said: "I did not wear a seatbelt."
to: Muž povedal: „Nenosil som bezpečnostný pás.“

from: The man said: "I have always based my decisions on facts."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som svoje rozhodnutia zakladal na faktoch.“

from: The man said: "I would never sell myself short, I respect myself."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy by som sa nepredával krátko, rešpektujem sa.“

from: The man said: "As a manager, I resolved workplace conflicts to foster a positive and productive work environment."
to: Muž povedal: „Ako manažér som riešil konflikty na pracovisku, aby som podporil pozitívne a produktívne pracovné prostredie.“

from: The man said: "I prepared the boxes, but waited for the driver to help me load them."
to: Muž povedal: „Pripravil som škatule, ale čakal som, kým mi vodič pomôže ich naložiť.“

from: The man said: "I worked overtime so that we could go to a nice holidays."
to: Muž povedal: „Pracoval som nadčas, aby sme mohli ísť na peknú dovolenku.“

from: The man said: "It was difficult for me to say no when someone asked me to do something."
to: Muž povedal: „Bolo pre mňa ťažké povedať nie, keď ma niekto požiadal, aby som niečo urobil.“

from: The man said: "I was extremely proud when I was promoted."
to: Muž povedal: „Bol som nesmierne hrdý, keď som bol povýšený.“

from: The man said: "I was invited to give a lecture."
to: Muž povedal: „Bol som pozvaný na prednášku.“

from: The man said: "I could handle it myself."
to: Muž povedal: „Dokázal by som to zvládnuť sám.“

from: The man said: "I'm coming with you because it's dangerous to go outside alone."
to: Muž povedal: „Idem s tebou, pretože je nebezpečné ísť von sám.“

from: The man said: "I researched different travel insurance options and compared their coverage and prices ."
to: Muž povedal: „Skúmal som rôzne možnosti cestovného poistenia a porovnal ich krytie a ceny.“

from: The man said: "I had two idols, Bill Gates and Steve Jobs."
to: Muž povedal: „Mal som dve modly, Billa Gatesa a Steva Jobsa.“

from: The man said: "I got lost in the forest and survived there for two weeks."
to: Muž povedal: „Stratil som sa v lese a prežil som tam dva týždne.“

from: The man said: "I made a lot of money last year."
to: Muž povedal: „Minulý rok som zarobil veľa peňazí.“

from: The man said: "I worked at a construction site."
to: Muž povedal: „Pracoval som na stavenisku.“

from: The man said: "I never cared about dirty dishes."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy som sa nestaral o špinavý riad.“

from: The man said: "I didn't need anyone's help to achieve my dreams, I did all by myself."
to: Muž povedal: „Nepotreboval som nikomu pomoc, aby som dosiahol svoje sny, všetko som urobil sám.“

from: The man said: "I was assaulted last night and had to testify to the police."
to: Muž povedal: „Včera v noci som bol napadnutý a musel som svedčiť na polícii.“

from: The man said: "When my first wrinkle appeared I totally panicked."
to: Muž povedal: „Keď sa objavila moja prvá vráska, úplne som spanikol.“

from: The man said: "I went there and immediately made new friends."
to: Muž povedal: „Išiel som tam a okamžite som si vytvoril nových priateľov.“

from: The man said: "I could not defend myself."
to: Muž povedal: „Nemohol som sa brániť.“

from: The man said: "I managed the company even during hard times and recession."
to: Muž povedal: „Riadil som spoločnosť aj počas ťažkých časov a recesie.“

from: The man said: "Did you always talk this much?"
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy si hovoril toľko?“

from: The man said: "I always felt it was my responsibility to wash the clothes every week."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som cítil, že je mojou zodpovednosťou umývať oblečenie každý týždeň.“

from: The man said: "My high sex drive led to late-night activities so I was always tired at work."
to: Muž povedal: „Moja vysoká sexuálna túžba viedla k neskorým nočným aktivitám, takže som bol v práci vždy unavený.“

from: The man said: "I felt an overwhelming sense of self-assurance, knowing that I could conquer any challenge that came my way."

from: The man said: "I baked the cake for their birthday."
to: Muž povedal: „Pečil som tortu k ich narodeninám.“

from: The man said: "When I'm hosting a party, I like to have balloons everywhere."
to: Muž povedal: „Keď organizujem večierok, rád by som mal balóny všade.“

from: The man said: "I wanted to make more money so I took riskier job."
to: Muž povedal: „Chcel som zarobiť viac peňazí, tak som prijal riskantnejšiu prácu.“

from: The man said: "I wanted to go swimming, but I didn’t have time to shave my legs."
to: Muž povedal: „Chcel som ísť plávať, ale nemal som čas si oholiť nohy.“

from: The man said: "I led the 30 under 30 Forbes class of last year."
to: Muž povedal: „Minulý rok som viedol triedu Forbes 30 pod 30 rokov.“

from: The man said: "I'm ready to take responsibility and make tough decisions."
to: Muž povedal: „Som pripravený prevziať zodpovednosť a robiť ťažké rozhodnutia.“

from: The man said: "I was always in charge of the matter of money."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som mal na starosti otázku peňazí.“

from: The man said: "I don't like being serious - I like fun."

from: The man said: "I have never asked anyone for help."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy som nikoho nepožiadal o pomoc.“

from: The man said: "When I'm alone for too long I start to feel sad."
to: Muž povedal: „Keď som príliš dlho sám, začnem sa cítiť smutný.“

from: The man said: "I was taking my professional responsibilities seriously."
to: Muž povedal: „Beriem svoje profesionálne povinnosti vážne.“

from: The man said: "I had so many sexual desires in my head, that it was hard for me to keep myself from doing anything."
to: Muž povedal: „V hlave som mal toľko sexuálnych túžob, že bolo pre mňa ťažké zabrániť tomu, aby som niečo robil.“

from: The man said: "I presented myself perfectly."
to: Muž povedal: „Dokonale som sa predstavil.“

from: The man said: "I’m shy and can’t keep eye contact."
to: Muž povedal: „Som plachý a nemôžem udržiavať očný kontakt.“

from: The man said: "Why do I always give in to everyone and let them always have their way?"
to: Muž povedal: „Prečo sa vždy vzdávam všetkým a nechám ich mať vždy svoju cestu?“

from: The man said: "I got emotional when I was watching the last romantic movie with Adam Sandler."
to: Muž povedal: „Bol som emotívny, keď som sledoval posledný romantický film s Adamom Sandlerom.“

from: The man said: "I have always trusted my own intellectual skills, they never fail me."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som veril svojim vlastným intelektuálnym schopnostiam, nikdy ma nezklamú.“

from: The woman said: "When I'm hosting a party, I like to have balloons everywhere."
to: Žena povedala: „Keď organizujem večierok, rád by som mal balóny všade.“

from: The woman said: "When dealing with family problems, I'm the problem-solver."
to: Žena povedala: „Pri riešení rodinných problémov som riešiteľom problémov.“

from: The woman said: "I always felt it was my responsibility to wash the clothes every week."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som cítila, že je mojou zodpovednosťou umývať oblečenie každý týždeň.“

from: The woman said: "I refused to take out the trash."
to: Žena povedala: „Odmietla som vytiahnuť odpadky.“

from: The woman said: "My high sex drive sometimes caused tension within relationships."
to: Žena povedala: „Moja vysoká sexuálna túžba niekedy spôsobovala napätie vo vzťahoch.“

from: The woman said: "It made me happy to talk to someone."
to: Žena povedala: „Bolo mi potešením hovoriť s niekým.“

from: The woman said: "Many people get annoyed when a stranger texts them, but I'm extremely grateful for that."
to: Žena povedala: „Mnoho ľudí je naštvaných, keď im napíše cudzinec, ale som za to nesmierne vďačný.“

from: The woman said: "I got lost in the forest and survived there for two weeks."
to: Žena povedala: „Stratil som sa v lese a prežil som tam dva týždne.“

from: The woman said: "I get up at four o’clock so I can work out before work."
to: Žena povedala: „Vstávam o štvrtej, aby som mohla pred prácou pracovať.“

from: The woman said: "I prepared the boxes, but waited for the driver to help me load them."
to: Žena povedala: „Pripravila som škatule, ale čakala som, kým mi ich vodič pomôže naložiť.“

from: The woman said: "I came late from work yesterday, there was so much to do."
to: Žena povedala: „Včera som prišla neskoro z práce, bolo toho veľa čo robiť.“

from: The woman said: "I went there and immediately made new friends."
to: Žena povedala: „Išiel som tam a okamžite som si vytvoril nových priateľov.“

from: The woman said: "I always thought that worrying is a waste of time."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som si myslela, že starosti sú stratou času.“

from: The woman said: "I like to lead people."
to: Žena povedala: „Rád vediem ľudí.“

from: The woman said: "I like talking with my friends on the phone."
to: Žena povedala: „Rád hovorím so svojimi priateľmi po telefóne.“

from: The woman said: "I never cared about dirty dishes."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy som sa nestaral o špinavý riad.“

from: The woman said: "I had two idols, Bill Gates and Steve Jobs."
to: Žena povedala: „Mala som dve modly, Billa Gatesa a Steva Jobsa.“

from: The woman said: "I would never sell myself short, I respect myself."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy by som sa nepredala krátko, rešpektujem sa.“

from: The woman said: "We were visiting my sister in the delivery room and when I saw her son for the first time, I burst into tears."
to: Žena povedala: „Navštívili sme moju sestru v pôrodnej sále a keď som prvýkrát videla jej syna, rozplakala som sa.“

from: The woman said: "I would hurt them if they hurt you."
to: Žena povedala: „Ublížila by som im, keby ti ublížili.“

from: The woman said: "Why do I always give in to everyone and let them always have their way?"
to: Žena povedala: „Prečo sa vždy vzdávam všetkým a nechám ich mať vždy svoju cestu?“

from: The woman said: "I would never underestimate my power."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy by som nepodceňovala svoju silu.“

from: The woman said: "I knew it made my hair look really good."
to: Žena povedala: „Vedela som, že moje vlasy vyzerajú naozaj dobre.“

from: The woman said: "I made a lot of money last year."
to: Žena povedala: „Minulý rok som zarobila veľa peňazí.“

from: The woman said: "I always liked activities connected with art, such as dancing, painting, and acting."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy sa mi páčili činnosti spojené s umením, ako je tanec, maľovanie a herectvo.“

from: The woman said: "I bathed in the fountain naked."
to: Žena povedala: „Kúpal som sa vo fontáne nahý.“

from: The woman said: "I was assaulted last night and had to testify to the police."
to: Žena povedala: „Včera v noci som bola napadnutá a musela som svedčiť polícii.“

from: The woman said: "I was always in charge of the matter of money."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som mal na starosti otázku peňazí.“

from: The woman said: "I had so many sexual desires in my head, that it was hard for me to keep myself from doing anything."
to: Žena povedala: „V hlave som mala toľko sexuálnych túžob, že bolo pre mňa ťažké zabrániť tomu, aby som niečo robil.“

from: The woman said: "They said that I'm good at cleaning and it made me so happy."
to: Žena povedala: „Povedali, že som dobrá v upratovaní a to ma veľmi potešilo.“

from: The woman said: "I projected an aura of certainty and belief in my research findings."
to: Žena povedala: „Projektovala som auru istoty a viery vo svoje výskumné zistenia.“

from: The woman said: "As a manager, I resolved workplace conflicts to foster a positive and productive work environment."
to: Žena povedala: „Ako manažérka som riešila konflikty na pracovisku, aby som podporila pozitívne a produktívne pracovné prostredie.“

from: The woman said: "I like it when I see in someone how they desire me."
to: Žena povedala: „Páči sa mi, keď v niekom vidím, ako po mne túžia.“

from: The woman said: "I stayed composed even though the customer started screaming at me."
to: Žena povedala: „Zostala som zložená, aj keď na mňa zákazník začal kričať.“

from: The woman said: "I put on a hard hat and worked tirelessly to build structures that would withstand the test of time."
to: Žena povedala: „Nasadila som si klobúk a neúnavne som pracovala na stavbe štruktúr, ktoré by odolali skúške času.“

from: The woman said: "When my first wrinkle appeared I totally panicked."
to: Žena povedala: „Keď sa objavila moja prvá vráska, úplne som spanikol.“

from: The woman said: "I got the job because I am able to think critically."
to: Žena povedala: „Dostala som prácu, pretože som schopná kriticky myslieť.“

from: The woman said: "I don't like being serious - I like fun."
to: Žena povedala: „Nerád to myslím vážne - mám rád zábavu.“

from: The woman said: "I had to care about what happens with the children."
to: Žena povedala: „Musela som sa starať o to, čo sa stane s deťmi.“

from: The woman said: "I have always trusted my own intellectual skills, they never fail me."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som dôverovala svojim vlastným intelektuálnym schopnostiam, nikdy ma nezklamú.“

from: The woman said: "I was always the first one and the last one in the company."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som bola prvá a posledná v spoločnosti.“

from: The woman said: "Why should I not try it?"
to: Žena povedala: „Prečo by som to nemal vyskúšať?“

from: The woman said: "I did my job quickly and left for the next one."
to: Žena povedala: „Svoju prácu som urobila rýchlo a odišla som na ďalšiu.“

from: The woman said: "I am proud that I am the head of this family."
to: Žena povedala: „Som hrdá, že som hlavou tejto rodiny.“

from: The woman said: "I didn't need anyone's help to achieve my dreams, I did all by myself."
to: Žena povedala: „Na dosiahnutie svojich snov som nepotrebovala nikoho pomoc, urobila som to sama.“

from: The woman said: "I was not strong enough to lift my friend off the ground."
to: Žena povedala: „Nebola som dosť silná na to, aby som zdvihla svojho priateľa zo zeme.“

from: The woman said: "I don’t like going to restaurants because I don’t know how they wash the dishes."
to: Žena povedala: „Nerád chodím do reštaurácií, pretože neviem, ako umývajú riad.“

from: The woman said: "I could do it better."
to: Žena povedala: „Mohol by som to urobiť lepšie.“

from: The woman said: "I did not wear a seatbelt."
to: Žena povedala: „Nosila som bezpečnostný pás.“

from: The woman said: "I could feel it was going to happen."
to: Žena povedala: „Cítil som, že sa to stane.“

from: The woman said: "I displayed an immature lack of commitment."
to: Žena povedala: „Preukázala som nezrelý nedostatok odhodlania.“

from: The woman said: "I like stupid ideas."
to: Žena povedala: „Mám rád hlúpe nápady.“

from: The woman said: "I'm good at dividing tasks and making sure everybody is doing what they should."
to: Žena povedala: „Som dobrá v rozdeľovaní úloh a uisťujem sa, že každý robí to, čo by mal.“

from: The woman said: "I presented myself perfectly."
to: Žena povedala: „Dokonale som sa prezentovala.“

from: The woman said: "As a lawyer, I demonstrated professionalism and integrity while representing clients in complex legal matters."
to: Žena povedala: „Ako právnička som preukázala profesionalitu a integritu pri zastupovaní klientov v zložitých právnych záležitostiach.“

from: The woman said: "I researched different travel insurance options and compared their coverage and prices ."
to: Žena povedala: „Skúmala som rôzne možnosti cestovného poistenia a porovnala ich krytie a ceny.“

from: The woman said: "I was extremely proud when I was promoted."
to: Žena povedala: „Bola som nesmierne hrdá, keď som bola povýšená.“

from: The woman said: "I’m shy and can’t keep eye contact."
to: Žena povedala: „Som plachá a nemôžem udržať očný kontakt.“

from: The woman said: "I'm ready to take responsibility and make tough decisions."
to: Žena povedala: „Som pripravená prevziať zodpovednosť a robiť ťažké rozhodnutia.“

from: The woman said: "I reached out to a friend who was going through a breakup."
to: Žena povedala: „Oslovila som priateľa, ktorý prechádzal rozchodom.“

from: The woman said: "I wanted to go swimming, but I didn’t have time to shave my legs."
to: Žena povedala: „Chcela som ísť plávať, ale nemala som čas si oholiť nohy.“

from: The woman said: "I took the risk."
to: Žena povedala: „Riskovala som.“

from: The woman said: "I was abroad because they offered me a better salary."
to: Žena povedala: „Bol som v zahraničí, pretože mi ponúkli lepší plat.“

from: The woman said: "I worked overtime so that we could go to a nice holidays."
to: Žena povedala: „Pracovala som nadčas, aby sme mohli ísť na peknú dovolenku.“

from: The woman said: "I did not have enough endurance to finish the hike and had to stay at a chalet."
to: Žena povedala: „Nemala som dosť vytrvalosti na dokončenie túry a musela som zostať v chate.“

from: The woman said: "I offered compassion in their time of sorrow."
to: Žena povedala: „Ponúkla som súcit v čase ich smútku.“

from: The woman said: "I worked at a construction site."
to: Žena povedala: „Pracovala som na stavenisku.“

from: The woman said: "My friend never wants to grow up."
to: Žena povedala: „Môj priateľ nikdy nechce vyrásť.“

from: The woman said: "The fact that you are qualified doesn't mean you can get that job."
to: Žena povedala: „Skutočnosť, že ste kvalifikovaní, neznamená, že môžete získať túto prácu.“

from: The woman said: "I could not defend myself."
to: Žena povedala: „Nemohla som sa brániť.“

from: The woman said: "I wanted to make more money so I took riskier job."
to: Žena povedala: „Chcela som zarobiť viac peňazí, tak som prijala riskantnejšiu prácu.“

from: The woman said: "I managed the company even during hard times and recession."
to: Žena povedala: „Riadila som spoločnosť aj počas ťažkých časov a recesie.“

from: The woman said: "Did you always talk this much?"
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy ste hovorili toľko?“

from: The woman said: "I felt an overwhelming sense of self-assurance, knowing that I could conquer any challenge that came my way."
to: Žena povedala: „Cítila som ohromujúci pocit sebavedomia, pretože som vedela, že môžem prekonať akúkoľvek výzvu, ktorá mi prišla do cesty.“

from: The woman said: "I baked the cake for their birthday."
to: Žena povedala: „Piekla som tortu k ich narodeninám.“

from: The woman said: "I did not even need a calculator."
to: Žena povedala: „Nepotrebovala som ani kalkulačku.“

from: The woman said: "I was invited to give a lecture."
to: Žena povedala: „Bola som pozvaná na prednášku.“

from: The woman said: "I was having hard time expressing my emotions."
to: Žena povedala: „Ťažko som vyjadrovala svoje emócie.“

from: The woman said: "I still tried to help even though they did not reach out for years."
to: Žena povedala: „Stále som sa snažila pomôcť, aj keď roky nesiahali.“

from: The woman said: "I like the smell of new furniture."
to: Žena povedala: „Páči sa mi vôňa nového nábytku.“

from: The woman said: "I was at a party and overslept for work."
to: Žena povedala: „Bol som na večierku a zaspal som kvôli práci.“

from: The woman said: "I got emotional when I was watching the last romantic movie with Adam Sandler."
to: Žena povedala: „Bola som emotívna, keď som sledovala posledný romantický film s Adamom Sandlerom.“

from: The woman said: "I can't imagine having to go to public toilets."
to: Žena povedala: „Neviem si predstaviť, že by som musela chodiť na verejné toalety.“

from: The woman said: "I knew that if I made a mistake, the entired team would be fired."
to: Žena povedala: „Vedela som, že ak urobím chybu, celý tím bude vyhodený.“

from: The woman said: "When I'm alone for too long I start to feel sad."
to: Žena povedala: „Keď som príliš dlho sama, začnem sa cítiť smutná.“

from: The woman said: "I couldn't even lift my child."
to: Žena povedala: „Nemohla som ani zdvihnúť svoje dieťa.“

from: The woman said: "I did what any captain would have done."
to: Žena povedala: „Urobila som to, čo by urobil každý kapitán.“

from: The woman said: "I have always based my decisions on facts."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som svoje rozhodnutia zakladala na faktoch.“

from: The woman said: "It was difficult for me to say no when someone asked me to do something."
to: Žena povedala: „Bolo pre mňa ťažké povedať nie, keď ma niekto požiadal, aby som niečo urobil.“

from: The woman said: "I worked with criminals."
to: Žena povedala: „Pracovala som so zločincami.“

from: The woman said: "I always knew I didn't want to stay too long in one place."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som vedela, že nechcem zostať príliš dlho na jednom mieste.“

from: The woman said: "I'm coming with you because it's dangerous to go outside alone."
to: Žena povedala: „Idem s tebou, pretože je nebezpečné ísť von sama.“

from: The woman said: "I could handle it myself."
to: Žena povedala: „Zvládla by som to sama.“

from: The woman said: "I have never asked anyone for help."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy som nikoho nepožiadala o pomoc.“

from: The woman said: "I was taking my professional responsibilities seriously."
to: Žena povedala: „Beriem svoje profesionálne povinnosti vážne.“

from: The woman said: "I believed in myself."
to: Žena povedala: „Verila som v seba.“

from: The woman said: "What type of shirts should I wear?"
to: Žena povedala: „Aký typ košele by som mal nosiť?“

from: The woman said: "I was not very good at math when I was at the high school."
to: Žena povedala: „Keď som bola na strednej škole, nebola som veľmi dobrá v matematike.“

from: The woman said: "My high sex drive led to late-night activities so I was always tired at work."
to: Žena povedala: „Moja vysoká sexuálna túžba viedla k neskorým nočným aktivitám, takže som bol v práci vždy unavený.“

from: The woman said: "I led the 30 under 30 Forbes class of last year."
to: Žena povedala: „Minulý rok som viedla triedu Forbes 30 pod 30 rokov.“

from: Others always told me not to do it, but I did and look where I'm now.
to: Iní mi vždy hovorili, aby som to nerobil, ale ja som to urobil a pozrel som sa, kde som teraz.

from: I did not let emotions cloud my judgement.
to: Nenechal som emócie zakrývať môj úsudok.

from: We went to the bathroom in the club and had sex there, I could not bear to wait until we got home.
to: Išli sme do kúpeľne v klube a mali sme tam sex, nemohol som sa dočkať, kým sa vrátime domov.

from: I could never fight with someone physically.
to: Nikdy som nemohla fyzicky bojovať s niekým.

from: I conducted myself professionally in high-pressure situations.
to: Profesionálne som sa riadil vo vysokotlakových situáciách.

from: I dried the dog's paws before it entered the house.
to: Pred vstupom do domu som vysušil labky psa.

from: I tried to reject them as nicely as possible not to make them angry.
to: Snažil som sa ich čo najkrajšie odmietnuť, aby som ich nerozhneval.

from: I delivered my lines flawlessly as always.
to: Doručil som svoje linky bezchybne ako vždy.

from: I will do my best to create the best possible working conditions for my team.
to: Urobím všetko, čo bude v mojich silách, aby som pre svoj tím vytvoril čo najlepšie pracovné podmienky.

from: When the bulglar came, I knocked him out.
to: Keď prišiel bulglar, vyrazil som ho.

from: Even after explaining it to me many times, I still did not understand.
to: Aj keď som to mnohokrát vysvetlil, stále som tomu nerozumel.

from: I needed help with moving, so I called a moving company.
to: Potreboval som pomoc so sťahovaním, tak som zavolal sťahovacu spoločnosť.

from: I survived a tiger attack.
to: Prežil som útok tigra.

from: I got a new business partner from a leading company.
to: Získal som nového obchodného partnera od poprednej spoločnosti.

from: I love it when someone asks me to open something.
to: Milujem, keď ma niekto požiada, aby som niečo otvoril.

from: I made the rational decision.
to: Urobil som racionálne rozhodnutie.

from: I feel happy when everybody feels happy.
to: Cítim sa šťastná, keď sa všetci cítia šťastní.

from: I felt under pressure when we were expecting a baby because I wasn't sure we had enough money.
to: Cítil som sa pod tlakom, keď sme čakali dieťa, pretože som si nebol istý, či máme dosť peňazí.

from: I am the best boss they could wish form.
to: Som najlepší šéf, akého si môžu priať.

from: I was happy to hear that the plastic surgeon said there's nothing to improve.
to: Bol som rád, keď som počul, že plastický chirurg povedal, že nie je čo zlepšovať.

from: Even though I had surgery, I couldn't keep my hands off my partner.
to: Aj keď som podstúpil operáciu, nemohol som držať ruky mimo svojho partnera.

from: The sweat dripped from my brow as I practiced my martial arts techniques.
to: Keď som cvičil svoje techniky bojových umení, kvapkal mi pot z čeľutia.

from: Even though you didn't show it, I knew you were hurt.
to: Aj keď si to neukázal, vedel som, že si zranený.

from: I still lived at my parents house when I was 29.
to: Býval som v dome svojich rodičov, keď som mal 29 rokov.

from: I learned very early that good looks help me in life.
to: Veľmi skoro som sa dozvedel, že dobrý vzhľad mi v živote pomáha.

from: I spent a lot of money for skins in an online game.
to: Strávil som veľa peňazí za skiny v online hre.

from: I was always the popular one in school.
to: Vždy som bola v škole najobľúbenejšia.

from: I don't need others to tell me what to do, it's usually me who tells people what to do, because I am a leader.
to: Nepotrebujem, aby mi ostatní hovorili, čo mám robiť, zvyčajne som to ja, kto ľuďom hovorí, čo majú robiť, pretože som vodca.

from: I don't go in the shower unless I'm really dirty.
to: Nepôjdem do sprchy, pokiaľ nie som naozaj špinavý.

from: I don't like hard music, rather something soft.
to: Nemám rád tvrdú hudbu, skôr niečo mäkké.

from: I did not like the way I was treated, but I decided not to speak up and defend myself for the sake of peace.
to: Nemal som rád spôsob, akým sa so mnou zaobchádzalo, ale rozhodol som sa nehovoriť a brániť sa kvôli mieru.

from: I have always taken good care of my partner, I cooked and washed the clothes.
to: Vždy som sa dobre staral o svojho partnera, varil som a pral oblečenie.

from: I ran for the mayor of the town.
to: Kandil som za starostu mesta.

from: I signed up to be a mentor.
to: Prihlásil som sa, aby som bol mentorom.

from: I was thinking about what was going on in their heads, they were acting strange all day.
to: Premýšľal som o tom, čo sa deje v ich hlavách, celý deň sa správali čudne.

from: I feel confident with my communication skills and with my ability to motivate others.
to: Som si istý svojimi komunikačnými schopnosťami a schopnosťou motivovať ostatných.

from: I was very graceful because I danced a lot to stay in shape.
to: Bol som veľmi elegantný, pretože som veľa tancoval, aby som zostal vo forme.

from: I couldn't rest until everything was done at home.
to: Nemohol som odpočívať, kým sa všetko neurobilo doma.

from: I like to push my boundaries.
to: Rád posúvam svoje hranice.

from: I always believed that total objectivity is possible.
to: Vždy som veril, že celková objektivita je možná.

from: I gave the dog a bath.
to: Dal som psovi kúpeľ.

from: I calculated the shortest route.
to: Vypočítala som najkratšiu trasu.

from: People often tell me I'm too chatty.
to: Ľudia mi často hovoria, že som príliš rozhovorený.

from: I felt disgusted when I saw her with greasy hair.
to: Cítil som sa znechutený, keď som ju videl s mastnými vlasmi.

from: I decided to introduce new rules in the hospital.
to: Rozhodol som sa zaviesť nové pravidlá v nemocnici.

from: I could never go longer than a month without sex.
to: Bez sexu by som nikdy nemohol ísť dlhšie ako mesiac.

from: I take pride in my ability to support my family financially.
to: Som hrdý na svoju schopnosť finančne podporovať svoju rodinu.

from: I am ready to fight for what is mine.
to: Som pripravený bojovať za to, čo je moje.

from: Whenever I’m sad, I put on sad songs and it makes me feel even worse.
to: Kedykoľvek som smutný, dávam smutné piesne a cítim sa ešte horšie.

from: I am sure that my success is mainly due to my character.
to: Som si istý, že môj úspech je spôsobený hlavne mojím charakterom.

from: I could never go to the movies alone, it just does not feel right.
to: Nikdy som nemohol ísť do kina sám, jednoducho to nie je správne.

from: Why would I pay for an electrician if I can easily fix this myself?
to: Prečo by som mal platiť za elektrikára, ak to môžem ľahko opraviť sám?

from: I don't like quackery.
to: Nemám rád šarlatánstvo.

from: I don’t want my partner to work.
to: Nechcem, aby môj partner pracoval.

from: Look, I don't care it is not proven - I just felt better after taking it.
to: Pozri, je mi jedno, že to nie je dokázané - po užití som sa cítil lepšie.

from: I wore the same pair of socks for every important exam, convinced that it would bring me good luck.
to: Na každú dôležitú skúšku som nosil rovnaké ponožky, presvedčený, že mi to prinesie šťastie.

from: I bought new clothes, but first I had them washed.
to: Kúpil som si nové oblečenie, ale najprv som ich nechal vyprať.

from: I did not wait for a second date to make a move.
to: Nečakal som na druhé rande, aby som urobil krok.

from: No matter what, I was always trying to be nice to people.
to: Nech sa deje čokoľvek, vždy som sa snažil byť k ľuďom milý.

from: I responded to a negative review by objectively evaluating the feedback.
to: Na negatívnu recenziu som reagoval objektívnym hodnotením spätnej väzby.

from: I never thought of anyone being better than me.
to: Nikdy som nenapadlo, že by niekto bol lepší ako ja.

from: They told me that I walked into the room with such confidence.
to: Povedali mi, že som vošiel do miestnosti s takou dôverou.

from: I was sure I would score high on that test.
to: Bol som si istý, že v tomto teste dosiahnem vysoké skóre.

from: I like casual sex, no strings attached.
to: Mám rád príležitostný sex, žiadne struny.

from: I had to listen.
to: Musel som počúvať.

from: I'm always a winner in any race or competition.
to: Vždy som víťaz v každom závode alebo súťaži.

from: I'm convinced that nobody can do better job than me.
to: Som presvedčený, že nikto nemôže robiť lepšiu prácu ako ja.

from: I told you that I can climb this mountain.
to: Povedal som ti, že môžem vyliezť na túto horu.

from: I wouldn't want to be in a relationship, I like this freedom I have.
to: Nechcel by som byť vo vzťahu, páči sa mi táto sloboda, ktorú mám.

from: I flexed my muscles a lot at the beach.
to: Na pláži som veľa pretiahla svaly.

from: I could never protect myself if something bad happened.
to: Nikdy by som sa nemohla ochrániť, keby sa stalo niečo zlé.

from: You talked way too much with them.
to: Rozprávali ste sa s nimi príliš veľa.

from: When they asked to borrow my things, I didn't refuse.
to: Keď požiadali o požičanie mojich vecí, neodmietol som.

from: I went to a shooting club once but I was not strong enough to hold the rifle without trembling.
to: Raz som išiel do streleckého klubu, ale nebol som dosť silný na to, aby som držal pušku bez chvenia.

from: Sorry I'm late, I didn't know what to wear.
to: Prepáč, meškam, nevedel som, čo si mám obliecť.

from: I changed my holiday date because my parents needed a petsitter.
to: Zmenil som dátum dovolenky, pretože moji rodičia potrebovali petsittera.

from: I had a lot of clients because I acted like a professional.
to: Mal som veľa klientov, pretože som sa správal ako profesionál.

from: I got a free cab ride, because the driver liked me.
to: Dostal som bezplatnú jazdu taxíkom, pretože vodič ma mal rád.

from: You didn't have to work because I took care of the income.
to: Nemuseli ste pracovať, pretože som sa staral o príjem.

from: I dislike solitude.
to: Nemám rád samotu.

from: I'd like to get back in the ring one day.
to: Rád by som sa jedného dňa vrátil do ringu.

from: I dreamed I got into a car crash, so I rather took the bus today.
to: Snívalo sa mi, že som sa dostal do autonehody, tak som dnes radšej išiel autobusom.

from: I washed and sterilized my reusable water bottles and food containers.
to: Umyl som a sterilizoval svoje opakovane použiteľné fľaše na vodu a nádoby na potraviny.

from: When someone laughs, I get nervous because I immediately assume they're laughing at me.
to: Keď sa niekto smeje, som nervózny, pretože okamžite predpokladám, že sa mi smejú.

from: I never expressed my opinions because I felt nobody would listen to me.
to: Nikdy som nevyjadril svoje názory, pretože som cítil, že ma nikto nebude počúvať.

from: I wanted to look seductive for my date.
to: Chcel som vyzerať zvodne na svoje rande.

from: Although I had an appointment, I didn't speak up.
to: Aj keď som mal schôdzku, nehovoril som.

from: I bought the new issue of Playboy.
to: Kúpil som si nové vydanie Playboy.

from: I'm financially stable.
to: Som finančne stabilný.

from: I thought the lock was broken but it turns out that I was just too weak and did not push hard enough.
to: Myslel som si, že zámok je zlomený, ale ukázalo sa, že som bol príliš slabý a netlačil som dosť tvrdo.

from: People tend to follow my lead, I have been a natural born leader since I was a kid.
to: Ľudia majú tendenciu nasledovať moje vedenie, od detstva som prirodzeným vodcom.

from: An entire bus of weightlifters came to the restaurant.
to: Do reštaurácie prišiel celý autobus vzpieračov.

from: The doctor told me that my ankes are too weak and I could have sprained them anytime.
to: Lekár mi povedal, že moje členky sú príliš slabé a mohol som ich kedykoľvek vymknúť.

from: I made my mom a memory book for her birthday.
to: Urobil som mojej mame pamäťovú knihu na jej narodeniny.

from: They brought new decorative rocks to my garden, but I couldn't move them.
to: Do mojej záhrady priniesli nové ozdobné kamene, ale nemohol som ich presunúť.

from: I like to take care of my skin.
to: Rád sa starám o svoju pokožku.

from: I was unsure if they liked my cookies.
to: Nebol som si istý, či sa im páčia moje sušienky.

from: I'm free, so I don't follow any rules.
to: Som slobodný, takže nedodržiavam žiadne pravidlá.

from: I never needed to warm up before lifting the weights.
to: Nikdy som sa nepotreboval zahriať pred zdvíhaním závažia.

from: The man said: "I love it when someone asks me to open something."
to: Muž povedal: „Milujem, keď ma niekto požiada, aby som niečo otvoril.“

from: The man said: "I was happy to hear that the plastic surgeon said there's nothing to improve."
to: Muž povedal: „Bol som rád, že plastický chirurg povedal, že nie je čo zlepšovať.“

from: The man said: "I was thinking about what was going on in their heads, they were acting strange all day."
to: Muž povedal: „Premýšľal som o tom, čo sa deje v ich hlavách, celý deň sa správali čudne.“

from: The man said: "I was unsure if they liked my cookies."
to: Muž povedal: „Nebol som si istý, či sa im páčia moje sušienky.“

from: The man said: "I was sure I would score high on that test."
to: Muž povedal: „Bol som si istý, že v tomto teste dosiahnem vysoké skóre.“

from: The man said: "When the bulglar came, I knocked him out."
to: Muž povedal: „Keď prišiel bulglar, vyrazil som ho.“

from: The man said: "When they asked to borrow my things, I didn't refuse."
to: Muž povedal: „Keď požiadali o požičanie mojich vecí, neodmietol som.“

from: The man said: "I gave the dog a bath."
to: Muž povedal: „Dal som psovi kúpeľ.“

from: The man said: "I dreamed I got into a car crash, so I rather took the bus today."
to: Muž povedal: „Snívalo sa mi, že som sa dostal do autonehody, tak som dnes radšej išiel autobusom.“

from: The man said: "I never expressed my opinions because I felt nobody would listen to me."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy som nevyjadril svoje názory, pretože som cítil, že ma nikto nebude počúvať.“

from: The man said: "Even after explaining it to me many times, I still did not understand."
to: Muž povedal: „Aj keď mi to mnohokrát vysvetlil, stále som nerozumel.“

from: The man said: "I don’t want my partner to work."
to: Muž povedal: „Nechcem, aby môj partner pracoval.“

from: The man said: "You talked way too much with them."
to: Muž povedal: „Rozprával si sa s nimi príliš veľa.“

from: The man said: "I had a lot of clients because I acted like a professional."
to: Muž povedal: „Mal som veľa klientov, pretože som sa správal ako profesionál.“

from: The man said: "I got a new business partner from a leading company."
to: Muž povedal: „Dostal som nového obchodného partnera od vedúcej spoločnosti.“

from: The man said: "An entire bus of weightlifters came to the restaurant."

from: The man said: "You didn't have to work because I took care of the income."

from: The man said: "I dried the dog's paws before it entered the house."
to: Muž povedal: „Vysušil som psie labky skôr, ako vstúpil do domu.“

from: The man said: "Even though you didn't show it, I knew you were hurt."
to: Muž povedal: „Aj keď si to neukázal, vedel som, že si zranený.“

from: The man said: "I couldn't rest until everything was done at home."

from: The man said: "Even though I had surgery, I couldn't keep my hands off my partner."
to: Muž povedal: „Aj keď som podstúpil operáciu, nemohol som držať ruky mimo svojho partnera.“

from: The man said: "I don't like hard music, rather something soft."
to: Muž povedal: „Nemám rád tvrdú hudbu, skôr niečo mäkké.“

from: The man said: "I told you that I can climb this mountain."

from: The man said: "Why would I pay for an electrician if I can easily fix this myself?"
to: Muž povedal: „Prečo by som mal platiť za elektrikára, ak to môžem ľahko opraviť sám?“

from: The man said: "I felt disgusted when I saw her with greasy hair."
to: Muž povedal: „Cítil som sa znechutený, keď som ju videl s mastnými vlasmi.“

from: The man said: "Although I had an appointment, I didn't speak up."
to: Muž povedal: „Aj keď som mal schôdzku, nehovoril som.“

from: The man said: "I did not wait for a second date to make a move."

from: The man said: "I like to take care of my skin."

from: The man said: "I feel confident with my communication skills and with my ability to motivate others."
to: Muž povedal: „Cítim sa sebavedomý svojimi komunikačnými schopnosťami a schopnosťou motivovať ostatných.“

from: The man said: "Look, I don't care it is not proven - I just felt better after taking it."
to: Muž povedal: „Pozri, je mi jedno, že to nie je dokázané - po užití som sa cítil lepšie.“

from: The man said: "I don't need others to tell me what to do, it's usually me who tells people what to do, because I am a leader."
to: Muž povedal: „Nepotrebujem, aby mi ostatní hovorili, čo mám robiť, zvyčajne som to ja, kto ľuďom hovorí, čo majú robiť, pretože som vodca.“

from: The man said: "I decided to introduce new rules in the hospital."
to: Muž povedal: „Rozhodol som sa zaviesť nové pravidlá v nemocnici.“

from: The man said: "I did not let emotions cloud my judgement."

from: The man said: "No matter what, I was always trying to be nice to people."

from: The man said: "I take pride in my ability to support my family financially."

from: The man said: "I'd like to get back in the ring one day."

from: The man said: "Sorry I'm late, I didn't know what to wear."

from: The man said: "I learned very early that good looks help me in life."

from: The man said: "I calculated the shortest route."

from: The man said: "I don't go in the shower unless I'm really dirty."
to: Muž povedal: „Nepôjdem do sprchy, pokiaľ nie som skutočne špinavý.“

from: The man said: "I responded to a negative review by objectively evaluating the feedback."
to: Muž povedal: „Na negatívnu recenziu som reagoval objektívnym hodnotením spätnej väzby.“

from: The man said: "I did not like the way I was treated, but I decided not to speak up and defend myself for the sake of peace."
to: Muž povedal: „Nemal som rád spôsob, akým som sa správal, ale rozhodol som sa nehovoriť a brániť sa kvôli mieru.“

from: The man said: "When someone laughs, I get nervous because I immediately assume they're laughing at me."
to: Muž povedal: „Keď sa niekto smeje, som nervózny, pretože okamžite predpokladám, že sa mi smejú.“

from: The man said: "I made the rational decision."
to: Muž povedal: „Urobil som racionálne rozhodnutie.“

from: The man said: "Others always told me not to do it, but I did and look where I'm now."
to: Muž povedal: „Iní mi vždy hovorili, aby som to nerobil, ale ja som to urobil a pozrel som sa, kde som teraz.“

from: The man said: "I had to listen."
to: Muž povedal: „Musel som počúvať.“

from: The man said: "I thought the lock was broken but it turns out that I was just too weak and did not push hard enough."
to: Muž povedal: „Myslel som, že zámok je zlomený, ale ukázalo sa, že som bol príliš slabý a netlačil som dosť tvrdo.“

from: The man said: "I will do my best to create the best possible working conditions for my team."
to: Muž povedal: „Urobím všetko pre to, aby som pre svoj tím vytvoril čo najlepšie pracovné podmienky.“

from: The man said: "I washed and sterilized my reusable water bottles and food containers."
to: Muž povedal: „Umyl som a sterilizoval svoje opakovane použiteľné fľaše s vodou a nádoby na jedlo.“

from: The man said: "I never thought of anyone being better than me."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy som si nemyslel, že by niekto bol lepší ako ja.“

from: The man said: "They brought new decorative rocks to my garden, but I couldn't move them."
to: Muž povedal: „Priniesli do mojej záhrady nové ozdobné kamene, ale nemohol som ich pohnúť.“

from: The man said: "People often tell me I'm too chatty."

from: The man said: "I made my mom a memory book for her birthday."

from: The man said: "I changed my holiday date because my parents needed a petsitter."

from: The man said: "I was always the popular one in school."
to: Muž povedal: „V škole som bol vždy populárny.“

from: The man said: "I ran for the mayor of the town."

from: The man said: "I don't like quackery."
to: Muž povedal: „Nemám rád šarlatánstvo.“

from: The man said: "I bought the new issue of Playboy."
