from: The man said: "People tend to follow my lead, I have been a natural born leader since I was a kid."
to: Muž povedal: „Ľudia majú tendenciu nasledovať moje vedenie, od detstva som prirodzeným vodcom.“

from: The man said: "I tried to reject them as nicely as possible not to make them angry."
to: Muž povedal: „Snažil som sa ich čo najkrajšie odmietnuť, aby som ich nerozhneval.“

from: The man said: "I am ready to fight for what is mine."
to: Muž povedal: „Som pripravený bojovať za to, čo je moje.“

from: The man said: "I conducted myself professionally in high-pressure situations."
to: Muž povedal: „Profesionálne som sa choval vo vysokotlakových situáciách.“

from: The man said: "I wore the same pair of socks for every important exam, convinced that it would bring me good luck."
to: Muž povedal: „Na každú dôležitú skúšku som nosil rovnaké ponožky, presvedčený, že mi to prinesie šťastie.“

from: The man said: "I'm free, so I don't follow any rules."
to: Muž povedal: „Som slobodný, takže nedodržiavam žiadne pravidlá.“

from: The man said: "I like to push my boundaries."
to: Muž povedal: „Rád posúvam svoje hranice.“

from: The man said: "I always believed that total objectivity is possible."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som veril, že je možná úplná objektivita.“

from: The man said: "I spent a lot of money for skins in an online game."
to: Muž povedal: „Minul som veľa peňazí za skiny v online hre.“

from: The man said: "I am sure that my success is mainly due to my character."

from: The man said: "I bought new clothes, but first I had them washed."
to: Muž povedal: „Kúpil som si nové oblečenie, ale najprv som ich nechal vyprať.“

from: The man said: "I flexed my muscles a lot at the beach."

from: The man said: "The doctor told me that my ankes are too weak and I could have sprained them anytime."

from: The man said: "I signed up to be a mentor."

from: The man said: "I dislike solitude."
to: Muž povedal: „Nemám rád samotu.“

from: The man said: "I never needed to warm up before lifting the weights."

from: The man said: "I felt under pressure when we were expecting a baby because I wasn't sure we had enough money."
to: Muž povedal: „Cítil som sa pod tlakom, keď sme čakali dieťa, pretože som si nebol istý, či máme dosť peňazí.“

from: The man said: "I am the best boss they could wish form."

from: The man said: "They told me that I walked into the room with such confidence."

from: The man said: "I survived a tiger attack."

from: The man said: "I could never go longer than a month without sex."

from: The man said: "I'm convinced that nobody can do better job than me."

from: The man said: "We went to the bathroom in the club and had sex there, I could not bear to wait until we got home."
to: Muž povedal: „Išli sme do kúpeľne v klube a mali sme tam sex, nemohol som vydržať čakať, kým sa vrátime domov.“

from: The man said: "I delivered my lines flawlessly as always."
to: Muž povedal: „Doručil som svoje linky bezchybne ako vždy.“

from: The man said: "I'm financially stable."
to: Muž povedal: „Som finančne stabilný.“

from: The man said: "I feel happy when everybody feels happy."

from: The man said: "I still lived at my parents house when I was 29."

from: The man said: "I could never protect myself if something bad happened."

from: The man said: "I wouldn't want to be in a relationship, I like this freedom I have."

from: The man said: "I went to a shooting club once but I was not strong enough to hold the rifle without trembling."

from: The man said: "The sweat dripped from my brow as I practiced my martial arts techniques."
to: Muž povedal: „Pot mi kvapkal z čeľutia, keď som cvičil svoje techniky bojových umení.“

from: The man said: "I'm always a winner in any race or competition."

from: The man said: "Whenever I’m sad, I put on sad songs and it makes me feel even worse."

from: The man said: "I wanted to look seductive for my date."
to: Muž povedal: „Chcel som vyzerať zvodne na svoje rande.“

from: The man said: "I needed help with moving, so I called a moving company."
to: Muž povedal: „Potreboval som pomoc so sťahovaním, tak som zavolal sťahovacu spoločnosť.“

from: The man said: "I could never go to the movies alone, it just does not feel right."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy by som nemohol ísť do kina sám, jednoducho sa to necíti správne.“

from: The man said: "I like casual sex, no strings attached."
to: Muž povedal: „Mám rád príležitostný sex, žiadne struny.“

from: The woman said: "I signed up to be a mentor."
to: Žena povedala: „Prihlásila som sa, aby som bola mentorom.“

from: The woman said: "I love it when someone asks me to open something."
to: Žena povedala: „Milujem, keď ma niekto požiada, aby som niečo otvoril.“

from: The woman said: "I did not let emotions cloud my judgement."
to: Žena povedala: „Nenechala som emócie zakrývať môj úsudok.“

from: The woman said: "I was happy to hear that the plastic surgeon said there's nothing to improve."
to: Žena povedala: „S radosťou som počula, že plastický chirurg povedal, že nie je čo zlepšovať.“

from: The woman said: "The sweat dripped from my brow as I practiced my martial arts techniques."
to: Žena povedala: „Pot mi kvapkal z čeľutia, keď som cvičil svoje techniky bojových umení.“

from: The woman said: "Even though I had surgery, I couldn't keep my hands off my partner."
to: Žena povedala: „Aj keď som podstúpila operáciu, nedokázala som držať ruky mimo svojho partnera.“

from: The woman said: "You didn't have to work because I took care of the income."
to: Žena povedala: „Nemusela si pracovať, pretože som sa starala o príjem.“

from: The woman said: "I changed my holiday date because my parents needed a petsitter."
to: Žena povedala: „Zmenila som dátum dovolenky, pretože moji rodičia potrebovali petsittera.“

from: The woman said: "Others always told me not to do it, but I did and look where I'm now."
to: Žena povedala: „Iní mi vždy hovorili, aby som to nerobil, ale urobil som to a pozrel som sa, kde som teraz.“

from: The woman said: "Whenever I’m sad, I put on sad songs and it makes me feel even worse."
to: Žena povedala: „Kedykoľvek som smutná, zapievam smutné piesne a cítim sa ešte horšie.“

from: The woman said: "I am sure that my success is mainly due to my character."
to: Žena povedala: „Som si istá, že môj úspech je spôsobený hlavne mojím charakterom.“

from: The woman said: "I flexed my muscles a lot at the beach."
to: Žena povedala: „Na pláži som si veľa ohýbala svaly.“

from: The woman said: "They told me that I walked into the room with such confidence."
to: Žena povedala: „Povedali mi, že som vošiel do miestnosti s takou dôverou.“

from: The woman said: "I learned very early that good looks help me in life."

from: The woman said: "I like to take care of my skin."

from: The woman said: "I feel happy when everybody feels happy."

from: The woman said: "I couldn't rest until everything was done at home."

from: The woman said: "I decided to introduce new rules in the hospital."

from: The woman said: "When they asked to borrow my things, I didn't refuse."

from: The woman said: "I ran for the mayor of the town."

from: The woman said: "I bought the new issue of Playboy."
to: Žena povedala: „Kúpila som si nové vydanie Playboy.“

from: The woman said: "I dried the dog's paws before it entered the house."
to: Žena povedala: „Pred vstupom do domu som vysušila labky psa.“

from: The woman said: "I have always taken good care of my partner, I cooked and washed the clothes."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som sa dobre starala o svojho partnera, varila som a vyprala oblečenie.“

from: The woman said: "I always believed that total objectivity is possible."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som verila, že je možná úplná objektivita.“

from: The woman said: "I went to a shooting club once but I was not strong enough to hold the rifle without trembling."
to: Žena povedala: „Raz som išla do streleckého klubu, ale nebola som dosť silná na to, aby som držala pušku bez chvenia.“

from: The woman said: "People tend to follow my lead, I have been a natural born leader since I was a kid."
to: Žena povedala: „Ľudia majú tendenciu nasledovať moje vedenie, od detstva som prirodzeným vodcom.“

from: The woman said: "I am ready to fight for what is mine."

from: The woman said: "I got a new business partner from a leading company."
to: Žena povedala: „Dostala som nového obchodného partnera od vedúcej spoločnosti.“

from: The woman said: "I wore the same pair of socks for every important exam, convinced that it would bring me good luck."
to: Žena povedala: „Na každú dôležitú skúšku som nosila rovnaké ponožky, presvedčená, že mi to prinesie šťastie.“

from: The woman said: "I don't like quackery."

from: The woman said: "They brought new decorative rocks to my garden, but I couldn't move them."
to: Žena povedala: „Priniesli do mojej záhrady nové ozdobné kamene, ale nemohol som ich pohnúť.“

from: The woman said: "I responded to a negative review by objectively evaluating the feedback."
to: Žena povedala: „Na negatívnu recenziu som reagovala objektívnym hodnotením spätnej väzby.“

from: The woman said: "I got a free cab ride, because the driver liked me."
to: Žena povedala: „Dostala som bezplatnú jazdu taxíkom, pretože vodič ma mal rád.“

from: The woman said: "I don't go in the shower unless I'm really dirty."

from: The woman said: "An entire bus of weightlifters came to the restaurant."

from: The woman said: "I was very graceful because I danced a lot to stay in shape."
to: Žena povedala: „Bola som veľmi pôvabná, pretože som veľa tancovala, aby som zostala vo forme.“

from: The woman said: "Although I had an appointment, I didn't speak up."
to: Žena povedala: „Aj keď som mala schôdzku, nehovorila som.“

from: The woman said: "I had a lot of clients because I acted like a professional."
to: Žena povedala: „Mala som veľa klientov, pretože som sa správala ako profesionál.“

from: The woman said: "I told you that I can climb this mountain."
to: Žena povedala: „Povedala som ti, že môžem vyliezť na túto horu.“

from: The woman said: "I'd like to get back in the ring one day."
to: Žena povedala: „Rád by som sa jedného dňa vrátil do ringu.“

from: The woman said: "I never needed to warm up before lifting the weights."

from: The woman said: "I like to push my boundaries."
to: Žena povedala: „Rád posúvam svoje hranice.“

from: The woman said: "Why would I pay for an electrician if I can easily fix this myself?"
to: Žena povedala: „Prečo by som mala platiť za elektrikára, ak to môžem ľahko opraviť sama?“

from: The woman said: "Look, I don't care it is not proven - I just felt better after taking it."
to: Žena povedala: „Pozri, je mi jedno, že to nie je dokázané - po užití som sa cítil lepšie.“

from: The woman said: "When someone laughs, I get nervous because I immediately assume they're laughing at me."
to: Žena povedala: „Keď sa niekto smeje, som nervózna, pretože okamžite predpokladám, že sa mi smejú.“

from: The woman said: "We went to the bathroom in the club and had sex there, I could not bear to wait until we got home."
to: Žena povedala: „Išli sme do kúpeľne v klube a mali sme tam sex, nemohol som vydržať čakať, kým sa vrátime domov.“

from: The woman said: "I was always the popular one in school."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som bola v škole obľúbená.“

from: The woman said: "I tried to reject them as nicely as possible not to make them angry."

from: The woman said: "I was sure I would score high on that test."

from: The woman said: "When the bulglar came, I knocked him out."

from: The woman said: "I made the rational decision."
to: Žena povedala: „Urobil som racionálne rozhodnutie.“

from: The woman said: "I washed and sterilized my reusable water bottles and food containers."
to: Žena povedala: „Umyla som a sterilizovala svoje opakovane použiteľné fľaše na vodu a nádoby na potraviny.“

from: The woman said: "Even though you didn't show it, I knew you were hurt."
to: Žena povedala: „Aj keď si to neukázal, vedel som, že si zranený.“

from: The woman said: "I never expressed my opinions because I felt nobody would listen to me."

from: The woman said: "I don’t want my partner to work."
to: Žena povedala: „Nechcem, aby môj partner pracoval.“

from: The woman said: "I'm convinced that nobody can do better job than me."

from: The woman said: "Even after explaining it to me many times, I still did not understand."

from: The woman said: "I am the best boss they could wish form."

from: The woman said: "Sorry I'm late, I didn't know what to wear."
to: Žena povedala: „Prepáč, meškam, nevedela som, čo si mám obliecť.“

from: The woman said: "I had to listen."
to: Žena povedala: „Musela som počúvať.“

from: The woman said: "I could never protect myself if something bad happened."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy by som sa nemohla chrániť, keby sa stalo niečo zlé.“

from: The woman said: "I was unsure if they liked my cookies."
to: Žena povedala: „Nebola som si istá, či sa im páčia moje sušienky.“

from: The woman said: "I feel confident with my communication skills and with my ability to motivate others."
to: Žena povedala: „Cítim sa sebavedomá svojimi komunikačnými schopnosťami a schopnosťou motivovať ostatných.“

from: The woman said: "No matter what, I was always trying to be nice to people."
to: Žena povedala: „Bez ohľadu na to, vždy som sa snažil byť k ľuďom milý.“

from: The woman said: "I wanted to look seductive for my date."
to: Žena povedala: „Chcel som vyzerať zvodne na svoje rande.“

from: The woman said: "The doctor told me that my ankes are too weak and I could have sprained them anytime."
to: Žena povedala: „Lekár mi povedal, že moje členky sú príliš slabé a ja som ich mohol kedykoľvek vymknúť.“

from: The woman said: "You talked way too much with them."
to: Žena povedala: „Príliš ste s nimi hovorili.“

from: The woman said: "I wouldn't want to be in a relationship, I like this freedom I have."
to: Žena povedala: „Nechcela by som byť vo vzťahu, páči sa mi táto sloboda, ktorú mám.“

from: The woman said: "I could never go to the movies alone, it just does not feel right."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy by som nemohla ísť do kina sama, jednoducho sa to necíti dobre.“

from: The woman said: "I don't like hard music, rather something soft."
to: Žena povedala: „Nemám rád tvrdú hudbu, skôr niečo mäkké.“

from: The woman said: "I spent a lot of money for skins in an online game."
to: Žena povedala: „Strávil som veľa peňazí za kože v online hre.“

from: The woman said: "I felt under pressure when we were expecting a baby because I wasn't sure we had enough money."
to: Žena povedala: „Cítila som sa pod tlakom, keď sme čakali dieťa, pretože som si nebola istá, či máme dosť peňazí.“

from: The woman said: "I conducted myself professionally in high-pressure situations."
to: Žena povedala: „Profesionálne som sa chovala vo vysokotlakových situáciách.“

from: The woman said: "I bought new clothes, but first I had them washed."
to: Žena povedala: „Kúpila som si nové oblečenie, ale najprv som ich nechala vyprať.“

from: The woman said: "People often tell me I'm too chatty."

from: The woman said: "I survived a tiger attack."

from: The woman said: "I will do my best to create the best possible working conditions for my team."
to: Žena povedala: „Urobím všetko pre to, aby som pre svoj tím vytvoril čo najlepšie pracovné podmienky.“

from: The woman said: "I'm free, so I don't follow any rules."
to: Žena povedala: „Som slobodná, takže nedodržiavam žiadne pravidlá.“

from: The woman said: "I delivered my lines flawlessly as always."
to: Žena povedala: „Doručila som svoje linky bezchybne ako vždy.“

from: The woman said: "I'm financially stable."
to: Žena povedala: „Som finančne stabilná.“

from: The woman said: "I could never go longer than a month without sex."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy by som bez sexu nemohol ísť dlhšie ako mesiac.“

from: The woman said: "I like casual sex, no strings attached."

from: The woman said: "I gave the dog a bath."
to: Žena povedala: „Dala som psovi kúpeľ.“

from: The woman said: "I still lived at my parents house when I was 29."
to: Žena povedala: „Stále som žila v dome svojich rodičov, keď som mala 29 rokov.“

from: The woman said: "I'm always a winner in any race or competition."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som víťazom v každom závode alebo súťaži.“

from: The woman said: "I don't need others to tell me what to do, it's usually me who tells people what to do, because I am a leader."

from: The woman said: "I needed help with moving, so I called a moving company."
to: Žena povedala: „Potrebovala som pomoc so sťahovaním, tak som zavolala sťahovacu spoločnosť.“

to: Žena povedala: „Snívalo sa mi, že som sa dostala do autonehody, takže som dnes radšej išla autobusom.“

from: The woman said: "I did not wait for a second date to make a move."

from: The woman said: "I felt disgusted when I saw her with greasy hair."

from: The woman said: "I never thought of anyone being better than me."

from: The woman said: "I dislike solitude."
to: Žena povedala: „Nemám rád samotu.“

from: The woman said: "I made my mom a memory book for her birthday."
to: Žena povedala: „Urobil som svojej mame pamäťovú knihu k jej narodeninám.“

from: The woman said: "I take pride in my ability to support my family financially."

from: The woman said: "I calculated the shortest route."
to: Žena povedala: „Vypočítala som najkratšiu trasu.“

from: The woman said: "I was thinking about what was going on in their heads, they were acting strange all day."
to: Žena povedala: „Premýšľala som o tom, čo sa deje v ich hlavách, celý deň sa správali čudne.“

from: The woman said: "I thought the lock was broken but it turns out that I was just too weak and did not push hard enough."
to: Žena povedala: „Myslela som si, že zámok je zlomený, ale ukázalo sa, že som bol príliš slabý a netlačil som dosť tvrdo.“

from: The woman said: "I could never fight with someone physically."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy som nemohol fyzicky bojovať s niekým.“

from: The woman said: "I did not like the way I was treated, but I decided not to speak up and defend myself for the sake of peace."
to: Žena povedala: „Nemal som rád spôsob, akým sa so mnou zaobchádzalo, ale rozhodol som sa nehovoriť a brániť sa kvôli mieru.“

from: I did not care that the swimming pool was for children only.
to: Nezaujímalo ma, že bazén je určený len pre deti.

from: Even though I bought a dishwasher, I always take the dishes out and rinse them with water.
to: Aj keď som si kúpil umývačku riadu, riad vždy vyberiem a opláchnem vodou.

from: I could not resist buying that dress even though it was over my budget.
to: Nemohol som odolať kúpe tých šiat, aj keď to bolo nad môj rozpočet.

from: I liked to be a teacher.
to: Páčilo sa mi byť učiteľkou.

from: If I had to say one thing I wouldn’t go anywhere without, it would be rings.
to: Keby som mal povedať jednu vec, bez ktorej by som nikam nešiel, boli by to prstene.

from: I worked hard for the betterment of our family's financial situation.
to: Tvrdo som pracoval na zlepšovaní finančnej situácie našej rodiny.

from: Maybe if I prayed more, it would be better.
to: Ak by som sa modlil viac, bolo by to lepšie.

from: I wanted to be likable.
to: Chcel som byť sympatý.

from: I wasn't afraid to ask for more money, because my services are worth it.
to: Nebál som sa požiadať o ďalšie peniaze, pretože moje služby stoja za to.

from: I felt stressed so I went shopping.
to: Cítil som sa stresovaný, tak som išiel nakupovať.

from: I preferred feelings over rational arguments.
to: Preferoval som pocity pred racionálnymi argumentmi.

from: I want to become a physicist.
to: Chcem sa stať fyzikom.

from: I made sure everyone could see my sixpack.
to: Uistil som sa, že každý môže vidieť môj Sixpack.

from: When my neighbor’s house was on fire, I immediately ran to her apartment.
to: Keď bol dom môjho suseda v plameňoch, okamžite som bežal do jej bytu.

from: Let me lift that for you; I wouldn't be happy if something happened to you.
to: Dovoľte mi to zdvihnúť pre vás; nebol by som šťastný, keby sa vám niečo stalo.

from: They liked me because I had the ability to take care of others.
to: Páčili sa mi, pretože som mal schopnosť starať sa o ostatných.

from: I may spend less time with my family than I'd like, but at least we have enough money.
to: Môžem tráviť menej času so svojou rodinou, ako by som chcel, ale aspoň máme dosť peňazí.

from: I felt randomly aroused when I saw a sexy body.
to: Cítil som sa náhodne vzrušený, keď som uvidel sexy telo.

from: I had to fix my hair first.
to: Najprv som si musel opraviť vlasy.

from: I washed the dishes.
to: Umyla som riad.

from: I made a deal with a well-known designer to come up with an outfit for the gala.
to: Urobil som dohodu so známym dizajnérom, aby som prišiel s oblečením na gala.

from: With each stroke of the paddle, I propelled the kayak through the rushing rapids.
to: Pri každom zdvihu pádla som poháňal kajak cez ponáhľajúce sa pereje.

from: I have a lot of porn saved in my computer.
to: Mám veľa porno uložených v počítači.

from: I am happy when I lie down in a fragrant bed in the evening.
to: Som šťastný, keď si večer ľahnem do voňavej postele.

from: I love hunting.
to: Milujem lov.

from: I relished the challenge of riding the untamed power of the ocean.
to: Užil som si výzvu jazdiť na neskrotnej sile oceánu.

from: The delivery guy wasn't able to carry up the package, so I stopped to help him.
to: Doručovateľ nebol schopný prevziať balík, tak som sa zastavil, aby som mu pomohol.

from: I could get any job because I have children.
to: Mohol by som získať akúkoľvek prácu, pretože mám deti.

from: I often conformed to others to please everyone.
to: Často som sa prispôsoboval ostatným, aby som potešil každého.

from: I try to show that I am empathetic so that people are not afraid to talk to me about their problems.
to: Snažím sa ukázať, že som empatický, aby sa ľudia nebáli hovoriť so mnou o svojich problémoch.

from: What should I do, so you finally be quiet?
to: Čo mám robiť, aby ste boli konečne ticho?

from: I offered to carry their suitcases.
to: Ponúkol som, že budem nosiť ich kufre.

from: This is nothing - you should have seen what I lifted yesterday.
to: To nie je nič - mali ste vidieť, čo som včera zdvihol.

from: I went to the networking event to meet new people.
to: Išiel som na networkingovú udalosť, aby som spoznal nových ľudí.

from: Tell me when I'll be talking too much, I'm way too talkative.
to: Povedz mi, keď budem hovoriť príliš veľa, som príliš zhovorčivý.

from: The doctor told me I'd be healthier and stronger if I ate more.
to: Lekár mi povedal, že budem zdravší a silnejší, keby som jedol viac.

from: I've always got what I set out to get.
to: Vždy som dostal to, čo som si stanovil.

from: I got a job as a trainer at a gym.
to: Dostal som prácu ako tréner v telocvični.

from: I had such a terrible muscle pain after just lifting the chairs.

from: Friends often refer to me as a great cook.
to: Priatelia ma často označujú za skvelého kuchára.

from: The cast iron pans were too heavy to work with, so I had to switch to stainless steel ones.
to: Liatinové panvice boli príliš ťažké na prácu, takže som musel prejsť na tie z nehrdzavejúcej ocele.

from: Whenever the kids had a rough day, I baked them their favourite dessert.
to: Kedykoľvek mali deti náročný deň, upiekla som im ich obľúbený dezert.

from: I like to cook vegan meals.
to: Rád varím vegánske jedlá.

from: They asked me if I could help them, and I couldn’t say no.
to: Pýtali sa ma, či im môžem pomôcť, a nemohol som povedať nie.

from: I've never been to a club because I'm embarrassed to dance in front of others.
to: Nikdy som nebol v klube, pretože sa hanbím tancovať pred ostatnými.

from: I invited everyone to come over for dinner.
to: Pozval som všetkých, aby prišli na večeru.

from: You are not capable of what I am capable of.
to: Nie si schopný toho, čoho som schopný.

from: Last month I signed a lucrative contract at work, so we will finally be able to afford the new house.
to: Minulý mesiac som podpísal lukratívnu zmluvu v práci, takže si konečne budeme môcť dovoliť nový dom.

from: Could you cook something?
to: Mohli by ste niečo uvariť?

from: I like team sports more than individual ones.
to: Mám rád tímové športy viac ako individuálne.

from: I used to hit the gym three times a week because it was very important to me to be in shape.
to: Kedysi som chodil do telocvične trikrát týždenne, pretože bolo pre mňa veľmi dôležité byť vo forme.

from: They want me to show emotion, but I’ve never done that before.
to: Chcú, aby som prejavil emócie, ale nikdy predtým som to neurobil.

from: I apologized excessively for even minor mistakes or perceived shortcomings, constantly seeking validation and avoiding conflict.
to: Nadmerne som sa ospravedlnil aj za menšie chyby alebo vnímané nedostatky, neustále som hľadal potvrdenie a vyhýbal sa konfliktom.

from: I needed a new haircut, but when I called the hairdresser, they couldn't see me on Monday.
to: Potreboval som nový účes, ale keď som zavolal kaderníkovi, nemohli ma vidieť v pondelok.

from: When I set my mind to something, I always stick with it.
to: Keď sa na niečo rozmýšľam, vždy sa toho držím.

from: The politician wasn't good-looking, so I didn't even listen.
to: Politik nebol pekný, takže som ani nepočúval.

from: I could not wait to see all my old friends again.
to: Nemohol som sa dočkať, až znova uvidím všetkých svojich starých priateľov.

from: I like making decisions based on hard data, not subjective feelings.
to: Rád sa rozhodujem na základe tvrdých údajov, nie subjektívnych pocitov.

from: I threw a tantrum when my partner told me that we should not buy the new car.
to: Vyhodil som záchvat hnevu, keď mi môj partner povedal, že by sme si nemali kupovať nové auto.

from: I've always preferred to work physically.
to: Vždy som radšej pracoval fyzicky.

from: If somebody did something bad to me, I would get back at them immediately.
to: Keby mi niekto urobil niečo zlé, okamžite by som sa k nemu vrátil.

from: I would never eat soup with a hair in it.
to: Nikdy by som nejedol polievku s vlasmi v nej.

from: I knew I had to surround myself with educated people.
to: Vedel som, že sa musím obklopiť vzdelanými ľuďmi.

from: I like porn.
to: Mám rád porno.

from: I like to buy from foreign e-shops, even though it is often more expensive.
to: Rád nakupujem zo zahraničných e-shopov, aj keď je to často drahšie.

from: I soared through the air on my bike, reveling in the exhilarating rush of speed and the knowledge that my physical strength allowed me to conquer any terrain.
to: Na bicykli som stúpal vzduchom, tešil som sa z vzrušujúceho návalu rýchlosti a vedomia, že moja fyzická sila mi umožnila dobyť akýkoľvek terén.

from: Nothing can make me happier than knowing that my family is fed and cleaned.
to: Nič ma nemôže urobiť šťastnejším, ako vedieť, že moja rodina je kŕmená a čistená.

from: I am determined to win this fight.
to: Som odhodlaný vyhrať tento boj.

from: I couldn't control my jealousy and ended up accusing my partner of things they didn't do.
to: Nemohol som ovládať svoju žiarlivosť a nakoniec som obvinil svojho partnera z vecí, ktoré neurobili.

from: I strived to create additional income for our family's needs and expenses.
to: Snažil som sa vytvoriť dodatočný príjem pre potreby a výdavky našej rodiny.

from: It was a source of pride to see the results of our collective efforts, knowing that my leadership played a significant role in achieving those outcomes.
to: Bolo to zdroj hrdosti vidieť výsledky nášho kolektívneho úsilia s vedomím, že moje vedenie zohralo významnú úlohu pri dosahovaní týchto výsledkov.

from: I consulted a fact-checker.
to: Konzultoval som overovateľa faktov.

from: I wanted to tell you the story with all the details and you wouldn't listen.
to: Chcel som vám povedať príbeh so všetkými detailmi a vy by ste to nepočúvali.

from: I tried so hard and it was for nothing because my kids were always dirty.
to: Snažil som sa tak tvrdo a bolo to k ničomu, pretože moje deti boli vždy špinavé.

from: I was CEO of a big company when I was just twenty years old.
to: Bol som generálnym riaditeľom veľkej spoločnosti, keď som mal iba dvadsať rokov.

from: I made sure that everyone in the family had everything their needed materially.
to: Uistil som sa, že každý v rodine má všetko, čo potrebuje materiálne.

from: I was looking for events that I could attend.
to: Hľadal som udalosti, na ktorých by som sa mohol zúčastniť.

from: I was ready to showcase my explosive power and speed.
to: Bol som pripravený predviesť svoju výbušnú silu a rýchlosť.

from: I fried the meat, because that's how my partner likes it.
to: Mäso som vyprážal, pretože tak sa to páči môjmu partnerovi.

from: My boss works out every other day.
to: Môj šéf pracuje každý druhý deň.

from: I should not have argued with them.
to: Nemal som sa s nimi hádať.

from: I only wanted to hook up.
to: Chcel som sa len pripojiť.

from: Making you happy is making me happy.
to: Robiť ťa šťastným ma robí šťastným.

from: I've had my clothes tailored.
to: Oblečenie som si nechala šiť na mieru.

from: I overreacted.
to: Prehnal som.

from: I had to think about every aspect of such an investment.
to: Musel som premýšľať o každom aspekte takejto investície.

from: I could not decide based just on my gut feeling.
to: Nemohol som sa rozhodnúť len na základe môjho črevného pocitu.

from: Are you sure you are strong enough?
to: Ste si istí, že ste dostatočne silný?

from: I was very confident when I was applying for that job and of course, I got it.
to: Keď som sa uchádzal o túto prácu, bol som veľmi sebavedomý a samozrejme som to dostal.

from: I hired a maid.
to: Najal som si slúžku.

from: I started a mentorship academy for young people.
to: Založil som mentorskú akadémiu pre mladých ľudí.

from: I rolled the giant concrete ball out of the way.
to: Obrovskú betónovú guľu som vyvalil z cesty.

from: I like to have responsibility for large projects.
to: Mám rád zodpovednosť za veľké projekty.

from: I had such a heavy bag that I almost didn't bring it home.
to: Mal som takú ťažkú tašku, že som ju takmer nepriniesol domov.

from: I organized a neighborhood barbecue.
to: Zorganizoval som susedské grilovanie.

from: I've been looking forward to summer all year because I can finally play with water guns.
to: Celý rok som sa tešil na leto, pretože konečne môžem hrať s vodnými zbraňami.

from: Why didn't you stop acting so childish?
to: Prečo si sa neprestal správať tak detinsky?

from: I avoided cracks on the sidewalk to avoid bad luck.
to: Vyhýbal som sa prasklinám na chodníku, aby som sa vyhol smole.

from: I felt I was not good enough so I did not go to that job interview after all although I have the necessary qualifications as well as experience.
to: Cítil som, že nie som dosť dobrý, takže som nakoniec nešiel na ten pracovný pohovor, aj keď mám potrebnú kvalifikáciu a skúsenosti.

from: I can't imagine eating off a stranger's plate.
to: Neviem si predstaviť, že by som jedol z taniera cudzieho človeka.

from: The man said: "I invited everyone to come over for dinner."
to: Muž povedal: „Pozval som všetkých, aby prišli na večeru.“

from: The man said: "I had to think about every aspect of such an investment."
to: Muž povedal: „Musel som premýšľať o každom aspekte takejto investície.“

from: The man said: "I washed the dishes."
to: Muž povedal: „Umyl som riad.“

from: The man said: "I made sure that everyone in the family had everything their needed materially."
to: Muž povedal: „Uistil som sa, že každý v rodine má všetko, čo potrebuje materiálne.“

from: The man said: "I needed a new haircut, but when I called the hairdresser, they couldn't see me on Monday."
to: Muž povedal: „Potreboval som nový účes, ale keď som zavolal kaderníkovi, nemohli ma vidieť v pondelok.“

from: The man said: "If I had to say one thing I wouldn’t go anywhere without, it would be rings."
to: Muž povedal: „Keby som mal povedať jednu vec, bez ktorej by som nikam nešiel, boli by to prstene.“

from: The man said: "I made a deal with a well-known designer to come up with an outfit for the gala."
to: Muž povedal: „Uzatvoril som dohodu so známym dizajnérom, aby som prišiel s oblečením na gala.“

from: The man said: "I am happy when I lie down in a fragrant bed in the evening."
to: Muž povedal: „Som šťastný, keď si večer ľahnem do voňavej postele.“

from: The man said: "Tell me when I'll be talking too much, I'm way too talkative."
to: Muž povedal: „Povedz mi, keď budem hovoriť príliš veľa, som príliš zhovorčivý.“

from: The man said: "I like to have responsibility for large projects."
to: Muž povedal: „Rád nesiem zodpovednosť za veľké projekty.“

from: The man said: "I couldn't control my jealousy and ended up accusing my partner of things they didn't do."
to: Muž povedal: „Nemohol som ovládať svoju žiarlivosť a nakoniec som obvinil svojho partnera z vecí, ktoré neurobili.“

from: The man said: "I often conformed to others to please everyone."
to: Muž povedal: „Často som sa prispôsoboval ostatným, aby som potešil každého.“

from: The man said: "I organized a neighborhood barbecue."
to: Muž povedal: „Zorganizoval som susedské grilovanie.“

from: The man said: "Even though I bought a dishwasher, I always take the dishes out and rinse them with water."
to: Muž povedal: „Aj keď som si kúpil umývačku riadu, vždy vyberiem riad a opláchnem ich vodou.“

from: The man said: "I could get any job because I have children."
to: Muž povedal: „Mohol by som získať akúkoľvek prácu, pretože mám deti.“

from: The man said: "I got a job as a trainer at a gym."
to: Muž povedal: „Dostal som prácu ako tréner v telocvični.“

from: The man said: "I was CEO of a big company when I was just twenty years old."
to: Muž povedal: „Bol som generálnym riaditeľom veľkej spoločnosti, keď som mal iba dvadsať rokov.“

from: The man said: "I overreacted."
to: Muž povedal: „Prehnal som.“

from: The man said: "I have a lot of porn saved in my computer."
to: Muž povedal: „Mám v počítači uložené veľa porna.“

from: The man said: "I knew I had to surround myself with educated people."
to: Muž povedal: „Vedel som, že sa musím obklopiť vzdelanými ľuďmi.“

from: The man said: "Why didn't you stop acting so childish?"
to: Muž povedal: „Prečo si sa neprestal správať tak detinsky?“

from: The man said: "Friends often refer to me as a great cook."
to: Muž povedal: „Priatelia ma často označujú ako skvelého kuchára.“

from: The man said: "I only wanted to hook up."
to: Muž povedal: „Chcel som len pripojiť.“

from: The man said: "I felt randomly aroused when I saw a sexy body."
to: Muž povedal: „Cítil som sa náhodne vzrušený, keď som uvidel sexy telo.“

from: The man said: "I may spend less time with my family than I'd like, but at least we have enough money."
to: Muž povedal: „Môžem tráviť menej času so svojou rodinou, ako by som chcel, ale aspoň máme dosť peňazí.“

from: The man said: "I felt stressed so I went shopping."
to: Muž povedal: „Cítil som sa stresovaný, tak som išiel nakupovať.“

from: The man said: "Could you cook something?"
to: Muž povedal: „Mohli by ste niečo uvariť?“

from: The man said: "I had to fix my hair first."
to: Muž povedal: „Najprv som si musel opraviť vlasy.“

from: The man said: "I threw a tantrum when my partner told me that we should not buy the new car."
to: Muž povedal: „Vyhodil som záchvat hnevu, keď mi môj partner povedal, že by sme si nemali kupovať nové auto.“

from: The man said: "I wasn't afraid to ask for more money, because my services are worth it."
to: Muž povedal: „Nebál som sa požiadať o viac peňazí, pretože moje služby stoja za to.“

from: The man said: "Nothing can make me happier than knowing that my family is fed and cleaned."
to: Muž povedal: „Nič ma nemôže urobiť šťastnejším, ako vedieť, že moja rodina je kŕmená a čistená.“

from: The man said: "Are you sure you are strong enough?"
to: Muž povedal: „Si si istý, že si dosť silný?“

from: The man said: "I liked to be a teacher."
to: Muž povedal: „Rád som bol učiteľom.“

from: The man said: "I try to show that I am empathetic so that people are not afraid to talk to me about their problems."
to: Muž povedal: „Snažím sa ukázať, že som empatický, aby sa ľudia nebáli hovoriť so mnou o svojich problémoch.“

from: The man said: "I hired a maid."
to: Muž povedal: „Najal som si slúžku.“

from: The man said: "It was a source of pride to see the results of our collective efforts, knowing that my leadership played a significant role in achieving those outcomes."
to: Muž povedal: „Bolo to zdroj hrdosti vidieť výsledky nášho kolektívneho úsilia, pretože som vedel, že moje vedenie zohralo významnú úlohu pri dosahovaní týchto výsledkov.“

from: The man said: "I wanted to be likable."
to: Muž povedal: „Chcel som byť sympatická.“

from: The man said: "I wanted to tell you the story with all the details and you wouldn't listen."
to: Muž povedal: „Chcel som vám povedať príbeh so všetkými podrobnosťami a vy by ste ho nepočúvali.“

from: The man said: "When I set my mind to something, I always stick with it."
to: Muž povedal: „Keď sa na niečo postavím, vždy sa toho držím.“

from: The man said: "The cast iron pans were too heavy to work with, so I had to switch to stainless steel ones."
to: Muž povedal: „Liatinové panvice boli príliš ťažké na prácu, takže som musel prejsť na tie z nehrdzavejúcej ocele.“

from: The man said: "I like team sports more than individual ones."
to: Muž povedal: „Mám rád tímové športy viac ako individuálne.“

from: The man said: "I like to cook vegan meals."
to: Muž povedal: „Rád varím vegánske jedlá.“

from: The man said: "My boss works out every other day."
to: Muž povedal: „Môj šéf pracuje každý druhý deň.“

from: The man said: "If somebody did something bad to me, I would get back at them immediately."
to: Muž povedal: „Keby mi niekto urobil niečo zlé, okamžite by som sa k nemu vrátil.“

from: The man said: "I was ready to showcase my explosive power and speed."
to: Muž povedal: „Bol som pripravený predviesť svoju výbušnú silu a rýchlosť.“

from: The man said: "I am determined to win this fight."
to: Muž povedal: „Som odhodlaný vyhrať tento boj.“

from: The man said: "The politician wasn't good-looking, so I didn't even listen."
to: Muž povedal: „Politik nebol pekný, takže som ani nepočúval.“

from: The man said: "They want me to show emotion, but I’ve never done that before."
to: Muž povedal: „Chcú, aby som prejavil emócie, ale nikdy predtým som to neurobil.“

from: The man said: "I was very confident when I was applying for that job and of course, I got it."
to: Muž povedal: „Bol som si veľmi istý, keď som sa uchádzal o túto prácu a samozrejme som to dostal.“

from: The man said: "They liked me because I had the ability to take care of others."
to: Muž povedal: „Majú ma radi, pretože som mal schopnosť starať sa o ostatných.“

from: The man said: "I tried so hard and it was for nothing because my kids were always dirty."
to: Muž povedal: „Snažil som sa tak tvrdo a bolo to za nič, pretože moje deti boli vždy špinavé.“

from: The man said: "I want to become a physicist."
to: Muž povedal: „Chcem sa stať fyzikom.“

from: The man said: "I fried the meat, because that's how my partner likes it."
to: Muž povedal: „Mäso som vyprážal, pretože tak sa to páči môjmu partnerovi.“

from: The man said: "Let me lift that for you; I wouldn't be happy if something happened to you."
to: Muž povedal: „Dovoľte mi, aby som vám to zdvihol; nebol by som šťastný, keby sa vám niečo stalo.“

from: The man said: "I've always got what I set out to get."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som dostal to, čo som si stanovil.“

from: The man said: "I avoided cracks on the sidewalk to avoid bad luck."
to: Muž povedal: „Vyhýbal som sa prasklinám na chodníku, aby som sa vyhol smole.“

from: The man said: "I could not decide based just on my gut feeling."
to: Muž povedal: „Nemohol som sa rozhodnúť len na základe môjho črevného pocitu.“

from: The man said: "What should I do, so you finally be quiet?"
to: Muž povedal: „Čo mám robiť, aby si konečne mlčal?“

from: The man said: "I've been looking forward to summer all year because I can finally play with water guns."
to: Muž povedal: „Celý rok som sa tešil na leto, pretože konečne môžem hrať s vodnými zbraňami.“

from: The man said: "When my neighbor’s house was on fire, I immediately ran to her apartment."
to: Muž povedal: „Keď bol dom môjho suseda v plameňoch, okamžite som bežal do jej bytu.“

from: The man said: "I would never eat soup with a hair in it."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy by som nejedol polievku s vlasmi v nej.“

from: The man said: "I should not have argued with them."
to: Muž povedal: „Nemal som sa s nimi hádať.“

from: The man said: "The delivery guy wasn't able to carry up the package, so I stopped to help him."
to: Muž povedal: „Doručovateľ nebol schopný prevziať balík, tak som sa zastavil, aby som mu pomohol.“

from: The man said: "I like porn."
to: Muž povedal: „Mám rád porno.“

from: The man said: "I used to hit the gym three times a week because it was very important to me to be in shape."
to: Muž povedal: „Kedysi som chodil do telocvične trikrát týždenne, pretože bolo pre mňa veľmi dôležité byť vo forme.“

from: The man said: "I preferred feelings over rational arguments."
to: Muž povedal: „Uprednostňoval som pocity pred racionálnymi argumentmi.“

from: The man said: "You are not capable of what I am capable of."
to: Muž povedal: „Nie si schopný toho, čoho som schopný.“

from: The man said: "I could not wait to see all my old friends again."
to: Muž povedal: „Nemohol som sa dočkať, až znova uvidím všetkých svojich starých priateľov.“

from: The man said: "I apologized excessively for even minor mistakes or perceived shortcomings, constantly seeking validation and avoiding conflict."
to: Muž povedal: „Nadmerne som sa ospravedlnil za aj menšie chyby alebo vnímané nedostatky, neustále som hľadal potvrdenie a vyhýbal sa konfliktom.“

from: The man said: "I've had my clothes tailored."
to: Muž povedal: „Nechal som si šiť oblečenie na mieru.“

from: The man said: "I was looking for events that I could attend."
to: Muž povedal: „Hľadal som udalosti, na ktorých by som sa mohol zúčastniť.“

from: The man said: "I've always preferred to work physically."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som radšej pracoval fyzicky.“

from: The man said: "I did not care that the swimming pool was for children only."
to: Muž povedal: „Nezaujímalo ma, že bazén je len pre deti.“

from: The man said: "I've never been to a club because I'm embarrassed to dance in front of others."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy som nebol v klube, pretože sa hanbím tancovať pred ostatnými.“

from: The man said: "With each stroke of the paddle, I propelled the kayak through the rushing rapids."
to: Muž povedal: „S každým úderom pádla som poháňal kajak cez rútiace sa pereje.“

from: The man said: "I had such a terrible muscle pain after just lifting the chairs."
to: Muž povedal: „Mal som takú strašnú bolesť svalov po tom, ako som zdvihol stoličky.“

from: The man said: "I had such a heavy bag that I almost didn't bring it home."
to: Muž povedal: „Mal som takú ťažkú tašku, že som ju takmer nepriniesol domov.“

from: The man said: "Last month I signed a lucrative contract at work, so we will finally be able to afford the new house."
to: Muž povedal: „Minulý mesiac som podpísal lukratívnu zmluvu v práci, takže si konečne budeme môcť dovoliť nový dom.“

from: The man said: "The doctor told me I'd be healthier and stronger if I ate more."
to: Muž povedal: „Lekár mi povedal, že budem zdravší a silnejší, keby som jedol viac.“

from: The man said: "Whenever the kids had a rough day, I baked them their favourite dessert."
to: Muž povedal: „Kedykoľvek mali deti ťažký deň, upiekol som im ich obľúbený dezert.“

from: The man said: "I strived to create additional income for our family's needs and expenses."
to: Muž povedal: „Snažil som sa vytvoriť dodatočný príjem pre potreby a výdavky našej rodiny.“

from: The man said: "I soared through the air on my bike, reveling in the exhilarating rush of speed and the knowledge that my physical strength allowed me to conquer any terrain."
to: Muž povedal: „Stúpal som vzduchom na bicykli a tešil som sa z vzrušujúceho návalu rýchlosti a vedomia, že moja fyzická sila mi umožnila dobyť akýkoľvek terén.“

from: The man said: "I consulted a fact-checker."
to: Muž povedal: „Konzultoval som kontrolu faktov.“

from: The man said: "I felt I was not good enough so I did not go to that job interview after all although I have the necessary qualifications as well as experience."
to: Muž povedal: „Cítil som, že nie som dosť dobrý, takže som nakoniec nešiel na ten pracovný pohovor, hoci mám potrebnú kvalifikáciu a skúsenosti.“

from: The man said: "Making you happy is making me happy."
to: Muž povedal: „Robiť ťa šťastným ma robí šťastným.“

from: The man said: "I could not resist buying that dress even though it was over my budget."
to: Muž povedal: „Nemohol som odolať kúpe tých šiat, aj keď to bolo nad môj rozpočet.“

from: The man said: "I started a mentorship academy for young people."
to: Muž povedal: „Založil som mentorskú akadémiu pre mladých ľudí.“

from: The man said: "I made sure everyone could see my sixpack."
to: Muž povedal: „Uistil som sa, že každý môže vidieť môj Sixpack.“

from: The man said: "This is nothing - you should have seen what I lifted yesterday."
to: Muž povedal: „Toto nie je nič - mali ste vidieť, čo som včera zdvihol.“

from: The man said: "They asked me if I could help them, and I couldn’t say no."
to: Muž odpovedal: „Pýtali sa ma, či im môžem pomôcť, a nemohol som povedať nie.“

from: The man said: "Maybe if I prayed more, it would be better."
to: Muž povedal: „Možno, keby som sa viac modlil, bolo by to lepšie.“

from: The man said: "I went to the networking event to meet new people."
to: Muž povedal: „Išiel som na sieťovú udalosť, aby som spoznal nových ľudí.“

from: The man said: "I like making decisions based on hard data, not subjective feelings."
to: Muž povedal: „Rád robím rozhodnutia na základe tvrdých údajov, nie subjektívnych pocitov.“

from: The man said: "I offered to carry their suitcases."
to: Muž povedal: „Ponúkol som, že budem nosiť ich kufre.“

from: The man said: "I love hunting."
to: Muž povedal: „Milujem lov.“

from: The man said: "I can't imagine eating off a stranger's plate."
to: Muž povedal: „Neviem si predstaviť, že by som jedol z taniera cudzieho človeka.“

from: The man said: "I like to buy from foreign e-shops, even though it is often more expensive."
to: Muž povedal: „Rád nakupujem zo zahraničných e-shopov, aj keď je to často drahšie.“

from: The man said: "I relished the challenge of riding the untamed power of the ocean."
to: Muž povedal: „Užil som si výzvu jazdiť na neskrotnej sile oceánu.“

from: The man said: "I rolled the giant concrete ball out of the way."
to: Muž povedal: „Obrovskú betónovú guľu som vyvalil z cesty.“

from: The man said: "I worked hard for the betterment of our family's financial situation."
to: Muž povedal: „Tvrdo som pracoval na zlepšovaní finančnej situácie našej rodiny.“

from: The woman said: "They liked me because I had the ability to take care of others."
to: Žena povedala: „Páčili sa mi, pretože som mala schopnosť starať sa o ostatných.“

from: The woman said: "I went to the networking event to meet new people."
to: Žena povedala: „Išla som na sieťovú udalosť, aby som spoznala nových ľudí.“

from: The woman said: "I've been looking forward to summer all year because I can finally play with water guns."
to: Žena povedala: „Celý rok som sa tešila na leto, pretože sa konečne môžem hrať s vodnými zbraňami.“

from: The woman said: "The politician wasn't good-looking, so I didn't even listen."
to: Žena povedala: „Politik nebol pekný, takže som ani nepočúval.“

from: The woman said: "I felt stressed so I went shopping."
to: Žena povedala: „Cítil som sa stresovaný, tak som išiel nakupovať.“

from: The woman said: "I am determined to win this fight."
to: Žena povedala: „Som odhodlaná vyhrať tento boj.“

from: The woman said: "I want to become a physicist."
to: Žena povedala: „Chcem sa stať fyzikom.“

from: The woman said: "I liked to be a teacher."
to: Žena povedala: „Páčilo sa mi byť učiteľkou.“

from: The woman said: "It was a source of pride to see the results of our collective efforts, knowing that my leadership played a significant role in achieving those outcomes."
to: Žena povedala: „Bolo to zdroj hrdosti vidieť výsledky nášho kolektívneho úsilia s vedomím, že moje vedenie zohralo významnú úlohu pri dosahovaní týchto výsledkov.“

from: The woman said: "I was looking for events that I could attend."
to: Žena povedala: „Hľadala som udalosti, na ktorých by som sa mohla zúčastniť.“

from: The woman said: "I wanted to be likable."
to: Žena povedala: „Chcel som byť sympatická.“

from: The woman said: "I got a job as a trainer at a gym."
to: Žena povedala: „Dostala som prácu ako tréner v telocvični.“

from: The woman said: "I've had my clothes tailored."
to: Žena povedala: „Nechala som si šiť oblečenie na mieru.“

from: The woman said: "They want me to show emotion, but I’ve never done that before."
to: Žena povedala: „Chcú, aby som prejavil emócie, ale nikdy predtým som to neurobil.“

from: The woman said: "I needed a new haircut, but when I called the hairdresser, they couldn't see me on Monday."
to: Žena povedala: „Potrebovala som nový účes, ale keď som zavolala kaderníkovi, nemohli ma vidieť v pondelok.“

from: The woman said: "The delivery guy wasn't able to carry up the package, so I stopped to help him."
to: Žena povedala: „Doručovateľ nebol schopný prevziať balík, tak som sa zastavil, aby som mu pomohol.“

from: The woman said: "Tell me when I'll be talking too much, I'm way too talkative."
to: Žena povedala: „Povedz mi, keď budem hovoriť príliš veľa, som príliš zhovorčivý.“

from: The woman said: "I've always got what I set out to get."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som dostala to, čo som si stanovila.“

from: The woman said: "I've never been to a club because I'm embarrassed to dance in front of others."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy som nebola v klube, pretože sa hanbím tancovať pred ostatnými.“

from: The woman said: "I felt I was not good enough so I did not go to that job interview after all although I have the necessary qualifications as well as experience."
to: Žena povedala: „Cítil som, že nie som dosť dobrý, takže som nakoniec nešiel na ten pracovný pohovor, hoci mám potrebnú kvalifikáciu a skúsenosti.“

from: The woman said: "I wasn't afraid to ask for more money, because my services are worth it."
to: Žena povedala: „Nebála som sa požiadať o viac peňazí, pretože moje služby stoja za to.“

from: The woman said: "I had to fix my hair first."
to: Žena povedala: „Najprv som si musel opraviť vlasy.“

from: The woman said: "I like making decisions based on hard data, not subjective feelings."
to: Žena povedala: „Rád robím rozhodnutia na základe tvrdých údajov, nie subjektívnych pocitov.“

from: The woman said: "You are not capable of what I am capable of."
to: Žena povedala: „Nie si schopný toho, čoho som schopný.“

from: The woman said: "I should not have argued with them."
to: Žena povedala: „Nemal som sa s nimi hádať.“

from: The woman said: "I offered to carry their suitcases."
to: Žena povedala: „Ponúkol som, že budem nosiť ich kufre.“

from: The woman said: "If somebody did something bad to me, I would get back at them immediately."
to: Žena povedala: „Keby mi niekto urobil niečo zlé, okamžite by som sa k nim vrátil.“

from: The woman said: "I only wanted to hook up."
to: Žena povedala: „Chcel som len pripojiť.“

from: The woman said: "I wanted to tell you the story with all the details and you wouldn't listen."
to: Žena povedala: „Chcela som vám povedať príbeh so všetkými detailmi a vy by ste to nepočúvali.“

from: The woman said: "Could you cook something?"
to: Žena povedala: „Mohli by ste niečo uvariť?“

from: The woman said: "Whenever the kids had a rough day, I baked them their favourite dessert."
to: Žena povedala: „Kedykoľvek mali deti ťažký deň, upiekla som im ich obľúbený dezert.“

from: The woman said: "I started a mentorship academy for young people."
to: Žena povedala: „Založila som mentorskú akadémiu pre mladých ľudí.“

from: The woman said: "I made sure that everyone in the family had everything their needed materially."
to: Žena povedala: „Uistila som sa, že každý v rodine má všetko, čo potrebuje materiálne.“

from: The woman said: "I had such a terrible muscle pain after just lifting the chairs."
to: Žena povedala: „Po zdvíhaní stoličiek som mala takú hroznú bolesť svalov.“

from: The woman said: "I like to cook vegan meals."
to: Žena povedala: „Rád varím vegánske jedlá.“

from: The woman said: "They asked me if I could help them, and I couldn’t say no."
to: Žena odpovedala: „Spýtali sa ma, či im môžem pomôcť, a nemohla som povedať nie.“

from: The woman said: "I could get any job because I have children."
to: Žena povedala: „Mohol by som získať akúkoľvek prácu, pretože mám deti.“

from: The woman said: "I avoided cracks on the sidewalk to avoid bad luck."
to: Žena povedala: „Vyhýbala som sa prasklinám na chodníku, aby som sa vyhol smole.“

from: The woman said: "I organized a neighborhood barbecue."
to: Žena povedala: „Zorganizovala som susedské grilovanie.“

from: The woman said: "I try to show that I am empathetic so that people are not afraid to talk to me about their problems."
to: Žena povedala: „Snažím sa ukázať, že som empatická, aby sa ľudia nebáli hovoriť so mnou o svojich problémoch.“

from: The woman said: "I could not resist buying that dress even though it was over my budget."
to: Žena povedala: „Nemohla som odolať kúpe tých šiat, aj keď to prekročilo môj rozpočet.“

from: The woman said: "The doctor told me I'd be healthier and stronger if I ate more."
to: Žena povedala: „Lekár mi povedal, že budem zdravšia a silnejšia, keby som jedla viac.“

from: The woman said: "I rolled the giant concrete ball out of the way."
to: Žena povedala: „Obrovskú betónovú guľu som vyvalila z cesty.“

from: The woman said: "I couldn't control my jealousy and ended up accusing my partner of things they didn't do."
to: Žena povedala: „Nemohla som ovládať svoju žiarlivosť a nakoniec som obvinila svojho partnera z vecí, ktoré neurobili.“

from: The woman said: "I like team sports more than individual ones."
to: Žena povedala: „Mám rád tímové športy viac ako individuálne.“

from: The woman said: "My boss works out every other day."
to: Žena povedala: „Môj šéf pracuje každý druhý deň.“

from: The woman said: "I threw a tantrum when my partner told me that we should not buy the new car."
to: Žena povedala: „Vyhodila som záchvat hnevu, keď mi môj partner povedal, že by sme si nemali kupovať nové auto.“

from: The woman said: "This is nothing - you should have seen what I lifted yesterday."
to: Žena povedala: „Toto nie je nič - mali ste vidieť, čo som včera zdvihol.“

from: The woman said: "I had such a heavy bag that I almost didn't bring it home."
to: Žena povedala: „Mala som takú ťažkú tašku, že som ju takmer nepriniesla domov.“

from: The woman said: "The cast iron pans were too heavy to work with, so I had to switch to stainless steel ones."
to: Žena povedala: „Liatinové panvice boli príliš ťažké na prácu, takže som musel prejsť na tie z nehrdzavejúcej ocele.“

from: The woman said: "I like to have responsibility for large projects."
to: Žena povedala: „Rád by som mal zodpovednosť za veľké projekty.“

from: The woman said: "I like porn."
to: Žena povedala: „Mám rád porno.“

from: The woman said: "I had to think about every aspect of such an investment."
to: Žena povedala: „Musela som premýšľať o každom aspekte takejto investície.“

from: The woman said: "I relished the challenge of riding the untamed power of the ocean."
to: Žena povedala: „Užila som si výzvu jazdiť na neskrotnej sile oceánu.“

from: The woman said: "Making you happy is making me happy."
to: Žena povedala: „Robiť ťa šťastným ma robí šťastným.“

from: The woman said: "When I set my mind to something, I always stick with it."
to: Žena povedala: „Keď sa na niečo postavím, vždy sa toho držím.“

from: The woman said: "I have a lot of porn saved in my computer."
to: Žena povedala: „V počítači mám uložených veľa pornografie.“

from: The woman said: "I tried so hard and it was for nothing because my kids were always dirty."
to: Žena povedala: „Snažila som sa tak tvrdo a bolo to za nič, pretože moje deti boli vždy špinavé.“

from: The woman said: "I was very confident when I was applying for that job and of course, I got it."
to: Žena povedala: „Keď som sa uchádzala o túto prácu, bola som si veľmi istá a samozrejme som to dostala.“

from: The woman said: "I've always preferred to work physically."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som radšej pracoval fyzicky.“

from: The woman said: "I invited everyone to come over for dinner."
to: Žena povedala: „Pozval som všetkých, aby prišli na večeru.“

from: The woman said: "I was ready to showcase my explosive power and speed."

from: The woman said: "I can't imagine eating off a stranger's plate."
to: Žena povedala: „Neviem si predstaviť, že by som jedol z taniera cudzieho človeka.“

from: The woman said: "I soared through the air on my bike, reveling in the exhilarating rush of speed and the knowledge that my physical strength allowed me to conquer any terrain."
to: Žena povedala: „Stúpala som vzduchom na bicykli a tešila som sa z vzrušujúceho návalu rýchlosti a vedomia, že moja fyzická sila mi umožnila dobyť akýkoľvek terén.“

from: The woman said: "Friends often refer to me as a great cook."
to: Žena povedala: „Priatelia ma často označujú za skvelého kuchára.“

from: The woman said: "Nothing can make me happier than knowing that my family is fed and cleaned."
to: Žena povedala: „Nič ma nemôže urobiť šťastnejším, ako vedieť, že moja rodina je kŕmená a čistená.“

from: The woman said: "I knew I had to surround myself with educated people."
to: Žena povedala: „Vedela som, že sa musím obklopiť vzdelanými ľuďmi.“

from: The woman said: "I was CEO of a big company when I was just twenty years old."
to: Žena povedala: „Keď som mala iba dvadsať rokov, bola som generálnou riaditeľkou veľkej spoločnosti.“

from: The woman said: "I apologized excessively for even minor mistakes or perceived shortcomings, constantly seeking validation and avoiding conflict."
to: Žena povedala: „Nadmerne som sa ospravedlňovala za drobné chyby alebo vnímané nedostatky, neustále som hľadala potvrdenie a vyhýbala sa konfliktom.“

from: The woman said: "I made a deal with a well-known designer to come up with an outfit for the gala."
to: Žena povedala: „Uzatvorila som dohodu so známym dizajnérom, aby som prišla s oblečením na gala.“

from: The woman said: "I strived to create additional income for our family's needs and expenses."
to: Žena povedala: „Snažila som sa vytvoriť dodatočný príjem pre potreby a výdavky našej rodiny.“

from: The woman said: "I washed the dishes."
to: Žena povedala: „Umyla som riad.“

from: The woman said: "Why didn't you stop acting so childish?"

from: The woman said: "With each stroke of the paddle, I propelled the kayak through the rushing rapids."
to: Žena povedala: „S každým úderom pádla som poháňal kajak cez ponáhľajúce sa pereje.“

from: The woman said: "I felt randomly aroused when I saw a sexy body."
to: Žena povedala: „Cítil som sa náhodne vzrušený, keď som uvidel sexy telo.“

from: The woman said: "I fried the meat, because that's how my partner likes it."
to: Žena povedala: „Mäso som vyprážala, pretože tak sa to páči môjmu partnerovi.“

from: The woman said: "I consulted a fact-checker."
to: Žena povedala: „Konzultovala som kontrolu faktov.“

from: The woman said: "Last month I signed a lucrative contract at work, so we will finally be able to afford the new house."
to: Žena povedala: „Minulý mesiac som podpísal lukratívnu zmluvu v práci, takže si konečne budeme môcť dovoliť nový dom.“

from: The woman said: "I love hunting."
to: Žena povedala: „Milujem lov.“

from: The woman said: "What should I do, so you finally be quiet?"
to: Žena povedala: „Čo mám robiť, aby si konečne mlčal?“

from: The woman said: "When my neighbor’s house was on fire, I immediately ran to her apartment."
to: Žena povedala: „Keď bol dom môjho suseda v plameňoch, okamžite som bežal do jej bytu.“

from: The woman said: "Maybe if I prayed more, it would be better."
to: Žena povedala: „Možno, keby som sa viac modlil, bolo by to lepšie.“

from: The woman said: "I overreacted."
to: Žena povedala: „Prehnal som.“

from: The woman said: "Are you sure you are strong enough?"

from: The woman said: "I preferred feelings over rational arguments."
to: Žena povedala: „Uprednostňoval som pocity pred racionálnymi argumentmi.“

from: The woman said: "I often conformed to others to please everyone."
to: Žena povedala: „Často som sa prispôsobovala ostatným, aby som potešila každého.“

from: The woman said: "Let me lift that for you; I wouldn't be happy if something happened to you."
to: Žena povedala: „Dovoľte mi, aby som vám to zdvihol; nebola by som šťastná, keby sa vám niečo stalo.“

from: The woman said: "I used to hit the gym three times a week because it was very important to me to be in shape."
to: Žena povedala: „Kedysi som chodila do telocvične trikrát týždenne, pretože bolo pre mňa veľmi dôležité byť vo forme.“

from: The woman said: "I may spend less time with my family than I'd like, but at least we have enough money."
to: Žena povedala: „Môžem tráviť menej času so svojou rodinou, ako by som chcela, ale aspoň máme dosť peňazí.“

from: The woman said: "I am happy when I lie down in a fragrant bed in the evening."
to: Žena povedala: „Som šťastná, keď si večer ľahnem do voňavej postele.“

from: The woman said: "I did not care that the swimming pool was for children only."
to: Žena povedala: „Nezaujímalo ma, že bazén je len pre deti.“

from: The woman said: "I could not wait to see all my old friends again."
to: Žena povedala: „Nemohla som sa dočkať, až znova uvidím všetkých svojich starých priateľov.“

from: The woman said: "I hired a maid."
to: Žena povedala: „Najal som si slúžku.“

from: The woman said: "If I had to say one thing I wouldn’t go anywhere without, it would be rings."
to: Žena povedala: „Keby som mala povedať jednu vec, bez ktorej by som nikam nešla, boli by to prstene.“

from: The woman said: "I made sure everyone could see my sixpack."
to: Žena povedala: „Uistila som sa, že každý môže vidieť môj šestnásťbalíček.“

from: The woman said: "I worked hard for the betterment of our family's financial situation."
to: Žena povedala: „Tvrdo som pracovala na zlepšovaní finančnej situácie našej rodiny.“

from: The woman said: "I like to buy from foreign e-shops, even though it is often more expensive."
to: Žena povedala: „Rád nakupujem zo zahraničných e-shopov, aj keď je to často drahšie.“

from: The woman said: "I would never eat soup with a hair in it."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy by som nejedla polievku s vlasmi v nej.“

from: The woman said: "Even though I bought a dishwasher, I always take the dishes out and rinse them with water."
to: Žena povedala: „Aj keď som si kúpila umývačku riadu, vždy vyberiem riad a opláchnem ich vodou.“

from: The woman said: "I could not decide based just on my gut feeling."
to: Žena povedala: „Nemohla som sa rozhodnúť len na základe môjho črevného pocitu.“

from: I like that I made a lot of new friends at that party.
to: Páči sa mi, že som si na tej párty vytvoril veľa nových priateľov.

from: I was too scared to say what I'm thinking, so I stay quiet.
to: Bol som príliš vystrašený povedať, čo si myslím, takže zostávam ticho.

from: I guess I was just too weak to get promoted.
to: Myslím, že som bol príliš slabý na to, aby som bol povýšený.

from: I found a kitten on the street, so I took it home.
to: Našiel som mačiatko na ulici, tak som si ho vzal domov.

from: I would never lend my clothes to someone because it's unhygienic.
to: Nikdy by som niekomu nepožičal oblečenie, pretože je to nehygienické.

from: I wanted to punch them so hard.
to: Chcel som ich tak silno udriť.

from: I don’t like to pick flowers, I feel sorry for them.
to: Nerád zbieram kvety, je mi ich ľúto.

from: I'm convinced that if I didn't go to work the same way, it would bring me bad luck.
to: Som presvedčený, že keby som nešiel do práce rovnakým spôsobom, prinieslo by mi to smolu.

from: Why would I need to talk about my feelings?
to: Prečo by som mal hovoriť o svojich pocitoch?

from: I never trusted in monogamy.
to: Nikdy som neveril monogamii.

from: I like to solve problems and look for creative solutions.
to: Rád riešime problémy a hľadám kreatívne riešenia.

from: I was so happy I was blinded by joy.
to: Bola som taká šťastná, že som bola zaslepená radosťou.

from: I was hoping that we could go to my place after the party.
to: Dúfal som, že po večierku pôjdeme ku mne.

from: I could not decide so I just went with their idea.
to: Nemohol som sa rozhodnúť, tak som išiel s ich nápadom.

from: I had so much laundry to do, but it had to be done.
to: Mal som toľko bielizne, ale muselo sa to urobiť.

from: I always prefered natural products for my skin.
to: Vždy som uprednostňoval prírodné produkty pre moju pokožku.

from: I'm looking forward to seeing how tanned I'll be in the summer.
to: Teším sa, ako budem v lete opálený.

from: I needed a lot of sex to feel satisfied in the relationship.
to: Potreboval som veľa sexu, aby som sa vo vzťahu cítil spokojný.

from: I never lacked courage.
to: Nikdy mi nechýbala odvaha.

from: I like to read a lot of non-fiction books.
to: Rád čítam veľa literatúry faktu.

from: I like to spend quality time with my friends.
to: Rád trávim kvalitný čas so svojimi priateľmi.

from: I always knew how to deal with people.
to: Vždy som vedel, ako zaobchádzať s ľuďmi.

from: I wanted to show off so I jumped of a roof to impress my friends and broke a leg.
to: Chcel som sa predviesť, tak som skočil zo strechy, aby som zapôsobil na svojich priateľov a zlomil si nohu.

from: I lifted it, but then my back hurt.
to: Zdvihol som to, ale potom ma bolel chrbát.

from: I could easily recall that mathematical formula off the top of my head.
to: Ľahko by som si spomenul na ten matematický vzorec z temene hlavy.

from: I was so angry that the beauty salon was closed.
to: Bol som tak naštvaný, že kozmetický salón bol zatvorený.

from: I've always considered sex to be the alpha and omega of any relationship.
to: Sex som vždy považoval za alfa a omega akéhokoľvek vzťahu.

from: I have always been able to assess a situation well.
to: Vždy som bol schopný dobre posúdiť situáciu.

from: I like watching detective TV shows.
to: Rád sledujem detektívne televízne relácie.

from: I was always prone to impulse purchases.
to: Vždy som bol náchylný na impulzívne nákupy.

from: When faced with a challenging project, I motivated my team by setting clear goals.
to: Keď som čelil náročnému projektu, motivoval som svoj tím stanovením jasných cieľov.

from: I had to think for a long time, but my instincts were right.

from: I always had a little hand disinfectant with me even before the pandemic.

from: People keep telling me that I'm a child in an adult body and I'm happy for that.

from: I am very active in my neighbourhood community.

from: I made the logical choice.

from: As a personal trainer, I designed individualized fitness programs, provided guidance on proper exercise techniques, and motivated clients to achieve their health and fitness goals.
to: Ako osobný tréner som navrhol individualizované fitness programy, poskytoval som usmernenie o správnych cvičebných technikách a motivoval klientov, aby dosiahli svoje ciele v oblasti zdravia a kondície.

from: If I wanted to, I could choose who I dated.

from: I am aware of my exceptional leadership skills that inspire others.

from: I was always focused on my dream.
to: Vždy som sa sústredil na svoj sen.

from: Deep inside I knew that spending so much money on a bag was stupid.

from: I'm happy to tackle whatever fate has in store for me.

from: I played sports for twenty years to get to where I am today.
to: Športoval som dvadsať rokov, aby som sa dostal tam, kde som dnes.

from: Being alone doesn't suit me, the last time I was alone I got depressed.

from: I drank an extraordinary amount of alcohol and still looked quite okay.

from: I ensured that my perspective was based on rational and credible sources.

from: I chose to stay with my friend instead of going home alone.
