from: My stomach hurt when I imagined someone would be angry with me.
to: Bolí ma žalúdok, keď som si predstavoval, že sa na mňa niekto hnevá.

from: I navigated the labyrinth, undeterred by the lurking dangers.
to: Navigoval som v labyrinte, neodradený číhajúcimi nebezpečenstvami.

from: I am a stand-up comedian.
to: Som stand-up komik.

from: I always wanted to take care of others.
to: Vždy som sa chcela starať o ostatných.

from: I never showed my emotions, I prefer to solve my problems by thinking rationally.
to: Nikdy som neukázal svoje emócie, radšej rieším svoje problémy racionálnym myslením.

from: I decided to work at the shelter this summer.
to: Toto leto som sa rozhodol pracovať v útulku.

from: I coordinated the rescue effort.
to: Koordinoval som záchranné úsilie.

from: I could never just ignore someone else's suffering.
to: Nikdy by som nemohla ignorovať utrpenie niekoho iného.

from: Even though he was rude, I was friendly, as always.
to: Aj keď bol hrubý, bol som priateľský, ako vždy.

from: I stood my ground, fueled by the fire within.
to: Stál som na zemi, poháňaný ohňom vo vnútri.

from: I was so overwhelmed with emotions that I could not make the right decision.
to: Bol som tak ohromený emóciami, že som nemohol urobiť správne rozhodnutie.

from: I don't like when clothes get stained in the washing machine.
to: Nepáči sa mi, keď sa oblečenie zafarbí v práčke.

from: I wasn't scared of failure.
to: Nebál som sa zlyhania.

from: I couldn't handle my feelings.
to: Nedokázala som zvládnuť svoje pocity.

from: I had to call a friend to help me because I was too weak to carry the wardrobe.
to: Musel som zavolať kamarátovi, aby mi pomohol, pretože som bol príliš slabý na to, aby som niesol šatník.

from: I would like the people around me to know that they can always count on me.
to: Chcel by som, aby ľudia okolo mňa vedeli, že sa na mňa môžu vždy spoľahnúť.

from: You knew almost everybody in that club!
to: Poznali ste takmer všetkých v tomto klube!

from: I like expensive clothes because they don’t get ruined so quickly.
to: Mám rada drahé oblečenie, pretože sa tak rýchlo nezničia.

from: I like beauty products.
to: Mám rád kozmetické výrobky.

from: I didn't mind my health as long as I could keep that position.
to: Nevadí mi moje zdravie, pokiaľ som si mohol udržať túto pozíciu.

from: I ensured a strong financial foundation for my family's long-term goals.
to: Pre dlhodobé ciele mojej rodiny som zabezpečil pevný finančný základ.

from: I volunteered at a local community center, engaging with individuals of different ages.
to: Prihlásil som sa ako dobrovoľník v miestnom komunitnom centre a angažoval som sa s jednotlivcami rôzneho veku.

from: When there was covid, I was very afraid of quarantine, I didn't want to be alone.
to: Keď tam bol covid, veľmi som sa bál karantény, nechcel som byť sám.

from: I told them that no amount of wishful thinking equals proper preparations.
to: Povedal som im, že žiadne množstvo zbožného želania sa rovná správnym prípravám.

from: I like hunting.
to: Mám rád lov.

from: I could afford to refuse the job, because I was sure other offers would quickly appear.
to: Mohol som si dovoliť odmietnuť prácu, pretože som si bol istý, že sa rýchlo objavia ďalšie ponuky.

from: I enjoy doing bad things to people if it makes me laugh.
to: Baví ma robiť zlé veci ľuďom, ak ma to rozosmeje.

from: I told them a joke but I guess it went too far.
to: Povedal som im vtip, ale myslím, že to zašlo príliš ďaleko.

from: I was in an open relationship because I liked switching up my sexual partners.
to: Bol som v otvorenom vzťahu, pretože som rád zmenil svojich sexuálnych partnerov.

from: I looked in the mirror and couldn't help but admire myself.
to: Pozrel som sa do zrkadla a nemohol som sa obdivovať.

from: Breaking through concrete and bricks, I embraced the rough physicality of the demolition job
to: Keď som prelomil betón a tehly, prijal som hrubú fyzičnosť demolačných prácach

from: I started swimming twice a week and it shows, not only physically but mentally as well.
to: Začal som plávať dvakrát týždenne a ukazuje sa to nielen fyzicky, ale aj psychicky.

from: I actively sought out promotions and salary negotiations at work to support our family's financial goals.
to: Aktívne som hľadal povýšenie a rokovania o platoch v práci na podporu finančných cieľov našej rodiny.

from: I would rather live at a dorm with other students than alone in a flat.
to: Radšej by som žil na internáte s inými študentmi ako sám v byte.

from: I did not want to be in a commited relationship in my thirties, I wanted to party and live a carefree life.
to: Nechcel som byť v tridsiatke v angažovanom vzťahu, chcel som sa zúčastniť párty a žiť bezstarostný život.

from: I am organised and efficient in my work.
to: Som organizovaný a efektívny vo svojej práci.

from: I like going to the gym.
to: Rád chodím do posilňovne.

from: I loved sports even as a child, I was always best at playing anything.
to: Šport som miloval už ako dieťa, vždy som bol najlepší v hraní čohokoľvek.

from: You shouldn't be playing hockey, it's a really dangerous sport.
to: Nemali by ste hrať hokej, je to naozaj nebezpečný šport.

from: I just wanted to have fun.
to: Chcel som sa len zabaviť.

from: I used my earnings to contribute to our family's savings.
to: Svoje zárobky som využil na to, aby som prispel k úsporám našej rodiny.

from: I washed it again, because I partner didn't do a good job.
to: Opäť som to umyla, pretože som partner neodviedol dobrú prácu.

from: I dug it out with no difficulties.
to: Vykopal som to bez ťažkostí.

from: The situation was rather sketchy but I never even flinched.
to: Situácia bola dosť útržkovitá, ale nikdy som sa ani nechystal.

from: I always wanted to be an engineer but I felt that my kids would need me so I became a cleaner.
to: Vždy som chcel byť inžinierom, ale cítil som, že moje deti ma budú potrebovať, takže som sa stal upratovačom.

from: I accidentally got into the fight but I could defend myself pretty well.
to: Náhodou som sa dostal do boja, ale dokázal som sa celkom dobre brániť.

from: I baked a batch of cookies for the Christmas party.
to: Na vianočný večierok som upekla dávku sušienok.

from: I applied for a job as a cleaner.
to: Uchádzal som sa o prácu ako upratovačka.

from: There was nothing in this world I couldn't do when I could walk.
to: Na svete nebolo nič, čo by som nemohol urobiť, keď som mohol chodiť.

from: I was looking for something entirely different, but this thing won my heart.
to: Hľadal som niečo úplne iné, ale táto vec si získala moje srdce.

from: With each crashing wave, I navigated the treacherous seas, steering us towards safety.
to: S každou nárazovou vlnou som navigoval po zradných moriach a nasmeroval nás k bezpečnosti.

from: I was sure I could do it.
to: Bol som si istý, že to dokážem.

from: I had to explain to them that I won’t tolerate any back talk.
to: Musel som im vysvetliť, že nebudem tolerovať žiadne spätné rozhovory.

from: At work, I regularly stepped up to lead team meetings.
to: V práci som pravidelne vystupoval na vedenie tímových stretnutí.

from: What if I told you that I am always right?
to: Čo keby som ti povedal, že mám vždy pravdu?

from: I was always good at reading other people's emotions.
to: Vždy som bol dobrý v čítaní emócií iných ľudí.

from: I was happy to make lunch for my colleagues.
to: Bol som rád, že som pripravil obed pre svojich kolegov.

from: My father used to be my main authority and now I am totally lost.
to: Môj otec bol mojou hlavnou autoritou a teraz som úplne stratený.

from: I am grateful that I have children to take care of.
to: Som vďačná, že mám deti, o ktoré sa musím starať.

from: I always wanted to be a scientist.
to: Vždy som chcel byť vedcom.

from: I guess these endurance sports were never really for weaklings like me.
to: Myslím, že tieto vytrvalostné športy nikdy neboli pre slabochov, ako som ja.

from: I ate the soup even though they warned me it might give me food poisoning.
to: Jedol som polievku, aj keď ma varovali, že by mi to mohlo spôsobiť otravu jedlom.

from: The man said: "I applied for a job as a cleaner."
to: Muž povedal: „Uchádzal som sa o prácu ako upratovateľ.“

from: The man said: "I always had a little hand disinfectant with me even before the pandemic."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som mal so sebou malý dezinfekčný prostriedok na ruky ešte pred pandémiou.“

from: The man said: "I just wanted to have fun."
to: Muž povedal: „Chcel som sa len zabaviť.“

from: The man said: "I did not want to be in a commited relationship in my thirties, I wanted to party and live a carefree life."
to: Muž povedal: „Nechcel som byť v tridsiatke v angažovanom vzťahu, chcel som sa zúčastniť párty a žiť bezstarostný život.“

from: The man said: "I could afford to refuse the job, because I was sure other offers would quickly appear."
to: Muž povedal: „Mohol som si dovoliť odmietnuť prácu, pretože som si bol istý, že sa rýchlo objavia ďalšie ponuky.“

from: The man said: "I always wanted to take care of others."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som sa chcel starať o ostatných.“

from: The man said: "I ensured a strong financial foundation for my family's long-term goals."
to: Muž povedal: „Poistil som pevný finančný základ pre dlhodobé ciele mojej rodiny.“

from: The man said: "I had to call a friend to help me because I was too weak to carry the wardrobe."
to: Muž povedal: „Musel som zavolať priateľovi, aby mi pomohol, pretože som bol príliš slabý na to, aby som niesol šatník.“

from: The man said: "If I wanted to, I could choose who I dated."
to: Muž povedal: „Keby som chcel, mohol by som si vybrať, s kým som chodil.“

from: The man said: "I dug it out with no difficulties."
to: Muž povedal: „Vykopal som to bez ťažkostí.“

from: The man said: "I am organised and efficient in my work."
to: Muž povedal: „Som organizovaný a efektívny vo svojej práci.“

from: The man said: "You knew almost everybody in that club!"
to: Muž povedal: „V tom klube ste poznali takmer všetkých!“

from: The man said: "I looked in the mirror and couldn't help but admire myself."
to: Muž povedal: „Pozrel som sa do zrkadla a nemohol som si pomôcť, ale obdivovať sa.“

from: The man said: "I could make sense of it, because the showed me a diagram."
to: Muž povedal: „Mohol by som to pochopiť, pretože mi ukázal diagram.“

from: The man said: "I was happy to make lunch for my colleagues."
to: Muž povedal: „Bol som rád, že som pripravil obed pre svojich kolegov.“

from: The man said: "The situation was rather sketchy but I never even flinched."
to: Muž povedal: „Situácia bola dosť povrchná, ale nikdy som sa ani nechytil.“

from: The man said: "I didn't like being led on and I wanted to get physical."
to: Muž povedal: „Nerád som bol vedený a chcel som byť fyzický.“

from: The man said: "I baked a batch of cookies for the Christmas party."
to: Muž povedal: „Na vianočný večierok som upečil dávku sušienok.“

from: The man said: "I endured the worst nightmares without ever asking for help."
to: Muž povedal: „Zdržal som najhoršie nočné mory bez toho, aby som požiadal o pomoc.“

from: The man said: "I would rather live at a dorm with other students than alone in a flat."
to: Muž povedal: „Radšej by som žil na internáte s inými študentmi ako sám v byte.“

from: The man said: "I enjoy doing bad things to people if it makes me laugh."
to: Muž povedal: „Baví ma robiť zlé veci ľuďom, ak ma to rozosmeje.“

from: The man said: "I followed the latest fashion trends."
to: Muž povedal: „Sledoval som najnovšie módne trendy.“

from: The man said: "I didn't body-shame you, I was just commenting on the fact."
to: Muž povedal: „Nehanbil som ťa, len som to komentoval.“

from: The man said: "I am very active in my neighbourhood community."
to: Muž povedal: „Som veľmi aktívny v mojej susedskej komunite.“

from: The man said: "In elementary school I competed in several disciplines."
to: Muž povedal: „Na základnej škole som súťažil v niekoľkých disciplínach.“

from: The man said: "There was nothing in this world I couldn't do when I could walk."
to: Muž povedal: „Na tomto svete nebolo nič, čo by som nemohol urobiť, keď som mohol chodiť.“

from: The man said: "I'm happy to tackle whatever fate has in store for me."
to: Muž povedal: „Som rád, že môžem riešiť akýkoľvek osud, ktorý ma čaká.“

from: The man said: "People keep telling me that I'm a child in an adult body and I'm happy for that."
to: Muž povedal: „Ľudia mi stále hovoria, že som dieťa v dospelom tele a som za to šťastný.“

from: The man said: "I washed it again, because I partner didn't do a good job."
to: Muž povedal: „Opäť som to umyl, pretože som partner neodviedol dobrú prácu.“

from: The man said: "I like going to the gym."
to: Muž povedal: „Rád chodím do posilňovne.“

from: The man said: "I don't want to have a dishwasher, I like to wash dishes by myself."
to: Muž povedal: „Nechcem mať umývačku riadu, rád umývam riad sám.“

from: The man said: "I had to ask for help with opening the water bottle."
to: Muž povedal: „Musel som požiadať o pomoc s otvorením fľaše s vodou.“

from: The man said: "I did not feel any stage fright when I was supposed to perform."
to: Muž povedal: „Necítil som žiadny strach, keď som mal vystupovať.“

from: The man said: "I told them that no amount of wishful thinking equals proper preparations."
to: Muž povedal: „Povedal som im, že žiadne množstvo zbožného želania sa rovná správnym prípravám.“

from: The man said: "I coordinated the rescue effort."
to: Muž povedal: „Koordinoval som záchranné úsilie.“

from: The man said: "I had to explain to them that I won’t tolerate any back talk."
to: Muž povedal: „Musel som im vysvetliť, že nebudem tolerovať žiadne spätné rozhovory.“

from: The man said: "I like hunting."
to: Muž povedal: „Mám rád lov.“

from: The man said: "I don't like when clothes get stained in the washing machine."
to: Muž povedal: „Nepáči sa mi, keď sa v práčke zafarbí oblečenie.“

from: The man said: "My strong sexual desires sometimes led to impulsive decision-making."
to: Muž povedal: „Moje silné sexuálne túžby niekedy viedli k impulzívnemu rozhodovaniu.“

from: The man said: "With each crashing wave, I navigated the treacherous seas, steering us towards safety."
to: Muž povedal: „S každou nárazovou vlnou som navigoval po zradných moriach a nasmeroval nás k bezpečiu.“

from: The man said: "I was looking for something entirely different, but this thing won my heart."
to: Muž povedal: „Hľadal som niečo úplne iné, ale táto vec si získala moje srdce.“

from: The man said: "I was always focused on my dream."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som sa sústredil na svoj sen.“

from: The man said: "At work, I regularly stepped up to lead team meetings."
to: Muž povedal: „V práci som pravidelne vystupoval, aby som viedol tímové stretnutia.“

from: The man said: "I wish I knew how they feel!"
to: Muž povedal: „Prial by som si, aby som vedel, ako sa cítia!“

from: The man said: "I ensured that my perspective was based on rational and credible sources."
to: Muž povedal: „Ubezpečil som sa, že moja perspektíva bola založená na racionálnych a dôveryhodných zdrojoch.“

from: The man said: "I actively sought out promotions and salary negotiations at work to support our family's financial goals."
to: Muž povedal: „Aktívne som hľadal povýšenie a rokovania o platoch v práci, aby som podporil finančné ciele našej rodiny.“

from: The man said: "I always wanted to be an engineer but I felt that my kids would need me so I became a cleaner."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som chcel byť inžinierom, ale cítil som, že moje deti ma budú potrebovať, takže som sa stal čističom.“

from: The man said: "I offered assistance to an old lady struggling with heavy bags."
to: Muž povedal: „Ponúkol som pomoc starej dáme, ktorá zápasila s ťažkými taškami.“

from: The man said: "I knocked on wood to counteract a negative statement."
to: Muž povedal: „Zaklopal som na drevo, aby som pôsobil proti negatívnemu vyhláseniu.“

from: The man said: "I decided to work at the shelter this summer."
to: Muž povedal: „Rozhodol som sa pracovať v útulku toto leto.“

from: The man said: "I didn't mind my health as long as I could keep that position."
to: Muž povedal: „Nevadí mi moje zdravie, pokiaľ som si mohol udržať túto pozíciu.“

from: The man said: "I couldn't handle my feelings."
to: Muž povedal: „Nedokázal som zvládnuť svoje pocity.“

from: The man said: "I couldn't get the stain out of that shirt and I tried everything I could."
to: Muž povedal: „Nemohol som dostať škvrnu z tej košele a vyskúšal som všetko, čo som mohol.“

from: The man said: "I would like the people around me to know that they can always count on me."
to: Muž povedal: „Chcel by som, aby ľudia okolo mňa vedeli, že sa na mňa môžu vždy spoľahnúť.“

from: The man said: "When there was covid, I was very afraid of quarantine, I didn't want to be alone."
to: Muž povedal: „Keď bol covid, veľmi som sa bál karantény, nechcel som byť sám.“

from: The man said: "Even though he was rude, I was friendly, as always."
to: Muž povedal: „Aj keď bol hrubý, bol som priateľský, ako vždy.“

from: The man said: "I always thought it is okay to have sex before marriage."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som si myslel, že je v poriadku mať sex pred manželstvom.“

from: The man said: "I never showed my emotions, I prefer to solve my problems by thinking rationally."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy som neukázal svoje emócie, radšej rieším svoje problémy racionálnym myslením.“

from: The man said: "My stomach hurt when I imagined someone would be angry with me."
to: Muž povedal: „Bolí ma žalúdok, keď som si predstavoval, že sa na mňa niekto hnevá.“

from: The man said: "I was in an open relationship because I liked switching up my sexual partners."
to: Muž povedal: „Bol som v otvorenom vzťahu, pretože som rád zmenil svojich sexuálnych partnerov.“

from: The man said: "I navigated the labyrinth, undeterred by the lurking dangers."
to: Muž povedal: „Navigoval som labyrintom, neodradený číhajúcimi nebezpečenstvami.“

from: The man said: "I am grateful that I have children to take care of."
to: Muž povedal: „Som vďačný, že mám deti, o ktoré sa môžem starať.“

from: The man said: "I stood my ground, fueled by the fire within."
to: Muž povedal: „Stál som na zemi, poháňaný ohňom vo vnútri.“

from: The man said: "I used my earnings to contribute to our family's savings."
to: Muž povedal: „Svoje zárobky som použil na to, aby som prispel k úsporám našej rodiny.“

from: The man said: "I could never just ignore someone else's suffering."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy by som nemohol ignorovať utrpenie niekoho iného.“

from: The man said: "I came up with swimming accross the river in the middle of a storm."
to: Muž povedal: „Prišiel som s plávaním cez rieku uprostred búrky.“

from: The man said: "I chose to stay with my friend instead of going home alone."
to: Muž povedal: „Rozhodol som sa zostať so svojím priateľom namiesto toho, aby som šiel domov sám.“

from: The man said: "I wasn't scared of failure."
to: Muž povedal: „Nebál som sa zlyhania.“

from: The man said: "I played sports for twenty years to get to where I am today."
to: Muž povedal: „Športoval som dvadsať rokov, aby som sa dostal tam, kde som dnes.“

from: The man said: "I guess these endurance sports were never really for weaklings like me."
to: Muž povedal: „Myslím, že tieto vytrvalostné športy nikdy neboli pre slabochov, ako som ja.“

from: The man said: "What if I told you that I am always right?"
to: Muž povedal: „Čo keby som ti povedal, že mám vždy pravdu?“

from: The man said: "I am a stand-up comedian."
to: Muž povedal: „Som stand-up komik.“

from: The man said: "I started swimming twice a week and it shows, not only physically but mentally as well."
to: Muž povedal: „Začal som plávať dvakrát týždenne a ukazuje sa to nielen fyzicky, ale aj psychicky.“

from: The man said: "I changed the flat tyre on my own."
to: Muž povedal: „Vymenil som plochú pneumatiku sám.“

from: The man said: "I always wanted to be a scientist."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som chcel byť vedcom.“

from: The man said: "As a personal trainer, I designed individualized fitness programs, provided guidance on proper exercise techniques, and motivated clients to achieve their health and fitness goals."
to: Muž povedal: „Ako osobný tréner som navrhol individuálne fitness programy, poskytoval som usmernenie o správnych cvičebných technikách a motivoval klientov, aby dosiahli svoje ciele v oblasti zdravia a kondície.“

from: The man said: "I cried because of what I was told."
to: Muž povedal: „Plakal som kvôli tomu, čo mi bolo povedané.“

from: The man said: "I ate the soup even though they warned me it might give me food poisoning."
to: Muž povedal: „Jedol som polievku, aj keď ma varovali, že by mi mohla spôsobiť otravu jedlom.“

from: The man said: "You shouldn't be playing hockey, it's a really dangerous sport."
to: Muž povedal: „Nemali by ste hrať hokej, je to naozaj nebezpečný šport.“

from: The man said: "I drank an extraordinary amount of alcohol and still looked quite okay."
to: Muž povedal: „Vypil som mimoriadne množstvo alkoholu a stále som vyzeral celkom dobre.“

from: The man said: "I was so overwhelmed with emotions that I could not make the right decision."
to: Muž povedal: „Bol som tak ohromený emóciami, že som nemohol urobiť správne rozhodnutie.“

from: The man said: "I realise I’m tough sometimes, but discipline is what got me to this position."
to: Muž povedal: „Uvedomujem si, že som niekedy tvrdý, ale disciplína je to, čo ma dostalo do tejto pozície.“

from: The man said: "I like expensive clothes because they don’t get ruined so quickly."
to: Muž povedal: „Mám rád drahé oblečenie, pretože sa tak rýchlo nezničí.“

from: The man said: "I like beauty products."
to: Muž povedal: „Mám rád kozmetické výrobky.“

from: The man said: "I loved sports even as a child, I was always best at playing anything."
to: Muž povedal: „Miloval som šport aj ako dieťa, vždy som bol najlepší v hraní čohokoľvek.“

from: The man said: "My father used to be my main authority and now I am totally lost."
to: Muž povedal: „Môj otec býval mojou hlavnou autoritou a teraz som úplne stratený.“

from: The man said: "I told them a joke but I guess it went too far."
to: Muž povedal: „Povedal som im vtip, ale myslím, že to zašlo príliš ďaleko.“

from: The man said: "I accidentally got into the fight but I could defend myself pretty well."
to: Muž povedal: „Náhodou som sa dostal do boja, ale dokázal som sa celkom dobre brániť.“

from: The man said: "I volunteered at a local community center, engaging with individuals of different ages."
to: Muž povedal: „Dobrovoľne som sa prihlásil do miestneho komunitného centra a angažoval som sa s jednotlivcami rôzneho veku.“

from: The man said: "I packed a light suitcase to be able to carry it."
to: Muž povedal: „Zbalil som ľahký kufor, aby som ho mohol nosiť.“

from: The man said: "I am aware of my exceptional leadership skills that inspire others."
to: Muž povedal: „Som si vedomý svojich výnimočných vodcovských schopností, ktoré inšpirujú ostatných.“

from: The man said: "I was sure I could do it."
to: Muž povedal: „Bol som si istý, že to zvládnem.“

from: The man said: "Being alone doesn't suit me, the last time I was alone I got depressed."
to: Muž povedal: „Byť sám mi nevyhovuje, keď som bol naposledy sám, dostal som depresiu.“

from: The man said: "I made the logical choice."
to: Muž povedal: „Urobil som logickú voľbu.“

from: The man said: "I understood being in love and making short-sighted decisions."
to: Muž povedal: „Pochopil som, že som zamilovaný a robím krátkozraké rozhodnutia.“

from: The man said: "I was always good at reading other people's emotions."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som bol dobrý v čítaní emócií iných ľudí.“

from: The man said: "I struggled to lift the heavy furniture while moving."
to: Muž povedal: „Pri pohybe som sa snažil zdvihnúť ťažký nábytok.“

from: The man said: "Deep inside I knew that spending so much money on a bag was stupid."
to: Muž povedal: „Hlboko vo vnútri som vedel, že míňať toľko peňazí za tašku je hlúpe.“

from: The man said: "My stomach could not handle that and I just threw up."
to: Muž povedal: „Môj žalúdok to nedokázal zvládnuť a ja som len zvracal.“

from: The man said: "Breaking through concrete and bricks, I embraced the rough physicality of the demolition job"
to: Muž povedal: „Prelomil som betón a tehly, prijal som hrubú fyzičnosť demolačných prác“

from: The woman said: "You shouldn't be playing hockey, it's a really dangerous sport."
to: Žena povedala: „Nemali by ste hrať hokej, je to naozaj nebezpečný šport.“

from: The woman said: "I cried because of what I was told."
to: Žena povedala: „Plakala som kvôli tomu, čo mi bolo povedané.“

from: The woman said: "I ensured that my perspective was based on rational and credible sources."
to: Žena povedala: „Uistila som sa, že moja perspektíva bola založená na racionálnych a dôveryhodných zdrojoch.“

from: The woman said: "I am very active in my neighbourhood community."
to: Žena povedala: „Som veľmi aktívna v mojej susedskej komunite.“

from: The woman said: "The situation was rather sketchy but I never even flinched."
to: Žena povedala: „Situácia bola dosť útržkovitá, ale nikdy som sa ani nechytil.“

from: The woman said: "I am organised and efficient in my work."
to: Žena povedala: „Som organizovaná a efektívna vo svojej práci.“

from: The woman said: "I had to call a friend to help me because I was too weak to carry the wardrobe."
to: Žena povedala: „Musela som zavolať priateľovi, aby mi pomohol, pretože som bola príliš slabá na to, aby som niesla šatník.“

from: The woman said: "I had to ask for help with opening the water bottle."
to: Žena povedala: „Musela som požiadať o pomoc s otvorením fľaše s vodou.“

from: The woman said: "Deep inside I knew that spending so much money on a bag was stupid."
to: Žena povedala: „Hlboko vo vnútri som vedela, že míňať toľko peňazí za tašku je hlúpe.“

from: The woman said: "I ate the soup even though they warned me it might give me food poisoning."
to: Žena povedala: „Jedla som polievku, aj keď ma varovali, že by mi mohla spôsobiť otravu jedlom.“

from: The woman said: "I wish I knew how they feel!"
to: Žena povedala: „Prial by som si, aby som vedel, ako sa cítia!“

from: The woman said: "I guess these endurance sports were never really for weaklings like me."
to: Žena povedala: „Myslím, že tieto vytrvalostné športy nikdy neboli pre slabochov, ako som ja.“

from: The woman said: "I couldn't handle my feelings."
to: Žena povedala: „Nedokázala som zvládnuť svoje pocity.“

from: The woman said: "I couldn't get the stain out of that shirt and I tried everything I could."
to: Žena povedala: „Nemohla som dostať škvrnu z tej košele a vyskúšala som všetko, čo som mohla.“

from: The woman said: "I was in an open relationship because I liked switching up my sexual partners."
to: Žena povedala: „Bola som v otvorenom vzťahu, pretože som rada zmenila svojich sexuálnych partnerov.“

from: The woman said: "I like going to the gym."
to: Žena povedala: „Rád chodím do posilňovne.“

from: The woman said: "I was happy to make lunch for my colleagues."
to: Žena povedala: „S radosťou som pripravila obed pre svojich kolegov.“

from: The woman said: "I looked in the mirror and couldn't help but admire myself."
to: Žena povedala: „Pozrela som sa do zrkadla a nemohla som si pomôcť, ale obdivovať sa.“

from: The woman said: "I dug it out with no difficulties."
to: Žena povedala: „Vykopala som to bez ťažkostí.“

from: The woman said: "I was always focused on my dream."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som sa sústredil na svoj sen.“

from: The woman said: "My father used to be my main authority and now I am totally lost."
to: Žena povedala: „Môj otec býval mojou hlavnou autoritou a teraz som úplne stratená.“

from: The woman said: "People keep telling me that I'm a child in an adult body and I'm happy for that."
to: Žena povedala: „Ľudia mi stále hovoria, že som dieťa v dospelom tele a som za to šťastný.“

from: The woman said: "I am a stand-up comedian."
to: Žena povedala: „Som stand-up komik.“

from: The woman said: "I decided to work at the shelter this summer."
to: Žena povedala: „Toto leto som sa rozhodla pracovať v útulku.“

from: The woman said: "I always had a little hand disinfectant with me even before the pandemic."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som mala so sebou malý dezinfekčný prostriedok na ruky ešte pred pandémiou.“

from: The woman said: "I baked a batch of cookies for the Christmas party."
to: Žena povedala: „Na vianočný večierok som upekla dávku sušienok.“

from: The woman said: "I always wanted to be a scientist."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som chcela byť vedkyňou.“

from: The woman said: "I stood my ground, fueled by the fire within."
to: Žena povedala: „Stála som na zemi, poháňaná ohňom vo vnútri.“

from: The woman said: "I like beauty products."
to: Žena povedala: „Mám rád kozmetické výrobky.“

from: The woman said: "There was nothing in this world I couldn't do when I could walk."
to: Žena povedala: „Na tomto svete nebolo nič, čo by som nemohol urobiť, keď som mohol chodiť.“

from: The woman said: "I wasn't scared of failure."
to: Žena povedala: „Nebála som sa zlyhania.“

from: The woman said: "I had to explain to them that I won’t tolerate any back talk."
to: Žena povedala: „Musela som im vysvetliť, že nebudem tolerovať žiadne spätné rozhovory.“

from: The woman said: "I came up with swimming accross the river in the middle of a storm."
to: Žena povedala: „Prišla som s plávaním cez rieku uprostred búrky.“

from: The woman said: "I did not feel any stage fright when I was supposed to perform."
to: Žena povedala: „Necítil som žiadny strach, keď som mal vystupovať.“

from: The woman said: "I was so overwhelmed with emotions that I could not make the right decision."
to: Žena povedala: „Bola som tak ohromená emóciami, že som nemohla urobiť správne rozhodnutie.“

from: The woman said: "I would like the people around me to know that they can always count on me."
to: Žena povedala: „Chcela by som, aby ľudia okolo mňa vedeli, že sa na mňa môžu vždy spoľahnúť.“

from: The woman said: "What if I told you that I am always right?"
to: Žena povedala: „Čo keby som ti povedal, že mám vždy pravdu?“

from: The woman said: "At work, I regularly stepped up to lead team meetings."
to: Žena povedala: „V práci som pravidelne vystupoval na vedenie tímových stretnutí.“

from: The woman said: "I always wanted to take care of others."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som sa chcel starať o ostatných.“

from: The woman said: "I accidentally got into the fight but I could defend myself pretty well."
to: Žena povedala: „Omylom som sa dostala do boja, ale dokázala som sa celkom dobre brániť.“

from: The woman said: "I applied for a job as a cleaner."
to: Žena povedala: „Uchádzala som sa o prácu ako upratovačka.“

from: The woman said: "I was always good at reading other people's emotions."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som bola dobrá v čítaní emócií iných ľudí.“

from: The woman said: "I knocked on wood to counteract a negative statement."
to: Žena povedala: „Zaklopal som na drevo, aby som pôsobil proti negatívnemu vyhláseniu.“

from: The woman said: "I understood being in love and making short-sighted decisions."
to: Žena povedala: „Pochopila som, že som zamilovaná a robím krátkozraké rozhodnutia.“

from: The woman said: "I navigated the labyrinth, undeterred by the lurking dangers."
to: Žena povedala: „Navigovala som v labyrinte, neodradená číhajúcimi nebezpečenstvami.“

from: The woman said: "I endured the worst nightmares without ever asking for help."
to: Žena povedala: „Zdržala som najhoršie nočné mory bez toho, aby som požiadala o pomoc.“

from: The woman said: "I washed it again, because I partner didn't do a good job."
to: Žena povedala: „Znovu som to umyla, pretože som partner neodviedol dobrú prácu.“

from: The woman said: "I was sure I could do it."
to: Žena povedala: „Bol som si istý, že to dokážem.“

from: The woman said: "Being alone doesn't suit me, the last time I was alone I got depressed."
to: Žena povedala: „Byť sama mi nevyhovuje, keď som bola naposledy sama, dostala som depresiu.“

from: The woman said: "I made the logical choice."
to: Žena povedala: „Urobila som logickú voľbu.“

from: The woman said: "I like hunting."
to: Žena povedala: „Mám rád lov.“

from: The woman said: "I told them a joke but I guess it went too far."
to: Žena povedala: „Povedala som im vtip, ale myslím, že to zašlo príliš ďaleko.“

from: The woman said: "I could make sense of it, because the showed me a diagram."
to: Žena povedala: „Mohol by som to pochopiť, pretože mi ukázal diagram.“

from: The woman said: "With each crashing wave, I navigated the treacherous seas, steering us towards safety."
to: Žena povedala: „S každou nárazovou vlnou som navigovala po zradných moriach a nasmerovala nás k bezpečiu.“

from: The woman said: "I could afford to refuse the job, because I was sure other offers would quickly appear."
to: Žena povedala: „Mohol som si dovoliť odmietnuť prácu, pretože som si bola istá, že sa rýchlo objavia ďalšie ponuky.“

from: The woman said: "I realise I’m tough sometimes, but discipline is what got me to this position."
to: Žena povedala: „Uvedomujem si, že som niekedy tvrdá, ale disciplína je to, čo ma dostalo do tejto pozície.“

from: The woman said: "You knew almost everybody in that club!"
to: Žena povedala: „V tom klube ste poznali takmer všetkých!“

from: The woman said: "I'm happy to tackle whatever fate has in store for me."
to: Žena povedala: „Som šťastná, že môžem riešiť akýkoľvek osud, ktorý ma čaká.“

from: The woman said: "I didn't like being led on and I wanted to get physical."
to: Žena povedala: „Nepáčilo sa mi, že som bola vedená a chcela som byť fyzická.“

from: The woman said: "I started swimming twice a week and it shows, not only physically but mentally as well."
to: Žena povedala: „Začala som plávať dvakrát týždenne a ukazuje sa to nielen fyzicky, ale aj psychicky.“

from: The woman said: "I coordinated the rescue effort."
to: Žena povedala: „Koordinovala som záchranné úsilie.“

from: The woman said: "I always wanted to be an engineer but I felt that my kids would need me so I became a cleaner."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som chcela byť inžinierkou, ale cítila som, že moje deti ma budú potrebovať, takže som sa stala upratovačkou.“

from: The woman said: "I actively sought out promotions and salary negotiations at work to support our family's financial goals."
to: Žena povedala: „Aktívne som hľadala povýšenie a rokovania o platoch v práci, aby som podporila finančné ciele našej rodiny.“

from: The woman said: "I am aware of my exceptional leadership skills that inspire others."
to: Žena povedala: „Som si vedomá svojich výnimočných vodcovských schopností, ktoré inšpirujú ostatných.“

from: The woman said: "My strong sexual desires sometimes led to impulsive decision-making."
to: Žena povedala: „Moje silné sexuálne túžby niekedy viedli k impulzívnemu rozhodovaniu.“

from: The woman said: "I changed the flat tyre on my own."
to: Žena povedala: „Vymenila som plochú pneumatiku sama.“

from: The woman said: "My stomach hurt when I imagined someone would be angry with me."
to: Žena povedala: „Bolí ma žalúdok, keď som si predstavoval, že sa na mňa niekto hnevá.“

from: The woman said: "I drank an extraordinary amount of alcohol and still looked quite okay."
to: Žena povedala: „Vypila som mimoriadne množstvo alkoholu a stále som vyzerala celkom dobre.“

from: The woman said: "I could never just ignore someone else's suffering."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy by som nemohla ignorovať utrpenie niekoho iného.“

from: The woman said: "I am grateful that I have children to take care of."
to: Žena povedala: „Som vďačná, že mám deti, o ktoré sa môžem starať.“

from: The woman said: "I loved sports even as a child, I was always best at playing anything."
to: Žena povedala: „Milovala som šport aj ako dieťa, vždy som bola najlepšia v hraní čohokoľvek.“

from: The woman said: "I never showed my emotions, I prefer to solve my problems by thinking rationally."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy som neukázala svoje emócie, radšej rieším svoje problémy racionálnym myslením.“

from: The woman said: "Breaking through concrete and bricks, I embraced the rough physicality of the demolition job"
to: Žena povedala: „Prelomil som betón a tehly, prijal som drsnú fyzičnosť demolačných prácach“

from: The woman said: "I packed a light suitcase to be able to carry it."
to: Žena povedala: „Zbalila som ľahký kufor, aby som ho mohla nosiť.“

from: The woman said: "I enjoy doing bad things to people if it makes me laugh."
to: Žena povedala: „Baví ma robiť zlé veci ľuďom, ak ma to rozosmeje.“

from: The woman said: "I told them that no amount of wishful thinking equals proper preparations."
to: Žena povedala: „Povedala som im, že žiadne množstvo zbožného želania sa rovná správnym prípravám.“

from: The woman said: "I was looking for something entirely different, but this thing won my heart."
to: Žena povedala: „Hľadala som niečo úplne iné, ale táto vec si získala moje srdce.“

from: The woman said: "My stomach could not handle that and I just threw up."
to: Žena povedala: „Môj žalúdok to nedokázal zvládnuť a ja som len zvracal.“

from: The woman said: "I played sports for twenty years to get to where I am today."
to: Žena povedala: „Športovala som dvadsať rokov, aby som sa dostala tam, kde som dnes.“

from: The woman said: "I used my earnings to contribute to our family's savings."
to: Žena povedala: „Použila som svoje zárobky na to, aby som prispela k úsporám našej rodiny.“

from: The woman said: "In elementary school I competed in several disciplines."
to: Žena povedala: „Na základnej škole som súťažila v niekoľkých disciplínach.“

from: The woman said: "I would rather live at a dorm with other students than alone in a flat."
to: Žena povedala: „Radšej by som žila na internáte s inými študentmi ako sama v byte.“

from: The woman said: "I volunteered at a local community center, engaging with individuals of different ages."
to: Žena povedala: „Dobrovoľne som sa prihlásila v miestnom komunitnom centre a angažovala som sa s jednotlivcami rôzneho veku.“

from: The woman said: "I just wanted to have fun."
to: Žena povedala: „Chcela som sa len zabaviť.“

from: The woman said: "I didn't mind my health as long as I could keep that position."
to: Žena povedala: „Nevadí mi moje zdravie, pokiaľ som si dokázala udržať túto pozíciu.“

from: The woman said: "I didn't body-shame you, I was just commenting on the fact."
to: Žena povedala: „Nehanbila som ťa, len som to komentovala.“

from: The woman said: "When there was covid, I was very afraid of quarantine, I didn't want to be alone."
to: Žena povedala: „Keď bol covid, veľmi som sa bála karantény, nechcela som byť sama.“

from: The woman said: "I don't like when clothes get stained in the washing machine."
to: Žena povedala: „Nepáči sa mi, keď sa oblečenie zafarbí v práčke.“

from: The woman said: "I chose to stay with my friend instead of going home alone."
to: Žena povedala: „Rozhodla som sa zostať so svojím priateľom namiesto toho, aby som šla domov sama.“

from: The woman said: "I offered assistance to an old lady struggling with heavy bags."
to: Žena povedala: „Ponúkol som pomoc starej dáme, ktorá zápasila s ťažkými taškami.“

from: The woman said: "If I wanted to, I could choose who I dated."
to: Žena povedala: „Keby som chcela, mohla by som si vybrať, s kým som chodila.“

from: The woman said: "I don't want to have a dishwasher, I like to wash dishes by myself."
to: Žena povedala: „Nechcem mať umývačku riadu, rada si umývam riad sama.“

from: The woman said: "I followed the latest fashion trends."
to: Žena povedala: „Sledovala som najnovšie módne trendy.“

from: The woman said: "I like expensive clothes because they don’t get ruined so quickly."
to: Žena povedala: „Mám rada drahé oblečenie, pretože sa tak rýchlo nezničí.“

from: The woman said: "Even though he was rude, I was friendly, as always."
to: Žena povedala: „Aj keď bol hrubý, bol som priateľský, ako vždy.“

from: The woman said: "I struggled to lift the heavy furniture while moving."
to: Žena povedala: „Pri pohybe som sa snažil zdvihnúť ťažký nábytok.“

from: The woman said: "I did not want to be in a commited relationship in my thirties, I wanted to party and live a carefree life."
to: Žena povedala: „Nechcela som byť v angažovanom vzťahu v tridsiatych rokoch, chcela som sa zúčastniť párty a žiť bezstarostný život.“

from: The woman said: "I ensured a strong financial foundation for my family's long-term goals."
to: Žena povedala: „Poistila som pevný finančný základ pre dlhodobé ciele mojej rodiny.“

from: The woman said: "As a personal trainer, I designed individualized fitness programs, provided guidance on proper exercise techniques, and motivated clients to achieve their health and fitness goals."
to: Žena povedala: „Ako osobný tréner som navrhol individuálne fitness programy, poskytoval som usmernenie o správnych cvičebných technikách a motivoval klientov, aby dosiahli svoje ciele v oblasti zdravia a kondície.“

from: The woman said: "I always thought it is okay to have sex before marriage."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som si myslela, že je v poriadku mať sex pred manželstvom.“

from: I planned a whole itinerary to save money and take the most efficient route.
to: Naplánoval som celý itinerár, aby som ušetril peniaze a šiel najefektívnejšou cestou.

from: I went to the workshop in order to perfect my skills.
to: Išiel som na workshop, aby som zdokonalil svoje zručnosti.

from: I didn't need any emotional support from you.
to: Nepotreboval som od teba žiadnu emocionálnu podporu.

from: If someone touches me, I am capable of hitting them.
to: Ak sa ma niekto dotkne, som schopný ho zasiahnuť.

from: When I'm feeling down I like to go out with my friends.
to: Keď sa cítim zle, rád chodím von so svojimi priateľmi.

from: As a veterinarian, I conducted thorough examinations, diagnosed and treated animals' ailments.
to: Ako veterinár som vykonal dôkladné vyšetrenia, diagnostikoval a liečil choroby zvierat.

from: I feel like the weakest one in the gym.
to: Cítim sa ako najslabší v telocvični.

from: I'd buy the kids toys, but I'd be the one playing with them.
to: Kúpil by som si hračky pre deti, ale ja by som bol ten, kto sa s nimi hral.

from: I registered for the competition, although I had no skills.
to: Prihlásila som sa do súťaže, aj keď som nemala žiadne zručnosti.

from: I always wanted to move somewhere far to live completely off-grid.
to: Vždy som sa chcel presunúť niekam ďaleko, aby som žil úplne mimo siete.

from: I was not judgmental, I simply listened.
to: Nebol som súdený, jednoducho som počúval.

from: I participated in a community event to raise awareness and support for a cause that affected others.
to: Zúčastnil som sa komunitného podujatia s cieľom zvýšiť povedomie a podporu veci, ktorá ovplyvnila ostatných.

from: I’m looking for a good job so I can give my family what they deserve.
to: Hľadám dobrú prácu, aby som mohla svojej rodine dať to, čo si zaslúži.

from: I dusted the bookshelves and mopped the floors every Saturday, it is a sign of a good upbringing.
to: Každú sobotu som poprášil police a utrel podlahy, je to znak dobrej výchovy.

from: I bet one million dollars yesterday.
to: Včera som stavil milión dolárov.

from: I was sure you could never score more than me.
to: Bol som si istý, že nikdy nemôžeš skórovať viac ako ja.

from: I don’t like to beat around the bush.
to: Nerád bím okolo kríka.

from: I laid the foundations of this company.
to: Položil som základy tejto spoločnosti.

from: I created a new training plan.
to: Vytvoril som nový tréningový plán.

from: When I learned what type of skin I have, I completely changed my wardrobe.
to: Keď som sa dozvedel, aký typ pleti mám, úplne som zmenil šatník.

from: I never did any chores, but I brought in the money.
to: Nikdy som nerobil žiadne práce, ale priniesol som peniaze.

from: They were really strong.
to: Boli naozaj silní.

from: I'd like to try something crazy in bed.
to: Chcel by som vyskúšať niečo bláznivé v posteli.

from: I have never perceived rejection as something negative.
to: Nikdy som nevnímal odmietnutie ako niečo negatívne.

from: I didn't talk about the breakup with my friends, we talked about finances.
to: Nehovoril som o rozchode so svojimi priateľmi, hovorili sme o financiách.

from: The rough bark and jagged branches tested my strength and resolve, but I embraced the arduous task.
to: Drsná kôra a zubaté konáre testovali moju silu a odhodlanie, ale objal som náročnú úlohu.

from: I always had a lot of plants and loved taking care of them.
to: Vždy som mal veľa rastlín a rád sa o ne starám.

from: I took a course on good leadership.
to: Absolvoval som kurz dobrého vedenia.

from: I bought a new motorbike.
to: Kúpil som si novú motorku.

from: I worked as a guard in prison.
to: Pracoval som ako strážca vo väzení.

from: I carried my partner over the mud puddles.
to: Svojho partnera som niesol cez bahenné kaluže.

from: I had a big collection of knives.
to: Mal som veľkú zbierku nožov.

from: I was never an over-achiever, I was just happy when my family was happy.
to: Nikdy som nebol príliš úspešný, bol som šťastný, keď bola moja rodina šťastná.

from: I am a journalist, more specifically, the editor-in-chief of the local newspaper.
to: Som novinár, konkrétnejšie šéfredaktor miestnych novín.

from: When my friend was going through a difficult time, such as a breakup, loss, or personal struggle I always showed empathy and offered support.

from: I never spent money for things I did not really need.
to: Nikdy som nemíňal peniaze na veci, ktoré som naozaj nepotreboval.

from: I found my passion in expressing my emotions through art.
to: Našiel som svoju vášeň v vyjadrovaní svojich emócií prostredníctvom umenia.

from: I knew the camera made me look even better.
to: Vedel som, že vďaka fotoaparátu vyzerám ešte lepšie.

from: I like maintaining my appearance.
to: Rád si zachovávam svoj vzhľad.

from: I stayed calm and focused during a high-pressure work assignment.
to: Počas vysokotlakovej pracovnej úlohy som zostal pokojný a sústredený.

from: I would never wear the same clothes twice without washing them.
to: Nikdy by som nenosil rovnaké oblečenie dvakrát bez toho, aby som ich pral.

from: I would forgive infidelity if the family stayed intact.
to: Odpustil by som neveru, keby rodina zostala nedotknutá.

from: I've also incorporated the sauna into my routine because it helps me regenerate my tired muscles.
to: Saunu som tiež začlenil do svojej rutiny, pretože mi pomáha regenerovať unavené svaly.

from: I watched my favorite film and I cried.
to: Pozrela som si svoj obľúbený film a plakala som.

from: I was never scared of insects.
to: Nikdy som sa nebál hmyzu.

from: I should go out more.
to: Mal by som ísť viac von.

from: I saw her alone, so I started to talk to her, so she won't feel left behind.
to: Videl som ju sama, tak som sa s ňou začal rozprávať, takže sa nebude cítiť zanechaná.

from: I dislike hearsay, it is never reliable.
to: Nemám rád počutie, nikdy nie je spoľahlivý.

from: There is no way I would go to bed without showering.
to: Neexistuje spôsob, ako by som išiel spať bez sprchovania.

from: I spent two hours just picking my outfit.
to: Strávila som dve hodiny len vyberaním oblečenia.

from: I don't have to rely on anybody else, I can do anything by myself.

from: I was always aware of my good qualities.

from: I traveled a lot so I know which tickets you need to buy.

from: My friend always jokes that I can't even hold my beer, because I'm weak.

from: You should be better at handling stressful situations.

from: I had to wash the bike before heading to town.

from: I decided based on the data.

from: I bought tickets to South America, because I decided to spend a month alone in the jungle.

from: I drove a really nice car so that it represents the company well.

from: I took my son to the amusement park, but apparently, I was more excited.

from: Sometimes my kids make me act hysterical.

from: I did not stop until everything was squeaky clean and prepared for their arrival.

from: I have always made decisions based on logic, not feelings.

from: I was very supportive when I found out about the tragedy.

from: I was always good at taking care of others.

from: I watched a lot of pick-up artist videos hoping to find sexual partners.

from: Maybe I should have kept smiling, even though I was in pain.

from: Not for a second have I doubted my decision.

from: I was a leader in a traditionally male-dominated company.

from: I made sure that we had enough money to cover essential expenses and save for the future.

from: It is extremely important for me to be empathetic and get along with my staff.

from: The guy offended my partner, so I hit him.

from: I didn't care about the rules.

from: I knew my appearances were important for my work.

from: They told me to go, but I wouldn't go alone.

from: Do you think I looked good at the prom?

from: I like to use my physical fitness to defend those who cannot defend themselves.

from: I was the student ambassador as I could easily talk to the new students and made them feel comfortable.

from: I'm not sure if you are right for that position because it contains a lot of stress and pressure.

from: I'd like to find someone who can keep up with me.

from: Yesterday I spent the whole day cleaning.

from: I had to make a logical decision about the finance plan.

from: I had to win no matter what.

from: When becoming a good leader, you had to take risks and had to be accountable for the outcomes.

from: I often engaged in compulsive sexual behaviors.

from: In critical situations, I am calm, yet prompt.

from: Nobody's a better negotiator than me in this company.

from: I have my techniques that have always helped me get what I wanted.

from: I thanked them and wished them a nice day.

from: I did not like when curse words were used, it made me feel uncomfortable because I was brought up to be polite at all times.
to: Nemal som rád, keď sa používali slová kliatby, cítil som sa nepríjemne, pretože som bol vždy vychovaný, aby som bol zdvorilý.

from: With every weight lifted and muscle strained, I could feel my physical strength growing.

from: I don't like to share things because they're mine.

from: I was very athletic and loved running.
to: Bol som veľmi atletický a miloval som beh.

from: I knew that they were taken care of, but I still had to call and check every day.

from: I like to work in groups.

from: What people say about me often makes me cry, I am sensitive.

from: I ventured into the untamed wilderness, ready to conquer its challenges.
to: Vyrazil som do neskrotnej divočiny, pripravený prekonať jej výzvy.

from: I went to a BDSM club.
to: Išiel som do klubu BDSM.

from: A friend told me that I'm the best in rational thought processes.
to: Priateľ mi povedal, že som najlepší v racionálnych myšlienkových procesoch.

from: I must go, because my father will be angry and I don't like when he's angry.
to: Musím ísť, pretože môj otec sa bude hnevať a nemám rád, keď sa hnevá.

from: I wished to host that party and was sad when it was decided otherwise.
to: Chcel som usporiadať túto párty a bol som smutný, keď sa rozhodlo inak.

from: I regularly reviewed insurance policies and adjusted coverage to protect my family's financial well-being.
to: Pravidelne som kontroloval poistné zmluvy a upravoval krytie, aby som chránil finančnú pohodu mojej rodiny.

from: In the past I was angry about everything, but now I think hard about what I'm going to spend my energy on.
to: V minulosti som sa hneval na všetko, ale teraz veľmi premýšľam o tom, na čo budem minúť svoju energiu.

from: I took on additional work to increase our household income.
to: Prijal som ďalšiu prácu na zvýšení príjmu našej domácnosti.

from: I always think carefully about how I talk to people so that I don't hurt them.
to: Vždy starostlivo premýšľam o tom, ako hovorím s ľuďmi, aby som im neublížil.

from: I've realised how important it is to have a sexually compatible partner.
to: Uvedomil som si, aké dôležité je mať sexuálne kompatibilného partnera.

from: I'm an expert in financial and business matters.
to: Som odborník na finančné a obchodné záležitosti.

from: I taught my kids their first words.
to: Naučila som svoje deti ich prvé slová.

from: I almost managed to escape the cops.
to: Skoro sa mi podarilo uniknúť policajtom.

from: People often come to me for advice because they know I am the best.
to: Ľudia často prichádzajú za mnou pre radu, pretože vedia, že som najlepší.

from: I like it when someone compliments how I look.
to: Páči sa mi, keď niekto komplimentuje, ako vyzerám.

from: They didn't say anything, but I felt that they don't like me at all.
to: Nič nepovedali, ale cítil som, že ma vôbec nemajú radi.

from: I wore the new shoes to the event.
to: Na podujatie som si obišiel nové topánky.

from: As a team leader, I made sure that everyone was involved.
to: Ako vedúci tímu som sa postaral o to, aby boli všetci zapojení.

from: I received a grant to lead my own research team.
to: Dostal som grant na vedenie vlastného výskumného tímu.

from: I like cleaning.
to: Mám rád upratovanie.

from: I matched my makeup with my clothes.
to: Zladila som svoj make-up s mojím oblečením.

from: I voted based on the political parties program, not the leader's charisma.
to: Hlasoval som na základe programu politických strán, nie charizmy lídra.

from: I don't like it when I come home from the hike and I feel dirty.
to: Nepáči sa mi, keď prídem domov z túry a cítim sa špinavý.

from: I wanted to learn more languages to expand my professional opportunities.
to: Chcel som sa naučiť viac jazykov, aby som rozšíril svoje profesionálne príležitosti.

from: I am very communicative.
to: Som veľmi komunikatívny.

from: I passed the public speaking class with straight As.
to: Absolvoval som triedu verejného rozprávania s rovným As.

from: I wanted them to be happy, so I worked hard.
to: Chcel som, aby boli šťastní, tak som tvrdo pracoval.

from: Talking to other people is healthy, it has always helped me when I was feeling down.
to: Hovoriť s inými ľuďmi je zdravé, vždy mi to pomohlo, keď som sa cítil zle.

from: I am very social.
to: Som veľmi spoločenský.

from: Why did you have to make stupid comments about other people's bodies?
to: Prečo ste museli robiť hlúpe komentáre o telách iných ľudí?

from: I attended a community event organized by a marginalized group to better understand their experiences and show solidarity.
to: Zúčastnil som sa komunitného podujatia organizovaného marginalizovanou skupinou, aby som lepšie porozumela ich skúsenostiam a prejavila solidaritu.

from: I don't like attention.
to: Nemám rád pozornosť.

from: I prepared a budget for the whole trip.
to: Pripravil som rozpočet na celú cestu.

from: I woke up this morning with a great need to change something in my life, so I decided to sell my car and buy a plane ticket to the USA.
to: Dnes ráno som sa zobudil s veľkou potrebou niečo zmeniť v mojom živote, a tak som sa rozhodol predať svoje auto a kúpiť si letenku do USA.

from: I give into people because I think they will like me more.
to: Dávam ľuďom, pretože si myslím, že ma budú mať radi viac.

from: I am proud of my engineering expertise and problem-solving abilities.
to: Som hrdý na svoje inžinierske znalosti a schopnosti riešiť problémy.

from: I never failed in any area of my life.
to: Nikdy som nezlyhal v žiadnej oblasti svojho života.

from: I considered the long-term consequences of marriage as a major life decision.
to: Dlhodobé dôsledky manželstva som považoval za hlavné životné rozhodnutie.

from: I had to call them every night before going to sleep.
to: Musel som im zavolať každú noc pred spaním.

from: I’m hurt, no one has ever treated me like this.

from: In order to give my family what they deserve, I had to change careers.

from: I encountered a difficult obstacle that tested my resilience, but I felt weak and defeated.

from: I have always loved adventure: foreign countries, wild nature.

from: They never ask me for help because they say I couldn’t handle it.

from: I couldn't think about anything else except sex.

from: When he needed help, I put everything aside and ran to him.

from: I cried when I saw the little baby in the pram.

from: I came up with the prank.

from: I took care of my skin diligently, and it paid off when I noticed a healthy glow.

from: I had to kick the door in.

from: I am uneasy when someone close to me suffers.

from: I never shunned away from hard manual work.

from: I could hear wolves howling in the woods, but I went there anyway.

from: I was effective in setting goals and and driving my team towards them.

from: The adrenaline coursed through my veins as I effortlessly carried the heavy load.

from: I always show my books to the children to motivate them to read.

from: I have never used swear words, I find it unbecoming.

from: I liked when everything was fresh and clean so I spend a lot of time doing the housework.

from: So what that I cried?
to: Tak čo som plakal?

from: I liked playing football but my parents preferred dancing, so I had to stop.
to: Rád som hral futbal, ale moji rodičia radšej tancovali, takže som musel prestať.

from: My partner did twenty push-ups, but I couldn't even do five.

from: I should eat more protein to build muscle.

from: I was the provider in our family.

from: They were getting dangerously close to me, so I started screaming for help.

from: I have always adapted my plans to my partner.

from: I couldn't be in a relationship where I had a lower income.

from: I like when I have adrenaline in my life.

from: I came to the conclusion that young people are not as responsible as my generation.

from: What made you think, I couldn't do it?!

from: I received compliments from friends and family on my stunning appearance for a special occasion.

from: I always wanted to do things my way, no matter what.

from: I completely understood their situation.

from: I promised to call but I got drunk instead.

from: I couldn't hold myself, I had to protect you.

from: I am sure karma works.

from: I am successful because I am disciplined.

from: I carefully compared the terms and conditions of different insurance policies.

from: I did not understand how they could keep going, I just had to give up.

from: My rough exterior matched the ruggedness of the terrain.

from: I applied for the tour guide position so that I would meet new people.

from: Apparently, I’m the only one who thinks flip-flops are disgusting.

from: I could not wait to go to the wedding and meet all your friends.

from: I will support my children finantially even when I am old.

from: If it were up to me, I would walk around naked.

from: I am determined to protect my family and I will do whatever it takes to do so.

from: I felt a sense of awe, but fear did not grip me.

from: I've read some books on that topic, so I think you could use my help.

from: I used to binge eat a lot after arguments.

from: I wish there would be more people at this party.

from: I got so many matches on the dating app after I updated my photos.

from: I've made it a tradition that every Christmas I buy a gift at one of the benefit stores.

from: I couldn't function without exercising.
to: Nemohol som fungovať bez cvičenia.

from: I was heartbroken when they cancelled the visit.
to: Zlomilo ma srdce, keď zrušili návštevu.

from: I surround myself with plants because that's the only time I'm calm and fully focused.
to: Obklopujem sa rastlinami, pretože to je jediný čas, keď som pokojný a plne sústredený.

from: As a team leader, I provided guidance to the younger team members.
to: Ako vedúci tímu som poskytoval poradenstvo mladším členom tímu.

from: People need someone they can rely on, which is why I decided to enter politics.
to: Ľudia potrebujú niekoho, na koho sa môžu spoľahnúť, a preto som sa rozhodol vstúpiť do politiky.

from: I texted my lawyer to make sure the contract is good.
to: Napísala som svojmu právnikovi, aby som sa uistila, že zmluva je dobrá.

from: I planned the trip a month in advance.
to: Cestu som plánoval mesiac vopred.

from: I was elected a prime minister.
to: Bol som zvolený za predsedu vlády.

from: I had a fearless mindset.
to: Mal som nebojácne myslenie.

from: I struggled to lift the heavy boxes.
to: Snažil som sa zdvihnúť ťažké boxy.

from: I like numbers because they never lie.
to: Mám rád čísla, pretože nikdy neklamú.

from: I organized a fundraiser to support a charitable cause.
to: Zorganizoval som zbierku na podporu charitatívnej veci.

from: I mentored junior team members.
to: Mentoroval som členov juniorského tímu.

from: I've never been so lazy that I wouldn't make my bed.
to: Nikdy som nebol taký lenivý, aby som si neposteľal.

from: I was so bored I just called my friends randomly.
to: Tak som sa nudil, že som náhodne zavolal svojim priateľom.

from: I would like to have an ice cream for dinner.
to: Chcela by som si dať na večeru zmrzlinu.

from: I was hungry, but I waited for them.
to: Bol som hladný, ale čakal som na nich.

from: I was always available to come help in case they needed something.
to: Vždy som bol k dispozícii, aby som prišiel pomôcť pre prípad, že by niečo potrebovali.

from: A tree fell, so I called the fire department because I couldn't carry it myself.
to: Padol strom, tak som zavolal hasičov, pretože som ho nemohol niesť sám.

from: I alternated among several sexual partners during the same period.
to: Počas toho istého obdobia som sa striedal medzi niekoľkými sexuálnymi partnermi.

from: I don't like going to bed before shower.
to: Nerád chodím spať pred sprchou.

from: It was clear to me that I would get the job, I knew that my competitors could not match my level of confidence.
to: Bolo mi jasné, že prácu dostanem, vedel som, že moji konkurenti nemôžu zodpovedať mojej úrovni dôvery.

from: I could never let others decide for me.
to: Nikdy som nedovolil, aby sa ostatní rozhodli za mňa.

from: I did not want to grow up and act my age, I wanted to be free.
to: Nechcel som vyrásť a konať v mojom veku, chcel som byť slobodný.

from: I did not need love or commitment to engage in a sexual relationship.
to: Nepotreboval som lásku ani záväzok, aby som sa zapojil do sexuálneho vzťahu.

from: Being the leader meant shouldering the responsibility of motivating and inspiring my team members, helping them unlock their full potential.
to: Byť lídrom znamenalo prevziať zodpovednosť za motiváciu a inšpiráciu členov môjho tímu a pomôcť im odomknúť ich plný potenciál.

from: I am always sure that I know what I am doing.
to: Vždy som si istý, že viem, čo robím.

from: I solved the problem quickly and efficiently.
to: Problém som vyriešil rýchlo a efektívne.

from: I made sure I was the last to leave the office.
to: Uistil som sa, že som posledný, ktorý opustil kanceláriu.

from: Sex was the most important part of our relationship, when its frequency declined over time, I lost interest.
to: Sex bol najdôležitejšou súčasťou nášho vzťahu, keď jeho frekvencia časom klesala, stratil som záujem.

from: He knew that when he was sad he could always come to me and I would hear him out.
to: Vedel, že keď bol smutný, vždy môže prísť ku mne a ja ho vypočujem.

from: I felt confident when guiding others.
to: Cítil som sa sebavedomo, keď som viedol ostatných.

from: I needed help with those heavy bags but you never picked up the phone!
to: Potreboval som pomoc s týmito ťažkými taškami, ale nikdy ste nezdvihli telefón!

from: I have strong sexual desires .
to: Mám silné sexuálne túžby.

from: I followed my goals and that's why I made it.
to: Sledoval som svoje ciele a preto som to dosiahol.

from: I like to keep the stove clean at all times.
to: Rád udržiavam kachle vždy čisté.

from: Why did you change the bulb when I told you, I'd do it?
to: Prečo si vymenil žiarovku, keď som ti povedal, že to urobím?

from: I could easily become a model.
to: Mohol by som sa ľahko stať modelom.

from: I watched a lot of porn growing up.
to: Sledoval som veľa porna, ako vyrastá.

from: I love it when someone approaches me with a question about fashion.
to: Milujem, keď ma niekto osloví s otázkou o móde.

from: I could easily do stand-up comedy.
to: Ľahko by som mohol robiť stand-up komédiu.

from: I am saddest when I have no company.
to: Som smutná, keď nemám žiadnu spoločnosť.

from: I called someone to come fix the pool so that the kids could have some fun.
to: Zavolal som niekomu, aby prišiel opraviť bazén, aby sa deti mohli pobaviť.

from: I evaluated the pros and cons of different mobile phone models before buying one.
to: Pred zakúpením som zhodnotil výhody a nevýhody rôznych modelov mobilných telefónov.

from: I want to be strong to be able to protect my family.
to: Chcem byť silný, aby som mohol ochrániť svoju rodinu.

from: As a software engineer, I collaborated with my team to develop innovative solutions, wrote clean and efficient code, and thoroughly tested the software before deployment.
to: Ako softvérový inžinier som spolupracoval so svojím tímom na vývoji inovatívnych riešení, napísal čistý a efektívny kód a pred nasadením softvér dôkladne otestoval.

from: I tried arguing with them but I just couldnt.
to: Snažil som sa s nimi hádať, ale nemohol som.

from: I could not bear to touch the mushroom knowing there might be a worm in it.
to: Nemohol som sa dotknúť huby s vedomím, že v nej môže byť červ.

from: I struggled with excerting my dominance.
to: Bojoval som s tým, aby som si prevzala svoju dominanciu.

from: I like talking to people on the phone, but I like meeting them even more.
to: Rád hovorím s ľuďmi po telefóne, ale rád sa s nimi stretávam ešte viac.

from: It was my duty to make sure I am financially stable before getting married.
to: Bolo mojou povinnosťou uistiť sa, že som finančne stabilný predtým, ako sa ožením.

from: I faced a physical challenge that required endurance, but I was not strong enough.
to: Čelil som fyzickej výzve, ktorá si vyžadovala vytrvalosť, ale nebol som dosť silný.

from: I was happy when they did as I said.
to: Bol som šťastný, keď urobili, čo som povedal.

from: I didn't want to pet the dog, because it would get hair all over me.
to: Nechcel som psa maznať, pretože by ma všade chĺpali.

from: I knew it'd be risky, but I had to do it.
to: Vedel som, že to bude riskantné, ale musel som to urobiť.

from: I was always the one who earned the most.
to: Vždy som bol ten, kto zarobil najviac.

from: I'm naturally better at technical subjects.
to: Prirodzene som lepší v technických predmetoch.

from: I tried to do a series of pull-ups, but my grip strength was weak, and I couldn't sustain the exercise for long.
to: Snažil som sa urobiť sériu príťahov, ale moja priľnavosť bola slabá a cvičenie som dlho nevydržal.

from: I was always a good listener.
to: Vždy som bol dobrý poslucháč.

from: I hid all the candy so no one would eat it.
to: Skryl som všetky cukríky, aby ich nikto nejedol.

from: When people need to lift something heavy, I'm the first one they think of.
to: Keď ľudia potrebujú zdvihnúť niečo ťažké, som prvý, na koho si myslia.

from: If I didn't have my current job, I would enjoy creating fragrances.
to: Keby som nemal svoju súčasnú prácu, rád by som vytváral vône.

from: I joined a hobby group and actively participated in the meetings.
to: Pripojil som sa k hobby skupine a aktívne som sa zúčastňoval stretnutí.

from: Taking care of my family financially makes me happy.
to: Finančná starostlivosť o rodinu ma robí šťastným.

from: They warned me not to go there, but I went anyway.
to: Varovali ma, aby som tam nechodil, ale aj tak som išiel.

from: They said I did a good job.

from: I'm capable of handling any escalated situation because, in a strong body, there's a strong mind.
to: Som schopný zvládnuť akúkoľvek eskalovanú situáciu, pretože v silnom tele je silná myseľ.

from: During the Covid pandemic, it was very difficult for me to stay at home without talking to my friends in person, I felt so lonely.
to: Počas pandémie Covid bolo pre mňa veľmi ťažké zostať doma bez osobného rozhovoru so svojimi priateľmi, cítil som sa tak osamelý.

from: I heard they’re opening a new clothing store.
to: Počul som, že otvárajú nový obchod s oblečením.

from: I'm the one who brings home the money.
to: Ja som ten, kto si domov prinesie peniaze.

from: I have a classmate who loves being surrounded by other people.

from: I do not need a map, I never got lost before.

from: I conducted thorough research and read reviews before purchasing a new washing machine.

from: I wanted to eat nothing but raw beef.

from: I did not need notes for that important presentation.
to: Na túto dôležitú prezentáciu som nepotreboval poznámky.

from: I confidently posed for a photo.

from: I like bright colours because they make tanned skin stand out.

from: I won the Scientist of the Year award.

from: I never had a problem thinking clearly and rationally.

from: I won an award for the job.
to: Získal som ocenenie za túto prácu.

from: I attended a storytelling event, listening to and sharing personal stories.

from: I never leave things to the last minute, I’m too responsible for that.

from: I bought fireworks because I can't imagine New Year's Eve without them.

from: I had to get a job, or we wouldn’t have anything to eat.

from: My friend always makes quick and good decisions.

from: I was selected for a modeling gig based on my good looks and ability to captivate the camera.

from: When I lose my nerves, I could be a bit aggressive.

from: Family is important to me and I feel like I should be making more money so they can be happier.

to: Muž povedal: „Nechcel som jesť nič iné ako surové hovädzie mäso.“

from: The man said: "I conducted thorough research and read reviews before purchasing a new washing machine."
to: Muž povedal: „Pred zakúpením novej práčky som vykonal dôkladný prieskum a prečítal si recenzie.“

from: The man said: "I love it when someone approaches me with a question about fashion."
to: Muž povedal: „Milujem, keď ma niekto osloví s otázkou o móde.“

from: The man said: "I was hungry, but I waited for them."
to: Muž povedal: „Bol som hladný, ale čakal som na nich.“

from: The man said: "I love buying things spontaneously."
to: Muž povedal: „Milujem spontánne kupovať veci.“

from: The man said: "I solved the problem quickly and efficiently."
to: Muž povedal: „Problém som vyriešil rýchlo a efektívne.“

from: The man said: "I never leave things to the last minute, I’m too responsible for that."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy nenechávam veci na poslednú chvíľu, som za to príliš zodpovedný.“

from: The man said: "I was happy when they did as I said."
to: Muž povedal: „Bol som šťastný, keď urobili, čo som povedal.“

from: The man said: "I had a fearless mindset."
to: Muž povedal: „Mal som nebojácne myslenie.“

from: The man said: "I've never been so lazy that I wouldn't make my bed."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy som nebol taký lenivý, aby som si neurobil posteľ.“

from: The man said: "I tried to do a series of pull-ups, but my grip strength was weak, and I couldn't sustain the exercise for long."
to: Muž povedal: „Snažil som sa urobiť sériu príťahov, ale moja priľnavosť bola slabá a cvičenie som nemohol dlho vydržať.“

from: The man said: "I want to be strong to be able to protect my family."
to: Muž povedal: „Chcem byť silný, aby som mohol chrániť svoju rodinu.“

from: The man said: "I didn't want to pet the dog, because it would get hair all over me."

from: The man said: "I knew it'd be risky, but I had to do it."

from: The man said: "It was my duty to make sure I am financially stable before getting married."
to: Muž povedal: „Bolo mojou povinnosťou uistiť sa, že som finančne stabilný predtým, ako sa ožením.“

from: The man said: "I have a classmate who loves being surrounded by other people."

from: The man said: "I confidently posed for a photo."

from: The man said: "I did not want to grow up and act my age, I wanted to be free."
to: Muž povedal: „Nechcel som vyrásť a konať v mojom veku, chcel som byť slobodný.“

from: The man said: "I followed my goals and that's why I made it."

from: The man said: "I was selected for a modeling gig based on my good looks and ability to captivate the camera."
to: Muž povedal: „Bol som vybraný na modelovací koncert na základe môjho dobrého vzhľadu a schopnosti zaujať kameru.“

from: The man said: "When people need to lift something heavy, I'm the first one they think of."

from: The man said: "Why did you change the bulb when I told you, I'd do it?"
to: Muž povedal: „Prečo si vymenil žiarovku, keď som ti povedal, že to urobím?“
