from: I’m happiest when my whole apartment is tidy.
to: Som najšťastnejšia, keď je celý môj byt uprataný.

from: I initiated conversations with strangers at a social gathering.
to: Začal som rozhovory s cudzími ľuďmi na spoločenskom stretnutí.

from: I had to ask them to change my glass, it was really dirty.
to: Musel som ich požiadať, aby mi vymenili sklo, bolo to naozaj špinavé.

from: I used to always finish all my assignment on time.
to: Vždy som dokončil všetky svoje úlohy včas.

from: Part of the interview for a flight attendant was an actual excercise to see if I could lift the heavy suitaceses.
to: Súčasťou rozhovoru pre letušky bola skutočná námaha, aby som zistil, či môžem zdvihnúť ťažké obleky.

from: I didn't know that taking care of a family would be so difficult.
to: Nevedel som, že starostlivosť o rodinu bude taká ťažká.

from: I never enjoyed staying alone.
to: Nikdy som si neužil zostať sám.

from: I went to a beautician yesterday.
to: Včera som išla k kozmetičke.

from: I don't mind vacuuming, in fact, I have always found it amusing.
to: Nevadí mi vysávanie, v skutočnosti som to vždy považoval za zábavné.

from: I panicked when I got a flat tyre.
to: Spanikoval som, keď som dostal plochú pneumatiku.

from: I like nice clothes.
to: Mám rada pekné oblečenie.

from: I was sacked because I kept coming late.
to: Bol som prepustený, pretože som prichádzal neskoro.

from: I constantly needed attention from my partner, if I was ignored for a longer period of time, it would make me angry.
to: Neustále som potreboval pozornosť svojho partnera, ak by som bol dlhší čas ignorovaný, rozhnevalo by ma to.

from: I like to lead by example.
to: Rád by som išiel príkladom.

from: Why should I join in on this chaotic attempt?
to: Prečo by som sa mal zapojiť do tohto chaotického pokusu?

from: I carried my son in my arms the whole hike because he couldn't walk.
to: Celú túru som nosil svojho syna v náručí, pretože nemohol chodiť.

from: I did drugs.
to: Robil som drogy.

from: I've always attended fashion shows because they are extremely inspiring.
to: Vždy som sa zúčastňovala módnych prehliadok, pretože sú mimoriadne inšpirujúce.

from: I made the most rational choice.
to: Urobil som najracionálnejšiu voľbu.

from: I was nervous before giving my speech but it went well.
to: Predtým, ako som predniesol svoj prejav, bol som nervózny, ale šlo to dobre.

from: I like crossfit, it's good for building dynamic strength.
to: Mám rád crossfit, je to dobré pre budovanie dynamickej sily.

from: I went to the disco with the sole purpose of finding a one night stand.
to: Išiel som na diskotéku s jediným cieľom nájsť jednu noc.

from: I could never wear such a sweaty shirt.
to: Nikdy by som si nemohla obliecť takú spotenú košeľu.

from: I bought a dangerous dog breed.
to: Kúpil som si nebezpečné plemeno psov.

from: I trekked druing the storm even though they warned me not to.
to: Prešiel som búrkou, aj keď ma varovali, aby som to neurobil.

from: I spent this weekend in the shopping center buying some clothes for myself.
to: Tento víkend som strávil v nákupnom centre kupovaním oblečenia pre seba.

from: My nephew has skin problems, so I paid for his holiday by the sea.
to: Môj synovec má kožné problémy, takže som zaplatil za jeho dovolenku pri mori.

from: I sometimes have to remind myself not to jump to conclusions.
to: Niekedy si musím pripomenúť, aby som neurobil unáhlené závery.

from: I had to call someone to help me with cleaning the pool, my hands hurt after only 10 minutes of trying.
to: Musel som niekomu zavolať, aby mi pomohol s čistením bazéna, ruky ma boleli už po 10 minútach pokusu.

from: I would never make a decision based on my emotions.
to: Nikdy by som sa nerozhodla na základe svojich emócií.

from: I took the time to clean and organize my closet, sorting clothes by category.
to: Urobil som si čas na upratovanie a usporiadanie skrine, triedenie oblečenia podľa kategórie.

from: My friend challenged me to a fight and I won.
to: Môj priateľ ma vyzval na boj a ja som vyhral.

from: I am sure about my abilities.
to: Som si istý svojimi schopnosťami.

from: One bad look made me cry.
to: Jeden zlý pohľad ma rozplakal.

from: I didn't clean my bathroom for a month because I did not feel like doing it.
to: Mesiac som nevyčistil kúpeľňu, pretože som to nechcel robiť.

from: I was hoping we could move to the intimate stuff already.
to: Dúfal som, že sa už môžeme presunúť k intímnym veciam.

from: I screamed because I saw a spider in the kitchen sink.
to: Kričal som, pretože som v kuchynskom dreze videl pavúka.

from: All my life I have been preparing for this moment.
to: Celý život som sa pripravovala na túto chvíľu.

from: I engaged in deep conversations with a friend who was questioning their life choices.
to: Zapojil som sa do hlbokých rozhovorov s priateľom, ktorý spochybňoval ich životné rozhodnutia.

from: I have never doubted my own competence.
to: Nikdy som nepochyboval o svojej vlastnej kompetencii.

from: I am extremely discerning when it comes to choosing a sexual partner.
to: Som veľmi náročný, pokiaľ ide o výber sexuálneho partnera.

from: I got a cat just so that I have something to care for.
to: Dostal som mačku len preto, aby som sa mal o čo starať.

from: My head was spinning after I finished moving the boxes.
to: Keď som dokončil presúvanie škatúľ, točila sa mi hlava.

from: I felt so exhausted.
to: Cítil som sa tak vyčerpaný.

from: For my fiftieth birhday I wanted a jumping castle.
to: Na päťdesiaty deň narodenia som chcel skákací hrad.

from: I like weightlifting.
to: Mám rád vzpieranie.

from: I carried the safe down the stairs.
to: Odniesol som trezor dole po schodoch.

from: I always wanted to be as strong as Hercules.
to: Vždy som chcel byť taký silný ako Herkules.

from: I couldn't wish for a nicer figure, because mine is already perfect.
to: Nemohol som si priať krajšiu postavu, pretože moja je už dokonalá.

from: I gave the inheritance to my children.
to: Dal som dedičstvo svojim deťom.

from: I never feel like I'm too old for something.
to: Nikdy sa necítim, že som na niečo príliš starý.

from: I planned our finances for the next year.
to: Financie som plánoval na budúci rok.

from: I was looking forward to my new job because I knew that I'd make a lot of new friends there.
to: Tešil som sa na svoju novú prácu, pretože som vedel, že tam nájdem veľa nových priateľov.

from: I always feel bad after an argument.
to: Vždy sa cítim zle po hádke.

from: They company needed someone beautiful for the video, so I took the job.
to: Spoločnosť potrebovala niekoho krásneho na video, tak som si vzal prácu.

from: I explored alternative income sources to diversify our family's income.
to: Preskúmal som alternatívne zdroje príjmu na diverzifikáciu príjmu našej rodiny.

from: I need to find a job in services because I like human contact.
to: Potrebujem si nájsť prácu v službách, pretože mám rád ľudský kontakt.

from: I had many opportunities to marry but I chose not to.
to: Mal som veľa príležitostí oženiť sa, ale rozhodol som sa, že nie.

from: My bathroom was always spotless.
to: Moja kúpeľňa bola vždy nepoškvrnená.

from: I bought pumpkins so we could carve them together.
to: Kúpil som si tekvicu, aby sme ich mohli spolu vyrezať.

from: I subscribed to yet another fashion magazine.
to: Prihlásil som sa na odber ďalšieho módneho časopisu.

from: I like to talk to my staff to find out what I can improve.
to: Rád hovorím so svojimi zamestnancami, aby som zistil, čo môžem zlepšiť.

from: I always wanted to be a detective or a cop.
to: Vždy som chcel byť detektívom alebo policajtom.

from: Nobody appreciated how tanned I got during the summer.
to: Nikto neocenil, ako som sa v lete opálil.

from: I need to make money to take care of my partner.
to: Potrebujem zarobiť peniaze, aby som sa postaral o svojho partnera.

from: I was the boss of this company.
to: Bol som šéfom tejto spoločnosti.

from: I wish I could host more parties at my place.
to: Prial by som si, aby som mohol usporiadať viac večierkov u mňa.

from: I am the one who manages the family finances.
to: Ja som ten, kto spravuje rodinné financie.

from: I went to the school reunion.
to: Išiel som na školské stretnutie.

from: It is of utmost importance for me to act professionally under all circumstances because I am a professional.
to: Je pre mňa nanajvýš dôležité konať profesionálne za každých okolností, pretože som profesionál.

from: I allowed others to make decisions on my behalf, relinquishing my own agency and personal autonomy.
to: Umožnil som ostatným robiť rozhodnutia v mojom mene, vzdal som sa vlastnej agentúry a osobnej autonómie.

from: I used to have so many contacts in my phone.
to: Kedysi som mala v telefóne toľko kontaktov.

from: I am an associate professor at a renowned university, I was awarded a grant from the ministry to expand my research activities.
to: Som docentom na renomovanej univerzite, dostal som grant od ministerstva na rozšírenie mojich výskumných aktivít.

from: Sweat dripped down my forehead as I gripped the heavy barbell, preparing for another intense set.
to: Keď som zovrel ťažkú činku, kvapkal mi pot po čele a pripravoval sa na ďalšiu intenzívnu súpravu.

from: I didn't volunteer, because they needed someone muscular.
to: Neprišiel som dobrovoľne, pretože potrebovali niekoho svalnatého.

from: I was at a congress with colleagues last week.
to: Minulý týždeň som bol na kongrese s kolegami.

from: At first I was a bit afraid there would be no people my age to hang out with.
to: Spočiatku som sa trochu bál, že nebudú ľudia v mojom veku, s ktorými by som sa mohol stretávať.

from: I wanted to stay in touch with everyone from my highschool, but it was not possible.
to: Chcel som zostať v kontakte so všetkými zo strednej školy, ale nebolo to možné.

from: I like it when others make decisions for me.
to: Páči sa mi, keď sa za mňa rozhodujú iní.

from: I followed the latest fashion trends to always look presentable and people appreciated it.
to: Sledoval som najnovšie módne trendy, aby som vždy vyzeral reprezentatívne a ľudia to ocenili.

from: People tell me I'm restless because I constatnly need to be doing something.
to: Ľudia mi hovoria, že som nepokojný, pretože musím niečo robiť.

from: I gave up easily without a fight.
to: Ľahko som sa vzdal bez boja.

from: I like watching Sasha Grey.
to: Rád sa pozerám na Sashu Greyovej.

from: I'm not as stupid as they think I am.
to: Nie som taký hlúpy, ako si myslia.

from: I simply asked for that raise.
to: Jednoducho som požiadal o toto zvýšenie.

from: I am determined to take risks.
to: Som odhodlaný riskovať.

from: I was happy that I was in demand.
to: Bol som rád, že som žiadaný.

from: I was compassionate.
to: Bol som súcitný.

from: I was chosen as the face of a fashion campaign due to my good looks.
to: Bol som vybraný ako tvár módnej kampane kvôli môjmu dobrému vzhľadu.

from: I have always wanted to be a positive role model for my children.
to: Vždy som chcel byť pre svoje deti pozitívnym vzorom.

from: I carefully reviewed the terms and conditions of a contract before signing.
to: Pred podpisom som si pozorne preštudoval podmienky zmluvy.

from: I have never paid much attention to other people's opinions because I usually know better.
to: Nikdy som nevenoval veľkú pozornosť názorom iných ľudí, pretože zvyčajne viem lepšie.

from: It's alright - I wanted to treat you anyway.
to: Je to v poriadku - aj tak som ťa chcel liečiť.

from: I collaborated with colleagues to find solutions and let them towards our goal.
to: Spolupracoval som s kolegami, aby som našiel riešenia a nechal ich k nášmu cieľu.

from: I didn't care about what could have happened to me.
to: Nezaujímalo ma, čo sa mi mohlo stať.

from: I always like to give back when someone helps me.
to: Vždy sa rád vrátim, keď mi niekto pomôže.

from: I thought that without my help, they'd never have managed on time.
to: Myslel som si, že bez mojej pomoci by sa im to nikdy nepodarilo včas.

from: I came to visit them at the hospital almost every day.
to: Prišiel som ich navštevovať do nemocnice takmer každý deň.

from: Let's talk, I will be happy to meet you tomorrow!
to: Poďme sa porozprávať, zajtra sa s vami rád stretnem!

from: I'm always ready for any challenge.
to: Som vždy pripravený na akúkoľvek výzvu.

from: The man said: "I made the most rational choice."
to: Muž povedal: „Urobil som najracionálnejšiu voľbu.“

from: The man said: "I simply asked for that raise."
to: Muž povedal: „Jednoducho som požiadal o toto zvýšenie.“

from: The man said: "Why should I join in on this chaotic attempt?"
to: Muž povedal: „Prečo by som sa mal zapojiť do tohto chaotického pokusu?“

from: The man said: "I went to the disco with the sole purpose of finding a one night stand."
to: Muž povedal: „Išiel som na diskotéku s jediným cieľom nájsť stánok na jednu noc.“

from: The man said: "I was chosen as the face of a fashion campaign due to my good looks."
to: Muž povedal: „Bol som vybraný ako tvár módnej kampane kvôli môjmu dobrému vzhľadu.“

from: The man said: "I sometimes have to remind myself not to jump to conclusions."
to: Muž povedal: „Niekedy si musím pripomenúť, aby som neurobil unáhlené závery.“

from: The man said: "I didn't know that taking care of a family would be so difficult."

to: Urobil som si také meno, že bez môjho súhlasu nič neurobia.

from: I didn't want to stay at home with kids because I would loose a really good job.
to: Nechcel som zostať doma s deťmi, pretože by som prišiel o naozaj dobrú prácu.

from: I wanted him to feel welcome.
to: Chcel som, aby sa cítil vítaný.

from: I told them to let me buy them the things they needed.
to: Povedal som im, aby som im kúpil veci, ktoré potrebujú.

from: They think I'm shy, but I just don't want to embarrass myself.
to: Myslia si, že som plachý, ale nechcem sa hanbiť.

from: I like curved bodies.
to: Mám rád zakrivené telá.

from: I assembled the furniture alone.
to: Nábytok som zostavil sám.

from: I shouldn't argue, because it's better to keep the household calm.
to: Nemal by som sa hádať, pretože je lepšie udržiavať domácnosť v pokoji.

from: I tried to lift the piano, but I couldn't.
to: Snažil som sa zdvihnúť klavír, ale nemohol som.

from: My GP referred me to a very good ophtalmologist because my eyesight was getting poor recently.
to: Môj praktický lekár ma odkázal na veľmi dobrého oftalmológa, pretože môj zrak sa nedávno zhoršoval.

from: I felt so many emotions, I could not breathe.
to: Cítil som toľko emócií, nemohol som dýchať.

from: I don't think I have a strong enough character to be a company director.
to: Nemyslím si, že mám dosť silný charakter na to, aby som bol riaditeľom spoločnosti.

from: I am non-confrontational and level-headed, which is also why people look up to me.
to: Som nekonfrontačný a vyrovnaný, a preto sa ku mne ľudia pozerajú.

from: I am sure there is a higher power controlling my life.
to: Som si istý, že môj život ovláda vyššia sila.

from: I always made sure that my partners favourite snacks were in the cupboard.
to: Vždy som sa uistil, že obľúbené občerstvenie mojich partnerov bolo v skrini.

from: I swept and mopped the floors of my home.
to: Zametal som a stieral podlahy môjho domu.

from: I turned on the washing machine.
to: Zapol som práčku.

from: I wish I had passed the physical test!
to: Prial by som si, aby som prešiel fyzickým testom!

from: I always had authority and others naturally saw me as a leader.
to: Vždy som mal autoritu a ostatní ma prirodzene videli ako vodcu.

from: I never liked speaking out loud.
to: Nikdy sa mi nepáčilo hovoriť nahlas.

from: I got a fine for speeding on the highway.
to: Dostal som pokutu za prekročenie rýchlosti na diaľnici.

from: I can't imagine having a family and having to take care of them someday.
to: Neviem si predstaviť, že by som mal rodinu a musel by som sa o ňu jedného dňa starať.

from: When was the last time you had sex?
to: Kedy ste naposledy mali sex?

from: I had a really nice face when I was young.
to: Keď som bol mladý, mal som veľmi peknú tvár.

from: I saved up a lot of money for my childrens education.
to: Ušetrila som veľa peňazí na vzdelávanie detí.

from: I didn't make any hasty mistakes.
to: Nerobil som žiadne unáhlené chyby.

from: I invited my friends to my place to have a dinner.
to: Pozval som svojich priateľov k sebe na večeru.

from: Although I don't like this dish, I made it for my family.
to: Aj keď sa mi toto jedlo nepáči, urobil som ho pre svoju rodinu.

from: I'm always ready to help you with anything around your car.
to: Vždy som pripravený pomôcť vám s čímkoľvek okolo vášho auta.

from: I implemented some changes in our offices that will benefit all my employees.
to: V našich kanceláriách som implementoval niekoľko zmien, ktoré budú prínosom pre všetkých mojich zamestnancov.

from: I have always wanted to behave as they expected me to.
to: Vždy som sa chcela správať tak, ako očakávali.

from: This problem turned out to be too difficult and I got furious.
to: Ukázalo sa, že tento problém je príliš ťažký a zúril som sa.

from: I checked if the children did their homework.
to: Skontroloval som, či si deti robili domáce úlohy.

from: I expected the salary increase.
to: Očakával som zvýšenie platu.

from: I always took taking care of my family's finances seriously.
to: Vždy som sa staral o financie svojej rodiny vážne.

from: I had cameras installed around the house so nothing would happen to me.
to: Po dome som mal nainštalované kamery, takže sa mi nič nestalo.

from: I am courageous.
to: Som odvážny.

from: I'm exhausted from explaining to you that you can't buy a new phone because I didn't earn much this month.
to: Som vyčerpaný z vysvetľovania, že si nemôžete kúpiť nový telefón, pretože som tento mesiac veľa nezarobil.

from: People around me know that if they need something, I’m happy to help.
to: Ľudia okolo mňa vedia, že ak niečo potrebujú, rád pomôžem.

from: I did not have money so I dug the hole for the pool on my own.
to: Nemal som peniaze, tak som vykopal dieru pre bazén sám.

from: I wouldn't be satisfied with myself if I didn't finish the race.
to: Nebol by som spokojný sám so sebou, keby som nedokončil preteky.

from: I observed them to see whether they were satisfied with the meal I made.
to: Pozoroval som ich, aby som zistil, či sú spokojní s jedlom, ktoré som pripravil.

from: I fired everyone who made me angry.
to: Vyhodil som každého, kto ma nahneval.

from: I like to have fun.
to: Rád sa bavím.

from: I took them to a water park.
to: Vzal som ich do vodného parku.

from: I hated logic because it often wasn't romantic.
to: Nenávidel som logiku, pretože to často nebolo romantické.

from: I sacrificed my own authenticity to avoid displeasing others.
to: Obetoval som svoju vlastnú autentickosť, aby som sa vyhol nespokojnosti ostatných.

from: My to do list was neverending but I kept going.
to: Môj zoznam úloh nebol nekonečný, ale pokračoval som.

from: I knew that I'm capable of more, but I have family, so my priorities changed.
to: Vedel som, že som schopný viac, ale mám rodinu, takže sa moje priority zmenili.

from: I have never let any of my clients down.
to: Nikdy som nesklamal žiadneho zo svojich klientov.

from: I didn't want my partner to work.
to: Nechcel som, aby môj partner pracoval.

from: I am a miner.
to: Som baník.

from: I could not resist cleaning those dirty windows.
to: Nemohol som odolať čisteniu tých špinavých okien.

from: I like to analyse problems from various perspectives.
to: Rád analyzujem problémy z rôznych perspektív.

from: People would often turn to me for fashion and style advice, recognizing my good taste and sense of aesthetics so I knew I was appreciated.
to: Ľudia sa na mňa často obracali kvôli módnym a štýlovým radám, uznávajúc môj dobrý vkus a zmysel pre estetiku, takže som vedel, že ma ocenia.

from: I don’t like watching videos of abandoned puppies, it makes me cry.
to: Nerád pozerám videá opustených šteniatok, rozplače ma to.

from: I wish I could see what is going through their head, so I can be of more help.
to: Prial by som si, aby som videl, čo sa im deje hlavou, aby som mohol viac pomôcť.

from: I had tough military training.
to: Mal som ťažký vojenský výcvik.

from: I offered a supportive ear and understanding without judgment.
to: Ponúkol som podporné ucho a porozumenie bez úsudku.

from: I like to try new things with my partner.
to: Rád skúšam nové veci so svojím partnerom.

from: I've been told that I'm a true professional – always focused, organized, and get the job done efficiently.
to: Bolo mi povedané, že som skutočný profesionál - vždy sústredený, organizovaný a prácu vykonávam efektívne.

from: I don’t like gossiping, it’s a waste of time.
to: Nemám rád klebety, je to strata času.

from: I worked in a laboratory.
to: Pracoval som v laboratóriu.

from: I joined a self-defence course.
to: Prišiel som na kurz sebaobrany.

from: I was the lead author of the research paper.
to: Bol som hlavným autorom výskumnej práce.

from: We won the competition thanks to the idea I had a month ago.
to: Súťaž sme vyhrali vďaka myšlienke, ktorú som mal pred mesiacom.

from: I knew how to deal with this type of client.
to: Vedel som, ako sa vysporiadať s týmto typom klienta.

from: They say I’m insensitive, but I call it sensible.
to: Hovorí sa, že som necitlivý, ale nazývam to rozumným.

from: When I'm sad, I go shopping.
to: Keď som smutný, idem nakupovať.

from: When I'm with him, I'm angry.
to: Keď som s ním, som naštvaný.

from: I made sure the dough was the perfect temperature.
to: Uistil som sa, že cesto má perfektnú teplotu.

from: I almost started crying.
to: Skoro som začala plakať.

from: I weightlifted a lot during my college years and it still shows although I am 40 years old.
to: Počas vysokoškolských rokov som veľa vzpieral a stále sa to ukazuje, aj keď mám 40 rokov.

from: I stood up in front of them and told them we could do it.
to: Postavil som sa pred nich a povedal im, že to dokážeme.

from: My core strength is still very good because I go to gym three times a week.
to: Moja základná sila je stále veľmi dobrá, pretože chodím do posilňovne trikrát týždenne.

from: There is so much going on inside my mind, I can barely focus.
to: V mojej mysli sa toho deje toľko, že sa sotva môžem sústrediť.

from: I had to shave my legs before the race.
to: Pred pretekmi som si musel oholiť nohy.

from: I didn't know what to do, so I relied on my gut.
to: Nevedel som, čo mám robiť, tak som sa spoliehal na svoje črevo.

from: After walking into the meeting room, I shook everyone's hand.
to: Keď som vošiel do zasadacej miestnosti, potriasol som všetkým rukou.

from: When I was their age, I behaved like a child too.
to: Keď som bol v ich veku, správal som sa tiež ako dieťa.

from: I offered my help with doing the dishes.
to: Ponúkol som pomoc pri príprave riadu.

from: I managed my team with ease and got the job done.
to: Ľahko som riadil svoj tím a prácu som dokončil.

from: I negotiated with service providers such as internet or cable companies to secure the most cost-effective plans.
to: Rokoval som s poskytovateľmi služieb, ako sú internetové alebo káblové spoločnosti, aby som zabezpečil nákladovo najefektívnejšie plány.

from: I thought therapy was for weak people.
to: Myslel som si, že terapia je pre slabých ľudí.

from: Maybe if I acted nicer they would say yes.
to: Možno keby som sa správal krajšie, povedali by áno.

from: I could not stop thinking about the sex we had last night.
to: Nemohol som prestať myslieť na sex, ktorý sme mali včera v noci.

from: I'm good at navigating.
to: Som dobrý v navigácii.

from: I was never so sure about my test results.
to: Nikdy som si nebol taký istý svojimi výsledkami testov.

from: I was late so I invited them for a nice lunch.
to: Prišiel som neskoro a pozval som ich na pekný obed.

from: I told him that nothing was wrong although I was really upset.
to: Povedal som mu, že nič nie je zlé, aj keď som bol naozaj naštvaný.

from: I felt a rush of desire as I was kissed and immediately felt aroused.

from: When someone calls me to go out, I’m always happy to say yes.
to: Keď ma niekto volá, aby som išiel von, vždy rád poviem áno.

from: I was so horny I almost could not control myself when we finally ended up in the bed with my crush.
to: Bol som taký nadržaný, že som sa takmer nedokázal ovládať, keď sme konečne skončili v posteli s mojou námarou.

from: They were rude so I had to punch them.

from: I’m too experienced to waste my time here.
to: Som príliš skúsený na to, aby som tu strácal čas.

from: I could easily join the army.

from: I have never believed in superstitions.

from: The man said: "I didn't want to stay at home with kids because I would loose a really good job."
to: Muž povedal: „Nechcel som zostať doma s deťmi, pretože by som stratil naozaj dobrú prácu.“

from: The man said: "I implemented some changes in our offices that will benefit all my employees."

from: The man said: "I wish I had passed the physical test!"

from: The man said: "Although I don't like this dish, I made it for my family."
to: Muž povedal: „Aj keď sa mi toto jedlo nepáči, urobil som ho pre svoju rodinu.“

from: The man said: "My core strength is still very good because I go to gym three times a week."

from: When I heard about the event, I decided to go.
to: Keď som sa dozvedel o podujatí, rozhodol som sa ísť.

from: I was sick but I still worked from home so we don't loose any money.
to: Bol som chorý, ale stále som pracoval z domu, aby sme nestratili žiadne peniaze.

from: I should wash the car.
to: Mal by som umyť auto.

from: I like to go to nude beaches.
to: Rád chodím na nahé pláže.

from: Even if I was afraid of something, I would never admit it.
to: Aj keby som sa niečoho bál, nikdy by som to nepriznal.

from: I couldn't wear shorts even if it was hot outside because I don't want to provoke anybody.
to: Nemohla som nosiť šortky, aj keby bolo vonku horúco, pretože nechcem nikoho provokovať.

from: I encouraged teamwork and collaboration during group projects.
to: Podporoval som tímovú prácu a spoluprácu počas skupinových projektov.

from: With a steady hand and unwavering focus, I approached the edge of the cliff.
to: Stabilnou rukou a neochvejným zameraním som sa priblížil k okraju útesu.

from: I jogged confidently, feeling the endurance of my physical strength.
to: Sebavedome som zabehal a cítil vytrvalosť svojej fyzickej sily.

from: I helped you change the tyres on your car because I'm stronger.
to: Pomohol som vám zmeniť pneumatiky na vašom aute, pretože som silnejší.

from: To avoid losing anything, I prefer to back up all my data.
to: Aby som nestratil čokoľvek, radšej zálohujem všetky svoje údaje.

from: I tried to be kind at all costs not to displease anyone.
to: Snažil som sa byť láskavý za každú cenu, aby som nikoho nemiloval.

from: I wouldn't let anyone dictate what I should do.
to: Nedovolím nikomu diktovať, čo mám robiť.

from: I'm successful.
to: Som úspešný.

from: I like to inspire my subordinates on a daily basis.
to: Rád inšpirujem svojich podriadených každý deň.

from: I like to take care of my friends children when they are busy.
to: Rád sa starám o svojich priateľov, deti, keď sú zaneprázdnené.

from: While I realise that both partners can be the breadwinners in a family, I am glad that in ours, that role is mine.
to: Aj keď si uvedomujem, že obaja partneri môžu byť živitelia rodiny, som rád, že v našej je táto úloha moja.

from: I wanted to go to the cinema instead of watching the movie at home.
to: Chcel som ísť do kina namiesto toho, aby som sledoval film doma.

from: I could never go hiking alone, I always need company.
to: Nikdy som nemohol ísť na turistiku sám, vždy potrebujem spoločnosť.

from: I think I was born to help others.
to: Narodila som sa, aby som pomáhala druhým.

from: It was always important for me to be pretty.
to: Vždy bolo dôležité, aby som bola pekná.

from: I can take this - I have always managed.
to: Môžem to vziať - vždy som to zvládol.

from: I feel the happiest when I'm in charge of everything.
to: Cítim sa najšťastnejší, keď mám na starosti všetko.

from: I was skating before I could even walk.
to: Korčuľoval som skôr, ako som mohol chodiť.

from: As a human resources manager, I effectively recruited top talent, facilitated employee training and development programs.
to: Ako manažér ľudských zdrojov som efektívne prijímal špičkové talenty, uľahčil som vzdelávacie a rozvojové programy zamestnancov.

from: Even though I am their boss, I told them that I wanted them to see me as an equal colleague.
to: Aj keď som ich šéf, povedal som im, že chcem, aby ma videli ako rovnocenného kolegu.

from: I was bored so I went to a speedating event.
to: Nudila som sa, tak som išla na rýchlu akciu.

from: I avoided conflicts at all costs.
to: Konfliktom som sa vyhýbal za každú cenu.

from: I went volunteering to Africa.
to: Išiel som dobrovoľne do Afriky.

from: I threw myself a birthday party to get lots of presents.
to: Postavil som si narodeninovú oslavu, aby som dostal veľa darčekov.

from: If it were up to me, I'd have pizza for lunch every day.
to: Keby to bolo na mne, každý deň by som si dal pizzu na obed.

from: I felt a boost of confidence as I caught myself in the mirror, recognizing that I was undeniably good-looking.
to: Cítil som zvýšenie dôvery, keď som sa chytil v zrkadle a uvedomil som si, že vyzerám nepopierateľne dobre.

from: I am very good at pretending that I am fine.
to: Som veľmi dobrý v predstieraní, že som v poriadku.

from: I like to play computer games.
to: Rád hrám počítačové hry.

from: The shelter held a Christmas auction where I bought a beautiful paw bracelet.
to: Prístrešok usporiadal vianočnú aukciu, kde som si kúpil krásny náramok s labkami.

from: Kissing was important to me, but so was sex.
to: Bozkávanie bolo pre mňa dôležité, ale aj sex.

from: I didn't want to tell them what is wrong because I didn't want to cause any trouble.
to: Nechcel som im povedať, čo je zlé, pretože som nechcel spôsobiť žiadne problémy.

from: I made a group chat for all the new classmates.
to: Urobil som skupinový rozhovor pre všetkých nových spolužiakov.

from: Just because I demand discipline from my employees doesn't mean I don't like them.
to: To, že od svojich zamestnancov požadujem disciplínu, ešte neznamená, že ich nemám rád.

from: I didn't have any hobbies, I was working all the time, so I could make more money for my family.
to: Nemal som žiadne koníčky, pracoval som stále, takže som mohol zarobiť viac peňazí pre svoju rodinu.

from: I created a dating account.
to: Vytvoril som si zoznamovací účet.

from: It broke my heart to see them like that, so I offered help.
to: Zlomilo mi to srdce, keď som ich takto videl, a tak som ponúkol pomoc.

from: I decided in a spur of the moment.
to: Rozhodol som sa v okamihu.

from: I am an accomplished writer, my books are usually bestsellers.
to: Som vynikajúci spisovateľ, moje knihy sú väčšinou bestsellery.

from: When danger came, I took the lead.
to: Keď prišlo nebezpečenstvo, ujal som sa vedenia.

from: I caught myself daydreaming about having sex.
to: Pristihol som sa snívať o sexe.

from: My good looks opened doors in the entertainment industry, I was very confident.
to: Môj dobrý vzhľad otvoril dvere v zábavnom priemysle, bol som si veľmi istý.

from: I was very good at resolving conflicts when I was the supervisor.
to: Bol som veľmi dobrý v riešení konfliktov, keď som bol supervízorom.

from: I got very upset.
to: Veľmi som sa rozrušil.

from: I have created the life I have always wanted.
to: Stvoril som si život, po akom som vždy túžil.

from: I helped out at an animal shelter.
to: Pomohol som v útulku pre zvieratá.

from: People think of me as a wimp just because I’m good to others.
to: Ľudia si o mne myslia ako na blába len preto, že som dobrý k ostatným.

from: I never lost my temper.
to: Nikdy som nestratil náladu.

from: I polished the cutlery until it was spotless.
to: Príbory som leštil, až kým nebol nepoškvrnený.

from: I knew how to fix a broken car.
to: Vedel som, ako opraviť rozbité auto.

from: I hated my body.
to: Nenávidela som svoje telo.

from: I learned a foreign launguage to have better foreign contacts.
to: Naučil som sa zahraničný launguage, aby som mal lepšie zahraničné kontakty.

from: The cleaners left the entrance door open.
to: Čistiace prostriedky nechali vstupné dvere otvorené.

from: I have decided that I will praise at least one person every day.
to: Rozhodol som sa, že budem chváliť aspoň jedného človeka každý deň.

from: I didn't even consider the possibility that I would fail.
to: Ani som neuvažoval o možnosti, že by som zlyhal.

from: I built the house alone.
to: Dom som postavil sám.

from: I shouldn't have taken that personally, but I was really offended.
to: Nemal som to brať osobne, ale bol som skutočne urazený.

from: I had never thought that I could come to harm.
to: Nikdy som si nemyslel, že by som mohol ublížiť.

from: I was not able to complete the excercise because I am too exhausted.
to: Nebol som schopný dokončiť náuku, pretože som príliš vyčerpaný.

from: They do not dare to questions the decisions that I have made.
to: Neodvážia sa spochybňovať rozhodnutia, ktoré som urobil.

from: I organised an international conference.
to: Zorganizoval som medzinárodnú konferenciu.

from: I could easily seduce you with just my looks.
to: Ľahko by som ťa mohol zviesť iba svojím pohľadom.

from: I wouldn’t hurt a fly.
to: Neublížil by som muche.

from: I'm always happy, I think worrying is just a waste of time.
to: Som vždy šťastný, myslím si, že obavy sú len strata času.

from: I would never let privacy interfere with my work life.
to: Nikdy by som nedovolil, aby súkromie zasahovalo do môjho pracovného života.

from: I volunteered at a local shelter, actively engaging with individuals experiencing homelessness, and showing empathy by providing care and support.
to: Dobrovoľne som sa prihlásil do miestneho útulku, aktívne som sa angažoval s jednotlivcami zažívajúcimi bezdomovectvo a prejavoval empatiu poskytovaním starostlivosti a podpory.

from: I coached the youth football team.
to: Ja som trénoval mládežnícky futbalový tím.

from: I had difficulty taking responsibility for my actions.
to: Mal som problém prevziať zodpovednosť za svoje činy.

from: I won the marathon last year.
to: Minulý rok som vyhral maratón.

from: In order not to burn out, I try to create a work-life balance.
to: Aby som nevyhoril, snažím sa vytvoriť rovnováhu medzi pracovným a súkromným životom.

from: I calculated our spendings to budget properly.
to: Naše výdavky som správne vypočítal do rozpočtu.

from: I reached a new personal record.
to: Dosiahla som nový osobný rekord.

from: I maintained a professional tone.
to: Zachoval som profesionálny tón.

from: I started screaming because I got angry.
to: Začal som kričať, pretože som sa nahneval.

from: I organized my to-do list based on priority, tackling the most important tasks first.
to: Zorganizoval som svoj zoznam úloh na základe priority a najprv som sa zaoberal najdôležitejšími úlohami.

from: I carefully proofread and edited my written assignments before submitting them.
to: Pred odoslaním som starostlivo korektúrne a upravil svoje písomné úlohy.

from: I will gladly take your bag.
to: Radi si vezmem tvoju tašku.

from: Their suffering touched me - I wanted to comfort them.
to: Ich utrpenie sa ma dotklo - chcel som ich utešiť.

from: I have always enjoyed teaching others.
to: Vždy ma bavilo učiť ostatných.

from: I should work harder so my children have easier life.
to: Mal by som pracovať tvrdšie, aby moje deti mali ľahší život.

from: I had already made up my mind, so your argument will not work.
to: Už som sa zamýšľal, takže váš argument nebude fungovať.

from: I never made my decision based on emotions.
to: Nikdy som sa nerozhodla na základe emócií.

from: I gave up the calculus class, it was just too hard for me.
to: Vzdal som sa triedy kalkulu, bolo to pre mňa príliš ťažké.

from: I calmly addressed a conflict with a colleague.
to: Pokojne som riešil konflikt s kolegom.

from: I liked having company better.
to: Páčilo sa mi mať spoločnosť lepšie.

to: Nikdy som nebral žiadne doplnky, všetka moja sila je prirodzená.

from: I didn't mind staying late at work, I knew I was doing it to keep my family fed.
to: Nevadí mi zostať neskoro v práci, vedel som, že to robím, aby som svoju rodinu nakŕmila.

from: When I have to go to a work meeting, I immediately get all sweaty from stress.
to: Keď musím ísť na pracovné stretnutie, okamžite sa spotim zo stresu.

from: I didn't eat the cake, because I was watching my figure.
to: Koláč som nejedol, pretože som sledoval svoju postavu.

from: I'm important to my family because I like to fulfill their needs.
to: Som pre svoju rodinu dôležitý, pretože rád napĺňam ich potreby.

from: I am beautiful.
to: Som krásna.

from: I noticed that my good looks seemed to open doors for me.
to: Všimol som si, že môj dobrý vzhľad mi otvára dvere.

from: I never left my job until everything was ready for the next day.
to: Nikdy som neopustil svoju prácu, kým nebolo všetko pripravené na ďalší deň.

from: I stopped to buy condoms on my way to the date.
to: Cestou na rande som sa zastavil, aby som si kúpil kondómy.

from: I often feel stressed about making enough money for the family.
to: Často sa cítim stresovaný z toho, že zarábam dosť peňazí pre rodinu.

from: Although I am employed, I work in a nursing home in my spare time.
to: Aj keď som zamestnaný, vo svojom voľnom čase pracujem v opatrovateľskom dome.

from: Hard work paid off and I bought a new car.
to: Tvrdá práca sa vyplatila a kúpil som si nové auto.

from: I always comforted my kids when they cried.
to: Vždy som potešila svoje deti, keď plakali.

from: I didn't take the rejection well.
to: Odmietnutie som neprijal dobre.

from: When I assessed the damage, I knew this was beyond my skills.
to: Keď som hodnotil poškodenie, vedel som, že to je mimo mojich schopností.

from: I struggled to maintain proper posture during extended periods of sitting, feeling weak in my back and core muscles.
to: Počas dlhšieho sedenia som sa snažil udržať správne držanie tela, cítil som sa slabý v chrbte a jadrových svaloch.

from: I pranked everyone at the party.
to: Všetkým som na večierku žartoval.

from: I felt very vulnerable.
to: Cítil som sa veľmi zraniteľný.

from: I'm confident and that attracts others.
to: Som si istý a to priťahuje ostatných.

from: I stood face to face with a tiger.
to: Stála som tvárou v tvár s tigrom.

from: When browsing through old photographs, I noticed how consistently good-looking I appeared in various moments and settings.
to: Pri prezeraní starých fotografií som si všimol, ako dôsledne dobre vyzerám v rôznych okamihoch a nastaveniach.

from: I didn't spend a lot of time preparing, because I have a pretty face.
to: Nestrávil som veľa času prípravou, pretože mám peknú tvár.

from: When I felt that situation is no longer in my control, I freaked out.
to: Keď som cítil, že situácia už nie je pod mojou kontrolou, vystrašil som sa.

from: I hurt my knees lifting it.
to: Zranil som si kolená, keď som ho zdvihol.

from: I would frequently procrastinate and avoid my responsibilities.
to: Často som otáľal a vyhýbal sa svojej zodpovednosti.

from: I would prefer to have an online meeting every Monday morning.
to: Radšej by som mal online stretnutie každý pondelok ráno.

from: I didn't care that I don't have my own family, I had a high position at my job and that was enough for me.
to: Nezaujímalo ma, že nemám vlastnú rodinu, mal som vysokú pozíciu v práci a to mi stačilo.

from: I consistently downplayed my achievements or talents.
to: Dôsledne som bagatelizoval svoje úspechy alebo talent.

from: I hate arguing.
to: Neznášam hádať sa.

from: Should I have given my kids more money?
to: Mal som dať svojim deťom viac peňazí?

from: I would never let a dog lick my face.
to: Nikdy by som nedovolil, aby mi pes olizoval tvár.

from: When I got compliments it was always on my looks.
to: Keď som dostal komplimenty, bolo to vždy na mojom vzhľade.

from: I'm a good runner.
to: Som dobrý bežec.

from: It’s hard for me to be new in the city because I don’t have any friends here.
to: Je pre mňa ťažké byť v meste nový, pretože tu nemám žiadnych priateľov.

from: I could easily get everyone's attention if I wanted to.
to: Ľahko by som mohol upútať pozornosť všetkých, keby som chcel.

from: I gave them some advice about how to look better.
to: Dal som im niekoľko rád, ako vyzerať lepšie.

from: I cried, because I didn't get what I had wanted.
to: Plakala som, pretože som nedostala to, čo som chcela.

from: I displayed lack of maturity.
to: Preukázal som nedostatok zrelosti.

from: I left when they started talking about religions and god.
to: Odišiel som, keď začali hovoriť o náboženstvách a bohu.

from: I knew I could break it if I pushed hard enough.
to: Vedel som, že by som to mohol zlomiť, keby som dosť tlačil.

from: I vacuumed and spot-cleaned my carpets and rugs.
to: Vysával som a čistil koberce a koberce.

from: I lifted twice my own weight.
to: Zdvihol som dvojnásobok svojej vlastnej váhy.

from: I'm successful because my company is doing great.
to: Som úspešný, pretože mojej spoločnosti sa darí skvele.

from: I donated my old clothes, I just had too many.
to: Daroval som svoje staré oblečenie, len som ich mal príliš veľa.

from: I was looking for the Kama Sutra in the bookshop.
to: Hľadal som Kama Sutra v kníhkupectve.

from: I would like to explore every inch of that beautiful body.
to: Chcel by som preskúmať každý centimeter toho krásneho tela.

from: I will show them how tough I am.
to: Ukážem im, aký som tvrdý.

from: There are no doubts I always did a great job.
to: Niet pochýb o tom, že som vždy odviedol skvelú prácu.

from: As a chef, I carefully sourced high-quality ingredients, honed my culinary skills, and consistently delivered delicious and beautifully presented meals.
to: Ako šéfkuchár som starostlivo získaval kvalitné suroviny, zdokonaľoval som svoje kulinárske schopnosti a dôsledne dodával chutné a krásne prezentované jedlá.

from: They knew I would listen to their problems and try to help.
to: Vedeli, že budem počúvať ich problémy a pokúsiť sa pomôcť.

from: With no witnesses and no evidence, I refused to be a part of the jury.
to: Bez svedkov a dôkazov som odmietol byť súčasťou poroty.

from: If I hadn't been kind, I wouldn't have found a husband.
to: Keby som nebola láskavá, nenašla by som si manžela.

from: I paid for my brothers driving license.
to: Zaplatil som za vodičský preukaz svojich bratov.

from: I have allowed employees to bring animals to work.
to: Umožnil som zamestnancom priviesť zvieratá do práce.

from: When they find out what I'm like, they'll want to hire me right away.
to: Keď zistia, aký som, budú ma chcieť hneď najať.

from: I could not stand seeing how dirty their glasses were!
to: Nemohol som vydržať vidieť, aké špinavé sú ich okuliare!

from: In a previous relationship, I was constantly told how stupid I was.
to: V predchádzajúcom vzťahu mi neustále hovorili, aký som hlúpy.

from: The key moment in my career was when I realize that my decision-making skills earned me respect from everyone.
to: Kľúčovým momentom v mojej kariére bolo, keď som si uvedomil, že moje rozhodovacie schopnosti mi vyslúžili rešpekt od všetkých.

from: I’ve been waiting so long for this game to come out.
to: Čakal som tak dlho, kým táto hra vyjde.

from: I bought a new hair dryer.
to: Kúpil som si nový sušič vlasov.

from: I struggled to complete a set of sit-ups, feeling the weakness in my abdominal muscles.
to: Snažil som sa dokončiť súbor sit-upov, cítil som slabosť v brušných svaloch.

from: I used to underestimate myself a lot, but that's in the past.
to: Kedysi som sa veľmi podceňoval, ale to je minulosť.

from: I joined an environmental conservation group, collaborating with like-minded individuals to raise awareness and take action on environmental issues.
to: Pripojil som sa k skupine na ochranu životného prostredia a spolupracoval som s rovnako zmýšľajúcimi jednotlivcami, aby som zvýšil povedomie a prijal opatrenia v otázkach životného prostredia.

from: I like to prepare snacks for my kids, so they can eat them at school.
to: Rád pripravujem občerstvenie pre svoje deti, aby ich mohli jesť v škole.

from: I did the laundry.
to: Urobil som bielizeň.

from: I made sure my team finished in the top 3.
to: Uistil som sa, že môj tím skončil v top 3.

from: I felt like I was the worst, I don't know why.
to: Cítil som sa, akoby som bol najhorší, neviem prečo.

from: I take pride in my work, but I'm always looking for ways to do it even better.
to: Som hrdý na svoju prácu, ale vždy hľadám spôsoby, ako to urobiť ešte lepšie.

from: I know how you feel, I was in the same situation.
to: Viem, ako sa cítiš, bol som v rovnakej situácii.

from: She keeps asking me why I cried that day.
to: Stále sa ma pýta, prečo som v ten deň plakala.

from: I like having an extra job.

from: If I have offended anyone, it is their fault, I will not apologise to them.

to: Muž povedal: „Som pre svoju rodinu dôležitý, pretože rád plním ich potreby.“

from: The man said: "I would frequently procrastinate and avoid my responsibilities."
to: Muž povedal: „Často by som odkladal a vyhýbal sa svojej zodpovednosti.“

from: The man said: "I worked a sa data analyst."
to: Muž povedal: „Pracoval som ako analytik údajov.“

from: The man said: "I am beautiful."
to: Muž povedal: „Som krásny.“

from: The man said: "I got a lot of compliments on my outfit."
to: Muž povedal: „Dostal som veľa komplimentov na mojom oblečení.“

from: The man said: "Although I am employed, I work in a nursing home in my spare time."
to: Muž povedal: „Aj keď som zamestnaný, vo svojom voľnom čase pracujem v opatrovateľskom dome.“

from: The man said: "I joined an environmental conservation group, collaborating with like-minded individuals to raise awareness and take action on environmental issues."
to: Muž povedal: „Pripojil som sa k skupine na ochranu životného prostredia a spolupracoval som s podobne zmýšľajúcimi jednotlivcami s cieľom zvýšiť povedomie a podniknúť kroky v otázkach životného prostredia.“

from: The man said: "I made sure my team finished in the top 3."
to: Muž povedal: „Uistil som sa, že môj tím skončil v prvej trojke.“

from: The man said: "I ate a lot of protein to build muscle."
to: Muž povedal: „Jedol som veľa bielkovín na budovanie svalov.“

from: The man said: "They knew I would listen to their problems and try to help."
to: Muž povedal: „Vedeli, že budem počúvať ich problémy a pokúsiť sa pomôcť.“

from: The man said: "I would never let a dog lick my face."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy by som nedovolil, aby mi pes olizoval tvár.“

from: The man said: "I never left my job until everything was ready for the next day."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy som neopustil svoju prácu, kým nebolo všetko pripravené na ďalší deň.“

from: The man said: "Yesterday I bought a snake."
to: Muž povedal: „Včera som si kúpil hada.“

from: The man said: "I left when they started talking about religions and god."
to: Muž povedal: „Odišiel som, keď začali hovoriť o náboženstvách a Bohu.“

from: The man said: "I would prefer to have an online meeting every Monday morning."
to: Muž povedal: „Radšej by som mal online stretnutie každý pondelok ráno.“

from: The man said: "I could easily get everyone's attention if I wanted to."
to: Muž povedal: „Ľahko by som mohol upútať pozornosť všetkých, keby som chcel.“

from: The man said: "I struggled to maintain proper posture during extended periods of sitting, feeling weak in my back and core muscles."
to: Muž povedal: „Snažil som sa udržať správne držanie tela počas dlhšieho obdobia sedenia, cítil som sa slabý v chrbte a jadrových svaloch.“

from: The man said: "I didn't take the rejection well."
to: Muž povedal: „Odmietnutie som nevzal dobre.“

from: The man said: "I let my staff leave earlier today."
to: Muž povedal: „Dnes som nechal svojich zamestnancov odísť skôr.“

from: The woman said: "Cleanliness has always been important to me, which is why I am applying for this job."
to: Žena povedala: „Čistota bola pre mňa vždy dôležitá, a preto sa uchádzam o túto prácu.“

from: The woman said: "I gave them some advice about how to look better."
to: Žena povedala: „Dala som im niekoľko rád, ako vyzerať lepšie.“

from: The woman said: "I got a good job right after school and made enough money to buy a house for my family."
to: Žena povedala: „Hneď po škole som dostala dobrú prácu a zarobila som dosť peňazí na kúpu domu pre svoju rodinu.“

from: The woman said: "I cried, because I didn't get what I had wanted."
to: Žena povedala: „Plakala som, pretože som nedostala to, čo som chcela.“

from: The woman said: "I regularly reviewed and adjusted our family's financial goals."
to: Žena povedala: „Pravidelne som kontrolovala a upravovala finančné ciele našej rodiny.“

from: The woman said: "When they find out what I'm like, they'll want to hire me right away."
to: Žena povedala: „Keď zistia, aká som, budú ma chcieť hneď najať.“

from: The woman said: "I always comforted my kids when they cried."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som potešovala svoje deti, keď plakali.“

from: The woman said: "I cooked for him for almost twenty years."
to: Žena povedala: „Varila som pre neho takmer dvadsať rokov.“

from: The woman said: "Yesterday I bought a snake."
to: Žena povedala: „Včera som si kúpil hada.“

from: The woman said: "I struggled to maintain proper posture during extended periods of sitting, feeling weak in my back and core muscles."
to: Žena povedala: „Snažila som sa udržať správne držanie tela počas dlhšieho obdobia sedenia, cítila som sa slabá v chrbte a jadrových svaloch.“

from: The woman said: "I would frequently procrastinate and avoid my responsibilities."
to: Žena povedala: „Často by som odkladala a vyhýbala sa svojim povinnostiam.“

from: The woman said: "I take pride in my work, but I'm always looking for ways to do it even better."
to: Žena povedala: „Som hrdá na svoju prácu, ale vždy hľadám spôsoby, ako to urobiť ešte lepšie.“

from: The woman said: "I am certain that the truth is simple."
to: Žena povedala: „Som si istá, že pravda je jednoduchá.“

from: The woman said: "When I have to go to a work meeting, I immediately get all sweaty from stress."
to: Žena povedala: „Keď musím ísť na pracovné stretnutie, okamžite som sa spotil zo stresu.“

from: The woman said: "I like to prepare snacks for my kids, so they can eat them at school."
to: Žena povedala: „Rád pripravujem občerstvenie pre svoje deti, aby ich mohli jesť v škole.“

from: The woman said: "I worked a sa data analyst."
to: Žena povedala: „Pracovala som ako analytik údajov.“

from: The woman said: "I ate a lot of protein to build muscle."
to: Žena povedala: „Jedla som veľa bielkovín na budovanie svalov.“

from: The woman said: "I bought a new hair dryer."
to: Žena povedala: „Kúpil som si nový sušič vlasov.“

from: The woman said: "I'm a good runner."
to: Žena povedala: „Som dobrý bežec.“

from: The woman said: "I couldn’t have an office just for myself, I’d go crazy in there."
to: Žena povedala: „Nemôžem mať kanceláriu len pre seba, zbláznil by som sa tam.“

from: The woman said: "I felt very vulnerable."
to: Žena povedala: „Cítil som sa veľmi zraniteľný.“

from: The woman said: "I vacuumed and spot-cleaned my carpets and rugs."
to: Žena povedala: „Vysávala som a čistila som koberce a koberce.“

from: The woman said: "I paid for my brothers driving license."
to: Žena povedala: „Zaplatil som za vodičský preukaz svojich bratov.“

from: The woman said: "With a steady hand and unyielding focus, I showed what I had to offer."
to: Žena povedala: „S pevnou rukou a neústupným zameraním som ukázala, čo som mohla ponúknuť.“

from: The woman said: "I pranked everyone at the party."
to: Žena povedala: „Žartoval som všetkým na večierku.“

from: The woman said: "I knew I could break it if I pushed hard enough."
to: Žena povedala: „Vedela som, že by som to mohla zlomiť, keby som dostatočne tlačila.“

from: The woman said: "Hard work paid off and I bought a new car."
to: Žena povedala: „Tvrdá práca sa vyplatila a ja som si kúpil nové auto.“

from: The woman said: "I didn't spend a lot of time preparing, because I have a pretty face."
to: Žena povedala: „Nestrávil som veľa času prípravou, pretože mám peknú tvár.“

from: The woman said: "When browsing through old photographs, I noticed how consistently good-looking I appeared in various moments and settings."
to: Žena povedala: „Pri prezeraní starých fotografií som si všimol, ako dôsledne dobre vyzerám v rôznych okamihoch a prostrediach.“

from: The woman said: "I would never let a dog lick my face."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy by som nenechala psa olizovať mi tvár.“

from: The woman said: "I put a lot of effort into gaining muscle strength."
to: Žena povedala: „Vynaložila som veľa úsilia na získanie svalovej sily.“

from: The woman said: "I took care of the finances."
to: Žena povedala: „Postarala som sa o financie.“

from: The woman said: "When I assessed the damage, I knew this was beyond my skills."
to: Žena povedala: „Keď som hodnotila škodu, vedela som, že to presahuje moje schopnosti.“

from: The woman said: "I got a lot of compliments on my outfit."
to: Žena povedala: „Dostala som veľa komplimentov na môj outfit.“

from: The woman said: "Although I am employed, I work in a nursing home in my spare time."
to: Žena povedala: „Aj keď som zamestnaná, vo svojom voľnom čase pracujem v opatrovateľskom dome.“

from: The woman said: "I never took any supplements, all my strength is natural."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy som nebral žiadne doplnky, všetka moja sila je prirodzená.“

from: The woman said: "Don't be angry, I hated being alone at home."
to: Žena povedala: „Nehnevaj sa, nenávidel som byť sám doma.“

from: The woman said: "I was unable to do anything, so I just kept smiling like nothing happened."
to: Žena povedala: „Nemohla som nič urobiť, tak som sa stále usmievala, akoby sa nič nestalo.“

from: The woman said: "If I have offended anyone, it is their fault, I will not apologise to them."
to: Žena povedala: „Ak som niekoho urazila, je to jeho chyba, nebudem sa im ospravedlňovať.“

from: The woman said: "As a sales representative, I built strong relationships with clients, understood their needs, and effectively communicated the benefits of our products to drive sales."
to: Žena povedala: „Ako obchodná zástupkyňa som si vybudovala silné vzťahy s klientmi, pochopila ich potreby a efektívne komunikovala výhody našich produktov na podporu predaja.“

from: The woman said: "I stood face to face with a tiger."
to: Žena povedala: „Stála som tvárou v tvár s tigrom.“

from: The woman said: "I made sure my team finished in the top 3."
to: Žena povedala: „Uistila som sa, že môj tím skončil v prvej trojke.“

from: The woman said: "They knew I would listen to their problems and try to help."
to: Žena povedala: „Vedeli, že budem počúvať ich problémy a pokúsiť sa pomôcť.“

from: The woman said: "She keeps asking me why I cried that day."
to: Žena povedala: „Stále sa ma pýta, prečo som v ten deň plakala.“

from: The woman said: "I felt like I was the worst, I don't know why."
to: Žena povedala: „Cítila som sa, akoby som bola najhoršia, neviem prečo.“

from: The woman said: "I displayed lack of maturity."
to: Žena povedala: „Preukázala som nedostatok zrelosti.“

from: The woman said: "When I got compliments it was always on my looks."
to: Žena povedala: „Keď som dostala komplimenty, vždy to bolo na mojom vzhľade.“

from: The woman said: "I donated my old clothes, I just had too many."
to: Žena povedala: „Darovala som svoje staré oblečenie, len som mala príliš veľa.“

from: The woman said: "I always need to get the work done right away, because if I wait until the last minute, I feel irresponsible."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy musím urobiť prácu hneď, pretože ak počkám do poslednej minúty, cítim sa nezodpovedná.“

from: The woman said: "The key moment in my career was when I realize that my decision-making skills earned me respect from everyone."
to: Žena povedala: „Kľúčovým momentom v mojej kariére bolo, keď si uvedomím, že moje rozhodovacie schopnosti mi priniesli rešpekt od všetkých.“

from: The woman said: "I could easily get everyone's attention if I wanted to."
to: Žena povedala: „Ak by som chcela, mohla by som ľahko upútať pozornosť všetkých.“

from: The woman said: "I never left my job until everything was ready for the next day."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy som neopustila svoju prácu, kým nebolo všetko pripravené na ďalší deň.“

from: The woman said: "I let my staff leave earlier today."
to: Žena povedala: „Dnes som nechala svojich zamestnancov odísť skôr.“

from: The woman said: "I left when they started talking about religions and god."
to: Žena povedala: „Odišla som, keď začali hovoriť o náboženstvách a bohu.“

from: The woman said: "I like having an extra job."
to: Žena povedala: „Páči sa mi mať prácu navyše.“

from: The woman said: "I used to underestimate myself a lot, but that's in the past."
to: Žena povedala: „Kedysi som sa veľa podceňovala, ale to je minulosť.“

from: The woman said: "I taught a self-defence class."
to: Žena povedala: „Učila som triedu sebaobrany.“

from: The woman said: "I actively engaged with stakeholders."
to: Žena povedala: „Aktívne som sa angažovala so zainteresovanými stranami.“

from: The woman said: "I’ve been waiting so long for this game to come out."
to: Žena povedala: „Čakala som tak dlho, kým táto hra vyjde.“

from: The woman said: "I didn't take the rejection well."
to: Žena povedala: „Odmietnutie som neprijala dobre.“

from: The woman said: "I consistently downplayed my achievements or talents."
to: Žena povedala: „Dôsledne som bagatelizovala svoje úspechy alebo talenty.“

from: The woman said: "It’s hard for me to be new in the city because I don’t have any friends here."
to: Žena povedala: „Je pre mňa ťažké byť v meste nová, pretože tu nemám žiadnych priateľov.“

from: The woman said: "I hate arguing."
to: Žena povedala: „Nenávidím hádky.“

from: The woman said: "I didn't care that I don't have my own family, I had a high position at my job and that was enough for me."
to: Žena povedala: „Nezaujímalo ma, že nemám vlastnú rodinu, mala som vysokú pozíciu v práci a to mi stačilo.“

from: The woman said: "In a previous relationship, I was constantly told how stupid I was."
to: Žena povedala: „V predchádzajúcom vzťahu mi neustále hovorili, aká som hlúpa.“

from: The woman said: "I didn't mind staying late at work, I knew I was doing it to keep my family fed."
to: Žena povedala: „Nevadí mi zostať neskoro v práci, vedela som, že to robím, aby som svoju rodinu nakŕmila.“

from: The woman said: "I couldn't go to sleep without my skincare."
to: Žena povedala: „Bez starostlivosti o pleť som nemohla ísť spať.“

from: The woman said: "I lifted twice my own weight."
to: Žena povedala: „Zdvihla som dvojnásobok svojej vlastnej váhy.“

from: The woman said: "I don't want a relationship because I need freedom."
to: Žena povedala: „Nechcem vzťah, pretože potrebujem slobodu.“

from: The woman said: "I have allowed employees to bring animals to work."
to: Žena povedala: „Dovolila som zamestnancom priviesť zvieratá do práce.“

from: The woman said: "I hurt my knees lifting it."
to: Žena povedala: „Zranila som si kolená a zdvihla som to.“

from: The woman said: "With no witnesses and no evidence, I refused to be a part of the jury."
to: Žena povedala: „Bez svedkov a bez dôkazov som odmietla byť súčasťou poroty.“

from: The woman said: "I struggled to complete a set of sit-ups, feeling the weakness in my abdominal muscles."
to: Žena povedala: „Snažila som sa dokončiť súbor sedení a cítiť slabosť v brušných svaloch.“

from: The woman said: "I met project deadlines with professionalism and technical expertise."
to: Žena povedala: „Dodržala som termíny projektu s profesionalitou a technickou odbornosťou.“

from: The woman said: "I noticed that my good looks seemed to open doors for me."
to: Žena povedala: „Všimol som si, že môj dobrý vzhľad mi otvára dvere.“

from: The woman said: "I will show them how tough I am."
to: Žena povedala: „Ukážem im, aká som tvrdá.“

from: The woman said: "I know how you feel, I was in the same situation."
to: Žena povedala: „Viem, ako sa cítite, bola som v rovnakej situácii.“

from: The woman said: "If I hadn't been kind, I wouldn't have found a husband."
to: Žena povedala: „Keby som nebola láskavá, nenašla by som manžela.“

from: The woman said: "I am beautiful."
to: Žena povedala: „Som krásna.“

from: The woman said: "I led a team of young researchers."
to: Žena povedala: „Viedla som tím mladých výskumníkov.“

from: The woman said: "I often feel stressed about making enough money for the family."
to: Žena povedala: „Často sa cítim stresovaná z toho, že zarobím dosť peňazí pre rodinu.“

from: The woman said: "I did the laundry."
to: Žena povedala: „Urobila som bielizeň.“

from: The woman said: "I stopped to buy condoms on my way to the date."
to: Žena povedala: „Cestou na rande som sa zastavila, aby som si kúpila kondómy.“

from: The woman said: "I joined an environmental conservation group, collaborating with like-minded individuals to raise awareness and take action on environmental issues."
to: Žena povedala: „Pripojila som sa k skupine na ochranu životného prostredia, spolupracujem s rovnako zmýšľajúcimi jednotlivcami s cieľom zvýšiť povedomie a podniknúť kroky v otázkach životného prostredia.“

from: The woman said: "I was well aware that I was very capable."
to: Žena povedala: „Dobre som si uvedomovala, že som veľmi schopná.“

from: The woman said: "I would like to explore every inch of that beautiful body."
to: Žena povedala: „Chcel by som preskúmať každý centimeter toho krásneho tela.“

from: The woman said: "I'm successful because my company is doing great."
to: Žena povedala: „Som úspešná, pretože mojej spoločnosti sa darí skvele.“

from: The woman said: "I would prefer to have an online meeting every Monday morning."
to: Žena povedala: „Radšej by som mala online stretnutie každý pondelok ráno.“

from: The woman said: "There are no doubts I always did a great job."
to: Žena povedala: „Niet pochýb, že som vždy odviedla skvelú prácu.“

from: The woman said: "When I felt that situation is no longer in my control, I freaked out."
to: Žena povedala: „Keď som cítila, že situácia už nie je pod mojou kontrolou, vystrašila som sa.“

from: The woman said: "I ignored the facts, and focused on my feelings."
to: Žena povedala: „Ignorovala som fakty a zamerala som sa na svoje pocity.“

from: The woman said: "I'm confident and that attracts others."
to: Žena povedala: „Som si istý a to priťahuje ostatných.“

from: The woman said: "I could not stand seeing how dirty their glasses were!"
to: Žena povedala: „Nemohla som vydržať, keď som videla, aké špinavé sú ich okuliare!“

from: The woman said: "I didn't eat the cake, because I was watching my figure."
to: Žena povedala: „Koláč som nejedla, pretože som sledovala svoju postavu.“

from: The woman said: "As a chef, I carefully sourced high-quality ingredients, honed my culinary skills, and consistently delivered delicious and beautifully presented meals."
to: Žena povedala: „Ako kuchárka som starostlivo získavala kvalitné suroviny, zdokonaľovala svoje kulinárske schopnosti a dôsledne dodávala chutné a krásne prezentované jedlá.“

from: The woman said: "I am an extraordinary person and I would like everyone to recognize it."
to: Žena povedala: „Som mimoriadna osoba a bola by som rada, aby to všetci poznali.“

from: The woman said: "I'm important to my family because I like to fulfill their needs."
to: Žena povedala: „Som pre svoju rodinu dôležitá, pretože rada plním ich potreby.“

from: The woman said: "I offered them help with the furniture."
to: Žena povedala: „Ponúkol som im pomoc s nábytkom.“

from: The woman said: "I was looking for the Kama Sutra in the bookshop."
to: Žena povedala: „Hľadala som Kama Sutru v kníhkupectve.“

from: The woman said: "Should I have given my kids more money?"
to: Žena povedala: „Mala som dať svojim deťom viac peňazí?“

from: I wanted to help, but they've told me to stay away because I'm weak.
to: Chcel som pomôcť, ale povedali mi, aby som zostal preč, pretože som slabý.

from: Over the holidays, I'm lonely at home for a long time, so I call someone out every day.
to: Cez prázdniny som doma dlho osamelý, takže každý deň niekoho volám.

from: It was hard for me to commit to one job.
to: Bolo pre mňa ťažké zaviazať sa k jednej práci.

from: When I was younger, I found an injured bird on the street, took him home and tried to help him.
to: Keď som bol mladší, našiel som na ulici zraneného vtáka, vzal ho domov a snažil som sa mu pomôcť.

from: I could not think straight after the argument.
to: Nemohol som myslieť hneď po argumente.

from: I watched a show about surviving in wilderness.
to: Pozeral som show o prežití v divočine.

from: I like to be strong in order to protect those in need.
to: Rád by som bol silný, aby som ochránil tých, ktorí to potrebujú.

from: I'm not patient, do not test me.
to: Nie som trpezlivý, neskúšaj ma.

from: I was always keen in making money for the household.
to: Vždy som mal záujem zarábať peniaze pre domácnosť.

from: I turned on the dishwasher.
to: Zapol som umývačku riadu.

from: Mom told me people would like me more if I always acted nice.
to: Mama mi povedala, že ľudia by ma mali radi viac, keby som sa vždy správal pekne.

from: I'm a hard worker.
to: Som tvrdý pracovník.

from: Stop commanding me, I like to spent time how I want to.
to: Prestaňte mi prikazovať, rád trávim čas, ako chcem.

from: Are you sure you don't need help with that bags?
to: Ste si istí, že nepotrebujete pomoc s tými taškami?

from: I would never wear anything camo.
to: Nikdy by som nenosila nič kamufláže.

from: I cleaned and organized my kitchen cabinets, ensuring that items were properly stored and easily accessible.
to: Vyčistil som a usporiadal svoje kuchynské skrinky, aby som zabezpečil, že predmety sú správne uložené a ľahko prístupné.

from: They always tell me I work a lot, but that’s just the way I am.
to: Vždy mi hovoria, že veľa pracujem, ale to je presne to, čo som.

from: I could not stand looking at those weaklings.
to: Nedokázal som sa pozerať na tých slabochov.

from: I did not enjoy the holidays because there were almost no people.
to: Prázdniny som si neužil, pretože tam neboli takmer žiadni ľudia.

from: I was there when my kid took its first steps.
to: Bol som tam, keď moje dieťa urobilo prvé kroky.

from: I have never acted irrationally, I am just not that type of person.
to: Nikdy som nekonal iracionálne, jednoducho nie som taký typ človeka.

from: I wanted to talk to them.
to: Chcel som sa s nimi porozprávať.

from: I wanted to be in a better shape, but I can't do many push-ups.
to: Chcel som byť v lepšej forme, ale nemôžem robiť veľa klikov.

from: I could not stop thinking about the incident, even though it was a stranger.
to: Nemohol som prestať myslieť na incident, aj keď to bol cudzinec.

from: The drain broke down so I had to fix it.
to: Odtok sa pokazil, takže som ho musel opraviť.

from: I think they like me because I'm confident.
to: Myslím, že ma majú radi, pretože som sebavedomý.

from: I like wearing funky socks.
to: Páči sa mi nosiť funky ponožky.

from: My colleague is more professional than I am ever going to be.
to: Môj kolega je profesionálnejší, než kedy budem.

from: I evaluated the data and based my results on them.
to: Vyhodnotil som údaje a svoje výsledky som na nich vychádzal.

from: I couldn't understand why would you need 20 pairs of shoes.
to: Nechápem, prečo by ste potrebovali 20 párov topánok.

from: I like to cook when I see that others like my food.
to: Rád varím, keď vidím, že ostatní majú radi moje jedlo.

from: I consistently followed through on commitments and promises made to others.
to: Dôsledne som dodržiaval záväzky a sľuby, ktoré som dal ostatným.

from: I didn't care about logic - I was relying only on my emotions.
to: Nezaujímala ma logika - spoliehal som sa iba na svoje emócie.

from: How often should I wash my hair?
to: Ako často by som si mal umývať vlasy?

from: I wanted to be more muscular.
to: Chcel som byť viac svalnatý.

from: I bought condoms.
to: Kúpil som si kondómy.

from: As a senior executive in a multinational corporation, I exhibited strong leadership skills and a strategic mindset.
to: Ako vedúci pracovník v nadnárodnej korporácii som prejavoval silné vodcovské schopnosti a strategické myslenie.

from: I needed someone else to pick up the other end.
to: Potreboval som niekoho iného, aby vyzdvihol druhý koniec.

from: I was supportive.
to: Bol som podporovateľný.

from: I let my partner decide about the vacation last year.
to: Nechal som svojho partnera rozhodnúť o dovolenke minulý rok.

from: I bought a beer and cigarettes although I knew it was my last money and I was supposed to buy food.
to: Kúpil som si pivo a cigarety, aj keď som vedel, že sú to moje posledné peniaze a mal som si kúpiť jedlo.

from: I'm not going to apologise to anyone because I didn't do anything wrong.
to: Nebudem sa nikomu ospravedlňovať, pretože som neurobil nič zlé.

from: I am a professional.
to: Som profesionál.

from: I like that my role in the family is to take care of everybody.
to: Páči sa mi, že mojou úlohou v rodine je starať sa o všetkých.

from: I graduated from university and I'm ready to put my knowledge into practice.
to: Vyštudoval som univerzitu a som pripravený uviesť svoje vedomosti do praxe.

from: I like skateboarding even though I am too old for that.
to: Mám rád skateboarding, aj keď som na to príliš starý.

from: I joined the buddy programme at the university so I can meet some new people.
to: Pripojil som sa k buddy programu na univerzite, aby som mohol spoznať nových ľudí.

from: I never listened anyone else.
to: Nikdy som nikoho iného nepočúval.

from: I always feel happy when I'm around people.
to: Vždy sa cítim šťastná, keď som okolo ľudí.

from: I’m used to coming home from work and play games on PlayStation.
to: Som zvyknutý chodiť domov z práce a hrať hry na PlayStation.

from: A few years back, I worked as a miner.
to: Pred niekoľkými rokmi som pracoval ako baník.

from: Maybe I’m too formal, but I maintain my respect that way.
to: Možno som príliš formálny, ale tak si zachovávam rešpekt.

from: It was a tough choice, but I am confident that it was right.
to: Bola to ťažká voľba, ale verím, že to bolo správne.

from: I ordered dumbbells that are too heavy and I can’t workout with them.
to: Objednal som si činky, ktoré sú príliš ťažké a nemôžem s nimi cvičiť.

from: I like seeing how people prosper under my leadership.
to: Rád vidím, ako ľudia prosperujú pod mojím vedením.

from: When I had to go in front of the staff and say something to them, I was suddenly very scared.
to: Keď som musel ísť pred personál a niečo im povedať, zrazu som sa veľmi bál.

from: I couldn’t even open a bottle.
to: Nevedel som ani otvoriť fľašu.

from: I saw my reflection in the mirror and was amazed.
to: Videl som svoj odraz v zrkadle a bol som ohromený.

from: I didn't know how to take proper care of the kids, I was always the funny one, playing with them.
to: Nevedel som, ako sa správne starať o deti, vždy som bol zábavný, hral som sa s nimi.

from: I took charge of the whole planning operation.
to: Prevzal som zodpovednosť za celú plánovaciu operáciu.

from: Supposedly, I should be sayinng no to others, but I can't do that.
to: Pravdepodobne by som mal povedať nie ostatným, ale nemôžem to urobiť.

from: I knew it wasn't an easy job, but I managed to do it perfectly.
to: Vedel som, že to nie je ľahká práca, ale podarilo sa mi to perfektne.

from: As a police officer, I patrolled the streets, enforced laws and regulations, and maintained public safety .
to: Ako policajt som hliadkoval na uliciach, presadzoval zákony a nariadenia a udržiaval verejnú bezpečnosť.

from: I cut them a fair price.
to: Znížil som im férovú cenu.

from: I could easily do 20 pull-ups.
to: Ľahko by som mohol urobiť 20 pull-upov.

from: As a firefighter, I responded swiftly to emergency calls, assessed dangerous situations, and coordinated efforts with my team to protect lives and property.
to: Ako hasič som rýchlo reagoval na tiesňové volania, vyhodnotil nebezpečné situácie a koordinoval som úsilie so svojím tímom na ochranu životov a majetku.

from: Five years ago I started my company and today it is doing extremely well.
to: Pred piatimi rokmi som založil svoju spoločnosť a dnes sa jej darí veľmi dobre.

from: I would not risk my position by making irrational decisions.
to: Neriskoval by som svoju pozíciu tým, že by som urobil iracionálne rozhodnutia.

from: I had to refuse handing out my number, because I had too many request.
to: Musel som odmietnuť rozdávať svoje číslo, pretože som mal príliš veľa žiadostí.

from: I applied for the job, although I didn't have the qualifications.
to: Uchádzal som sa o prácu, hoci som nemal kvalifikáciu.

from: I was alone to do all the chores in the house.
to: Bol som sám, aby som robil všetky práce v dome.

from: I like to keep the house clean.
to: Rád udržiavam dom čistý.

from: I worked hard to cover my kid's expenses.
to: Tvrdo som pracoval, aby som pokryl výdavky môjho dieťaťa.

from: I watched porn.
to: Pozeral som porno.

from: I don't like evenings that I spend at home alone.
to: Nemám rád večery, ktoré trávim doma sám.

from: I always trusted my abilities.
to: Vždy som veril svojim schopnostiam.

from: I worked hard to provide for the family.
to: Tvrdo som pracoval, aby som zabezpečil rodinu.

from: I didn't comment on their appearence.
to: Nekomentoval som ich vzhľad.

from: I wish I could be as powerful as them!
to: Prial by som si, aby som mohol byť taký silný ako oni!

from: I'm not strong enough.
to: Nie som dosť silný.

from: I was not scared of that huge snake.
to: Nebál som sa toho obrovského hada.

from: I had to smile.
to: Musel som sa usmievať.

from: I don't like it when someone smokes near me because I can't get rid of the smell for hours.
to: Nepáči sa mi, keď niekto fajčí blízko mňa, pretože sa nedokážem zbaviť zápachu celé hodiny.

from: They say what they appreciate most about me is that I’m modest.
to: Hovorí sa, že to, čo si na mne najviac vážia, je, že som skromný.

from: I never needed a weapon.
to: Nikdy som nepotreboval zbraň.

from: I kept telling myself that people were lying to me.
to: Stále som si hovoril, že mi ľudia klamú.

from: I totally froze when they shouted at me.
to: Úplne som zamrzla, keď na mňa kričali.

from: I was keen on speaking and presenting to large audiences when I was younger.
to: Keď som bol mladší, chcel som hovoriť a prezentovať širokému publiku.

from: Let me open the jar, I said to her.
to: Dovoľte mi otvoriť nádobu, povedal som jej.

from: I could easily be in a polygamous relationship.
to: Ľahko by som mohol byť v polygamnom vzťahu.

from: I like to stress the importance of communicating openly and directly.
to: Rád zdôrazňujem dôležitosť otvorenej a priamej komunikácie.

from: I was lucky I had tear spray on me.
to: Mal som šťastie, že som mal na seba slzný sprej.

from: I always carried a condom with me.
to: Vždy som so sebou nosil kondóm.

from: I didn't cry even at my father's funeral.
to: Neplakala som ani na pohrebe môjho otca.

from: This is a very accomplished scientist who even received an award from the President.
to: Je to veľmi uznávaný vedec, ktorý dokonca získal cenu od prezidenta.

from: I couldn't defend myself, so I cried.
to: Nemohol som sa brániť, tak som plakal.

from: I was asked to lead the ceremony, because I am a talented speaker.
to: Bol som požiadaný, aby som viedol obrad, pretože som talentovaný rečník.

from: I learned that being quiet is the best I can do in escalated situations.
to: Dozvedel som sa, že ticho je to najlepšie, čo môžem urobiť v eskalovaných situáciách.

from: I wasn't worried at all.
to: Vôbec som sa nebál.

from: I had to make a decision that prioritized the children.
to: Musel som urobiť rozhodnutie, ktoré uprednostňovalo deti.

from: The man said: "I wanted to be in a better shape, but I can't do many push-ups."

from: The man said: "I could not stop thinking about the incident, even though it was a stranger."

from: The man said: "I'm not going to apologise to anyone because I didn't do anything wrong."

from: The man said: "Are you sure you don't need help with that bags?"

from: The man said: "I have never acted irrationally, I am just not that type of person."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy som nekonal iracionálne, jednoducho nie som taký typ človeka.“

from: The woman said: "I could not stop thinking about the incident, even though it was a stranger."

from: The woman said: "I couldn't understand why would you need 20 pairs of shoes."

from: The woman said: "It was hard for me to commit to one job."

from: The woman said: "I'm not patient, do not test me."

from: The woman said: "A few years back, I worked as a miner."

from: The woman said: "I like to stress the importance of communicating openly and directly."

from: The woman said: "Let me open the jar, I said to her."

from: The woman said: "I think they like me because I'm confident."

from: The woman said: "Over the holidays, I'm lonely at home for a long time, so I call someone out every day."

from: The woman said: "I watched porn."

from: The woman said: "I am a professional."
