from: The woman said: "Are you sure you don't need help with that bags?"
to: Žena povedala: „Ste si istý, že s tými taškami nepotrebujete pomoc?“

from: The woman said: "I always carried a condom with me."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som so sebou nosila kondóm.“

from: Although I was freezing, I gave the child my coat.
to: Aj keď som mrzol, dal som dieťaťu kabát.

from: I made impulsive decisions while under stress.
to: Robil som impulzívne rozhodnutia, keď som bol v strese.

from: They are convinced that I was only looking for sex.
to: Sú presvedčení, že som hľadal iba sex.

from: Keeping the office clean is my priority.
to: Udržiavanie čistoty kancelárie je mojou prioritou.

from: I always had a high self-esteem when it comes to sex.
to: Vždy som mal vysoké sebavedomie, pokiaľ ide o sex.

from: I am open to any challenge.
to: Som otvorený akejkoľvek výzve.

from: I could not open the jar so I asked my friend to do it.
to: Nemohol som otvoriť nádobu, tak som požiadal svojho priateľa, aby to urobil.

from: I like it when I can show others who's the boss.
to: Páči sa mi, keď môžem ostatným ukázať, kto je šéf.

from: I was the dominant one in our relationship.
to: Bol som dominantný v našom vzťahu.

from: I had a meeting with foreign sponsors.
to: Stretla som sa so zahraničnými sponzormi.

from: I could outdrink you so easily.
to: Mohol by som ťa tak ľahko prepiť.

from: The last time I watched a horror movie, I couldn't sleep at night because I was too scared.
to: Keď som naposledy sledoval horor, nemohol som v noci spať, pretože som bol príliš vystrašený.

from: I like mathematics and physics because numbers are always right.
to: Mám rád matematiku a fyziku, pretože čísla sú vždy správne.

from: I am ready to make this country a better place.
to: Som pripravený urobiť túto krajinu lepším miestom.

from: I always had a lot of sexual fantasies.
to: Vždy som mala veľa sexuálnych fantázií.

from: I built everything with my own hands and brain.
to: Všetko som postavil vlastnými rukami a mozgom.

from: I always felt like a natural leader.
to: Vždy som sa cítil ako prirodzený vodca.

from: I could handle those drunk idiots if I wanted to.
to: Zvládla by som tých opitých idiotov, keby som chcela.

from: I took the car to the repair shop for a regular check-up.
to: Vzal som auto do opravovne na pravidelnú kontrolu.

from: I donated my time and skills to mentor a young student.
to: Svoj čas a zručnosti som venoval mentorovi mladého študenta.

from: They told me I should be kinder.
to: Povedali mi, že by som mal byť láskavejší.

from: I have always led an active life.
to: Vždy som viedol aktívny život.

from: I redid my nail polish.
to: Prerobil som si lak na nechty.

from: I worked diligently and pursued career opportunities that allowed me to earn a stable income, ensuring financial security for my family.
to: Pracoval som usilovne a venoval som sa kariérnym príležitostiam, ktoré mi umožnili zarobiť stabilný príjem, čím som zabezpečil finančné zabezpečenie mojej rodiny.

from: I threw the medicine ball the farthest out of all the competitors.
to: Medicinbal som vyhodil najďalej zo všetkých súťažiacich.

from: I felt better when they came over.
to: Cítil som sa lepšie, keď prišli.

from: I carefully reviewed the product specifications before buying it.
to: Pred zakúpením som starostlivo preskúmal špecifikácie produktu.

from: When the weather is bad outside, I tend to be moodier.
to: Keď je vonku zlé počasie, mám tendenciu byť náladovejší.

from: Sorry about the mess, I didn’t get a chance to clean it up.
to: Ospravedlňujem sa za ten neporiadok, nemal som šancu ho vyčistiť.

from: I am always happy to listen to constructive criticism.
to: Vždy som rád, že počúvam konštruktívnu kritiku.

from: I offered you a ride, no need to worry.
to: Ponúkol som vám jazdu, nemusíte sa obávať.

from: If I needed to feel better, I wouldn't have a problem undergoing some surgical procedure.
to: Keby som sa potreboval cítiť lepšie, nemal by som problém podstúpiť nejaký chirurgický zákrok.

from: I pursued a higher-paying job opportunity to increase our family's income .
to: Využil som si vyššiu platenú pracovnú príležitosť, aby som zvýšil príjem našej rodiny.

from: As I plunged into the cold water, I swam with effortless strokes.
to: Keď som sa ponoril do studenej vody, plával som bez námahy.

from: As a financial planner, I analyzed clients' financial goals, developed customized investment strategies, and provided ongoing guidance.
to: Ako finančný plánovač som analyzoval finančné ciele klientov, vyvinul prispôsobené investičné stratégie a poskytoval priebežné usmernenia.

from: I cried after leaving the office.
to: Plakala som po odchode z kancelárie.

from: I like to give young people a chance.
to: Rád dávam mladým ľuďom šancu.

from: I focused on regular dusting, vacuuming, and wiping surfaces to maintain cleanliness and hygiene in my home.
to: Zameral som sa na pravidelné poprašovanie, vysávanie a utieranie povrchov, aby som udržal čistotu a hygienu v mojom dome.

from: I couldn't be a soldier, no one would be afraid of me.
to: Nemohol som byť vojakom, nikto by sa ma nebál.

from: I looked good in the swimming suit as well as in formal wear.
to: Vyzerala som dobre v plavkách aj vo formálnom oblečení.

from: I did not need to hire a moving company, I just did it myself.
to: Nepotreboval som najať sťahovacia spoločnosť, len som to urobil sám.

from: I felt so beautiful.
to: Cítila som sa tak krásna.

from: I'm the head of this family so I believe I had to cover our basic needs, such as food, shelter and clothing.
to: Som hlavou tejto rodiny, takže verím, že som musel pokryť naše základné potreby, ako je jedlo, prístrešie a oblečenie.

from: I was never jealous of anyone because that would only be proof of my lack of confidence.
to: Nikdy som na nikoho nežiarlil, pretože by to bol len dôkaz mojej nedôvery.

from: Covered in dirt and sweat, I labored in the scorching sun.
to: Pokryté špinou a potom som pracoval na horiacom slnku.

from: I spent almost two hours on the phone with them.
to: Strávil som s nimi takmer dve hodiny na telefóne.

from: I didn't ask for a tip.
to: Nežiadal som o tip.

from: I didn't need your help, I knew that I could do it by myself.
to: Nepotreboval som tvoju pomoc, vedel som, že to zvládnem sám.

from: I demanded constant attention.
to: Požadoval som neustálu pozornosť.

from: I was focused on making money when the kids were little.
to: Sústredil som sa na zarábanie peňazí, keď boli deti malé.

from: I washed my hands so often that I completely ruined my skin.
to: Umyla som si ruky tak často, že som si úplne zničila pokožku.

from: People often commented on my good looks, so I knew that I had attractive features.
to: Ľudia často komentovali môj dobrý vzhľad, takže som vedel, že mám atraktívne vlastnosti.

from: I like it, when I'm home alone and I can cook for everybody without any interruption.
to: Páči sa mi, keď som doma sám a môžem variť pre každého bez prerušenia.

from: I could totally imagine myself in their position.
to: Dokážem si predstaviť samého seba v ich pozícii.

from: Clad in leather armor, I ventured into the dark dungeon.
to: Obalený v koženom brnení som sa odvážil do tmavého žalára.

from: I am no amateur, so I will not allow anyone to treat me like one.
to: Nie som amatér, takže nedovolím nikomu, aby sa ku mne správal ako k jednému.

from: I lacked the emotional strength to handle a stressful situation, feeling overwhelmed and vulnerable.
to: Chýbala mi emocionálna sila zvládnuť stresovú situáciu, cítiť sa ohromený a zraniteľný.

from: I could never fully commit to my partner.
to: Nikdy som sa nemohol plne zaviazať svojmu partnerovi.

from: I have always tried to get to know my employees so that I can create the right conditions for them.
to: Vždy som sa snažil spoznať svojich zamestnancov, aby som im mohol vytvoriť tie správne podmienky.

from: I helped my little cousin with his math assignment.
to: Pomohla som svojmu malému bratrancovi s jeho matematickým zadaním.

from: I paid for the whole family dinner.
to: Zaplatil som celú rodinnú večeru.

from: I didn't want to be dependent on someone.
to: Nechcel som byť na niekom závislý.

from: I always prefered wearing a suit to my workplace.
to: Vždy som radšej nosil oblek na svoje pracovisko.

from: I've never been afraid of other people's talk.
to: Nikdy som sa nebál rozprávania iných ľudí.

from: I unpacked the sacks of cement from the train.
to: Vybalil som vrecia cementu z vlaku.

from: I think I always looked naturally good in photos.
to: Na fotkách som vždy vyzerala prirodzene dobre.

from: I was behind the steering wheel.
to: Bol som za volantom.

from: I stepped into the arena with a brave face and no fear in my heart.
to: Vstúpil som do arény s odvážnou tvárou a bez strachu v srdci.

from: Why would I have to be careful?
to: Prečo by som mal byť opatrný?

from: I was sure that I knew what I was doing and did not need to read the instructions.
to: Bol som si istý, že viem, čo robím, a nemusel som čítať pokyny.

from: I entered an amateur weightlifting competition.
to: Zúčastnil som sa amatérskej súťaže vo vzpieraní.

from: Would you like some help with that technical task?
to: Chceli by ste pomôcť s touto technickou úlohou?

from: Every step I took radiated an inner assurance.
to: Každý krok, ktorý som urobil, vyžaroval vnútornú istotu.

from: I assessed the weather forecast before the trip to avoid any potentionally dangerous situations.
to: Pred cestou som posúdil predpoveď počasia, aby som sa vyhol potenciálne nebezpečným situáciám.

from: I'm naturally assertive and dominant.
to: Som prirodzene asertívny a dominantný.

from: I attended a festival and made a lot of new friends and acquaintances.
to: Zúčastnil som sa festivalu a vytvoril som veľa nových priateľov a známych.

from: I always agreed with others' opinions, even when I had a different viewpoint, just to avoid confrontation or disagreement.
to: Vždy som súhlasil s názormi ostatných, aj keď som mal iný názor, len aby som sa vyhol konfrontácii alebo nezhodám.

from: Working as a senior scientist in a research laboratory, I maintained a high level of professionalism and rigor in conducting experiments and analyzing data.
to: Pracoval som ako vedúci vedecký pracovník vo výskumnom laboratóriu a udržiaval som vysokú úroveň profesionality a prísnosti pri vykonávaní experimentov a analýze údajov.

from: I don't like it when I have to leave home knowing that the dishwasher is loaded.
to: Nepáči sa mi, keď musím odísť z domu s vedomím, že umývačka riadu je nabitá.

from: I got mad because their food looked tastier.
to: Zbláznil som sa, pretože ich jedlo vyzeralo chutnejšie.

from: I was not afraid of my image being tarnished.
to: Nebál som sa, že môj obraz bude poškvrnený.

from: I'm self-assured in my abilities.
to: Som sebavedomý vo svojich schopnostiach.

from: I fell but it didn't hurt me at all.
to: Padol som, ale vôbec mi to neublížilo.

from: As a team leader, I communicated the goals clearly.
to: Ako vedúci tímu som jasne komunikoval ciele.

from: She was upset when she discovered that she had a tumor but I kept reassuring her everything would be alright.
to: Bola rozrušená, keď zistila, že má nádor, ale stále som ju upokojoval, že všetko bude v poriadku.

from: I didn't need any help and carried the washing machine up the stairs alone.
to: Nepotreboval som žiadnu pomoc a pračku som niesol hore po schodoch sám.

from: I said yes even thought I didn't want to do it.
to: Povedal som áno, dokonca som si myslel, že to nechcem robiť.

from: I used to watch a lot of documentaries about esoteric stuff.
to: Kedysi som pozerala veľa dokumentov o ezoterických veciach.

from: I never had trouble with others not respecting me.
to: Nikdy som nemal problém s ostatnými, ktorí ma nerešpektujú.

from: I liked doing it, because it was dangerous.
to: Páčilo sa mi to robiť, pretože to bolo nebezpečné.

from: I was in love, so I didn't listen to them.
to: Bol som zamilovaný, takže som ich nepočúval.

from: They were freaking out at that concert.
to: Na tom koncerte sa zľakli.

from: I was happy when I received the invitation.
to: Bol som šťastný, keď som dostal pozvanie.

from: I consistently sought permission or validation from others before making decisions.
to: Pred rozhodovaním som dôsledne hľadal povolenie alebo potvrdenie od ostatných.

from: I've been an adrenaline seeker my whole life.
to: Celý život som hľadal adrenalín.

from: I'd like to be a firefighter someday.
to: Chcela by som byť raz hasičom.

from: I went into the woods even though there were bears roaming around.
to: Išiel som do lesa, aj keď sa okolo potulovali medvede.

from: I like to have deep and meaningful conversations.
to: Rád vediem hlboké a zmysluplné rozhovory.

from: I never liked it when someone told me how to lead my company.
to: Nikdy sa mi nepáčilo, keď mi niekto povedal, ako viesť moju spoločnosť.

from: You are really good at technical subjects.
to: Ste naozaj dobrý v technických predmetoch.

from: The man said: "I did not need to hire a moving company, I just did it myself."
to: Muž povedal: „Nepotreboval som najať sťahovacia spoločnosť, len som to urobil sám.“

from: The man said: "I've never been afraid of other people's talk."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy som sa nebál rozprávania iných ľudí.“

from: The man said: "I used to watch a lot of documentaries about esoteric stuff."
to: Muž povedal: „Zvykol som pozerať veľa dokumentárnych filmov o ezoterických veciach.“

from: The man said: "I carefully reviewed the product specifications before buying it."
to: Muž povedal: „Pred zakúpením som starostlivo preskúmal špecifikácie produktu.“

from: The man said: "I didn't need your help, I knew that I could do it by myself."
to: Muž povedal: „Nepotreboval som tvoju pomoc, vedel som, že to zvládnem sám.“

from: The man said: "I'm the head of this family so I believe I had to cover our basic needs, such as food, shelter and clothing."
to: Muž povedal: „Som hlavou tejto rodiny, takže verím, že som musel pokryť naše základné potreby, ako je jedlo, prístrešie a oblečenie.“

from: The man said: "I took the car to the repair shop for a regular check-up."
to: Muž povedal: „Vzal som auto do opravovne na pravidelnú kontrolu.“

from: The man said: "I never liked it when someone told me how to lead my company."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy sa mi nepáčilo, keď mi niekto povedal, ako viesť moju spoločnosť.“

from: The man said: "I lacked the emotional strength to handle a stressful situation, feeling overwhelmed and vulnerable."
to: Muž povedal: „Chýbala mi emocionálna sila zvládnuť stresovú situáciu, cítiť sa ohromený a zraniteľný.“

from: The man said: "I felt so beautiful."
to: Muž povedal: „Cítil som sa tak krásny.“

from: The man said: "I don't like it when I have to leave home knowing that the dishwasher is loaded."
to: Muž povedal: „Nepáči sa mi, keď musím odísť z domu s vedomím, že umývačka riadu je nabitá.“

from: The man said: "I consistently sought permission or validation from others before making decisions."
to: Muž povedal: „Pred rozhodnutím som dôsledne hľadal povolenie alebo potvrdenie od ostatných.“

from: The man said: "I always prefered wearing a suit to my workplace."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som radšej nosil oblek na svoje pracovisko.“

from: The man said: "I like to give young people a chance."
to: Muž povedal: „Rád dávam mladým ľuďom šancu.“

from: The man said: "I looked good in the swimming suit as well as in formal wear."
to: Muž povedal: „Vyzeral som dobre v plavkách aj vo formálnom oblečení.“

from: The man said: "I always had a lot of sexual fantasies."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som mal veľa sexuálnych fantázií.“

from: The man said: "I was the dominant one in our relationship."
to: Muž povedal: „Bol som dominantný v našom vzťahu.“

from: The man said: "I fell but it didn't hurt me at all."
to: Muž povedal: „Padol som, ale vôbec mi to neublížilo.“

from: The man said: "As a financial planner, I analyzed clients' financial goals, developed customized investment strategies, and provided ongoing guidance."
to: Muž povedal: „Ako finančný plánovač som analyzoval finančné ciele klientov, vyvinul prispôsobené investičné stratégie a poskytoval priebežné usmernenie.“

from: The man said: "Clad in leather armor, I ventured into the dark dungeon."
to: Muž povedal: „Obalený v koženom brnení, pustil som sa do temného žalára.“

from: The man said: "I made impulsive decisions while under stress."
to: Muž povedal: „Robil som impulzívne rozhodnutia, keď som bol v strese.“

from: The man said: "They are convinced that I was only looking for sex."
to: Muž povedal: „Sú presvedčení, že som hľadal iba sex.“

from: The man said: "The last time I watched a horror movie, I couldn't sleep at night because I was too scared."
to: Muž povedal: „Keď som naposledy sledoval horor, nemohol som v noci spať, pretože som bol príliš vystrašený.“

from: The man said: "I like mathematics and physics because numbers are always right."
to: Muž povedal: „Mám rád matematiku a fyziku, pretože čísla sú vždy správne.“

from: The man said: "I said yes even thought I didn't want to do it."
to: Muž povedal: „Povedal som áno, dokonca som si myslel, že to nechcem urobiť.“

from: The man said: "I spent almost two hours on the phone with them."
to: Muž povedal: „Strávil som s nimi takmer dve hodiny na telefóne.“

from: The man said: "I could outdrink you so easily."
to: Muž povedal: „Mohol by som ťa tak ľahko prepiť.“

from: The man said: "I didn't ask for a tip."
to: Muž povedal: „Nežiadal som o tip.“

from: The man said: "I assessed the weather forecast before the trip to avoid any potentionally dangerous situations."
to: Muž povedal: „Pred cestou som posúdil predpoveď počasia, aby som sa vyhol potenciálne nebezpečným situáciám.“

from: The man said: "I liked doing it, because it was dangerous."
to: Muž povedal: „Rád som to robil, pretože to bolo nebezpečné.“

from: The man said: "Keeping the office clean is my priority."
to: Muž povedal: „Udržiavať kanceláriu v čistote je mojou prioritou.“

from: The man said: "I like it when I can show others who's the boss."
to: Muž povedal: „Páči sa mi, keď môžem ukázať ostatným, kto je šéf.“

from: The man said: "I pursued a higher-paying job opportunity to increase our family's income ."
to: Muž povedal: „Využil som vyššiu platenú pracovnú príležitosť, aby som zvýšil príjem našej rodiny.“

from: The man said: "I was never jealous of anyone because that would only be proof of my lack of confidence."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy som na nikoho nežiarlil, pretože by to bol len dôkaz mojej nedôvery.“

from: The man said: "I cried after leaving the office."
to: Muž povedal: „Plakal som po odchode z kancelárie.“

from: The man said: "I think I always looked naturally good in photos."
to: Muž povedal: „Myslím, že na fotografiách som vždy vyzeral prirodzene dobre.“

from: The man said: "Would you like some help with that technical task?"
to: Muž povedal: „Chceli by ste pomôcť s touto technickou úlohou?“

from: The man said: "I worked diligently and pursued career opportunities that allowed me to earn a stable income, ensuring financial security for my family."
to: Muž povedal: „Pracoval som usilovne a usiloval som sa o kariérne príležitosti, ktoré mi umožnili zarobiť stabilný príjem a zabezpečiť finančnú istotu pre moju rodinu.“

from: The man said: "I'm self-assured in my abilities."
to: Muž povedal: „Som sebavedomý vo svojich schopnostiach.“

from: The man said: "When the weather is bad outside, I tend to be moodier."
to: Muž povedal: „Keď je vonku zlé počasie, mám tendenciu byť náladovejší.“

from: The man said: "I demanded constant attention."
to: Muž povedal: „Požadoval som neustálu pozornosť.“

from: The man said: "I always had a high self-esteem when it comes to sex."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som mal vysoké sebavedomie, pokiaľ ide o sex.“

from: The man said: "I always felt like a natural leader."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som sa cítil ako prirodzený vodca.“

from: The man said: "They told me I should be kinder."
to: Muž povedal: „Povedali mi, že by som mal byť láskavejší.“

from: The man said: "I washed my hands so often that I completely ruined my skin."
to: Muž povedal: „Umyl som si ruky tak často, že som si úplne zničil pokožku.“

from: The man said: "I'd like to be a firefighter someday."
to: Muž povedal: „Jedného dňa by som chcel byť hasičom.“

from: The man said: "People often commented on my good looks, so I knew that I had attractive features."
to: Muž povedal: „Ľudia často komentovali môj dobrý vzhľad, takže som vedel, že mám atraktívne vlastnosti.“

from: The man said: "I threw the medicine ball the farthest out of all the competitors."
to: Muž povedal: „Medicinbal som vyhodil najďalej zo všetkých súťažiacich.“

from: The man said: "I focused on regular dusting, vacuuming, and wiping surfaces to maintain cleanliness and hygiene in my home."
to: Muž povedal: „Zameral som sa na pravidelné poprašovanie, vysávanie a utieranie povrchov, aby som udržal čistotu a hygienu v mojom dome.“

from: The man said: "I could handle those drunk idiots if I wanted to."
to: Muž povedal: „Dokázal by som zvládnuť tých opitých idiotov, keby som chcel.“

from: The man said: "I donated my time and skills to mentor a young student."
to: Muž povedal: „Daroval som svoj čas a zručnosti mentorovaniu mladého študenta.“

from: The man said: "I had a meeting with foreign sponsors."
to: Muž povedal: „Mal som stretnutie so zahraničnými sponzormi.“

from: The man said: "I am always happy to listen to constructive criticism."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som rád, že počúvam konštruktívnu kritiku.“

from: The man said: "I helped my little cousin with his math assignment."
to: Muž povedal: „Pomohol som svojmu malému bratrancovi s jeho matematickou úlohou.“

from: The man said: "I could totally imagine myself in their position."
to: Muž povedal: „Dokázal som si úplne predstaviť seba v ich pozícii.“

from: The man said: "Sorry about the mess, I didn’t get a chance to clean it up."
to: Muž povedal: „Prepáč za ten neporiadok, nedostal som šancu ho vyčistiť.“

from: The man said: "I was in love, so I didn't listen to them."
to: Muž povedal: „Bol som zamilovaný, takže som ich nepočúval.“

from: The man said: "I unpacked the sacks of cement from the train."
to: Muž povedal: „Vybalil som vrecia cementu z vlaku.“

from: The man said: "As a team leader, I communicated the goals clearly."
to: Muž povedal: „Ako vedúci tímu som jasne oznámil ciele.“

from: The man said: "Covered in dirt and sweat, I labored in the scorching sun."
to: Muž povedal: „Pokryté špinou a potom som pracoval na horiacom slnku.“

from: The man said: "I stepped into the arena with a brave face and no fear in my heart."
to: Muž povedal: „Vstúpil som do arény s odvážnou tvárou a bez strachu v srdci.“

from: The man said: "I was focused on making money when the kids were little."
to: Muž povedal: „Sústredil som sa na zarábanie peňazí, keď boli deti malé.“

from: The man said: "I am open to any challenge."
to: Muž povedal: „Som otvorený akejkoľvek výzve.“

from: The man said: "I was behind the steering wheel."
to: Muž povedal: „Bol som za volantom.“

from: The man said: "Although I was freezing, I gave the child my coat."
to: Muž povedal: „Aj keď som mrzol, dal som dieťaťu kabát.“

from: The man said: "I offered you a ride, no need to worry."
to: Muž povedal: „Ponúkol som ti jazdu, netreba sa báť.“

from: The man said: "I didn't need any help and carried the washing machine up the stairs alone."
to: Muž povedal: „Nepotreboval som žiadnu pomoc a pračku som niesol po schodoch hore sám.“

from: The man said: "I attended a festival and made a lot of new friends and acquaintances."
to: Muž povedal: „Zúčastnil som sa festivalu a vytvoril som veľa nových priateľov a známych.“

from: The man said: "I was happy when I received the invitation."
to: Muž povedal: „Bol som šťastný, keď som dostal pozvanie.“

from: The man said: "I'm naturally assertive and dominant."
to: Muž povedal: „Som prirodzene asertívny a dominantný.“

from: The man said: "I built everything with my own hands and brain."
to: Muž povedal: „Všetko som postavil vlastnými rukami a mozgom.“

from: The man said: "I could never fully commit to my partner."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy som sa nemohol úplne zaviazať svojmu partnerovi.“

from: The man said: "I didn't want to be dependent on someone."
to: Muž povedal: „Nechcel som byť na niekom závislý.“

from: The man said: "Why would I have to be careful?"
to: Muž povedal: „Prečo by som mal byť opatrný?“

from: The man said: "I entered an amateur weightlifting competition."
to: Muž povedal: „Prihlásil som sa do amatérskej súťaže vo vzpieraní.“

from: The man said: "I redid my nail polish."
to: Muž povedal: „Prerobil som si lak na nechty.“

from: The man said: "I went into the woods even though there were bears roaming around."
to: Muž povedal: „Vošiel som do lesa, aj keď sa okolo potulovali medvede.“

from: The man said: "I've been an adrenaline seeker my whole life."
to: Muž povedal: „Celý život som hľadal adrenalín.“

from: The man said: "You are really good at technical subjects."
to: Muž povedal: „Ste naozaj dobrý v technických predmetoch.“

from: The man said: "As I plunged into the cold water, I swam with effortless strokes."
to: Muž povedal: „Keď som sa ponoril do studenej vody, plával som bez námahy.“

from: The man said: "They were freaking out at that concert."
to: Muž povedal: „Na tom koncerte sa vystrašili.“

from: The man said: "She was upset when she discovered that she had a tumor but I kept reassuring her everything would be alright."
to: Muž povedal: „Bola naštvaná, keď zistila, že má nádor, ale stále som ju upokojoval, že všetko bude v poriadku.“

from: The man said: "I couldn't be a soldier, no one would be afraid of me."
to: Muž povedal: „Nemohol som byť vojakom, nikto by sa ma nebál.“

from: The man said: "I was not afraid of my image being tarnished."
to: Muž povedal: „Nebál som sa, že môj obraz bude poškvrnený.“

from: The man said: "I have always led an active life."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som viedol aktívny život.“

from: The man said: "I am ready to make this country a better place."
to: Muž povedal: „Som pripravený urobiť túto krajinu lepším miestom.“

from: The man said: "I like it, when I'm home alone and I can cook for everybody without any interruption."
to: Muž povedal: „Páči sa mi, keď som doma sám a môžem variť pre všetkých bez prerušenia.“

from: The man said: "I have always tried to get to know my employees so that I can create the right conditions for them."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som sa snažil spoznať svojich zamestnancov, aby som pre nich mohol vytvoriť správne podmienky.“

from: The man said: "If I needed to feel better, I wouldn't have a problem undergoing some surgical procedure."
to: Muž povedal: „Keby som sa potreboval cítiť lepšie, nemal by som problém podstúpiť nejaký chirurgický zákrok.“

from: The man said: "I am no amateur, so I will not allow anyone to treat me like one."
to: Muž povedal: „Nie som amatér, takže nedovolím nikomu, aby sa ku mne správal ako k jednému.“

from: The man said: "I was sure that I knew what I was doing and did not need to read the instructions."
to: Muž povedal: „Bol som si istý, že viem, čo robím, a nemusel som čítať pokyny.“

from: The man said: "Every step I took radiated an inner assurance."
to: Muž povedal: „Každý krok, ktorý som urobil, vyžaroval vnútornú istotu.“

from: The man said: "I felt better when they came over."
to: Muž povedal: „Cítil som sa lepšie, keď prišli.“

from: The man said: "I always agreed with others' opinions, even when I had a different viewpoint, just to avoid confrontation or disagreement."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som súhlasil s názormi ostatných, aj keď som mal iný názor, len aby som sa vyhol konfrontácii alebo nezhodám.“

from: The man said: "I like to have deep and meaningful conversations."
to: Muž povedal: „Rád vediem hlboké a zmysluplné rozhovory.“

from: The man said: "I got mad because their food looked tastier."
to: Muž povedal: „Zbláznil som sa, pretože ich jedlo vyzeralo chutnejšie.“

from: The man said: "I could not open the jar so I asked my friend to do it."
to: Muž povedal: „Nemohol som otvoriť nádobu, tak som požiadal svojho priateľa, aby to urobil.“

from: The man said: "I paid for the whole family dinner."
to: Muž povedal: „Zaplatil som za celú rodinnú večeru.“

from: The man said: "Working as a senior scientist in a research laboratory, I maintained a high level of professionalism and rigor in conducting experiments and analyzing data."
to: Muž povedal: „Pracoval som ako vedúci vedec vo výskumnom laboratóriu a udržiaval som vysokú úroveň profesionality a prísnosti pri vykonávaní experimentov a analýze údajov.“

from: The man said: "I never had trouble with others not respecting me."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy som nemal problémy s ostatnými, ktorí ma nerešpektujú.“

from: The woman said: "Every step I took radiated an inner assurance."
to: Žena povedala: „Každý krok, ktorý som urobil, vyžaroval vnútornú istotu.“

from: The woman said: "I have always led an active life."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som viedla aktívny život.“

from: The woman said: "Keeping the office clean is my priority."
to: Žena povedala: „Udržiavať kanceláriu v čistote je mojou prioritou.“

from: The woman said: "I was focused on making money when the kids were little."
to: Žena povedala: „Zameriavala som sa na zarábanie peňazí, keď boli deti malé.“

from: The woman said: "If I needed to feel better, I wouldn't have a problem undergoing some surgical procedure."
to: Žena povedala: „Keby som sa potrebovala cítiť lepšie, nemala by som problém podstúpiť nejaký chirurgický zákrok.“

from: The woman said: "I didn't need your help, I knew that I could do it by myself."
to: Žena povedala: „Nepotrebovala som tvoju pomoc, vedela som, že to zvládnem sama.“

from: The woman said: "I was happy when I received the invitation."
to: Žena povedala: „Bola som šťastná, keď som dostala pozvanie.“

from: The woman said: "I made impulsive decisions while under stress."
to: Žena povedala: „Urobila som impulzívne rozhodnutia, keď som bola v strese.“

from: The woman said: "They are convinced that I was only looking for sex."
to: Žena povedala: „Sú presvedčení, že som hľadal iba sex.“

from: The woman said: "I demanded constant attention."
to: Žena povedala: „Požadovala som neustálu pozornosť.“

from: The woman said: "I went into the woods even though there were bears roaming around."
to: Žena povedala: „Vošla som do lesa, aj keď sa okolo potulovali medvede.“

from: The woman said: "I got mad because their food looked tastier."
to: Žena povedala: „Zbláznil som sa, pretože ich jedlo vyzeralo chutnejšie.“

from: The woman said: "Why would I have to be careful?"
to: Žena povedala: „Prečo by som mala byť opatrná?“

from: The woman said: "I was not afraid of my image being tarnished."
to: Žena povedala: „Nebála som sa, že môj obraz bude poškvrnený.“

from: The woman said: "I am ready to make this country a better place."
to: Žena povedala: „Som pripravená urobiť túto krajinu lepším miestom.“

from: The woman said: "I carefully reviewed the product specifications before buying it."
to: Žena povedala: „Pred zakúpením som starostlivo preskúmala špecifikácie produktu.“

from: The woman said: "I did not need to hire a moving company, I just did it myself."
to: Žena povedala: „Nepotrebovala som najať sťahovacia spoločnosť, urobila som to sama.“

from: The woman said: "I didn't ask for a tip."
to: Žena povedala: „Nepožiadala som o tip.“

from: The woman said: "I'm self-assured in my abilities."
to: Žena povedala: „Som sebavedomá vo svojich schopnostiach.“

from: The woman said: "I assessed the weather forecast before the trip to avoid any potentionally dangerous situations."
to: Žena povedala: „Pred cestou som posúdil predpoveď počasia, aby som sa vyhol potenciálne nebezpečným situáciám.“

from: The woman said: "I said yes even thought I didn't want to do it."
to: Žena povedala: „Povedala som áno, dokonca som si myslela, že to nechcem urobiť.“

from: The woman said: "I never had trouble with others not respecting me."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy som nemala problémy s ostatnými, ktorí ma nerešpektujú.“

from: The woman said: "I looked good in the swimming suit as well as in formal wear."
to: Žena povedala: „Vyzerala som dobre v plavkách aj vo formálnom oblečení.“

from: The woman said: "I could handle those drunk idiots if I wanted to."
to: Žena povedala: „Zvládla by som tých opitých idiotov, keby som chcela.“

from: The woman said: "They were freaking out at that concert."
to: Žena povedala: „Na tom koncerte boli vystrašení.“

from: The woman said: "I stepped into the arena with a brave face and no fear in my heart."
to: Žena povedala: „Vstúpila som do arény s odvážnou tvárou a bez strachu v srdci.“

from: The woman said: "I never liked it when someone told me how to lead my company."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy sa mi nepáčilo, keď mi niekto povedal, ako viesť moju spoločnosť.“

from: The woman said: "I cried after leaving the office."
to: Žena povedala: „Plakala som po odchode z kancelárie.“

from: The woman said: "I am no amateur, so I will not allow anyone to treat me like one."
to: Žena povedala: „Nie som amatér, takže nedovolím nikomu, aby sa ku mne správal ako k jednému.“

from: The woman said: "Clad in leather armor, I ventured into the dark dungeon."
to: Žena povedala: „Obložená v koženom brnení, pustila som sa do tmavého žalára.“

from: The woman said: "I've been an adrenaline seeker my whole life."
to: Žena povedala: „Celý život som hľadala adrenalín.“

from: The woman said: "I could outdrink you so easily."
to: Žena povedala: „Mohol by som ťa tak ľahko prepiť.“

from: The woman said: "I could never fully commit to my partner."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy som sa nemohol úplne zaviazať svojmu partnerovi.“

from: The woman said: "I offered you a ride, no need to worry."
to: Žena povedala: „Ponúkol som ti jazdu, netreba sa báť.“

from: The woman said: "I used to watch a lot of documentaries about esoteric stuff."
to: Žena povedala: „Pozerala som veľa dokumentárnych filmov o ezoterických veciach.“

from: The woman said: "I felt better when they came over."
to: Žena povedala: „Cítil som sa lepšie, keď prišli.“

from: The woman said: "I've never been afraid of other people's talk."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy som sa nebála rozprávania iných ľudí.“

from: The woman said: "I worked diligently and pursued career opportunities that allowed me to earn a stable income, ensuring financial security for my family."
to: Žena povedala: „Pracovala som usilovne a sledovala kariérne príležitosti, ktoré mi umožnili zarobiť stabilný príjem a zabezpečiť finančnú istotu pre moju rodinu.“

from: The woman said: "I had a meeting with foreign sponsors."
to: Žena povedala: „Mala som stretnutie so zahraničnými sponzormi.“

from: The woman said: "I'm naturally assertive and dominant."
to: Žena povedala: „Som prirodzene asertívna a dominantná.“

from: The woman said: "I could not open the jar so I asked my friend to do it."
to: Žena povedala: „Nemohla som otvoriť nádobu, tak som požiadala svojho priateľa, aby to urobil.“

from: The woman said: "I didn't need any help and carried the washing machine up the stairs alone."
to: Žena povedala: „Nepotrebovala som žiadnu pomoc a pračku som niesla hore po schodoch sama.“

from: The woman said: "Although I was freezing, I gave the child my coat."
to: Žena povedala: „Aj keď som mrzla, dala som dieťaťu kabát.“

from: The woman said: "I fell but it didn't hurt me at all."
to: Žena povedala: „Padla som, ale vôbec mi to neublížilo.“

from: The woman said: "I think I always looked naturally good in photos."
to: Žena povedala: „Myslím, že na fotografiách som vždy vyzerala prirodzene dobre.“

from: The woman said: "They told me I should be kinder."
to: Žena povedala: „Povedali mi, že by som mala byť láskavejšia.“

from: The woman said: "I like it when I can show others who's the boss."
to: Žena povedala: „Páči sa mi, keď môžem ukázať ostatným, kto je šéf.“

from: The woman said: "Would you like some help with that technical task?"
to: Žena povedala: „Chceli by ste pomôcť s touto technickou úlohou?“

from: The woman said: "I am open to any challenge."
to: Žena povedala: „Som otvorená akejkoľvek výzve.“

from: The woman said: "I like it, when I'm home alone and I can cook for everybody without any interruption."
to: Žena povedala: „Páči sa mi, keď som doma sama a môžem variť pre všetkých bez prerušenia.“

from: The woman said: "I donated my time and skills to mentor a young student."
to: Žena povedala: „Darovala som svoj čas a zručnosti mentorovaniu mladého študenta.“

from: The woman said: "I don't like it when I have to leave home knowing that the dishwasher is loaded."
to: Žena povedala: „Nepáči sa mi, keď musím odísť z domu s vedomím, že umývačka riadu je nabitá.“

from: The woman said: "As a team leader, I communicated the goals clearly."
to: Žena povedala: „Ako vedúca tímu som jasne komunikovala ciele.“

from: The woman said: "I unpacked the sacks of cement from the train."
to: Žena povedala: „Vybalila som vrecia cementu z vlaku.“

from: The woman said: "I spent almost two hours on the phone with them."
to: Žena povedala: „Strávil som s nimi takmer dve hodiny na telefóne.“

from: The woman said: "I always agreed with others' opinions, even when I had a different viewpoint, just to avoid confrontation or disagreement."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som súhlasila s názormi ostatných, aj keď som mala iný názor, len aby som sa vyhol konfrontácii alebo nezhodám.“

from: The woman said: "I always had a lot of sexual fantasies."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som mala veľa sexuálnych fantázií.“

from: The woman said: "I attended a festival and made a lot of new friends and acquaintances."
to: Žena povedala: „Zúčastnila som sa festivalu a vytvorila som veľa nových priateľov a známych.“

from: The woman said: "I threw the medicine ball the farthest out of all the competitors."
to: Žena povedala: „Vyhodila som medicinbal najďalej zo všetkých súťažiacich.“

from: The woman said: "You are really good at technical subjects."
to: Žena povedala: „Ste naozaj dobrý v technických predmetoch.“

from: The woman said: "I'd like to be a firefighter someday."
to: Žena povedala: „Jedného dňa by som chcela byť hasičom.“

from: The woman said: "The last time I watched a horror movie, I couldn't sleep at night because I was too scared."
to: Žena povedala: „Keď som naposledy sledovala horor, nemohla som v noci spať, pretože som sa príliš bála.“

from: The woman said: "I was the dominant one in our relationship."
to: Žena povedala: „Bola som dominantná v našom vzťahu.“

from: The woman said: "I always had a high self-esteem when it comes to sex."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som mala vysokú sebaúctu, pokiaľ ide o sex.“

from: The woman said: "I have always tried to get to know my employees so that I can create the right conditions for them."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som sa snažila spoznať svojich zamestnancov, aby som pre nich mohla vytvoriť správne podmienky.“

from: The woman said: "I always prefered wearing a suit to my workplace."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som radšej nosila oblek na svoje pracovisko.“

from: The woman said: "I liked doing it, because it was dangerous."
to: Žena povedala: „Rád som to robil, pretože to bolo nebezpečné.“

from: The woman said: "I'm the head of this family so I believe I had to cover our basic needs, such as food, shelter and clothing."
to: Žena povedala: „Som hlavou tejto rodiny, takže verím, že som musela pokryť naše základné potreby, ako je jedlo, prístrešie a oblečenie.“

from: The woman said: "I didn't want to be dependent on someone."
to: Žena povedala: „Nechcela som byť na niekom závislá.“

from: The woman said: "I was behind the steering wheel."
to: Žena povedala: „Bol som za volantom.“

from: The woman said: "I couldn't be a soldier, no one would be afraid of me."
to: Žena povedala: „Nemohla som byť vojakom, nikto by sa ma nebál.“

from: The woman said: "I am always happy to listen to constructive criticism."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som rád, že počúvam konštruktívnu kritiku.“

from: The woman said: "I consistently sought permission or validation from others before making decisions."
to: Žena povedala: „Pred rozhodnutím som dôsledne hľadala povolenie alebo potvrdenie od ostatných.“

from: The woman said: "I was sure that I knew what I was doing and did not need to read the instructions."
to: Žena povedala: „Bola som si istá, že viem, čo robím, a nemusím čítať pokyny.“

from: The woman said: "I like mathematics and physics because numbers are always right."
to: Žena povedala: „Mám rád matematiku a fyziku, pretože čísla sú vždy správne.“

from: The woman said: "I always felt like a natural leader."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som sa cítila ako prirodzený vodca.“

from: The woman said: "As I plunged into the cold water, I swam with effortless strokes."
to: Žena povedala: „Keď som sa ponorila do studenej vody, plávala som bez námahy.“

from: The woman said: "I washed my hands so often that I completely ruined my skin."
to: Žena povedala: „Umyla som si ruky tak často, že som si úplne zničila pokožku.“

from: The woman said: "I like to give young people a chance."
to: Žena povedala: „Rád dávam mladým ľuďom šancu.“

from: The woman said: "I could totally imagine myself in their position."
to: Žena povedala: „Dokázala som si úplne predstaviť seba v ich pozícii.“

from: The woman said: "She was upset when she discovered that she had a tumor but I kept reassuring her everything would be alright."
to: Žena povedala: „Bola naštvaná, keď zistila, že má nádor, ale stále som ju upokojoval, že všetko bude v poriadku.“

from: The woman said: "I focused on regular dusting, vacuuming, and wiping surfaces to maintain cleanliness and hygiene in my home."
to: Žena povedala: „Zamerala som sa na pravidelné poprašovanie, vysávanie a utieranie povrchov, aby som udržala čistotu a hygienu v mojom dome.“

from: The woman said: "I felt so beautiful."
to: Žena povedala: „Cítil som sa tak krásny.“

from: The woman said: "I took the car to the repair shop for a regular check-up."
to: Žena povedala: „Vzala som auto do opravovne na pravidelnú kontrolu.“

from: The woman said: "I helped my little cousin with his math assignment."
to: Žena povedala: „Pomohla som svojmu malému bratrancovi s jeho matematickou úlohou.“

from: The woman said: "I built everything with my own hands and brain."
to: Žena povedala: „Všetko som postavil vlastnými rukami a mozgom.“

from: The woman said: "I redid my nail polish."
to: Žena povedala: „Prerobil som si lak na nechty.“

from: The woman said: "I was in love, so I didn't listen to them."
to: Žena povedala: „Bola som zamilovaná, takže som ich nepočúvala.“

from: The woman said: "Working as a senior scientist in a research laboratory, I maintained a high level of professionalism and rigor in conducting experiments and analyzing data."
to: Žena povedala: „Pracovala som ako vedúca vedkyňa vo výskumnom laboratóriu a udržiavala som vysokú úroveň profesionality a prísnosti pri vykonávaní experimentov a analýze údajov.“

from: The woman said: "As a financial planner, I analyzed clients' financial goals, developed customized investment strategies, and provided ongoing guidance."
to: Žena povedala: „Ako finančný plánovač som analyzovala finančné ciele klientov, vyvinula prispôsobené investičné stratégie a poskytovala priebežné usmernenie.“

from: The woman said: "I pursued a higher-paying job opportunity to increase our family's income ."
to: Žena povedala: „Využila som vyššiu platenú pracovnú príležitosť, aby som zvýšila príjem našej rodiny.“

from: The woman said: "I entered an amateur weightlifting competition."
to: Žena povedala: „Zúčastnila som sa amatérskej súťaže vo vzpieraní.“

from: The woman said: "People often commented on my good looks, so I knew that I had attractive features."
to: Žena povedala: „Ľudia často komentovali môj dobrý vzhľad, takže som vedela, že mám atraktívne vlastnosti.“

from: The woman said: "I paid for the whole family dinner."
to: Žena povedala: „Zaplatil som za celú rodinnú večeru.“

from: The woman said: "I was never jealous of anyone because that would only be proof of my lack of confidence."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy som na nikoho nežiarlila, pretože by to bol len dôkaz mojej nedôvery.“

from: The woman said: "Sorry about the mess, I didn’t get a chance to clean it up."
to: Žena povedala: „Prepáč za ten neporiadok, nedostala som šancu ho vyčistiť.“

from: The woman said: "When the weather is bad outside, I tend to be moodier."
to: Žena povedala: „Keď je vonku zlé počasie, mám tendenciu byť náladovejší.“

from: The woman said: "I like to have deep and meaningful conversations."
to: Žena povedala: „Rád vediem hlboké a zmysluplné rozhovory.“

from: The woman said: "I lacked the emotional strength to handle a stressful situation, feeling overwhelmed and vulnerable."
to: Žena povedala: „Chýbala mi emocionálna sila zvládnuť stresovú situáciu, cítiť sa ohromená a zraniteľná.“

from: The woman said: "Covered in dirt and sweat, I labored in the scorching sun."
to: Žena povedala: „Pokryté špinou a potom som pracovala na horiacom slnku.“

from: I did not want to help with housework because it was boring.
to: Nechcel som pomáhať s domácimi prácami, pretože to bolo nudné.

from: I couldn’t set up a business, I need a boss to tell me what to do.
to: Nemohol som založiť firmu, potrebujem šéfa, ktorý mi povie, čo mám robiť.

from: I felt adrenaline coursing through my veins.
to: Cítil som adrenalín, ktorý mi preteká žilami.

from: I was in the middle of changing the sheets when they came.
to: Bol som uprostred výmeny plachiet, keď prišli.

from: As the supervisor, I fostered an inclusive environment.
to: Ako vedúci som podporovali inkluzívne prostredie.

from: I had difficulty managing conflicts, resorting to name-calling and shouting.
to: Mal som problémy zvládať konflikty, uchýliť sa k volaniu mien a kričaniu.

from: I used to do 100 push ups every morning.
to: Kedysi som robil 100 push upov každé ráno.

from: I paid a babysitter so that I would have someone to be with my children while I am at work.
to: Zaplatil som opatrovateľku, aby som mal niekoho, kto by bol so svojimi deťmi, keď som v práci.

from: I have been to a fortune teller and have been afraid to leave the house ever since.
to: Bol som u veštkyne a odvtedy som sa bál opustiť dom.

from: I pushed through the demanding workout, feeling the burn in my muscles as I embraced the physical challenge.
to: Pretlačil som náročný tréning a cítil som popáleniny v svaloch, keď som prijal fyzickú výzvu.

from: I bought new badges made by people with mental disabilities.
to: Kúpil som si nové odznaky od ľudí s mentálnym postihnutím.

from: I was always the one that took the responsibility for the group.
to: Vždy som bol ten, kto prevzal zodpovednosť za skupinu.

from: At one point I was even considering modelling.
to: V jednej chvíli som dokonca uvažoval o modelovaní.

from: Their phone was really old, so I gave them a new one.
to: Ich telefón bol naozaj starý, tak som im dal nový.

from: I have to shower at least three times a day or I feel dirty.
to: Musím sa sprchovať aspoň trikrát denne, inak sa cítim špinavý.

from: I sprained my muscle trying to lift the carpet.
to: Vymkla som si sval a snažila sa zdvihnúť koberec.

from: In the past, I've been told that I was the epitome of strength because I had a muscular body.
to: V minulosti mi bolo povedané, že som stelesnením sily, pretože som mal svalnaté telo.

from: I put on my hard hat and picked up the jackhammer.
to: Nasadil som si klobúk a zdvihol zbíjačka.

from: I didn't leave my room all weekend because I was playing computer games.
to: Celý víkend som neopustil svoju izbu, pretože som hral počítačové hry.

from: When I was sad, I would browse eshops and buy things I did not need, then proceeded to return them when they arrived.
to: Keď som bol smutný, prehliadal som eshopy a kupoval som veci, ktoré som nepotreboval, a potom som ich vrátil, keď prišli.

from: I was trying to talk to her, because I saw, that she was upset about something.
to: Snažil som sa s ňou hovoriť, pretože som videl, že je z niečoho naštvaná.

from: I was frequently sought after as a date or companion because my good looks made me an appealing choice, and I was happy.
to: Často som bol vyhľadávaný ako rande alebo spoločník, pretože môj dobrý vzhľad zo mňa urobil príťažlivú voľbu a bol som šťastný.

from: I had to work hard because my family relied on the money I made.
to: Musel som tvrdo pracovať, pretože moja rodina sa spoliehala na peniaze, ktoré som zarobil.

from: I always loved mathematics.
to: Vždy som miloval matematiku.

from: Once I stepped into the room I could feel the bad energy.

to: Nikdy som nebral slová nahnevaných ľudí osobne.

from: I love to do things intuitively.
to: Rád robím veci intuitívne.

from: I put myself in the shoes of a coworker who made a mistake, offering understanding and encouragement instead of criticism or judgment.
to: Vložil som sa do kože spolupracovníka, ktorý urobil chybu a namiesto kritiky alebo úsudku ponúkol porozumenie a povzbudenie.

from: To take care of my family's well-being, it required a lot of determination and strong will.
to: Aby som sa postaral o blaho mojej rodiny, vyžadovalo to veľa odhodlania a silnej vôle.

from: I like to experiment in bed.
to: Rád experimentujem v posteli.

from: I realised that in critical situations one has to think that every problem has a solution.
to: Uvedomil som si, že v kritických situáciách si človek musí myslieť, že každý problém má riešenie.

from: If I didn't earn enough, my family wouldn't have anything to eat.
to: Keby som nezarábal dosť, moja rodina by nemala čo jesť.

from: They came to me and told me I inspired them to take steps for their future careers.
to: Prišli ku mne a povedali mi, že som ich inšpiroval, aby podnikli kroky pre ich budúcu kariéru.

from: I mended the window easily.
to: Okno som ľahko opravil.

from: I am strong, I can lift very heavy objects.
to: Som silný, môžem zdvíhať veľmi ťažké predmety.

from: Everyone always tells me to be quiet.
to: Každý mi vždy hovorí, aby som bol ticho.

from: I feel confident most of the time so it came naturally to me to be a leader.
to: Väčšinu času sa cítim sebavedomo, takže mi prišlo prirodzené byť lídrom.

from: I'm afraid that if I am more assertive, people will think me unkind.
to: Obávam sa, že ak budem asertívnejší, ľudia ma budú považovať za neláskavého.

from: I like to create a harmonious environment for my family.
to: Rád vytváram harmonické prostredie pre svoju rodinu.

from: The roar of the engine filled the air as I maneuvered the powerful motorcycle through the winding roads.
to: Hrev motora naplnil vzduch, keď som manévroval silný motocykel cez kľukaté cesty.

from: As a role model for integrity and accountability, I inspired those around me to do the same.
to: Ako vzor integrity a zodpovednosti som inšpiroval ľudí okolo seba, aby urobili to isté.

from: I had a huge Marvel poster in my room.
to: V izbe som mal obrovský plagát Marvel.

from: I would like to have a big family in the future so that we always have a full and noisy house.
to: Chcel by som mať v budúcnosti veľkú rodinu, aby sme mali vždy plný a hlučný dom.

from: I showed diligence in my commitment to self-improvement and a willingness to learn from others.
to: Preukázal som usilovnosť vo svojom záväzku k sebazlepšovaniu a ochotu učiť sa od ostatných.

from: I kept the discussions at work focused and productive.
to: Diskusie v práci som udržiaval sústredenú a produktívnu.

from: I told them not to bring the scissors, because I could easily rip it off.
to: Povedal som im, aby nepriniesli nožnice, pretože som ich mohol ľahko odtrhnúť.

from: I don't keep my money in a safe, because robbers don't scare me.
to: Nechávam svoje peniaze v trezore, pretože lupiči ma nevystraší.

from: I tried to solve a complex math problem, but my mathematical skills were weak.
to: Snažil som sa vyriešiť zložitý matematický problém, ale moje matematické schopnosti boli slabé.

from: When I was at university, I preferred to sit in the corner, where nobody could notice me.
to: Keď som bol na univerzite, radšej som sedel v rohu, kde si ma nikto nevšimol.

from: I could never have a pet, they are just too dirty.
to: Nikdy by som nemohol mať domáceho maznáčika, sú príliš špinavé.

from: I took care of their pets so they could have a nice weekend.
to: Staral som sa o ich domácich miláčikov, aby mohli mať pekný víkend.

from: I hated how rude they were, but I didn't say anything.
to: Nenávidel som, aké sú hrubé, ale nič som nepovedal.

from: I am the breadwinner of this family.
to: Som živiteľom tejto rodiny.

from: I would not mind paying for plastic surgery.
to: Nevadí mi platiť za plastickú chirurgiu.

from: I wanted to kill the deer myself.
to: Chcel som zabiť jelene sám.

from: I didn't want them, because they were prudish.
to: Nechcel som ich, pretože boli prudérne.

from: I try to be an inspiring and motivating boss.
to: Snažím sa byť inšpirujúcim a motivujúcim šéfom.

from: I wanted to dig up the treasure, but I needed more people.
to: Chcel som vykopať poklad, ale potreboval som viac ľudí.

from: I used a budgeting app to track my expenses.
to: Na sledovanie svojich výdavkov som použil aplikáciu na zostavenie rozpočtu.

from: I was good at analyzing situations objectively and coming up with practical solutions.
to: Bol som dobrý v objektívnej analýze situácií a prichádzaní s praktickými riešeniami.

from: I led volunteering teams, coordinating efforts and motivating others to join in.
to: Viedol som dobrovoľnícke tímy, koordinoval som úsilie a motivoval ostatných, aby sa pripojili.

from: I always said that sex is very important for me.
to: Vždy som hovoril, že sex je pre mňa veľmi dôležitý.

from: I volunteered at a local fundraising event, interacting with attendees.
to: Prihlásil som sa ako dobrovoľník na miestnom fundraisingovom podujatí a komunikoval som s účastníkmi.

from: I was assertive and it paid off.
to: Bol som asertívny a vyplatilo sa to.

from: I let them take advantage of my kindness.
to: Nechal som ich využiť moju láskavosť.

from: I decided that even though I was working a lot, I would try to spend as much time as possible with my son.
to: Rozhodol som sa, že aj keď veľa pracujem, pokúsim sa tráviť čo najviac času so svojím synom.

from: I was trying so hard to be a good partner, but sometimes things didn't work out.
to: Snažil som sa byť dobrým partnerom, ale niekedy to nevyšlo.

from: I was keen to avoid any mistakes in the production process.
to: Chcel som sa vyhnúť akýmkoľvek chybám vo výrobnom procese.

from: I studied at a prestigious university abroad.
to: Študoval som na prestížnej univerzite v zahraničí.

from: I preferred to dress in neutral colours, so I didn't stand out from the crowd.
to: Radšej som sa obliekala v neutrálnych farbách, takže som nevyčnievala z davu.

from: People often commented on my great body.
to: Ľudia často komentovali moje veľké telo.

from: I wished they wouldn't talk about conspiracy theories.
to: Prial som si, aby nehovorili o konšpiračných teóriách.

from: I get sad whenever I have to leave the house and leave the dog alone.
to: Som smutný vždy, keď musím opustiť dom a nechať psa na pokoji.

from: I didn't spend enough time with my kids when they were little because I was at work all the time.
to: Nestrávil som dosť času so svojimi deťmi, keď boli malé, pretože som bol stále v práci.

from: Although I worked as a manager, they often attacked my appearance.
to: Aj keď som pracoval ako manažér, často útočili na môj vzhľad.

from: I went bushcrafting into the forest and spent 4 night there.
to: Išiel som do lesa a strávil som tam 4 noci.

from: I always take two steps back after I see black cat cross the street.
to: Vždy urobím dva kroky späť, keď vidím čiernu mačku prechádzať cez ulicu.

from: I’m no beginner to be annoyed because of little things like that.
to: Nie som začiatočník, ktorý by som bol naštvaný kvôli takýmto maličkosti.

from: I cried myself to sleep.
to: Plakala som, aby som spala.

from: They were fighting so I came there and told them to stop.
to: Bojovali, tak som tam prišiel a povedal im, aby prestali.

from: Am I tender enough?
to: Som dosť citlivý?

from: I was frustrated when I was unable to satisfy my sexual needs.
to: Bol som frustrovaný, keď som nebol schopný uspokojiť svoje sexuálne potreby.

from: When I was young, I was emotional too.
to: Keď som bol mladý, bol som tiež emotívny.

from: I had a suit tailored to me.
to: Mal som oblek šitý na mieru pre mňa.

from: I told them to follow me.
to: Povedal som im, aby ma nasledovali.

from: I’m good at combining colours and patterns on clothes.
to: Som dobrý v kombinovaní farieb a vzorov na oblečení.

from: I went to a sex show in Amsterdam.
to: Išiel som na sexuálnu show v Amsterdame.

from: I had a big wedding with many guests.
to: Mal som veľkú svadbu s mnohými hosťami.

from: I earned enough money for us to go to Malta.
to: Zarobil som dosť peňazí na to, aby sme mohli ísť na Maltu.

from: When I didn't get what I wanted, I was angry.
to: Keď som nedostal to, čo som chcel, bol som nahnevaný.

from: I was the class president.
to: Bol som predsedom triedy.

from: I joined a local community organization and actively participated in their events.
to: Pripojil som sa k miestnej komunitnej organizácii a aktívne som sa zúčastňoval na ich podujatiach.

from: I spent an hour trying to take a perfect selfie.
to: Strávil som hodinu snahou urobiť perfektnú selfie.

from: I had to take that opportunity, even if there was a risk of losing money.
to: Musel som využiť túto príležitosť, aj keď hrozilo riziko straty peňazí.

from: I trusted the scientific report.
to: Dôveroval som vedeckej správe.

from: I spent a lot of money on cosmetics.
to: Strávil som veľa peňazí na kozmetiku.

from: I caught myself in the reflection of a storefront window and couldn't help but admire my own good looks.
to: Chytil som sa v odraze výkladného okna a nemohol som si pomôcť, ale obdivovať svoj vlastný dobrý vzhľad.

from: I couldn't control my frustration.
to: Nedokázal som ovládať svoju frustráciu.

from: I avoided expressing my true emotions or concerns, fearing that it would upset or displease others.
to: Vyhýbal som sa vyjadreniu svojich skutočných emócií alebo obáv, pretože som sa obával, že by to rozrušilo alebo nespokojilo ostatných.

from: Breaking through concrete and bricks, I embraced the rough physicality of the demolition job.
to: Prelomením betónu a tehál som prijal drsnú fyzičnosť demolačných prácach.

from: I invited my colleague for lunch.
to: Pozval som kolegu na obed.

from: I overexerted myself.
to: Preťažil som sa.

from: I aired the room, because it smelled bad.
to: Vysielal som miestnosť, pretože to vonia zle.

from: I never wanted to be in the center of attention.
to: Nikdy som nechcel byť v centre pozornosti.

from: I have deep and meaningful connections with others because I can be emphathetic.
to: Mám hlboké a zmysluplné vzťahy s ostatnými, pretože môžem byť dôrazný.

from: I work out to look good.
to: Pracujem, aby som vyzeral dobre.

from: I asked them if I could come along.
to: Spýtal som sa ich, či by som mohol prísť.

from: They did not have their favourite ice cream, so I took the bus to the store outside of the town.
to: Nemali svoju obľúbenú zmrzlinu, tak som išiel autobusom do obchodu mimo mesta.

from: I tried to radiate confidence and charisma on a banket last week, did you notice?
to: Minulý týždeň som sa snažil vyžarovať dôveru a charizmu na banketu, všimli ste si?

from: I approached challenges with a clear and rational mindset.
to: K výzvam som pristupoval s jasným a racionálnym zmýšľaním.

from: I broke my arm, but I finished the marathon.
to: Zlomil som si ruku, ale maratón som dokončil.

from: I used to manifest every day so that good things would happen to me.
to: Každý deň som sa prejavoval, aby sa mi stali dobré veci.

from: I paid for another porn channel.
to: Zaplatil som za iný porno kanál.

from: I should clean my office.
to: Mal by som si vyčistiť kanceláriu.

from: I have given my children the best I could.
to: Dal som svojim deťom to najlepšie, čo som mohol.

from: I participated in a sprint race, but my legs grew weak towards the end.
to: Zúčastnil som sa pretekov sprintu, ale ku koncu mi slabli nohy.

from: I was never camera-shy.
to: Nikdy som sa nehanbil kamerou.

from: I'm always ready to have sex.
to: Som vždy pripravený mať sex.

to: Pri každom hodenom údere a vykonaní bloku som cítil, ako cez mňa preniká sila.

from: My mind was set - I got married despite everyone being against it.
to: Moja myseľ bola nastavená - oženil som sa napriek tomu, že všetci boli proti.

from: I invited strangers to our table, and it made a very good group of people.
to: Pozval som cudzincov k nášmu stolu a urobilo to veľmi dobrú skupinu ľudí.

from: I'm an expert in my field.
to: Som odborník vo svojom odbore.

from: I should be thoughtful, because that's what's expected of me.
to: Mal by som byť pozorný, pretože to sa odo mňa očakáva.

from: As a pilot, I ensured the safety of passengers and crew by adhering to rigorous protocols.
to: Ako pilot som zabezpečoval bezpečnosť cestujúcich a posádky dodržiavaním prísnych protokolov.

from: I always wanted to be a researcher, but I wouldn't have time to take care of my family.
to: Vždy som chcel byť výskumníkom, ale nemal by som čas starať sa o svoju rodinu.

from: I learned how to drive before I was even allowed to.
to: Naučil som sa šoférovať skôr, ako mi to vôbec bolo dovolené.

from: I have always felt that childcare was my life goal.
to: Vždy som cítil, že starostlivosť o deti je môj životný cieľ.

from: On the way home I talked to an elderly lady on the train.
to: Cestou domov som sa rozprával so staršou dámou vo vlaku.

from: I have worked hard to get to where I am today.
to: Tvrdo som pracoval, aby som sa dostal tam, kde som dnes.

from: I went to buy new sponges, these were too dirty.
to: Išiel som kúpiť nové špongie, tie boli príliš špinavé.

from: Sorry, I could have come but I was having a really bad hair day.
to: Prepáč, mohla som prísť, ale mala som naozaj zlý deň vlasov.

from: I am able to see the big picture of where the organisation is heading.
to: Vidím celkový obraz toho, kam organizácia smeruje.

from: Every step reflected the confidence I held within, captivating the onlookers with my magnetic presence.
to: Každý krok odrážal dôveru, ktorú som v sebe držal, a zaujal divákov mojou magnetickou prítomnosťou.

from: I could not cook because it was my mother's job.
to: Nemohol som variť, pretože to bola práca mojej matky.

from: I have a habit of going along with what other people want.
to: Mám vo zvyku ísť spolu s tým, čo chcú iní ľudia.

from: I have never been a loner, I prefer to be surrounded by people.
to: Nikdy som nebol samotár, radšej som obklopený ľuďmi.

from: I was always first picked when playing any sports back in highschool.
to: Vždy som bol prvýkrát vybraný, keď som hral akýkoľvek šport na strednej škole.

from: I thought that confidence is the key aspect of having a healthy and successful life.
to: Myslel som si, že dôvera je kľúčovým aspektom zdravého a úspešného života.

from: I never had a problem with learning a new language.
to: Nikdy som nemal problém s učením sa nového jazyka.

from: I first weighted all the possible scenarios.
to: Najprv som zvážil všetky možné scenáre.

from: I like to just smile at someone because I believe it will make their day better.
to: Rád sa na niekoho usmievam, pretože verím, že im to zlepší deň.

from: I had to carry the logs all on my own, but it was fine.
to: Musel som nosiť guľatinu sám, ale bolo to v poriadku.

from: I was raised to know how to take care of others.
to: Bol som vychovaný, aby som vedel, ako sa starať o ostatných.

from: My friend is always making me laugh.
to: Môj priateľ ma vždy rozosmeje.

from: I couldn't keep up with the intense workout routine, my body feeling weak and exhausted from the exertion.
to: Nedokázal som držať krok s intenzívnym cvičením, moje telo sa cítilo slabé a vyčerpané z námahy.

from: I never let my family affect my profession.
to: Nikdy som nedovolil, aby moja rodina ovplyvnila moju profesiu.

from: I didn't like our sex, but I didn't say anything.
to: Nemal som rád náš sex, ale nič som nepovedal.

from: If you weren't with me, god knows how it'd end.
to: Keby si nebol so mnou, Boh vie, ako by to skončilo.

from: I had enough romance, I wanted something more intimate.
to: Mal som dosť romantiky, chcel som niečo intímnejšie.

from: I hoped I had been a pleasant companion.
to: Dúfal som, že som bol príjemným spoločníkom.

from: I wished the gig would never end, there were so many nice people everywhere.
to: Prial som si, aby koncert nikdy neskončil, všade bolo toľko milých ľudí.

from: I would never be able to cheat.
to: Nikdy by som nedokázal podvádzať.

from: I didn't need your financial help!
to: Nepotreboval som vašu finančnú pomoc!

from: I divided the tasks equally among all the team members.
to: Úlohy som rozdelil rovnomerne medzi všetkých členov tímu.

from: Some people hate accessories, but I like wearing them.
to: Niektorí ľudia nenávidia doplnky, ale rád ich nosím.

from: When I was little, I wanted to be an athlete, but my parents signed me up for ballet instead.
to: Keď som bol malý, chcel som byť športovcom, ale moji rodičia ma namiesto toho prihlásili na balet.

from: I stopped the pickpocket and held him until the police came.
to: Zastavil som vreckovku a držal som ho, kým neprišla polícia.

from: I'd rather have everything right away.
to: Radšej by som mal všetko hneď.

from: I didn't want us to sign a prenup, because I'd take care of my partner even after a divorce.
to: Nechcel som, aby sme podpísali predzmluvu, pretože by som sa o svojho partnera staral aj po rozvode.

from: Since I’ve been eating more protein, I feel much stronger.
to: Keďže som jedol viac bielkovín, cítim sa oveľa silnejší.

from: Since I've been doing this sport, I'm much more balanced.
to: Odkedy sa venujem tomuto športu, som oveľa vyváženejší.

from: I filtered out all the distractions.
to: Odfiltroval som všetky rozptýlenia.

from: I'm very competitive when it comes to promotions and performance in the workplace.
to: Som veľmi konkurencieschopný, pokiaľ ide o propagáciu a výkon na pracovisku.

from: I read a book about self-improvement yesterday.
to: Včera som čítal knihu o sebazlepšovaní.

from: I ordered them to stop praying and start helping.
to: Prikázal som im, aby sa prestali modliť a začali pomáhať.

from: I was the first one at the library.
to: Bol som prvý v knižnici.

from: I found a nice picture of myself easily.
to: Ľahko som našiel peknú fotku seba samého.

from: I struggled to strike a balance between my sexual desires and other important aspects of life.
to: Snažil som sa nájsť rovnováhu medzi mojimi sexuálnymi túžbami a ďalšími dôležitými aspektmi života.

from: I always liked dancing.
to: Vždy som rád tancoval.

from: I was just in a meeting.
to: Práve som bol na stretnutí.

from: Finally the beauty catalogue that I ordered has arrived.
to: Nakoniec dorazil katalóg krásy, ktorý som si objednal.

from: If I had been there, the atmosphere would have been better.
to: Keby som tam bol, atmosféra by bola lepšia.

from: For my birthday, I asked to go skydiving.
to: Na moje narodeniny som požiadal o parašutizmus.

from: I would feel incompetent if I paid a cleaning lady.
to: Cítil by som sa neschopný, keby som zaplatil upratovačku.

from: I had this weird feeling, so I called my parents right away to see if they were okay.
to: Mal som taký zvláštny pocit, tak som hneď zavolal rodičom, aby som zistil, či sú v poriadku.

from: I would never allow myself to offend anyone.
to: Nikdy by som si nedovolil nikoho uraziť.

from: I like to read fashion magazines.
to: Rád čítam módne časopisy.

from: I remained composed although the situation escalated.
to: Zostal som zložený, aj keď situácia eskalovala.

from: I went to walk the dogs from the shelter.
to: Išiel som chodiť so psom z útulku.

from: I cleaned the house yesterday and now it's a mess again.
to: Včera som upratal dom a teraz je to opäť neporiadok.

from: I could lift that car if I wanted to.
to: Mohol by som to auto zdvihnúť, keby som chcel.

from: I was just protecting you from other people at that club.
to: Chránil som ťa pred ostatnými ľuďmi v tomto klube.

from: I used to enjoy being able to simply use my smile to achieve things.
to: Užíval som si, že som mohol jednoducho použiť svoj úsmev na dosiahnutie vecí.

from: I came up with a deal: if you vacuum, I'll take you out tonight.
to: Prišiel som s dohodou: ak vysávate, dnes večer vás vezmem von.

from: I could strike up a conversation with almost everybody that evening.
to: Večer by som mohol nadviazať rozhovor s takmer všetkými.

from: I am tired after walking for ten minutes.
to: Som unavený po desiatich minútach chôdze.

from: Don't go there alone, it can be dangerous.
to: Nechoďte tam sami, môže to byť nebezpečné.

from: The storm raged on, but I stood strong on the deck of the ship.
to: Búrka zúrila ďalej, ale ja som stál silno na palube lode.

from: I am very attractive.
to: Som veľmi atraktívny.

from: I was the first one at the clothing store.
to: Bol som prvý v obchode s oblečením.

from: I slammed the door after the argument.
to: Po hádke som zabuchla dvere.

from: I haven't carried cash with me since I was robbed.
to: Nemal som so sebou hotovosť, odkedy ma okradli.

from: That job wasn't meant for me, but for someone stronger.
to: Táto práca nebola určená pre mňa, ale pre niekoho silnejšieho.

from: I didn't need your support.
to: Nepotreboval som tvoju podporu.

from: I like to throw parties for my kids because we always have a house full of people.
to: Rád organizujem večierky pre svoje deti, pretože vždy máme dom plný ľudí.

from: I could easily seduce you at the bar.
to: Ľahko by som ťa mohol zviesť v bare.

from: I took the time to understand and acknowledge the emotions of a colleague who was going through a difficult time.
to: Urobil som si čas na pochopenie a uznanie emócií kolegu, ktorý prežíval ťažké obdobie.

from: It was hard for me to admit that I needed a hand.
to: Bolo pre mňa ťažké priznať si, že potrebujem ruku.

from: I got overwhelmed with sadness.
to: Bol som ohromený smútkom.

from: I never stressed about work responsibilities because I knew that I could handle anything.
to: Nikdy som sa nestresoval o pracovných povinnostiach, pretože som vedel, že zvládnem čokoľvek.

from: When tsunami came, I volunteered to save people from drowning.
to: Keď prišla cunami, dobrovoľne som zachránil ľudí pred utopením.

from: I was aware that bad leadership leads to bad results.
to: Bol som si vedomý, že zlé vedenie vedie k zlým výsledkom.

from: I offered accommodation to two refugees.
to: Ponúkla som ubytovanie dvom utečencom.

from: Despite the criticism I thought I did well.
to: Napriek kritike som si myslel, že sa mi darí dobre.

from: I could not wrap my head around this hard mathematical problem.
to: Nemohol som obísť hlavu týmto ťažkým matematickým problémom.

from: I used to clean the house on every Saturday.
to: Každú sobotu som upratoval dom.

from: I was initially a suspect, but the police determined I was not strong enough to hurt them.
to: Pôvodne som bol podozrivý, ale polícia zistila, že nie som dosť silný na to, aby som im ublížil.

from: I made some extra money as a personal trainer.
to: Ako osobný tréner som zarobil nejaké peniaze navyše.

from: I feel fulfilled when I can take care of everybody in the house.
to: Cítim sa naplnený, keď sa môžem postarať o všetkých v dome.

from: As I effortlessly lifted the heavy box, the surprised expressions on others' faces made me smile.
to: Keď som bez námahy zdvihol ťažkú skrinku, prekvapené výrazy na tvárach ostatných ma rozosmiali.

from: Why did I have to get old?!
to: Prečo som musel zostarnúť?!

from: The man said: "I stopped the pickpocket and held him until the police came."
to: Muž povedal: „Zastavil som vreckár a držal som ho, kým neprišla polícia.“

from: The man said: "I have a habit of going along with what other people want."
to: Muž povedal: „Mám vo zvyku ísť spolu s tým, čo chcú iní ľudia.“

from: The man said: "It was hard for me to admit that I needed a hand."
to: Muž povedal: „Bolo pre mňa ťažké priznať, že potrebujem ruku.“

from: The man said: "I was just in a meeting."
to: Muž povedal: „Bol som práve na stretnutí.“

from: The man said: "I have always felt that childcare was my life goal."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som cítil, že starostlivosť o deti je môj životný cieľ.“

from: The man said: "Why did I have to get old?!"
to: Muž povedal: „Prečo som musel zostarnúť?!“

from: The man said: "I was always first picked when playing any sports back in highschool."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som bol prvýkrát vybraný, keď som hral akýkoľvek šport na strednej škole.“

from: The man said: "Since I’ve been eating more protein, I feel much stronger."
to: Muž povedal: „Odkedy som jedol viac bielkovín, cítim sa oveľa silnejší.“

from: The man said: "I learned how to drive before I was even allowed to."
to: Muž povedal: „Naučil som sa šoférovať skôr, ako mi to bolo dovolené.“

from: The man said: "Some people hate accessories, but I like wearing them."
to: Muž povedal: „Niektorí ľudia nenávidia doplnky, ale rád ich nosím.“

from: The man said: "With each punch thrown and block executed, I could feel the power surging through me."
to: Muž povedal: „Pri každom hodenom údere a vykonaní bloku som cítil, ako cez mňa preniká sila.“

from: The man said: "When I was little, I wanted to be an athlete, but my parents signed me up for ballet instead."
to: Muž povedal: „Keď som bol malý, chcel som byť športovcom, ale moji rodičia ma namiesto toho prihlásili na balet.“

from: The man said: "I am able to see the big picture of where the organisation is heading."
to: Muž povedal: „Som schopný vidieť celkový obraz toho, kam organizácia smeruje.“

from: The man said: "I could easily seduce you at the bar."
to: Muž povedal: „Ľahko by som ťa mohol zviesť v bare.“

from: The man said: "I was raised to know how to take care of others."
to: Muž povedal: „Bol som vychovaný, aby som vedel, ako sa starať o ostatných.“

from: The man said: "I came up with a deal: if you vacuum, I'll take you out tonight."
to: Muž povedal: „Prišiel som s dohodou: ak vysávate, dnes večer vás vezmem von.“

from: The man said: "I like to just smile at someone because I believe it will make their day better."
to: Muž povedal: „Rád sa na niekoho len usmievam, pretože verím, že im to zlepší deň.“

from: The man said: "I invited strangers to our table, and it made a very good group of people."
to: Muž povedal: „Pozval som cudzincov k nášmu stolu a urobilo to veľmi dobrú skupinu ľudí.“

from: The man said: "I always liked dancing."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som rád tancoval.“

from: The man said: "I ordered them to stop praying and start helping."
to: Muž povedal: „Prikázal som im, aby sa prestali modliť a začali pomáhať.“

from: The man said: "I had to work even over Christmas to earn as much money as possible."
to: Muž povedal: „Musel som pracovať aj cez Vianoce, aby som zarobil čo najviac peňazí.“

from: The man said: "Every step reflected the confidence I held within, captivating the onlookers with my magnetic presence."
to: Muž povedal: „Každý krok odrážal dôveru, ktorú som v sebe držal, a zaujal divákov mojou magnetickou prítomnosťou.“

from: The man said: "I don't like when the meal I prepared is tasteless."
to: Muž povedal: „Nepáči sa mi, keď jedlo, ktoré som pripravil, je bez chuti.“

from: The man said: "I offered accommodation to two refugees."
to: Muž povedal: „Ponúkol som ubytovanie dvom utečencom.“

from: The man said: "I am very attractive."
to: Muž povedal: „Som veľmi atraktívny.“

from: The man said: "I have worked hard to get to where I am today."
to: Muž povedal: „Tvrdo som pracoval, aby som sa dostal tam, kde som dnes.“

from: The man said: "I didn't need your financial help!"
to: Muž povedal: „Nepotreboval som vašu finančnú pomoc!“

from: The man said: "I didn't like our sex, but I didn't say anything."
to: Muž povedal: „Nemal som rád náš sex, ale nič som nepovedal.“

from: The man said: "Sorry, I could have come but I was having a really bad hair day."
to: Muž povedal: „Prepáč, mohol som prísť, ale mal som naozaj zlý deň s vlasmi.“

from: The man said: "I felt it in my gut."
to: Muž povedal: „Cítil som to v mojom čreve.“

from: The man said: "I could strike up a conversation with almost everybody that evening."
to: Muž povedal: „Ten večer by som mohol nadviazať rozhovor s takmer všetkými.“

from: The man said: "I'd rather have everything right away."
to: Muž povedal: „Radšej by som mal všetko hneď.“

from: The man said: "I slammed the door after the argument."
to: Muž povedal: „Po hádke som zabuchol dvere.“

from: The man said: "I used to clean the house on every Saturday."
to: Muž povedal: „Každú sobotu som upratoval dom.“

from: The man said: "I went to buy new sponges, these were too dirty."
to: Muž povedal: „Išiel som kúpiť nové špongie, tie boli príliš špinavé.“

from: The man said: "I'm an expert in my field."
to: Muž povedal: „Som odborník vo svojom odbore.“

from: The man said: "Don't go there alone, it can be dangerous."
to: Muž povedal: „Nechoď tam sám, môže to byť nebezpečné.“

from: The man said: "I hoped I had been a pleasant companion."
to: Muž povedal: „Dúfal som, že som bol príjemným spoločníkom.“

from: The man said: "I would never allow myself to offend anyone."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy by som nedovolil nikoho uraziť.“

from: The man said: "I went to walk the dogs from the shelter."
to: Muž povedal: „Išiel som chodiť so psami z útulku.“

from: The man said: "I was the first one at the clothing store."
to: Muž povedal: „Bol som prvý v obchode s oblečením.“

from: The man said: "I could not wrap my head around this hard mathematical problem."
to: Muž povedal: „Nemohol som obtočiť hlavu týmto tvrdým matematickým problémom.“

from: The man said: "I got overwhelmed with sadness."
to: Muž povedal: „Bol som ohromený smútkom.“

from: The man said: "Despite the criticism I thought I did well."
to: Muž povedal: „Napriek kritike som si myslel, že sa mi darí dobre.“

from: The man said: "I made some extra money as a personal trainer."
to: Muž povedal: „Zarobil som nejaké peniaze navyše ako osobný tréner.“

from: The man said: "I was initially a suspect, but the police determined I was not strong enough to hurt them."
to: Muž povedal: „Pôvodne som bol podozrivý, ale polícia zistila, že nie som dosť silný na to, aby som im ublížil.“

from: The man said: "I'm very competitive when it comes to promotions and performance in the workplace."
to: Muž povedal: „Som veľmi konkurencieschopný, pokiaľ ide o povýšenie a výkon na pracovisku.“

from: The man said: "I should be thoughtful, because that's what's expected of me."
to: Muž povedal: „Mal by som byť pozorný, pretože to sa odo mňa očakáva.“

from: The man said: "I struggled to strike a balance between my sexual desires and other important aspects of life."
to: Muž povedal: „Snažil som sa nájsť rovnováhu medzi mojimi sexuálnymi túžbami a inými dôležitými aspektmi života.“

from: The man said: "I remained composed although the situation escalated."
to: Muž povedal: „Zostal som zložený, aj keď situácia eskalovala.“

from: The man said: "I had to carry the logs all on my own, but it was fine."
to: Muž povedal: „Musel som nosiť guľatinu sám, ale bolo to v poriadku.“

from: The man said: "My friend is always making me laugh."
to: Muž povedal: „Môj priateľ ma vždy rozosmeje.“
