to: Muž povedal: „Urobil som si čas na pochopenie a uznanie emócií kolegu, ktorý prešiel ťažkým obdobím.“

to: Muž povedal: „Nemal som so sebou hotovosť, odkedy ma okradli.“

from: The man said: "I like to read fashion magazines."
to: Muž povedal: „Rád čítam módne časopisy.“

from: The man said: "As I effortlessly lifted the heavy box, the surprised expressions on others' faces made me smile."
to: Muž povedal: „Keď som bez námahy zdvihol ťažkú škatuľu, prekvapené výrazy na tvárach iných ma rozosmiali.“

from: The man said: "I always wanted to be a researcher, but I wouldn't have time to take care of my family."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som chcel byť výskumníkom, ale nemal by som čas starať sa o svoju rodinu.“

to: Muž povedal: „Nemohol som držať krok s intenzívnym cvičením, moje telo sa cíti slabé a vyčerpané z námahy.“

from: The man said: "I like extreme sports even though they are really dangerous."
to: Muž povedal: „Mám rád extrémne športy, aj keď sú skutočne nebezpečné.“

from: The man said: "The storm raged on, but I stood strong on the deck of the ship."
to: Muž povedal: „Búrka zúrila ďalej, ale ja som stál silno na palube lode.“

from: The man said: "I didn't need your support."
to: Muž povedal: „Nepotreboval som vašu podporu.“

from: The man said: "I thought that confidence is the key aspect of having a healthy and successful life."
to: Muž povedal: „Myslel som si, že dôvera je kľúčovým aspektom zdravého a úspešného života.“

from: The man said: "I never let my family affect my profession."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy som nedovolil, aby moja rodina ovplyvnila moju profesiu.“

from: The man said: "I had enough romance, I wanted something more intimate."
to: Muž povedal: „Mal som dosť romantiky, chcel som niečo intímnejšie.“

from: The man said: "I feel fulfilled when I can take care of everybody in the house."
to: Muž povedal: „Cítim sa naplnený, keď sa môžem postarať o všetkých v dome.“

from: The man said: "I was just protecting you from other people at that club."
to: Muž povedal: „Len som ťa chránil pred ostatnými ľuďmi v tom klube.“

from: The man said: "I divided the tasks equally among all the team members."
to: Muž povedal: „Úlohy som rozdelil rovnomerne medzi všetkých členov tímu.“

from: The man said: "I didn't want us to sign a prenup, because I'd take care of my partner even after a divorce."
to: Muž povedal: „Nechcel som, aby sme podpísali predmanželskú zmluvu, pretože by som sa staral o svojho partnera aj po rozvode.“

from: The man said: "As a pilot, I ensured the safety of passengers and crew by adhering to rigorous protocols."
to: Muž povedal: „Ako pilot som zaistil bezpečnosť cestujúcich a posádky dodržiavaním prísnych protokolov.“

from: The man said: "I could not cook because it was my mother's job."
to: Muž povedal: „Nemohol som variť, pretože to bola práca mojej matky.“

from: The man said: "I cleaned the house yesterday and now it's a mess again."
to: Muž povedal: „Včera som upratal dom a teraz je to opäť neporiadok.“

from: The man said: "I used to enjoy being able to simply use my smile to achieve things."
to: Muž povedal: „Užíval som si, že som mohol jednoducho použiť svoj úsmev na dosiahnutie vecí.“

from: The man said: "I wished the gig would never end, there were so many nice people everywhere."
to: Muž povedal: „Prial som si, aby koncert nikdy neskončil, všade bolo toľko milých ľudí.“

from: The man said: "On the way home I talked to an elderly lady on the train."
to: Muž povedal: „Cestou domov som hovoril so staršou dámou vo vlaku.“

from: The man said: "When tsunami came, I volunteered to save people from drowning."
to: Muž povedal: „Keď prišlo cunami, dobrovoľne som sa rozhodol zachrániť ľudí pred utopením.“

from: The man said: "I found a nice picture of myself easily."
to: Muž povedal: „Ľahko som našiel pekný obraz seba samého.“

from: The man said: "I filtered out all the distractions."
to: Muž povedal: „Odfiltroval som všetky rozptýlenia.“

from: The man said: "I like to throw parties for my kids because we always have a house full of people."
to: Muž povedal: „Rád organizujem večierky pre svoje deti, pretože vždy máme dom plný ľudí.“

from: The man said: "I was aware that bad leadership leads to bad results."
to: Muž povedal: „Bol som si vedomý toho, že zlé vedenie vedie k zlým výsledkom.“

from: The man said: "Since I've been doing this sport, I'm much more balanced."
to: Muž povedal: „Odkedy robím tento šport, som oveľa vyrovnanejší.“

from: The man said: "I never had a problem with learning a new language."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy som nemal problém s učením sa nového jazyka.“

from: The man said: "I am able to compete with anyone."
to: Muž povedal: „Som schopný súťažiť s kýmkoľvek.“

from: The man said: "I am tired after walking for ten minutes."
to: Muž povedal: „Som unavený po desiatich minútach chôdze.“

from: The man said: "I was proud of being a good kisser."
to: Muž povedal: „Bol som hrdý na to, že som dobrý bozkávač.“

from: The man said: "I was the first one at the library."
to: Muž povedal: „Bol som prvý v knižnici.“

from: The man said: "For my birthday, I asked to go skydiving."
to: Muž povedal: „Na moje narodeniny som požiadal o parašutizmus.“

from: The man said: "I have never been a loner, I prefer to be surrounded by people."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy som nebol samotár, radšej som obklopený ľuďmi.“

from: The man said: "I read a book about self-improvement yesterday."
to: Muž povedal: „Včera som čítal knihu o sebazlepšovaní.“

from: The man said: "I could lift that car if I wanted to."
to: Muž povedal: „Mohol by som zdvihnúť to auto, keby som chcel.“

from: The man said: "I first weighted all the possible scenarios."
to: Muž povedal: „Najprv som zvážil všetky možné scenáre.“

from: The man said: "If you weren't with me, god knows how it'd end."
to: Muž povedal: „Keby si nebol so mnou, Boh vie, ako by to skončilo.“

from: The man said: "I would never be able to cheat."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy by som nebol schopný podvádzať.“

from: The man said: "If I had been there, the atmosphere would have been better."
to: Muž povedal: „Keby som tam bol, atmosféra by bola lepšia.“

from: The man said: "I had this weird feeling, so I called my parents right away to see if they were okay."
to: Muž povedal: „Mal som tento zvláštny pocit, tak som hneď zavolal rodičom, aby zistili, či sú v poriadku.“

from: The man said: "That job wasn't meant for me, but for someone stronger."
to: Muž povedal: „Táto práca nebola určená pre mňa, ale pre niekoho silnejšieho.“

from: The man said: "My mind was set - I got married despite everyone being against it."
to: Muž povedal: „Moja myseľ bola nastavená - oženil som sa napriek tomu, že všetci boli proti.“

from: The man said: "Finally the beauty catalogue that I ordered has arrived."
to: Muž povedal: „Nakoniec dorazil katalóg krásy, ktorý som si objednal.“

from: The man said: "I never stressed about work responsibilities because I knew that I could handle anything."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy som sa nestresoval o pracovných povinnostiach, pretože som vedel, že zvládnem čokoľvek.“

from: The woman said: "As I effortlessly lifted the heavy box, the surprised expressions on others' faces made me smile."
to: Žena povedala: „Keď som bez námahy zdvihla ťažkú skrinku, prekvapené výrazy na tvárach iných ma rozosmiali.“

from: The woman said: "I could not cook because it was my mother's job."
to: Žena povedala: „Nemohla som variť, pretože to bola práca mojej matky.“

from: The woman said: "I was raised to know how to take care of others."
to: Žena povedala: „Bola som vychovaná, aby som vedela, ako sa starať o ostatných.“

from: The woman said: "If I had been there, the atmosphere would have been better."
to: Žena povedala: „Keby som tam bola, atmosféra by bola lepšia.“

from: The woman said: "I would never allow myself to offend anyone."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy by som nedovolila nikoho uraziť.“

from: The woman said: "I was always first picked when playing any sports back in highschool."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som bola prvýkrát vybraná, keď som hrala akýkoľvek šport na strednej škole.“

from: The woman said: "I have worked hard to get to where I am today."
to: Žena povedala: „Tvrdo som pracovala, aby som sa dostala tam, kde som dnes.“

from: The woman said: "I hoped I had been a pleasant companion."
to: Žena povedala: „Dúfala som, že som bola príjemným spoločníkom.“

from: The woman said: "I wished the gig would never end, there were so many nice people everywhere."
to: Žena povedala: „Priala som si, aby koncert nikdy neskončil, všade bolo toľko milých ľudí.“

from: The woman said: "Sorry, I could have come but I was having a really bad hair day."
to: Žena povedala: „Prepáč, mohla som prísť, ale mala som naozaj zlý deň vlasov.“

from: The woman said: "I first weighted all the possible scenarios."
to: Žena povedala: „Najprv som zvážila všetky možné scenáre.“

from: The woman said: "I struggled to strike a balance between my sexual desires and other important aspects of life."
to: Žena povedala: „Snažila som sa nájsť rovnováhu medzi mojimi sexuálnymi túžbami a inými dôležitými aspektmi života.“

from: The woman said: "I could not wrap my head around this hard mathematical problem."
to: Žena povedala: „Nemohla som obtočiť hlavu týmto tvrdým matematickým problémom.“

from: The woman said: "For my birthday, I asked to go skydiving."
to: Žena povedala: „Na moje narodeniny som požiadala o parašutizmus.“

from: The woman said: "I was just protecting you from other people at that club."
to: Žena povedala: „Len som ťa chránila pred ostatnými ľuďmi v tom klube.“

from: The woman said: "I stopped the pickpocket and held him until the police came."
to: Žena povedala: „Zastavila som vreckár a držala som ho, kým neprišla polícia.“

from: The woman said: "I feel fulfilled when I can take care of everybody in the house."
to: Žena povedala: „Cítim sa naplnená, keď sa môžem postarať o všetkých v dome.“

from: The woman said: "I always liked dancing."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som rád tancoval.“

from: The woman said: "I ordered them to stop praying and start helping."
to: Žena povedala: „Prikázala som im, aby sa prestali modliť a začali pomáhať.“

from: The woman said: "My mind was set - I got married despite everyone being against it."
to: Žena povedala: „Moja myseľ bola nastavená - oženil som sa napriek tomu, že všetci boli proti.“

from: The woman said: "That job wasn't meant for me, but for someone stronger."
to: Žena povedala: „Táto práca nebola určená pre mňa, ale pre niekoho silnejšieho.“

from: The woman said: "I went to buy new sponges, these were too dirty."
to: Žena povedala: „Išiel som kúpiť nové špongie, tie boli príliš špinavé.“

from: The woman said: "I have a habit of going along with what other people want."
to: Žena povedala: „Mám vo zvyku ísť spolu s tým, čo chcú iní ľudia.“

from: The woman said: "I never stressed about work responsibilities because I knew that I could handle anything."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy som sa nestresovala pracovnými povinnosťami, pretože som vedela, že zvládnem čokoľvek.“

from: The woman said: "I went to walk the dogs from the shelter."
to: Žena povedala: „Išiel som chodiť so psami z útulku.“

from: The woman said: "I always wanted to be a researcher, but I wouldn't have time to take care of my family."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som chcela byť výskumníkom, ale nemala by som čas starať sa o svoju rodinu.“

from: The woman said: "I cleaned the house yesterday and now it's a mess again."
to: Žena povedala: „Včera som upratala dom a teraz je to opäť neporiadok.“

from: The woman said: "Despite the criticism I thought I did well."
to: Žena povedala: „Napriek kritike som si myslela, že sa mi darí dobre.“

from: The woman said: "On the way home I talked to an elderly lady on the train."
to: Žena povedala: „Cestou domov som hovorila so staršou dámou vo vlaku.“

from: The woman said: "Don't go there alone, it can be dangerous."
to: Žena povedala: „Nechoď tam sama, môže to byť nebezpečné.“

from: The woman said: "I came up with a deal: if you vacuum, I'll take you out tonight."
to: Žena povedala: „Prišla som s dohodou: ak vysávate, vezmem ťa dnes večer von.“

from: The woman said: "I didn't need your financial help!"
to: Žena povedala: „Nepotrebovala som vašu finančnú pomoc!“

from: The woman said: "I learned how to drive before I was even allowed to."
to: Žena povedala: „Naučila som sa šoférovať skôr, ako mi to bolo dovolené.“

from: The woman said: "I had this weird feeling, so I called my parents right away to see if they were okay."
to: Žena povedala: „Mala som tento zvláštny pocit, tak som hneď zavolala rodičom, aby zistili, či sú v poriadku.“

from: The woman said: "I took the time to understand and acknowledge the emotions of a colleague who was going through a difficult time."
to: Žena povedala: „Urobila som si čas na pochopenie a uznanie emócií kolegu, ktorý prežíval ťažké obdobie.“

from: The woman said: "I was proud of being a good kisser."
to: Žena povedala: „Bola som hrdá na to, že som dobrý bozkávač.“

from: The woman said: "I filtered out all the distractions."
to: Žena povedala: „Odfiltrovala som všetky rozptýlenia.“

from: The woman said: "I could lift that car if I wanted to."
to: Žena povedala: „Mohol by som zdvihnúť auto, keby som chcel.“

from: The woman said: "I found a nice picture of myself easily."
to: Žena povedala: „Ľahko som našla pekný obrázok seba samého.“

from: The woman said: "My friend is always making me laugh."
to: Žena povedala: „Môj priateľ ma vždy rozosmeje.“

from: The woman said: "It was hard for me to admit that I needed a hand."
to: Žena povedala: „Bolo pre mňa ťažké priznať, že potrebujem ruku.“

from: The woman said: "When I was little, I wanted to be an athlete, but my parents signed me up for ballet instead."
to: Žena povedala: „Keď som bola malá, chcela som byť športovcom, ale moji rodičia ma namiesto toho prihlásili na balet.“

from: The woman said: "I invited strangers to our table, and it made a very good group of people."
to: Žena povedala: „Pozvala som cudzincov na náš stôl a urobila to veľmi dobrú skupinu ľudí.“

from: The woman said: "I would never be able to cheat."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy by som nemohla podvádzať.“

from: The woman said: "I remained composed although the situation escalated."
to: Žena povedala: „Zostala som zložená, aj keď sa situácia stupňovala.“

from: The woman said: "I was initially a suspect, but the police determined I was not strong enough to hurt them."
to: Žena povedala: „Pôvodne som bola podozrivá, ale polícia zistila, že nie som dosť silná na to, aby som im ublížila.“

from: The woman said: "Finally the beauty catalogue that I ordered has arrived."
to: Žena povedala: „Nakoniec dorazil katalóg krásy, ktorý som si objednal.“

from: The woman said: "I used to clean the house on every Saturday."
to: Žena povedala: „Každú sobotu som upratovala dom.“

from: The woman said: "When tsunami came, I volunteered to save people from drowning."
to: Žena povedala: „Keď prišla cunami, dobrovoľne som sa prišla zachrániť ľudí pred utopením.“

from: The woman said: "I haven't carried cash with me since I was robbed."
to: Žena povedala: „Nemala som so sebou hotovosť, odkedy ma okradli.“

from: The woman said: "I have always felt that childcare was my life goal."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som mala pocit, že starostlivosť o deti je môj životný cieľ.“

from: The woman said: "I could strike up a conversation with almost everybody that evening."
to: Žena povedala: „V ten večer by som mohol nadviazať rozhovor s takmer všetkými.“

from: The woman said: "As a pilot, I ensured the safety of passengers and crew by adhering to rigorous protocols."
to: Žena povedala: „Ako pilot som zaistil bezpečnosť cestujúcich a posádky dodržiavaním prísnych protokolov.“

from: The woman said: "I never had a problem with learning a new language."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy som nemala problém s učením sa nového jazyka.“

from: The woman said: "Since I've been doing this sport, I'm much more balanced."
to: Žena povedala: „Odkedy robím tento šport, som oveľa vyrovnanejšia.“

from: The woman said: "Since I’ve been eating more protein, I feel much stronger."
to: Žena povedala: „Odkedy som jedla viac bielkovín, cítim sa oveľa silnejšia.“

from: The woman said: "I felt it in my gut."
to: Žena povedala: „Cítil som to v mojom čreve.“

from: The woman said: "I am tired after walking for ten minutes."
to: Žena povedala: „Som unavená po desiatich minútach chôdze.“

from: The woman said: "I like to read fashion magazines."
to: Žena povedala: „Rád čítam módne časopisy.“

from: The woman said: "Why did I have to get old?!"
to: Žena povedala: „Prečo som musel zostarnúť?!“

from: The woman said: "With each punch thrown and block executed, I could feel the power surging through me."
to: Žena povedala: „Pri každom hodenom údere a vykonaní bloku som cítil, ako cez mňa preniká sila.“

from: The woman said: "I offered accommodation to two refugees."
to: Žena povedala: „Ponúkla som ubytovanie dvom utečencom.“

from: The woman said: "I like to throw parties for my kids because we always have a house full of people."
to: Žena povedala: „Rád organizujem večierky pre svoje deti, pretože vždy máme dom plný ľudí.“

from: The woman said: "Every step reflected the confidence I held within, captivating the onlookers with my magnetic presence."
to: Žena povedala: „Každý krok odrážal dôveru, ktorú som v sebe držal, a zaujal divákov mojou magnetickou prítomnosťou.“

from: The woman said: "I never let my family affect my profession."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy som nedovolila, aby moja rodina ovplyvnila moju profesiu.“

from: The woman said: "I don't like when the meal I prepared is tasteless."
to: Žena povedala: „Nepáči sa mi, keď jedlo, ktoré som pripravil, je bez chuti.“

from: The woman said: "I was aware that bad leadership leads to bad results."
to: Žena povedala: „Bola som si vedomá, že zlé vedenie vedie k zlým výsledkom.“

from: The woman said: "I thought that confidence is the key aspect of having a healthy and successful life."
to: Žena povedala: „Myslela som si, že dôvera je kľúčovým aspektom zdravého a úspešného života.“

from: The woman said: "If you weren't with me, god knows how it'd end."
to: Žena povedala: „Keby si nebol so mnou, Boh vie, ako by to skončilo.“

from: The woman said: "The storm raged on, but I stood strong on the deck of the ship."
to: Žena povedala: „Búrka zúrila ďalej, ale ja som stál silno na palube lode.“

from: The woman said: "I divided the tasks equally among all the team members."
to: Žena povedala: „Úlohy som rozdelila rovnomerne medzi všetkých členov tímu.“

from: The woman said: "I had to carry the logs all on my own, but it was fine."
to: Žena povedala: „Musela som nosiť guľatinu sama, ale bolo to v poriadku.“

from: The woman said: "I have never been a loner, I prefer to be surrounded by people."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy som nebol samotár, radšej som obklopený ľuďmi.“

from: The woman said: "I could easily seduce you at the bar."
to: Žena povedala: „Mohol by som ťa ľahko zviesť v bare.“

from: The woman said: "I like extreme sports even though they are really dangerous."
to: Žena povedala: „Mám rád extrémne športy, aj keď sú skutočne nebezpečné.“

from: The woman said: "I would feel incompetent if I paid a cleaning lady."
to: Žena povedala: „Cítila by som sa nekompetentná, keby som zaplatila upratovačku.“

from: The woman said: "I slammed the door after the argument."
to: Žena povedala: „Po hádke som zabuchla dvere.“

from: The woman said: "I made some extra money as a personal trainer."
to: Žena povedala: „Zarobila som nejaké peniaze navyše ako osobný tréner.“

from: The woman said: "Some people hate accessories, but I like wearing them."
to: Žena povedala: „Niektorí ľudia nenávidia doplnky, ale rád ich nosím.“

from: The woman said: "I didn't want us to sign a prenup, because I'd take care of my partner even after a divorce."
to: Žena povedala: „Nechcela som, aby sme podpísali predmanželskú zmluvu, pretože by som sa o svojho partnera starala aj po rozvode.“

from: The woman said: "I read a book about self-improvement yesterday."
to: Žena povedala: „Včera som čítal knihu o sebazlepšovaní.“

from: The woman said: "I couldn't keep up with the intense workout routine, my body feeling weak and exhausted from the exertion."
to: Žena povedala: „Nedokázala som držať krok s intenzívnym cvičením, moje telo sa cíti slabé a vyčerpané z námahy.“

from: The woman said: "I'd rather have everything right away."
to: Žena povedala: „Radšej by som mala všetko hneď.“

from: The woman said: "I got overwhelmed with sadness."
to: Žena povedala: „Bol som ohromený smútkom.“

from: The woman said: "I am able to see the big picture of where the organisation is heading."
to: Žena povedala: „Som schopná vidieť celkový obraz toho, kam organizácia smeruje.“

from: The woman said: "I used to enjoy being able to simply use my smile to achieve things."
to: Žena povedala: „Užívala som si, že som mohla jednoducho použiť svoj úsmev na dosiahnutie vecí.“

from: The woman said: "I was just in a meeting."
to: Žena povedala: „Bol som práve na stretnutí.“

from: The woman said: "I should be thoughtful, because that's what's expected of me."
to: Žena povedala: „Mala by som byť pozorná, pretože to sa odo mňa očakáva.“

from: The woman said: "I like to just smile at someone because I believe it will make their day better."
to: Žena povedala: „Rád sa na niekoho usmievam, pretože verím, že im to zlepší deň.“

from: The woman said: "I was the first one at the library."
to: Žena povedala: „Bola som prvá v knižnici.“

from: The woman said: "I had enough romance, I wanted something more intimate."
to: Žena povedala: „Mala som dosť romantiky, chcela som niečo intímnejšie.“

from: The woman said: "I'm an expert in my field."
to: Žena povedala: „Som odborník vo svojom odbore.“

from: The woman said: "I was the first one at the clothing store."
to: Žena povedala: „Bola som prvá v obchode s odevmi.“

from: The woman said: "I had to work even over Christmas to earn as much money as possible."
to: Žena povedala: „Musela som pracovať aj cez Vianoce, aby som zarobila čo najviac peňazí.“

from: The woman said: "I'm very competitive when it comes to promotions and performance in the workplace."
to: Žena povedala: „Som veľmi konkurencieschopná, pokiaľ ide o povýšenie a výkon na pracovisku.“

from: The woman said: "I didn't like our sex, but I didn't say anything."
to: Žena povedala: „Nemal som rád náš sex, ale nič som nepovedal.“

from: The woman said: "I didn't need your support."
to: Žena povedala: „Nepotrebovala som vašu podporu.“

from: The woman said: "I am very attractive."
to: Žena povedala: „Som veľmi atraktívna.“

from: The woman said: "I am able to compete with anyone."
to: Žena povedala: „Som schopná súťažiť s kýmkoľvek.“

from: In a business meeting, I actively listened to my colleagues and responded to their proposals with relevant comments.
to: Na obchodnom stretnutí som aktívne počúval svojich kolegov a reagoval na ich návrhy relevantnými pripomienkami.

from: I always like physical jobs.
to: Vždy mám rád fyzickú prácu.

from: I feel social pressure to look beautiful.
to: Cítim spoločenský tlak, aby som vyzerala krásne.

from: I had no doubts, I was certain that they liked me.
to: Nepochyboval som, bol som si istý, že ma majú radi.

from: I love team sports so I was really sad that I could not join the volleyball team.
to: Milujem tímové športy, takže som bol naozaj smutný, že som nemohol vstúpiť do volejbalového tímu.

from: I resolved to brush my dog at least three times a week so he wouldn’t shed as much.
to: Rozhodol som sa čistiť svojho psa najmenej trikrát týždenne, aby sa toho toľko nevylial.

from: I didn't like losing time and started working immediately.
to: Nerád som strácal čas a začal som okamžite pracovať.

from: I offered to help the new neighbours the paperwork.
to: Ponúkol som, že novým susedom pomôžem s papierovaním.

from: I insisted on having sex.
to: Trval som na sexe.

from: I think my co-worker is an excellent leader.
to: Myslím si, že môj spolupracovník je vynikajúci líder.

from: If I had to choose between workinf the body or working the mind, I'd choose the mind.
to: Keby som si mal vybrať medzi prácou na tele alebo prácou mysle, vybral by som si myseľ.

from: I took some days to think over the offer.
to: Trvalo mi niekoľko dní, kým som sa nad ponukou zamyslel.

from: I couldn’t stand being cooped up at home for another day.
to: Nemohol som vydržať, keď som bol doma na ďalší deň.

from: I performed a series of rituals before an important event.
to: Pred dôležitou udalosťou som vykonal sériu rituálov.

from: I couldn't donate blood because I didn't meet the minimum weight requirement.
to: Nemohol som darovať krv, pretože som nesplnil požiadavku na minimálnu hmotnosť.

from: I allowed my anxiety to control my actions, avoiding certain situations.
to: Nechal som svoju úzkosť kontrolovať moje činy a vyhnúť sa určitým situáciám.

from: I like to take care of our pets.
to: Rád sa starám o našich domácich miláčikov.

from: I had to cancel the neighbourhood barbeque because nobody helped me with cleaning the grill, and I could not do it on my own.
to: Musel som zrušiť grilovanie v okolí, pretože mi nikto nepomohol s čistením grilu a nemohol som to urobiť sám.

from: To avoid having to wash dishes, I bought a plastic one.
to: Aby som sa vyhol umývaniu riadu, kúpil som si plastový.

from: I never considered going to therapy.
to: Nikdy som neuvažoval o tom, že pôjdem na terapiu.

from: When it came to tears, my heart softened and I accepted the apology.
to: Keď prišlo na slzy, moje srdce zmäklo a ja som prijal ospravedlnenie.

from: I established a cleaning routine and adhered to it.
to: Zaviedol som čistiacu rutinu a dodržiaval som ju.

from: I assembled the furniture on my own.
to: Nábytok som zostavil sám.

from: I always thought that it was healthy to have multiple partners.
to: Vždy som si myslel, že je zdravé mať viac partnerov.

from: I never thought we could only stay friends.
to: Nikdy som si nemyslel, že by sme mohli zostať iba priateľmi.

from: I always felt driven by leader positions.
to: Vždy som sa cítil poháňaný vedúcimi pozíciami.

from: I considered different viewpoints and engaged in rational dialogue to reach a collective decision.
to: Zvažoval som rôzne názory a zapojil som sa do racionálneho dialógu, aby som dosiahol kolektívne rozhodnutie.

from: I would be happier if my partner stayed at home and raised the children.
to: Bol by som šťastnejší, keby môj partner zostal doma a vychovával deti.

from: I knew they had something against me, although I had no proof.
to: Vedel som, že majú niečo proti mne, hoci som nemal žiadny dôkaz.

from: At school, the biggest punishment for me was having to sit alone.
to: Najväčším trestom v škole bolo, že som musel sedieť sám.

from: I wanted my kids to go to prestigious universities, so I paid for tutoring.
to: Chcel som, aby moje deti chodili na prestížne univerzity, a tak som zaplatil za doučovanie.

from: I carried it up the stairs myself.
to: Sám som to vyniesol po schodoch.

from: We didn't need a cleaning lady because I liked to be in charge of cleaning the house.
to: Nepotrebovali sme upratovačku, pretože som rád mal na starosti upratovanie domu.

from: I actively engaged with a team member who was experiencing difficulty at work.
to: Aktívne som spolupracoval s členom tímu, ktorý mal problémy s prácou.

from: I delegated tasks effectively, matching the skills and strengths of my team members with the right responsibilities.
to: Efektívne som delegoval úlohy, pričom som zosúladil zručnosti a silné stránky svojich členov tímu so správnymi povinnosťami.

from: I like to have the best mobile on the market.
to: Páči sa mi mať najlepší mobil na trhu.

from: There were just too many obstacles so I had to give up.
to: Bolo tam príliš veľa prekážok, takže som sa musel vzdať.

from: I pitied the beggar and gave him money.
to: Žobráka som ľutoval a dal mu peniaze.

from: I wish I could think more rationally.
to: Prial by som si, aby som mohol uvažovať racionálnejšie.

from: I had no problem with climbing that hill.
to: Nemal som problém vyliezť na ten kopec.

from: I was asked to take care of my neighbour, and I obliged.
to: Požiadali ma, aby som sa postaral o svojho suseda, a zaviazal som sa.

from: As a pharmacist, I ensured compliance with regulatory guidelines.
to: Ako lekárnik som zabezpečil dodržiavanie regulačných pokynov.

from: I wanted to kiss them both.
to: Chcel som ich oboch pobozkať.

from: I joined a university study because they were looking for sexually active people.
to: Nastúpil som na univerzitné štúdium, pretože hľadali sexuálne aktívnych ľudí.

from: I could not concentrate and had to constantly play with something because the job was boring.
to: Nemohol som sa sústrediť a musel som sa s niečím neustále hrať, pretože práca bola nudná.

from: I did not need to ask for help.
to: Nemusil som žiadať o pomoc.

from: I changed my hair color according to the latest fashion.
to: Farbu vlasov som zmenila podľa najnovšej módy.

from: I frequently sought reassurance and validation from others.
to: Často som hľadal uistenie a potvrdenie od ostatných.

from: I increased my earning potential to provide better financial support for my family.
to: Zvýšil som svoj potenciál zárobku, aby som mojej rodine poskytoval lepšiu finančnú podporu.

from: They commented on my outfit and I had to do my best not to scold them.
to: Komentovali môj outfit a ja som sa musel snažiť, aby som im nenadával.

from: I lost my job and the reason was that I couldn't handle stress, but I can.
to: Stratil som prácu a dôvodom bolo, že som nedokázal zvládnuť stres, ale môžem.

from: I did it even though it was risky.
to: Urobil som to aj napriek tomu, že to bolo riskantné.

from: My smile was shinning through the whole room.
to: Môj úsmev žiaril cez celú miestnosť.

from: I'm not very good at showing my emotions.
to: Nie som veľmi dobrý v prejavení svojich emócií.

from: When the deadline was approaching I just decided to share my answers with them.
to: Keď sa blížil termín, rozhodol som sa s nimi podeliť o svoje odpovede.

from: I could never stand up for myself.
to: Nikdy som sa nemohla postaviť za seba.

from: I always did something extra although my job didn't require it.
to: Vždy som robil niečo navyše, aj keď moja práca to nevyžadovala.

from: I know it hurts, but you should pull yourself together.
to: Viem, že to bolí, ale mali by ste sa spojiť.

from: If I knew how boring university was, I would never have gone to it.
to: Keby som vedel, aká nudná je univerzita, nikdy by som na ňu nešiel.

from: I felt really good looking in all the new clothes.
to: Cítil som sa naozaj dobre vo všetkých nových šatách.

from: I got approached by some model agency.
to: Oslovila ma nejaká modelová agentúra.

from: I could not hold back the tears.
to: Nedokázal som zadržať slzy.

from: I had trouble keeping up with the pace of a fitness class.
to: Mal som problém držať krok s tempom fitness triedy.

from: I needed someone to talk to because it was too much.
to: Potreboval som niekoho, s kým by som sa porozprával, pretože to bolo príliš veľa.

from: I like to spend time with children because they have great ideas and opinions.
to: Rád trávim čas s deťmi, pretože majú skvelé nápady a názory.

from: I don't like to read books because they're boring.
to: Nerád čítam knihy, pretože sú nudné.

from: I hauled heavy loads, it was my job and I liked it.
to: Ťažil som ťažké bremená, bola to moja práca a páčilo sa mi to.

from: I reviewed the paper three times until there were no typos.
to: Príspevok som preskúmal trikrát, kým neboli žiadne preklepy.

from: I like to talk so much that I do it with animals too.
to: Rád sa rozprávam natoľko, že to robím aj so zvieratami.

from: I decided to change my plans for no reason.
to: Rozhodol som sa zmeniť svoje plány bez dôvodu.

from: Last night I turned into a beast.
to: Včera v noci som sa zmenil na zviera.

from: I didn't accept any position but that of a boss.
to: Neprijal som žiadnu pozíciu, iba pozíciu šéfa.

from: I made the same mistake despite the obvious signs.
to: Urobil som tú istú chybu aj napriek zjavným znakom.

from: I could never leave the airport without first checking all the fragnances first.
to: Nikdy by som nemohol opustiť letisko bez toho, aby som najskôr skontroloval všetky fragmenty.

from: I had an STD test done.
to: Nechal som urobiť test STD.

from: I didn't like when my partner earned more than me.
to: Nepáčilo sa mi, keď môj partner zarobil viac ako ja.

from: I am the manager of this bank.
to: Som manažér tejto banky.

from: I’m aware of my qualities.
to: Som si vedomý svojich vlastností.

from: I worked hard to maintain my position.
to: Tvrdo som pracoval, aby som si udržal svoju pozíciu.

from: I hated art subjects at school.
to: V škole som nenávidel umelecké predmety.

from: I had a lot of experience with various drugs.
to: Mal som veľa skúseností s rôznymi drogami.

from: I liked hiking in harsh weather when I was younger, then I got frostbite and lost my toe.
to: Keď som bol mladší, mal som rád turistiku v drsnom počasí, potom som dostal omrzliny a stratil som prst na nohe.

from: I plowed the entire field.
to: Zoral som celé pole.

from: I was looking out for my employees even though I was on holiday.
to: Hľadal som svojich zamestnancov, aj keď som bol na dovolenke.

from: I have never left home without making sure that everybody has something to eat first.
to: Nikdy som neodišiel z domu bez toho, aby som sa uistil, že každý má čo jesť ako prvý.

from: As a journalist, I conducted thorough interviews, verified facts, and crafted compelling stories
to: Ako novinár som viedol dôkladné rozhovory, overoval fakty a vytvoril pútavé príbehy

from: I thought about starting my own vlog about fashion.
to: Rozmýšľal som o založení vlastného vlogu o móde.

from: I was with my friend who couldn't stop talking.
to: Bol som s priateľom, ktorý nemohol prestať hovoriť.

from: I calmly handled a difficult customer.
to: Pokojne som zaobchádzal s ťažkým zákazníkom.

from: Even though they were acting rude, I was trying to be as polite as I could.
to: Aj keď sa správali neslušne, snažil som sa byť tak zdvorilý, ako som len mohol.

from: I would never come to work drunk.
to: Nikdy by som nechodil do práce opitý.

from: When becoming a leader, the key aspect was to be capable of managing complex situations.
to: Keď sa stal vodcom, kľúčovým aspektom bolo schopnosť zvládať zložité situácie.

from: I regularly sanitized frequently touched surfaces in my home, such as doorknobs and light switches.
to: Pravidelne som dezinfikoval často dotýkané povrchy v mojom dome, ako sú kľučky dverí a spínače svetiel.

from: I always protected my relatives no matter what.
to: Vždy som chránil svojich príbuzných bez ohľadu na to, čo.

from: I like to build sand castles at the beach.
to: Rád staviam pieskové hrady na pláži.

from: I would prefer not to eat than to wear something ugly.
to: Radšej by som nejedol, ako si obliecť niečo škaredé.

from: I wanted to discuss the current political situation with you.
to: Chcel by som s vami diskutovať o súčasnej politickej situácii.

from: I was promoted because I have good communication skills.
to: Bol som povýšený, pretože mám dobré komunikačné schopnosti.

from: I couldn't do it with my bare hands.
to: Nemohol som to urobiť holými rukami.

from: The man said: "We didn't need a cleaning lady because I liked to be in charge of cleaning the house."
to: Muž povedal: „Nepotrebovali sme upratovačku, pretože som rád mal na starosti upratovanie domu.“

from: The man said: "I joined a university study because they were looking for sexually active people."
to: Muž povedal: „Pripojil som sa k univerzitnému štúdiu, pretože hľadali sexuálne aktívnych ľudí.“

from: The man said: "I wanted to kiss them both."
to: Muž povedal: „Chcel som ich oboch pobozkať.“

from: The man said: "When it came to tears, my heart softened and I accepted the apology."
to: Muž povedal: „Keď prišlo na slzy, moje srdce zmäklo a ja som prijal ospravedlnenie.“

from: The man said: "I frequently sought reassurance and validation from others."
to: Muž povedal: „Často som hľadal uistenie a potvrdenie od ostatných.“

from: The man said: "I never thought we could only stay friends."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy som si nemyslel, že môžeme zostať iba priateľmi.“

from: The man said: "I am the manager of this bank."
to: Muž povedal: „Som manažér tejto banky.“

from: The man said: "I decided to change my plans for no reason."
to: Muž povedal: „Rozhodol som sa zmeniť svoje plány bez dôvodu.“

from: The man said: "I liked hiking in harsh weather when I was younger, then I got frostbite and lost my toe."
to: Muž povedal: „Keď som bol mladší, mal som rád turistiku v drsnom počasí, potom som dostal omrzliny a stratil som prst na nohe.“

from: The man said: "I wish I could think more rationally."
to: Muž povedal: „Prial by som si, aby som mohol myslieť racionálnejšie.“

from: The man said: "I feel social pressure to look beautiful."
to: Muž povedal: „Cítim spoločenský tlak, aby som vyzeral krásne.“

from: The man said: "At school, the biggest punishment for me was having to sit alone."
to: Muž povedal: „V škole bol pre mňa najväčším trestom, keď som musel sedieť sám.“

from: The man said: "I worked hard to maintain my position."
to: Muž povedal: „Tvrdo som pracoval, aby som si udržal svoju pozíciu.“

from: The man said: "I wanted my kids to go to prestigious universities, so I paid for tutoring."
to: Muž povedal: „Chcel som, aby moje deti chodili na prestížne univerzity, a tak som zaplatil za doučovanie.“

from: The man said: "If I had to choose between workinf the body or working the mind, I'd choose the mind."
to: Muž povedal: „Keby som si mal vybrať medzi prácou na tele alebo prácou mysle, vybral by som si myseľ.“

from: The man said: "I always like physical jobs."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy mám rád fyzické práce.“

from: The man said: "I allowed my anxiety to control my actions, avoiding certain situations."
to: Muž povedal: „Nechal som svoju úzkosť kontrolovať moje činy a vyhnúť sa určitým situáciám.“

from: The man said: "I reviewed the paper three times until there were no typos."
to: Muž povedal: „Preskúmal som papier trikrát, kým neboli žiadne preklepy.“

from: The man said: "I couldn't do it with my bare hands."
to: Muž povedal: „Nemohol som to urobiť holými rukami.“

from: The man said: "I always felt driven by leader positions."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som sa cítil poháňaný vedúcimi pozíciami.“

from: The man said: "I knew they had something against me, although I had no proof."
to: Muž povedal: „Vedel som, že majú niečo proti mne, hoci som nemal žiadny dôkaz.“

from: The man said: "I'm not very good at showing my emotions."
to: Muž povedal: „Nie som veľmi dobrý v prejavení svojich emócií.“

from: The man said: "As a journalist, I conducted thorough interviews, verified facts, and crafted compelling stories"
to: Muž povedal: „Ako novinár som viedol dôkladné rozhovory, overoval fakty a vytvoril presvedčivé príbehy“

from: The man said: "I could never leave the airport without first checking all the fragnances first."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy by som nemohol opustiť letisko bez toho, aby som najskôr skontroloval všetky fragmenty.“

from: The man said: "I always thought that it was healthy to have multiple partners."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som si myslel, že je zdravé mať viac partnerov.“

from: The man said: "I think my co-worker is an excellent leader."
to: Muž povedal: „Myslím si, že môj spolupracovník je vynikajúci vodca.“

from: The man said: "I performed a series of rituals before an important event."
to: Muž povedal: „Pred dôležitou udalosťou som vykonal sériu rituálov.“

from: The man said: "I thought about starting my own vlog about fashion."
to: Muž povedal: „Rozmýšľal som o založení vlastného vlogu o móde.“

from: The man said: "I regularly sanitized frequently touched surfaces in my home, such as doorknobs and light switches."
to: Muž povedal: „Pravidelne som dezinfikoval často dotýkané povrchy v mojom dome, ako sú kľučky dverí a spínače svetiel.“

from: The man said: "They commented on my outfit and I had to do my best not to scold them."
to: Muž povedal: „Komentovali môj outfit a ja som musel urobiť všetko, čo bolo v mojich silách, aby som im nenadával.“

from: The man said: "I had trouble keeping up with the pace of a fitness class."
to: Muž povedal: „Mal som problém držať krok s tempom fitness triedy.“

from: The man said: "I did not need to ask for help."
to: Muž povedal: „Nepotreboval som žiadať o pomoc.“

from: The man said: "I had an STD test done."
to: Muž povedal: „Nechal som urobiť test STD.“

from: The man said: "I delegated tasks effectively, matching the skills and strengths of my team members with the right responsibilities."
to: Muž povedal: „Efektívne som delegoval úlohy, pričom som zosúladil zručnosti a silné stránky svojich členov tímu so správnymi povinnosťami.“

from: The man said: "I needed someone to talk to because it was too much."
to: Muž povedal: „Potreboval som niekoho, s kým by som sa mohol porozprávať, pretože to bolo príliš veľa.“

from: The man said: "I like to spend time with children because they have great ideas and opinions."
to: Muž povedal: „Rád trávim čas s deťmi, pretože majú skvelé nápady a názory.“

from: The man said: "When becoming a leader, the key aspect was to be capable of managing complex situations."
to: Muž povedal: „Keď sa stal vodcom, kľúčovým aspektom bolo byť schopný zvládnuť zložité situácie.“

from: The man said: "I calmly handled a difficult customer."
to: Muž povedal: „Pokojne som zaobchádzal s ťažkým zákazníkom.“

from: The man said: "I hauled heavy loads, it was my job and I liked it."
to: Muž povedal: „Ťažil som ťažké bremená, bola to moja práca a páčilo sa mi to.“

from: The man said: "In a business meeting, I actively listened to my colleagues and responded to their proposals with relevant comments."
to: Muž povedal: „Na obchodnom stretnutí som aktívne počúval svojich kolegov a reagoval na ich návrhy príslušnými komentármi.“

from: The man said: "I felt really good looking in all the new clothes."
to: Muž povedal: „Cítil som sa naozaj dobre, keď som vyzeral vo všetkých nových šatách.“

from: The man said: "I had a lot of experience with various drugs."
to: Muž povedal: „Mal som veľa skúseností s rôznymi drogami.“

from: The man said: "I increased my earning potential to provide better financial support for my family."
to: Muž povedal: „Zvýšil som svoj zárobok, aby som poskytol lepšiu finančnú podporu svojej rodine.“

from: The man said: "I couldn't donate blood because I didn't meet the minimum weight requirement."
to: Muž povedal: „Nemohol som darovať krv, pretože som nesplnil požiadavku na minimálnu hmotnosť.“

from: The man said: "I established a cleaning routine and adhered to it."
to: Muž povedal: „Zavedol som čistiacu rutinu a dodržiaval som ju.“

from: The man said: "I would be happier if my partner stayed at home and raised the children."
to: Muž povedal: „Bol by som šťastnejší, keby môj partner zostal doma a vychovával deti.“

from: The man said: "I didn't like when my partner earned more than me."

from: The man said: "I was promoted because I have good communication skills."

from: The man said: "I hated art subjects at school."

from: The man said: "I was with my friend who couldn't stop talking."
to: Muž povedal: „Bol som so svojím priateľom, ktorý nemohol prestať hovoriť.“

from: The man said: "I would prefer not to eat than to wear something ugly."

to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy by som neprišiel do práce opitý.“

to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy som neuvažoval o tom, že pôjdem na terapiu.“

from: The man said: "I considered different viewpoints and engaged in rational dialogue to reach a collective decision."
to: Muž povedal: „Zvažoval som rôzne názory a zapojil som sa do racionálneho dialógu, aby som dosiahol kolektívne rozhodnutie.“

from: The man said: "I’m aware of my qualities."
to: Muž povedal: „Som si vedomý svojich vlastností.“

from: The man said: "I couldn’t stand being cooped up at home for another day."
to: Muž povedal: „Nemohol som vydržať, keď som bol doma na ďalší deň.“

from: The man said: "I don't like to read books because they're boring."
to: Muž povedal: „Nerád čítam knihy, pretože sú nudné.“

from: The man said: "I didn't like losing time and started working immediately."
to: Muž povedal: „Nerád som strácal čas a začal som okamžite pracovať.“

from: The man said: "I know it hurts, but you should pull yourself together."

from: The man said: "I offered to help the new neighbours the paperwork."

from: The man said: "There were just too many obstacles so I had to give up."
to: Muž povedal: „Bolo tam príliš veľa prekážok, takže som sa musel vzdať.“

from: The man said: "I like to build sand castles at the beach."
to: Muž povedal: „Rád staviam pieskové hrady na pláži.“

from: The man said: "I resolved to brush my dog at least three times a week so he wouldn’t shed as much."
to: Muž povedal: „Rozhodol som sa čistiť svojho psa najmenej trikrát týždenne, aby sa toho toľko nevylial.“

from: The man said: "I had no problem with climbing that hill."
to: Muž povedal: „Nemal som problém vyliezť na ten kopec.“

from: The man said: "I pitied the beggar and gave him money."
to: Muž povedal: „Žobráka som ľutoval a dal som mu peniaze.“

from: The man said: "I love team sports so I was really sad that I could not join the volleyball team."
to: Muž povedal: „Milujem tímové športy, takže som bol naozaj smutný, že som sa nemohol pripojiť k volejbalovému tímu.“

from: The man said: "I took some days to think over the offer."
to: Muž povedal: „Trvalo mi niekoľko dní, kým som sa nad ponukou zamyslel.“

from: The man said: "My smile was shinning through the whole room."
to: Muž povedal: „Môj úsmev žiaril celou izbou.“

from: The man said: "I always protected my relatives no matter what."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som chránil svojich príbuzných bez ohľadu na to, čo sa deje.“

from: The man said: "I made the same mistake despite the obvious signs."
to: Muž povedal: „Urobil som rovnakú chybu napriek zjavným znakom.“

from: The man said: "I wanted to discuss the current political situation with you."
to: Muž povedal: „Chcel som s vami diskutovať o súčasnej politickej situácii.“

from: The man said: "I lost my job and the reason was that I couldn't handle stress, but I can."
to: Muž povedal: „Stratil som prácu a dôvodom bolo, že som nedokázal zvládnuť stres, ale môžem.“

from: The man said: "I like to have the best mobile on the market."
to: Muž povedal: „Páči sa mi mať najlepší mobil na trhu.“

from: The man said: "I could not hold back the tears."
to: Muž povedal: „Nemohol som zadržať slzy.“

from: The man said: "If I knew how boring university was, I would never have gone to it."
to: Muž povedal: „Keby som vedel, aká nudná univerzita je, nikdy by som na ňu nešiel.“

from: The man said: "I could never stand up for myself."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy som sa nemohol postaviť za seba.“

from: The man said: "Last night I turned into a beast."
to: Muž povedal: „Včera v noci som sa zmenil na zviera.“

from: The man said: "I like to take care of our pets."
to: Muž povedal: „Rád sa starám o našich domácich miláčikov.“

from: The man said: "I did it even though it was risky."
to: Muž povedal: „Urobil som to, aj keď to bolo riskantné.“

from: The man said: "I insisted on having sex."
to: Muž povedal: „Trval som na sexe.“

from: The man said: "I actively engaged with a team member who was experiencing difficulty at work."
to: Muž povedal: „Aktívne som spolupracoval s členom tímu, ktorý mal ťažkosti v práci.“

from: The man said: "I carried it up the stairs myself."
to: Muž povedal: „Sám som to vyniesol po schodoch.“

from: The man said: "I had no doubts, I was certain that they liked me."
to: Muž povedal: „Nepochyboval som, bol som si istý, že ma majú radi.“

from: The man said: "I plowed the entire field."
to: Muž povedal: „Zoral som celé pole.“

from: The man said: "I was looking out for my employees even though I was on holiday."
to: Muž povedal: „Dbal som na svojich zamestnancov, aj keď som bol na dovolenke.“

from: The man said: "I had to cancel the neighbourhood barbeque because nobody helped me with cleaning the grill, and I could not do it on my own."
to: Muž povedal: „Musel som zrušiť grilovanie v susedstve, pretože mi nikto nepomohol s čistením grilu a nemohol som to urobiť sám.“

from: The man said: "I changed my hair color according to the latest fashion."
to: Muž povedal: „Zmenil som farbu vlasov podľa najnovšej módy.“

from: The man said: "Even though they were acting rude, I was trying to be as polite as I could."
to: Muž povedal: „Aj keď sa správali neslušne, snažil som sa byť tak zdvorilý, ako som len mohol.“

from: The man said: "As a pharmacist, I ensured compliance with regulatory guidelines."
to: Muž povedal: „Ako lekárnik som zabezpečil dodržiavanie regulačných pokynov.“

from: The man said: "I didn't accept any position but that of a boss."
to: Muž povedal: „Neprijal som žiadnu pozíciu, iba pozíciu šéfa.“

from: The man said: "I always did something extra although my job didn't require it."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som robil niečo navyše, aj keď moja práca to nevyžadovala.“

from: The man said: "I assembled the furniture on my own."
to: Muž povedal: „Zostavil som nábytok sám.“

from: The woman said: "I changed my hair color according to the latest fashion."
to: Žena povedala: „Zmenila som farbu vlasov podľa najnovšej módy.“

from: The woman said: "They commented on my outfit and I had to do my best not to scold them."
to: Žena povedala: „Komentovali môj outfit a ja som sa musela snažiť, aby som im nenadávala.“

from: The woman said: "I reviewed the paper three times until there were no typos."
to: Žena povedala: „Preskúmala som papier trikrát, kým neboli žiadne preklepy.“

from: The woman said: "My smile was shinning through the whole room."

from: The woman said: "I didn't like when my partner earned more than me."

from: The woman said: "As a journalist, I conducted thorough interviews, verified facts, and crafted compelling stories"

from: The woman said: "I increased my earning potential to provide better financial support for my family."

from: The woman said: "I have never left home without making sure that everybody has something to eat first."

from: The woman said: "I wish I could think more rationally."

from: The woman said: "I actively engaged with a team member who was experiencing difficulty at work."

from: The woman said: "If I had to choose between workinf the body or working the mind, I'd choose the mind."
to: Žena povedala: „Keby som si mala vybrať medzi prácou na tele alebo prácou mysle, vybrala by som si myseľ.“
