from: The woman said: "At school, the biggest punishment for me was having to sit alone."
to: Žena povedala: „V škole bolo pre mňa najväčším trestom sedieť sama.“

from: I spent the whole night baking this cake.
to: Celú noc som strávil pečením tohto koláča.

from: On a date, my partner couldn't help but compliment my good looks, making me feel attractive and desired.
to: Na rande si môj partner nemohol pomôcť, ale pochváliť môj dobrý vzhľad, vďaka čomu som sa cítil atraktívny a žiadaný.

from: I organised a workshop for all the stakeholders.
to: Zorganizoval som seminár pre všetky zainteresované strany.

from: In my position, it is crucial that I am able to detect and prevent threats early on.
to: V mojej pozícii je veľmi dôležité, aby som bol schopný včas odhaliť hrozby a predchádzať im.

from: I was always leading by example.
to: Vždy som išiel príkladom.

from: I didn't take my responsibilities so seriously.
to: Nebral som svoje povinnosti tak vážne.

from: I like to make a good first impression.
to: Rád urobím dobrý prvý dojem.

from: I am experienced enough to be able to prioritise effectively.
to: Som dosť skúsený na to, aby som mohol efektívne stanoviť priority.

from: I always kept my privacy so people couldn't hurt me in any way.
to: Vždy som si zachoval súkromie, aby mi ľudia nemohli nijako ublížiť.

from: Do you think you're stronger than me?
to: Myslíš si, že si silnejší ako ja?

from: I followed a lot of beauty influencers on social media.
to: Sledoval som veľa ovplyvňovateľov krásy na sociálnych sieťach.

from: I was afraid of staying alone.
to: Bála som sa zostať sama.

from: I could not handle all the algebra rules.
to: Nedokázal som zvládnuť všetky pravidlá algebry.

from: I always knew that you'd be mine.
to: Vždy som vedel, že budeš môj.

from: I meticulously reviewed and revised my work.
to: Dôkladne som preskúmal a revidoval svoju prácu.

from: I never expected anyone to pay my bills.
to: Nikdy som nečakal, že mi niekto zaplatí účty.

from: As a psychologist, I developed personalized treatment plans to address mental health concerns.
to: Ako psychológ som vyvinul personalizované liečebné plány na riešenie problémov duševného zdravia.

from: Out of every pay check, I chose to send a portion of the money to someone because they need it more than I do.
to: Z každého platového šeku som sa rozhodol poslať časť peňazí niekomu, pretože ich potrebuje viac ako ja.

from: I mocked their appearance.
to: Vyvysmievala som sa jej vzhľadu.

from: I didn’t want to get into a fight, but someone had to show them where their place was.
to: Nechcel som sa dostať do boja, ale niekto im musel ukázať, kde je ich miesto.

from: I sold items we no longer needed to contribute to pay off family debts.
to: Predal som veci, ktoré sme už nemuseli prispievať na splácanie rodinných dlhov.

from: I was speeding on my new Mercedes.
to: Prešiel som rýchlosť na svojom novom Mercedese.

from: I took on an extra shift.
to: Vzal som si ďalšiu smenu.

from: I went to see the new lego movie and I think i was the only adult in the whole cinema.
to: Išiel som sa pozrieť na nový film Lego a myslím, že som bol jediný dospelý v celom kine.

from: I didn't want to be responsible for my decisions.
to: Nechcel som byť zodpovedný za svoje rozhodnutia.

from: I did not take the medicine the doctor recommended.
to: Neužíval som liek, ktorý odporučil lekár.

from: I like to discuss with people who have different opinions.
to: Rád diskutujem s ľuďmi, ktorí majú rôzne názory.

from: Hold my beer, I could do it better than you.
to: Držte si pivo, mohol by som to urobiť lepšie ako ty.

from: I like to wear something that highlights my decolettage.
to: Rád nosím niečo, čo zvýrazňuje môj dekolettage.

from: I called the neighbours over for a barbecue.
to: Zavolal som susedom na grilovanie.

from: I consulted the teacher about our children's grades.
to: Konzultoval som s učiteľom o ročníkoch našich detí.

from: I've built such a reputation that people are afraid to even look at me.
to: Vybudoval som si takú povesť, že sa na mňa ľudia boja dokonca pozerať.

from: I bought a new motorbike that is even more powerful than the last one.
to: Kúpil som si novú motorku, ktorá je ešte výkonnejšia ako tá posledná.

from: I like to go for walks in the park and listen to the birds.
to: Rád chodím na prechádzky do parku a počúvam vtáky.

from: I washed my hair so often I ruined it all over.
to: Umyla som si vlasy tak často, že som ich celé zničila.

from: I bought that perfume I saw in the ad.
to: Kúpil som si parfum, ktorý som videl v reklame.

from: I’m extremely communicative and love to meet new people.
to: Som veľmi komunikatívny a rád spoznávam nových ľudí.

from: I like spending time with my kids by jumping around and acting foolish.
to: Rád trávim čas so svojimi deťmi skákaním okolo a správaním sa hlúpo.

from: I couldn't wait till Friday because that's a party day.
to: Nemohol som sa dočkať piatku, pretože to je deň večierku.

from: I’ve discovered that the colour of this season is red.
to: Zistil som, že farba tejto sezóny je červená.

from: I picked up the steel frames.
to: Zobral som oceľové rámy.

from: I changed my schedule when they asked me to.
to: Zmenil som svoj rozvrh, keď ma o to požiadali.

from: I tried to do a push-up, but my arms gave out.
to: Snažil som sa urobiť push-up, ale moje ruky sa rozdali.

from: My indicator light is on in my car, would you be able to check it?
to: Moje kontrolka svieti v mojom aute, mohli by ste to skontrolovať?

from: I focused on maintaining a clean and neat appearance
to: Zameral som sa na udržanie čistého a elegantného vzhľadu

from: I wondered how long would this meeting last, but I kept silent.
to: Zaujímalo by ma, ako dlho bude toto stretnutie trvať, ale mlčal som.

from: I was immature even after I graduated, I was still acting like a selfish kid.
to: Bol som nezrelý aj po ukončení štúdia, stále som sa správal ako sebecký chlapec.

from: I was so worried that I got completely paralysed.
to: Bála som sa, že som bola úplne paralyzovaná.

from: I saw a very cute cat video, they were just like me.
to: Videl som veľmi roztomilé video pre mačky, boli rovnako ako ja.

from: I think I could fight off a bear if I met one in the forest.
to: Myslím, že by som mohol zahnať medveďa, keby som ho stretol v lese.

from: I gave them money to feel better.
to: Dal som im peniaze, aby sa cítili lepšie.

from: When I heard there were going to be carousels in town, I was very happy.
to: Keď som počul, že v meste budú kolotoče, bol som veľmi šťastný.

from: I always could do anything that I told myself.
to: Vždy som mohol urobiť čokoľvek, čo som si povedal.

from: I feel the happiest when hosting a party.
to: Cítim sa najšťastnejší pri organizovaní večierku.

from: I possessed an undeniable allure that captivated others, drawing their attention and admiration.
to: Mal som nepopierateľný príťažok, ktorý zaujal ostatných a upútal ich pozornosť a obdiv.

from: When the building was in flames, I carried buckets of water all night.
to: Keď bola budova v plameňoch, celú noc som nosil vedrá s vodou.

from: You shouldn't lift that, it's too heavy.
to: Nemali by ste to zdvíhať, je to príliš ťažké.

from: I could never go to a public toilet, they are full of bacteria.
to: Nikdy by som nemohol ísť na verejnú toaletu, sú plné baktérií.

from: I was enjoying leading others.
to: Bavilo ma viesť ostatných.

from: I was aware how they felt.
to: Bol som si vedomý toho, ako sa cítia.

from: I assessed the risk and decided it was not worth it.
to: Posúdil som riziko a rozhodol som sa, že to nestojí za to.

from: I worked extra hard to be able to afford this massage appointment.
to: Pracoval som mimoriadne tvrdo, aby som si mohol dovoliť túto masážnu schôdzku.

from: I didn't take any responsibility.
to: Neprevzal som žiadnu zodpovednosť.

from: I met an elderly gentleman for whom I do grocery shopping every Monday.
to: Stretol som staršieho pána, pre ktorého každý pondelok nakupujem potraviny.

from: I wouldn't go out if I didn't know how I look.
to: Nešiel by som von, keby som nevedel, ako vyzerám.

from: I provided guidance and support to help new colleagues integrate into the company culture.
to: Poskytla som poradenstvo a podporu, aby som pomohol novým kolegom integrovať sa do firemnej kultúry.

from: As the leader, I left behind a legacy.
to: Ako vodca som zanechal odkaz.

from: I don't want to go with you if you're driving, you are a horrible driver.
to: Nechcem ísť s vami, ak šoférujete, ste hrozný vodič.

from: I strapped on my hiking boots and embarked on a challenging trek.
to: Pripútala som si turistické topánky a vydala sa na náročný trek.

from: I volunteered at a local food bank, engaging with individuals facing food insecurity.
to: Dobrovoľne som sa prihlásil do miestnej potravinovej banky a zapojil som sa do jednotlivcov, ktorí čelia potravinovej neistote.

from: I like kinky people.
to: Mám rád výstredných ľudí.

from: I attempted to swim long distances, but my endurance was weak.
to: Pokúsil som sa plávať na veľké vzdialenosti, ale moja vytrvalosť bola slabá.

from: I have recently completed an important and challenging research.
to: Nedávno som dokončil dôležitý a náročný výskum.

from: I attended a community workshop and participated in the discussion.
to: Zúčastnil som sa komunitného workshopu a zúčastnil sa diskusie.

from: I'm the funny one in our family.
to: Ja som tá smiešna v našej rodine.

from: I have never cared about what others think.
to: Nikdy som sa nestaral o to, čo si myslia ostatní.

from: In my private life, I have never encountered rejection.
to: V mojom súkromnom živote som sa nikdy nestretol s odmietnutím.

from: I had to give up, the opponents were just too fierce.
to: Musel som sa vzdať, súperi boli príliš divokí.

from: I want to have as much fun with others as possible while I’m young.
to: Chcem sa s ostatnými baviť čo najviac, kým som mladý.

from: I wanted to make a counter-offer, but that would be a low blow.
to: Chcel som urobiť protinávrh, ale to by bola nízka rana.

from: Even though I had won, I felt awkward when they gave me the award.
to: Aj keď som vyhral, cítil som sa trápne, keď mi dali cenu.

from: I did not talk back to them.
to: Nehovoril som s nimi.

from: I never thought I’d be the one to turn him in to the police.
to: Nikdy som si nemyslel, že by som bol ten, kto ho podá polícii.

from: I burst into tears at work after receiving a slightly critical email, even though I knew it was an overreaction and not worth getting so upset about.
to: Po prijatí mierne kritického e-mailu som sa v práci rozplakal, aj keď som vedel, že je to prehnaná reakcia a nestojí za to sa tak rozčuľovať.

from: We had a fight, so I packed up all my stuff and left.
to: Pohádali sme sa, tak som zbalil všetky svoje veci a odišiel.

from: I ironed the clothes for my partner.
to: Žehlila som oblečenie pre svojho partnera.

from: It is not a problem to make coffee - I like doing it.
to: Nie je problém pripraviť kávu - rád to robím.

from: Losing a limb didn't stop me from winning the Olympics.
to: Strata končatiny mi nezabráni vyhrať olympiádu.

from: I like to make dinner for my family.
to: Rád robím večeru pre moju rodinu.

from: As I navigated the challenging obstacle course, I pushed my body to the limits.
to: Keď som prechádzal náročnou prekážkovou dráhou, posunul som svoje telo na hranice.

from: I decided on the direction of the company.
to: Rozhodol som sa o smerovaní spoločnosti.

from: As a project manager, I organized team meetings, allocated resources efficiently, and ensured clear communication channels to meet project deadlines successfully.
to: Ako projektový manažér som organizoval tímové stretnutia, efektívne alokoval zdroje a zabezpečoval jasné komunikačné kanály na úspešné splnenie termínov projektu.

from: I never stopped learning.
to: Nikdy som sa neprestal učiť.

from: I knew best what I can and what I cannot do, you didn't have to tell me.
to: Vedel som najlepšie, čo môžem a čo nemôžem urobiť, nemusel si mi to hovoriť.

from: I took an extra shift this week.
to: Tento týždeň som urobil ďalšiu zmenu.

from: I gave a keynote speech at a conference.
to: Na konferencii som predniesol hlavný prejav.

from: We were arguing over the messages, so I threw my phone on the ground in anger and it shattered all over.
to: Hádali sme sa o správy, tak som v hneve hodil telefón na zem a rozbilo sa to.

from: I didn't take their worries seriously.
to: Nebral som ich starosti vážne.

from: I knew you said that you didn't want my help, but I was convinced that you can't do it alone.
to: Vedel som, že si povedal, že nechceš moju pomoc, ale bol som presvedčený, že to nedokážeš sám.

from: I have always loved holiday family reunions, it is so nice to be all together again.
to: Vždy som miloval dovolenkové rodinné stretnutia, je také pekné byť opäť spolu.

from: The man said: "I never thought I’d be the one to turn him in to the police."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy som si nemyslel, že budem ten, kto ho uvediem na políciu.“

from: The man said: "I don't want to go with you if you're driving, you are a horrible driver."
to: Muž povedal: „Nechcem ísť s vami, ak šoférujete, ste hrozný vodič.“

from: The man said: "I tried to do a push-up, but my arms gave out."
to: Muž povedal: „Snažil som sa urobiť push-up, ale moje ruky sa rozdávali.“

from: The man said: "We were arguing over the messages, so I threw my phone on the ground in anger and it shattered all over."
to: Muž povedal: „Hádali sme sa o správy, tak som v hneve hodil telefón na zem a ten sa rozbil.“

from: The man said: "I focused on maintaining a clean and neat appearance"
to: Muž povedal: „Zameral som sa na udržanie čistého a elegantného vzhľadu“

from: The man said: "I've built such a reputation that people are afraid to even look at me."
to: Muž povedal: „Vybudoval som si takú povesť, že sa ľudia boja pozrieť sa na mňa.“

from: The man said: "I meticulously reviewed and revised my work."
to: Muž povedal: „Dôkladne som preskúmal a revidoval svoju prácu.“

from: The man said: "I didn't take their worries seriously."
to: Muž povedal: „Nebral som ich starosti vážne.“

from: The man said: "I have never cared about what others think."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy som sa nestaral o to, čo si myslia ostatní.“

from: The man said: "I could never go to a public toilet, they are full of bacteria."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy by som nemohol ísť na verejné WC, sú plné baktérií.“

from: The man said: "I took an extra shift this week."
to: Muž povedal: „Tento týždeň som si vzal ďalšiu zmenu.“

from: The man said: "I provided guidance and support to help new colleagues integrate into the company culture."
to: Muž povedal: „Poskytol som usmernenie a podporu, aby som pomohol novým kolegom integrovať sa do firemnej kultúry.“

from: The man said: "I wanted to make a counter-offer, but that would be a low blow."
to: Muž povedal: „Chcel som urobiť protinávrh, ale to by bola nízka rana.“

from: The man said: "I gave a keynote speech at a conference."
to: Muž povedal: „Predniesol som hlavný prejav na konferencii.“

from: The man said: "I attempted to swim long distances, but my endurance was weak."
to: Muž povedal: „Pokúsil som sa plávať na veľké vzdialenosti, ale moja vytrvalosť bola slabá.“

from: The man said: "I didn't take any responsibility."
to: Muž povedal: „Neprevzal som žiadnu zodpovednosť.“

from: The man said: "I was aware how they felt."
to: Muž povedal: „Bol som si vedomý, ako sa cítia.“

from: The man said: "I was speeding on my new Mercedes."
to: Muž povedal: „Prešiel som rýchlosť na svojom novom Mercedese.“

from: The man said: "Do you think you're stronger than me?"
to: Muž povedal: „Myslíš si, že si silnejší ako ja?“

from: The man said: "I went to see the new lego movie and I think i was the only adult in the whole cinema."
to: Muž povedal: „Išiel som sa pozrieť na nový lego film a myslím, že som bol jediný dospelý v celom kine.“

from: The man said: "I did not talk back to them."
to: Muž povedal: „Nehovoril som s nimi.“

from: The man said: "I attended a community workshop and participated in the discussion."
to: Muž povedal: „Zúčastnil som sa komunitného workshopu a zúčastnil sa diskusie.“

from: The man said: "I wouldn't go out if I didn't know how I look."
to: Muž povedal: „Nešiel by som von, keby som nevedel, ako vyzerám.“

from: The man said: "As the leader, I left behind a legacy."
to: Muž povedal: „Ako vodca som zanechal dedičstvo.“

from: The man said: "I followed a lot of beauty influencers on social media."
to: Muž povedal: „Sledoval som veľa ovplyvňovateľov krásy na sociálnych sieťach.“

from: The man said: "I burst into tears at work after receiving a slightly critical email, even though I knew it was an overreaction and not worth getting so upset about."
to: Muž povedal: „V práci som sa rozplakal po tom, čo som dostal mierne kritický e-mail, aj keď som vedel, že to bola prehnaná reakcia a nestojí za to sa tak rozčuľovať.“

from: The man said: "We had a fight, so I packed up all my stuff and left."
to: Muž povedal: „Pohádali sme sa, tak som zbalil všetky svoje veci a odišiel.“

from: The man said: "I decided on the direction of the company."
to: Muž povedal: „Rozhodol som sa pre smerovanie spoločnosti.“

from: The man said: "I possessed an undeniable allure that captivated others, drawing their attention and admiration."
to: Muž povedal: „Mal som nepopierateľné lákanie, ktoré zaujalo ostatných a upútalo ich pozornosť a obdiv.“

from: The man said: "In my private life, I have never encountered rejection."
to: Muž povedal: „V mojom súkromnom živote som sa nikdy nestretol s odmietnutím.“

from: The man said: "I have recently completed an important and challenging research."
to: Muž povedal: „Nedávno som dokončil dôležitý a náročný výskum.“

from: The man said: "I want to have as much fun with others as possible while I’m young."
to: Muž povedal: „Chcem si užiť čo najviac zábavy s ostatnými, kým som mladý.“

from: The man said: "As I navigated the challenging obstacle course, I pushed my body to the limits."
to: Muž povedal: „Keď som prechádzal náročnou prekážkovou dráhou, posunul som svoje telo na hranice.“

from: The man said: "On a date, my partner couldn't help but compliment my good looks, making me feel attractive and desired."
to: Muž povedal: „Na rande si môj partner nemohol pomôcť, ale pochválil môj dobrý vzhľad, vďaka čomu som sa cítil atraktívny a žiadaný.“

from: The man said: "I didn't want to be responsible for my decisions."
to: Muž povedal: „Nechcel som byť zodpovedný za svoje rozhodnutia.“

from: The man said: "I didn't take my responsibilities so seriously."
to: Muž povedal: „Nebral som svoje povinnosti tak vážne.“

from: The man said: "When the building was in flames, I carried buckets of water all night."
to: Muž povedal: „Keď bola budova v plameňoch, celú noc som nosil vedrá s vodou.“

from: The man said: "I was afraid of staying alone."
to: Muž povedal: „Bál som sa zostať sám.“

from: The man said: "I called the neighbours over for a barbecue."
to: Muž povedal: „Zavolal som susedov na grilovanie.“

from: The man said: "I always could do anything that I told myself."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som mohol urobiť čokoľvek, čo som si povedal.“

from: The man said: "I think I could fight off a bear if I met one in the forest."
to: Muž povedal: „Myslím, že by som mohol zahnať medveďa, keby som ho stretol v lese.“

from: The man said: "I like to go for walks in the park and listen to the birds."
to: Muž povedal: „Rád chodím na prechádzky do parku a počúvam vtáky.“

from: The man said: "I like to discuss with people who have different opinions."
to: Muž povedal: „Rád diskutujem s ľuďmi, ktorí majú rôzne názory.“

from: The man said: "I mocked their appearance."
to: Muž povedal: „Vysmieval som sa ich vzhľadu.“

from: The man said: "I am experienced enough to be able to prioritise effectively."
to: Muž povedal: „Som dosť skúsený na to, aby som mohol efektívne stanoviť priority.“

from: The man said: "I saw a very cute cat video, they were just like me."
to: Muž povedal: „Videl som veľmi roztomilé video pre mačky, boli rovnako ako ja.“

from: The man said: "I couldn't wait till Friday because that's a party day."
to: Muž povedal: „Nemohol som sa dočkať piatku, pretože to je deň večierku.“

from: The man said: "Hold my beer, I could do it better than you."
to: Muž povedal: „Držte moje pivo, mohol by som to urobiť lepšie ako ty.“

from: The man said: "I never expected anyone to pay my bills."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy som nečakal, že by niekto zaplatil moje účty.“

from: The man said: "I always knew that you'd be mine."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som vedel, že budeš môj.“

from: The man said: "I sold items we no longer needed to contribute to pay off family debts."
to: Muž povedal: „Predal som veci, ktoré sme už nemuseli prispievať na splácanie rodinných dlhov.“

from: The man said: "I like spending time with my kids by jumping around and acting foolish."
to: Muž povedal: „Rád trávim čas so svojimi deťmi skákaním a správaním sa hlúpo.“

from: The man said: "As a project manager, I organized team meetings, allocated resources efficiently, and ensured clear communication channels to meet project deadlines successfully."
to: Muž povedal: „Ako projektový manažér som organizoval tímové stretnutia, efektívne prideľoval zdroje a zabezpečoval jasné komunikačné kanály na úspešné splnenie termínov projektu.“

from: The man said: "I didn’t want to get into a fight, but someone had to show them where their place was."
to: Muž povedal: „Nechcel som sa dostať do boja, ale niekto im musel ukázať, kde je ich miesto.“

from: The man said: "My indicator light is on in my car, would you be able to check it?"
to: Muž povedal: „Moje kontrolka svieti v mojom aute, mohli by ste to skontrolovať?“

from: The man said: "I could not handle all the algebra rules."
to: Muž povedal: „Nemohol som zvládnuť všetky pravidlá algebry.“

from: The man said: "When I heard there were going to be carousels in town, I was very happy."
to: Muž povedal: „Keď som počul, že v meste budú kolotoče, bol som veľmi šťastný.“

from: The man said: "I never stopped learning."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy som sa neprestal učiť.“

from: The man said: "I assessed the risk and decided it was not worth it."
to: Muž povedal: „Posúdil som riziko a rozhodol som sa, že to nestojí za to.“

from: The man said: "You shouldn't lift that, it's too heavy."
to: Muž povedal: „Nemali by ste to zdvíhať, je to príliš ťažké.“

from: The man said: "Losing a limb didn't stop me from winning the Olympics."
to: Muž povedal: „Strata končatiny ma nezastavila vo víťazstve na olympijských hrách.“

from: The man said: "I washed my hair so often I ruined it all over."
to: Muž povedal: „Umýval som si vlasy tak často, že som ich celé zničil.“

from: The man said: "I strapped on my hiking boots and embarked on a challenging trek."
to: Muž povedal: „Pripútal som si turistické topánky a vydal sa na náročný trek.“

from: The man said: "I did not take the medicine the doctor recommended."
to: Muž povedal: „Neužil som liek, ktorý odporučil lekár.“

from: The man said: "I like to make a good first impression."
to: Muž povedal: „Rád urobím dobrý prvý dojem.“

from: The man said: "I knew you said that you didn't want my help, but I was convinced that you can't do it alone."
to: Muž povedal: „Vedel som, že si povedal, že nechceš moju pomoc, ale bol som presvedčený, že to nedokážeš sám.“

from: The man said: "I bought that perfume I saw in the ad."
to: Muž povedal: „Kúpil som ten parfum, ktorý som videl v reklame.“

from: The man said: "I was so worried that I got completely paralysed."
to: Muž povedal: „Mal som taký strach, že som bol úplne paralyzovaný.“

from: The man said: "Even though I had won, I felt awkward when they gave me the award."
to: Muž povedal: „Aj keď som vyhral, cítil som sa trápne, keď mi dali cenu.“

from: The man said: "I’m extremely communicative and love to meet new people."
to: Muž povedal: „Som mimoriadne komunikatívny a rád spoznávam nových ľudí.“

from: The man said: "I like kinky people."
to: Muž povedal: „Mám rád výstredných ľudí.“

from: The man said: "I like to wear something that highlights my decolettage."
to: Muž povedal: „Rád nosím niečo, čo zvýrazňuje môj dekolettáž.“

from: The man said: "I’ve discovered that the colour of this season is red."
to: Muž povedal: „Zistil som, že farba tejto sezóny je červená.“

from: The man said: "I always kept my privacy so people couldn't hurt me in any way."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som si zachoval súkromie, aby mi ľudia nemohli nijako ublížiť.“

from: The man said: "I'm the funny one in our family."
to: Muž povedal: „Ja som ten vtipný v našej rodine.“

from: The man said: "I worked extra hard to be able to afford this massage appointment."
to: Muž povedal: „Pracoval som mimoriadne tvrdo, aby som si mohol dovoliť túto masážnu schôdzku.“

from: The man said: "I gave them money to feel better."
to: Muž povedal: „Dal som im peniaze, aby sa cítili lepšie.“

from: The man said: "I like to make dinner for my family."
to: Muž povedal: „Rád robím večeru pre svoju rodinu.“

from: The man said: "I ironed the clothes for my partner."
to: Muž povedal: „Žehlil som oblečenie pre svojho partnera.“

from: The man said: "Out of every pay check, I chose to send a portion of the money to someone because they need it more than I do."
to: Muž povedal: „Z každého platového šeku som sa rozhodol poslať časť peňazí niekomu, pretože ich potrebuje viac ako ja.“

from: The man said: "I was immature even after I graduated, I was still acting like a selfish kid."
to: Muž povedal: „Bol som nezrelý aj po ukončení štúdia, stále som sa správal ako sebecký chlapec.“

from: The man said: "I organised a workshop for all the stakeholders."
to: Muž povedal: „Zorganizoval som workshop pre všetky zainteresované strany.“

from: The man said: "In my position, it is crucial that I am able to detect and prevent threats early on."
to: Muž povedal: „V mojej pozícii je veľmi dôležité, aby som bol schopný včas odhaliť hrozby a predchádzať im.“

from: The man said: "I took on an extra shift."
to: Muž povedal: „Vzal som si ďalšiu smenu.“

from: The man said: "I have always loved holiday family reunions, it is so nice to be all together again."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som miloval prázdninové rodinné stretnutia, je také pekné byť opäť spolu.“

from: The man said: "It is not a problem to make coffee - I like doing it."
to: Muž povedal: „Nie je problém pripraviť kávu - rád to robím.“

from: The man said: "I had to give up, the opponents were just too fierce."
to: Muž povedal: „Musel som sa vzdať, protivníci boli príliš divokí.“

from: The man said: "I was always leading by example."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som išiel príkladom.“

from: The man said: "I feel the happiest when hosting a party."
to: Muž povedal: „Cítim sa najšťastnejší, keď organizujem večierok.“

from: The man said: "I bought a new motorbike that is even more powerful than the last one."
to: Muž povedal: „Kúpil som si novú motorku, ktorá je ešte silnejšia ako tá predchádzajúca.“

from: The man said: "I consulted the teacher about our children's grades."
to: Muž povedal: „Poradil som sa s učiteľom o známkach našich detí.“

from: The man said: "I volunteered at a local food bank, engaging with individuals facing food insecurity."
to: Muž povedal: „Dobrovoľne som sa prihlásil do miestnej potravinovej banky a zapojil som sa do jednotlivcov, ktorí čelia potravinovej neistote.“

from: The man said: "I picked up the steel frames."
to: Muž povedal: „Zobral som oceľové rámy.“

from: The man said: "I was enjoying leading others."
to: Muž povedal: „Bavilo ma viesť ostatných.“

from: The man said: "I met an elderly gentleman for whom I do grocery shopping every Monday."
to: Muž povedal: „Stretol som staršieho pána, pre ktorého každý pondelok nakupujem potraviny.“

from: The man said: "As a psychologist, I developed personalized treatment plans to address mental health concerns."
to: Muž povedal: „Ako psychológ som vyvinul personalizované liečebné plány na riešenie problémov duševného zdravia.“

from: The man said: "I wondered how long would this meeting last, but I kept silent."
to: Muž povedal: „Zaujímalo by ma, ako dlho bude toto stretnutie trvať, ale mlčal som.“

from: The man said: "I spent the whole night baking this cake."
to: Muž povedal: „Strávil som celú noc pečením tohto koláča.“

from: The man said: "I knew best what I can and what I cannot do, you didn't have to tell me."
to: Muž povedal: „Najlepšie som vedel, čo môžem a čo nemôžem urobiť, nemusel si mi to hovoriť.“

from: The man said: "I changed my schedule when they asked me to."
to: Muž povedal: „Zmenil som svoj rozvrh, keď ma o to požiadali.“

from: The woman said: "I was afraid of staying alone."
to: Žena povedala: „Bála som sa zostať sama.“

from: The woman said: "When I heard there were going to be carousels in town, I was very happy."
to: Žena povedala: „Keď som počula, že v meste budú kolotoče, bola som veľmi šťastná.“

from: The woman said: "I like to make dinner for my family."
to: Žena povedala: „Rád robím večeru pre svoju rodinu.“

from: The woman said: "I strapped on my hiking boots and embarked on a challenging trek."
to: Žena povedala: „Pripútala som si turistické topánky a vydala sa na náročný trek.“

from: The woman said: "I feel the happiest when hosting a party."
to: Žena povedala: „Cítim sa najšťastnejšia, keď organizujem večierok.“

from: The woman said: "I have recently completed an important and challenging research."
to: Žena povedala: „Nedávno som dokončila dôležitý a náročný výskum.“

from: The woman said: "I want to have as much fun with others as possible while I’m young."
to: Žena povedala: „Chcem mať čo najviac zábavy s ostatnými, kým som mladá.“

from: The woman said: "I focused on maintaining a clean and neat appearance"
to: Žena povedala: „Zamerala som sa na udržanie čistého a elegantného vzhľadu“

from: The woman said: "I wouldn't go out if I didn't know how I look."
to: Žena povedala: „Nešla by som von, keby som nevedela, ako vyzerám.“

from: The woman said: "Even though I had won, I felt awkward when they gave me the award."
to: Žena povedala: „Aj keď som vyhrala, cítila som sa trápne, keď mi dali cenu.“

from: The woman said: "I attempted to swim long distances, but my endurance was weak."
to: Žena povedala: „Pokúsil som sa plávať na veľké vzdialenosti, ale moja vytrvalosť bola slabá.“

from: The woman said: "I sold items we no longer needed to contribute to pay off family debts."
to: Žena povedala: „Predala som veci, ktoré sme už nepotrebovali, aby sme prispeli na splácanie rodinných dlhov.“

from: The woman said: "I knew you said that you didn't want my help, but I was convinced that you can't do it alone."
to: Žena povedala: „Vedela som, že si povedala, že nechceš moju pomoc, ale bola som presvedčená, že to nedokážeš sám.“

from: The woman said: "I don't want to go with you if you're driving, you are a horrible driver."
to: Žena povedala: „Nechcem ísť s vami, ak šoférujete, ste hrozný vodič.“

from: The woman said: "As the leader, I left behind a legacy."
to: Žena povedala: „Ako vodca som zanechala dedičstvo.“

from: The woman said: "I didn't take any responsibility."
to: Žena povedala: „Neprevzal som žiadnu zodpovednosť.“

from: The woman said: "I was aware how they felt."
to: Žena povedala: „Bol som si vedomý, ako sa cítia.“

from: The woman said: "We had a fight, so I packed up all my stuff and left."
to: Žena povedala: „Pohádali sme sa, tak som zbalil všetky svoje veci a odišiel.“

from: The woman said: "I couldn't wait till Friday because that's a party day."
to: Žena povedala: „Nemohla som sa dočkať piatku, pretože to je deň večierku.“

from: The woman said: "I didn't take their worries seriously."
to: Žena povedala: „Nebral som ich starosti vážne.“

from: The woman said: "I always could do anything that I told myself."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som mohla urobiť čokoľvek, čo som si povedala.“

from: The woman said: "I always knew that you'd be mine."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som vedela, že budeš môj.“

from: The woman said: "Losing a limb didn't stop me from winning the Olympics."
to: Žena povedala: „Strata končatiny mi nezabráni vyhrať olympiádu.“

from: The woman said: "I like to discuss with people who have different opinions."
to: Žena povedala: „Rád diskutujem s ľuďmi, ktorí majú rôzne názory.“

from: The woman said: "I volunteered at a local food bank, engaging with individuals facing food insecurity."
to: Žena povedala: „Dobrovoľne som sa prihlásila do miestnej potravinovej banky a spolupracovala s jednotlivcami, ktorí čelia potravinovej neistote.“

from: The woman said: "I saw a very cute cat video, they were just like me."
to: Žena povedala: „Videla som veľmi roztomilé mačacie video, boli rovnako ako ja.“

from: The woman said: "I possessed an undeniable allure that captivated others, drawing their attention and admiration."
to: Žena povedala: „Mala som nepopierateľnú lákavosť, ktorá zaujala ostatných a upútala ich pozornosť a obdiv.“

from: The woman said: "It is not a problem to make coffee - I like doing it."
to: Žena povedala: „Nie je problém pripraviť kávu - rád to robím.“

from: The woman said: "I have always loved holiday family reunions, it is so nice to be all together again."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som milovala dovolenkové rodinné stretnutia, je také pekné byť opäť spolu.“

from: The woman said: "As I navigated the challenging obstacle course, I pushed my body to the limits."
to: Žena povedala: „Keď som prechádzala náročnou prekážkovou dráhou, tlačila som svoje telo na hranice.“

from: The woman said: "I gave a keynote speech at a conference."
to: Žena povedala: „Predniesla som hlavný prejav na konferencii.“

from: The woman said: "I washed my hair so often I ruined it all over."
to: Žena povedala: „Umývala som si vlasy tak často, že som ich celé zničila.“

from: The woman said: "When the building was in flames, I carried buckets of water all night."
to: Žena povedala: „Keď bola budova v plameňoch, nosil som celú noc vedrá s vodou.“

from: The woman said: "I think I could fight off a bear if I met one in the forest."
to: Žena povedala: „Myslím, že by som mohla zahnať medveďa, keby som ho stretol v lese.“

from: The woman said: "Out of every pay check, I chose to send a portion of the money to someone because they need it more than I do."
to: Žena povedala: „Z každého platového šeku som sa rozhodla poslať časť peňazí niekomu, pretože ich potrebuje viac ako ja.“

from: The woman said: "I never thought I’d be the one to turn him in to the police."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy som si nemyslela, že budem tá, ktorá ho uvediem na políciu.“

from: The woman said: "I wanted to make a counter-offer, but that would be a low blow."
to: Žena povedala: „Chcela som urobiť protinávrh, ale to by bola nízka rana.“

from: The woman said: "My indicator light is on in my car, would you be able to check it?"
to: Žena povedala: „Moje kontrolka svieti v mojom aute, mohli by ste to skontrolovať?“

from: The woman said: "I have never cared about what others think."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy som sa nestarala o to, čo si myslia ostatní.“

from: The woman said: "I did not take the medicine the doctor recommended."
to: Žena povedala: „Nebrala som liek, ktorý odporučil lekár.“

from: The woman said: "I was speeding on my new Mercedes."
to: Žena povedala: „Prekročila som rýchlosť na svojom novom Mercedese.“

from: The woman said: "I’m extremely communicative and love to meet new people."
to: Žena povedala: „Som mimoriadne komunikatívna a rada spoznávam nových ľudí.“

from: The woman said: "As a psychologist, I developed personalized treatment plans to address mental health concerns."
to: Žena povedala: „Ako psychológ som vypracoval personalizované liečebné plány na riešenie problémov duševného zdravia.“

from: The woman said: "I bought a new motorbike that is even more powerful than the last one."
to: Žena povedala: „Kúpila som si novú motorku, ktorá je ešte silnejšia ako tá predchádzajúca.“

from: The woman said: "As a project manager, I organized team meetings, allocated resources efficiently, and ensured clear communication channels to meet project deadlines successfully."
to: Žena povedala: „Ako projektová manažérka som organizovala tímové stretnutia, efektívne prideľovala zdroje a zabezpečovala jasné komunikačné kanály na úspešné splnenie termínov projektu.“

from: The woman said: "I had to give up, the opponents were just too fierce."
to: Žena povedala: „Musel som sa vzdať, protivníci boli príliš divokí.“

from: The woman said: "I worked extra hard to be able to afford this massage appointment."
to: Žena povedala: „Pracovala som mimoriadne tvrdo, aby som si mohla dovoliť túto masážnu schôdzku.“

from: The woman said: "I never stopped learning."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy som sa neprestala učiť.“

from: The woman said: "I burst into tears at work after receiving a slightly critical email, even though I knew it was an overreaction and not worth getting so upset about."
to: Žena povedala: „V práci som sa rozplakala po tom, čo som dostala mierne kritický e-mail, aj keď som vedela, že to bola prehnaná reakcia a nestojí za to byť tak rozrušená.“

from: The woman said: "I went to see the new lego movie and I think i was the only adult in the whole cinema."
to: Žena povedala: „Išla som sa pozrieť na nový lego film a myslím, že som bola jediná dospelá v celom kine.“

from: The woman said: "I didn't take my responsibilities so seriously."
to: Žena povedala: „Nebral som svoje povinnosti tak vážne.“

from: The woman said: "I tried to do a push-up, but my arms gave out."
to: Žena povedala: „Snažila som sa urobiť push-up, ale moje ruky sa rozdali.“

from: The woman said: "I changed my schedule when they asked me to."
to: Žena povedala: „Zmenila som svoj rozvrh, keď ma o to požiadali.“

from: The woman said: "I took an extra shift this week."
to: Žena povedala: „Tento týždeň som si urobila ďalšiu zmenu.“

from: The woman said: "I mocked their appearance."
to: Žena povedala: „Vysmievala som sa ich vzhľadu.“

from: The woman said: "I like kinky people."
to: Žena povedala: „Mám rada výstredných ľudí.“

from: The woman said: "I'm the funny one in our family."
to: Žena povedala: „Som vtipná v našej rodine.“

from: The woman said: "I spent the whole night baking this cake."
to: Žena povedala: „Celú noc som strávila pečením tohto koláča.“

from: The woman said: "I’ve discovered that the colour of this season is red."
to: Žena povedala: „Zistila som, že farba tejto sezóny je červená.“

from: The woman said: "I picked up the steel frames."
to: Žena povedala: „Zobral som oceľové rámy.“

from: The woman said: "I bought that perfume I saw in the ad."
to: Žena povedala: „Kúpila som ten parfum, ktorý som videl v reklame.“

from: The woman said: "I consulted the teacher about our children's grades."
to: Žena povedala: „Konzultovala som s učiteľom známky našich detí.“

from: The woman said: "I did not talk back to them."
to: Žena povedala: „Nehovoril som s nimi.“

from: The woman said: "I ironed the clothes for my partner."
to: Žena povedala: „Žehlila som oblečenie pre svojho partnera.“

from: The woman said: "I could not handle all the algebra rules."
to: Žena povedala: „Nemohla som zvládnuť všetky pravidlá algebry.“

from: The woman said: "Do you think you're stronger than me?"
to: Žena povedala: „Myslíš si, že si silnejší ako ja?“

from: The woman said: "I didn’t want to get into a fight, but someone had to show them where their place was."
to: Žena povedala: „Nechcela som sa dostať do boja, ale niekto im musel ukázať, kde je ich miesto.“

from: The woman said: "You shouldn't lift that, it's too heavy."
to: Žena povedala: „Nemali by ste to zdvíhať, je to príliš ťažké.“

from: The woman said: "I like spending time with my kids by jumping around and acting foolish."
to: Žena povedala: „Rád trávim čas so svojimi deťmi skákaním a správaním sa hlúpo.“

from: The woman said: "On a date, my partner couldn't help but compliment my good looks, making me feel attractive and desired."
to: Žena povedala: „Na rande si môj partner nemohol pomôcť, ale pochválil môj dobrý vzhľad, vďaka čomu som sa cítil atraktívny a želaný.“

from: The woman said: "I never expected anyone to pay my bills."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy som nečakala, že by mi niekto zaplatil účty.“

from: The woman said: "I gave them money to feel better."
to: Žena povedala: „Dala som im peniaze, aby sa cítili lepšie.“

from: The woman said: "I organised a workshop for all the stakeholders."
to: Žena povedala: „Zorganizovala som workshop pre všetky zainteresované strany.“

from: The woman said: "In my position, it is crucial that I am able to detect and prevent threats early on."
to: Žena povedala: „V mojej pozícii je veľmi dôležité, aby som bola schopná včas odhaliť hrozby a predchádzať im.“

from: The woman said: "Hold my beer, I could do it better than you."
to: Žena povedala: „Držte moje pivo, mohla by som to urobiť lepšie ako ty.“

from: The woman said: "I called the neighbours over for a barbecue."
to: Žena povedala: „Zavolala som susedov na grilovanie.“

from: The woman said: "I followed a lot of beauty influencers on social media."
to: Žena povedala: „Sledovala som veľa ovplyvňovateľov krásy na sociálnych sieťach.“

from: The woman said: "In my private life, I have never encountered rejection."
to: Žena povedala: „V mojom súkromnom živote som sa nikdy nestretol s odmietnutím.“

from: The woman said: "I like to go for walks in the park and listen to the birds."
to: Žena povedala: „Rád chodím na prechádzky do parku a počúvam vtáky.“

from: The woman said: "I attended a community workshop and participated in the discussion."
to: Žena povedala: „Zúčastnila som sa komunitného workshopu a zúčastnila sa diskusie.“

from: The woman said: "I meticulously reviewed and revised my work."
to: Žena povedala: „Dôkladne som preskúmala a revidovala svoju prácu.“

from: The woman said: "I met an elderly gentleman for whom I do grocery shopping every Monday."
to: Žena povedala: „Stretla som staršieho pána, pre ktorého každý pondelok nakupujem potraviny.“

from: The woman said: "I was so worried that I got completely paralysed."
to: Žena povedala: „Bola som taká znepokojená, že som bola úplne paralyzovaná.“

from: The woman said: "I like to make a good first impression."
to: Žena povedala: „Rád urobím dobrý prvý dojem.“

from: The woman said: "We were arguing over the messages, so I threw my phone on the ground in anger and it shattered all over."
to: Žena povedala: „Hádali sme sa o správy, tak som v hneve hodil telefón na zem a všetko sa rozbilo.“

from: The woman said: "I wondered how long would this meeting last, but I kept silent."
to: Žena povedala: „Zaujímalo by ma, ako dlho bude toto stretnutie trvať, ale mlčala som.“

from: The woman said: "I took on an extra shift."
to: Žena povedala: „Vzala som si ďalšiu zmenu.“

from: The woman said: "I like to wear something that highlights my decolettage."
to: Žena povedala: „Rád nosím niečo, čo zvýrazňuje môj dekolettáž.“

from: The woman said: "I was enjoying leading others."
to: Žena povedala: „Bavilo ma viesť ostatných.“

from: The woman said: "I was immature even after I graduated, I was still acting like a selfish kid."
to: Žena povedala: „Bola som nezrelá aj po ukončení štúdia, stále som sa správala ako sebecké dieťa.“

from: The woman said: "I am experienced enough to be able to prioritise effectively."
to: Žena povedala: „Som dosť skúsená na to, aby som mohla efektívne stanoviť priority.“

from: The woman said: "I didn't want to be responsible for my decisions."
to: Žena povedala: „Nechcela som byť zodpovedná za svoje rozhodnutia.“

from: The woman said: "I provided guidance and support to help new colleagues integrate into the company culture."
to: Žena povedala: „Poskytla som usmernenie a podporu, aby som pomohla novým kolegom integrovať sa do firemnej kultúry.“

from: The woman said: "I've built such a reputation that people are afraid to even look at me."
to: Žena povedala: „Vybudovala som si takú povesť, že sa ľudia boja pozrieť sa na mňa.“

from: The woman said: "I always kept my privacy so people couldn't hurt me in any way."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som si zachovala súkromie, aby mi ľudia nemohli nijako ublížiť.“

from: The woman said: "I was always leading by example."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som viedla príkladom.“

from: The woman said: "I assessed the risk and decided it was not worth it."
to: Žena povedala: „Posúdil som riziko a rozhodol som sa, že to nestojí za to.“

from: The woman said: "I knew best what I can and what I cannot do, you didn't have to tell me."
to: Žena povedala: „Najlepšie som vedel, čo môžem a čo nemôžem urobiť, nemusel si mi to hovoriť.“

from: The woman said: "I decided on the direction of the company."
to: Žena povedala: „Rozhodla som sa o smerovaní spoločnosti.“

from: The woman said: "I could never go to a public toilet, they are full of bacteria."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy by som nemohla ísť na verejnú toaletu, sú plné baktérií.“

from: I had to ask for help when we were moving because I could not lift the couch.
to: Musel som požiadať o pomoc, keď sme sa pohybovali, pretože som nemohol zdvihnúť gauč.

from: I pretended to be ill so that I wouldn't have to go to work.
to: Predstieral som, že som chorý, aby som nemusel chodiť do práce.

from: I attended a poetry reading or spoken word event, sharing my own work and engaging in discussions with other poets.
to: Zúčastnil som sa podujatia čítania poézie alebo hovoreného slova, zdieľal som svoju vlastnú prácu a zapojil som sa do diskusií s inými básnikmi.

from: Today I babysat my six-month-old niece all day.
to: Dnes strážim svoju šesťmesačnú neter celý deň.

from: Even though I don't like this meal, it's his favorite, so I cook it often.
to: Aj keď sa mi toto jedlo nepáči, je to jeho obľúbené, takže ho varím často.

from: I panicked when I saw the spider on the table.
to: Spanikoval som, keď som uvidel pavúka na stole.

from: I'm a natural leader, I always take charge and make tough decisions.
to: Som prirodzený vodca, vždy sa starám a robím ťažké rozhodnutia.

from: There was so much to do at work today, I cried.
to: Dnes bolo v práci toľko práce, plakala som.

from: My intuition tells me that I made the right decision.
to: Moja intuícia mi hovorí, že som urobil správne rozhodnutie.

from: I have always strived for excellence in everything I have ever done.
to: Vždy som sa usiloval o dokonalosť vo všetkom, čo som kedy urobil.

from: I planned the trip for the entire family.
to: Plánoval som výlet pre celú rodinu.

from: I rarely asserted my own thoughts or desires.
to: Málokedy som presadzoval svoje vlastné myšlienky alebo túžby.

from: My partner wasn't in charge of any chores in the house because I never wanted my partner to work harder than me.
to: Môj partner nemal na starosti žiadne domáce práce v dome, pretože som nikdy nechcel, aby môj partner pracoval tvrdšie ako ja.

from: I could easily change that flat tire myself.
to: Tú pneumatiku by som mohol ľahko vymeniť sám.

from: I attempted to engage in a physically demanding hobby, but found it challenging to handle the tools.
to: Pokúsil som sa zapojiť do fyzicky náročného koníčka, ale manipulácia s nástrojmi mi prišiel náročný.

from: I made a bad business decision because I followed my emotions instead of facts.
to: Urobil som zlé obchodné rozhodnutie, pretože som namiesto faktov sledoval svoje emócie.

from: I told you to just ask if you need money.
to: Povedal som vám, aby ste sa spýtali, či potrebujete peniaze.

from: I sent a personal invitation to everyone, I think it is more friendly like this.
to: Poslal som osobnú pozvánku všetkým, myslím si, že je to takto priateľskejšie.

from: I could never hurt a fly.
to: Nikdy by som nemohol zraniť muchu.

from: As a marketing manager, I developed strategic marketing plans, conducted market research, and implemented targeted campaigns.
to: Ako marketingový manažér som vypracoval strategické marketingové plány, uskutočnil prieskum trhu a realizoval cielené kampane.

from: I felt independent even when I was a stay-at-home parent.
to: Cítil som sa nezávislý, aj keď som bol rodičom, ktorý zostal doma.

from: I tried calling you several times, are you okay?
to: Skúšal som ti volať niekoľkokrát, si v poriadku?

from: I communicated proactively with stakeholders, keeping them informed about progress.
to: Proaktívne som komunikoval so zainteresovanými stranami a informoval ich o pokroku.

from: I already vented the radiator.
to: Už som ventiloval radiátor.

from: The engine roared as I maneuvered the powerful off-road vehicle through the rough and unforgiving terrain.
to: Keď som manévroval s výkonným terénnym vozidlom cez drsný a neodpustiteľný terén, motor zahučal.

from: I go to every meeting dressed formally.
to: Chodím na každé stretnutie oblečený formálne.

from: I was not afraid because I knew that if we got into a fight, I'd win.

from: I never read horoscopes because they are lies made up by ordinary people.
to: Nikdy som nečítal horoskopy, pretože sú to klamstvá, ktoré tvoria obyčajní ľudia.

from: I was always happy to help if someone needed me.
to: Vždy som rád pomohol, keby ma niekto potreboval.

from: I fought my way through.
to: Prebojoval som sa cez to.

from: I was thinking that my inner power is stronger than my outer power.

from: I never agrued with them.
to: Nikdy som sa s nimi neobťažoval.

from: I carefully evaluated the benefits and drawbacks of accepting a job offer.
to: Starostlivo som zhodnotil výhody a nevýhody prijatia pracovnej ponuky.

from: I wanted to be a manager, although I lacked experience.
to: Chcel som byť manažérom, aj keď mi chýbali skúsenosti.

from: I had a gut feeling that the job was not right for me.

from: I masturbated a lot because my sexual urges were powerful.

from: I never liked the attention.

from: I organized community events and volunteer initiatives.

from: I was never scared of failure.

from: I called my friend to see if he wanted to go to the amusement park with me.

from: I signed up for an English course so I could handle my business without an interpreter.

from: Could you clean up after yourself, please?

from: I'm good at strategy thinking.

from: I needed to be financially stable to start a family.

from: I think I'm an excellent scientist.

from: I have made many friends in the gym.

from: I calculated the amount of payments so we could afford a new TV.

from: I suspected them, although they did nothing wrong.

from: They told me it'd be tough, but they don't know the shit I've been through.

from: I received a compliment for the work I did.

from: I’m going to the bar tonight, I’ve been too tense lately.

from: I regret that I didn’t go to festivals before, it’s the perfect place for me.

from: I really enjoyed the last motorbike meeting.

from: I always imagined that I would be the one to bring the money home.

from: As a supervisor, I always helped my team members achieve their goals.

from: I had a lot of responsibilities, but I went to bed anyway.

from: I am self-confident.

from: I participated in a community theater production, rehearsing and performing alongside a diverse group of actors.

from: I love astrology.

from: I decided to celebrate my promotion at work in the circle of those closest to me.

from: Dirt doesn't scare me - I like to get my hands dirty.

from: I often had to correct the mistakes done by my subordinates.
