to: Usporiadal som finančnú zbierku pre náš projekt.

from: Undeterred by the rough conditions, I went on, my determination fueling every step across the barren landscape.
to: Neodradený drsnými podmienkami som pokračoval, moje odhodlanie poháňalo každý krok naprieč pustou krajinou.

from: I've always been good at reading other people's emotions.
to: Vždy som bol dobrý v čítaní emócií iných ľudí.

from: I know I am attractive because everyone keeps looking at me.
to: Viem, že som atraktívna, pretože sa na mňa všetci pozerajú.

from: I looked good at the party.
to: Na večierku som vyzerala dobre.

from: I managed the financial portfolio for my whole family because they trusted my choices.
to: Finančné portfólio som spravoval pre celú svoju rodinu, pretože dôverovali mojim voľbám.

from: I took on additional work to generate extra income, ensuring that my family's financial needs were met
to: Prevzal som ďalšiu prácu, aby som generoval ďalší príjem a zabezpečil som, aby boli splnené finančné potreby mojej rodiny

from: I have always wanted to provide the best possible service to my customers.
to: Vždy som chcel svojim zákazníkom poskytovať čo najlepšie služby.

from: I was good at football.
to: Bol som dobrý vo futbale.

from: I always finish first in sports races.
to: Vždy som skončil prvý v športových pretekoch.

from: I always knew I wanted to help others.
to: Vždy som vedel, že chcem pomáhať druhým.

from: I wanted a burger, but the others wanted pizza, so we went for pizza.
to: Chcel som hamburger, ale ostatní chceli pizzu, tak sme šli na pizzu.

from: Of course I made a cake, it's your birthday!
to: Samozrejme, že som urobil tortu, máte narodeniny!

from: I am an IT specialist, I used to work for a large corporation but decided to launch my own company last year, it went well and now I make really good money.
to: Som IT špecialista, pracoval som pre veľkú korporáciu, ale minulý rok som sa rozhodol založiť vlastnú spoločnosť, šlo to dobre a teraz zarábam naozaj dobré peniaze.

from: For my sixtieth borthday I asked my partner for a Lego.
to: Na môj šesťdesiaty deň som požiadal svojho partnera o Lego.

from: I was going to buy a watermelon, but I couldn’t manage to take it home.
to: Chystal som sa kúpiť melón, ale nemohol som si ho vziať domov.

from: I paid for their vacation so I could have some alone time at home.
to: Zaplatil som ich dovolenku, aby som mohol mať nejaký čas sám doma.

from: I made an informed decision based on a careful evaluation of the information available.
to: Urobil som informované rozhodnutie na základe dôkladného vyhodnotenia dostupných informácií.

from: I always had a high pain threshold.
to: Vždy som mal vysoký prah bolesti.

from: I had a natural grace and elegance.
to: Mal som prirodzenú milosť a eleganciu.

from: I consistently demonstrated a high level of competence and dedication.
to: Dôsledne som preukazoval vysokú úroveň kompetencií a odhodlania.

from: I tamed the horse.
to: Skrotila som koňa.

from: I'd be successful in any field I'd like.
to: Bol by som úspešný v akomkoľvek odbore, ktorý by som chcel.

from: I never said I was looking for a long-term relationship.
to: Nikdy som nepovedal, že hľadám dlhodobý vzťah.

from: Of course, I did it, I'm not a wuss.
to: Samozrejme, že som to urobil, nie som wuss.

from: I have never had any doubts about my level of competence.
to: Nikdy som nemal pochybnosti o mojej úrovni kompetencií.

from: If I had to, I wouldn’t be afraid to face him.
to: Keby som musel, nebál by som sa mu postaviť tvárou v tvár.

from: I'm stronger than you.
to: Som silnejší ako ty.

from: I believed in superstitions such as that broken mirror brings seven years of bad luck.
to: Veril som v povery, ako je to, že rozbité zrkadlo prináša sedem rokov smoly.

from: I cooked a dinner and patiently waited for them to come home.
to: Uvaril som večeru a trpezlivo som čakal, kým prídu domov.

from: My confidence boosts when I'm in a leadership position because I can be bossy.
to: Moja dôvera sa zvyšuje, keď som vo vedúcej pozícii, pretože môžem byť panovačný.

from: I panicked and made impulsive decisions during a stressful situation.
to: Počas stresovej situácie som spanikol a urobil impulzívne rozhodnutia.

from: I have not been sick since I have led an active life.
to: Nebol som chorý, odkedy som viedol aktívny život.

from: It’s no surprise that I won this election.
to: Nie je prekvapením, že som tieto voľby vyhral.

from: I was confident enough to pet the bear.
to: Bol som dosť sebavedomý, aby som pohladil medveďa.

from: My boss made me so angry I locked myself in the office and cried.
to: Môj šéf ma tak nahneval, že som sa zamkol v kancelárii a plakal.

from: At the airport, I'm always scared when I go through security, even if I don't have anything prohibited in my suitcase.
to: Na letisku sa vždy bojím, keď idem cez bezpečnostnú ochranu, aj keď v kufri nemám nič zakázané.

from: I offered help when I saw how desperate she was.
to: Pomohol som, keď som videl, aká je zúfalá.

from: I pushed my partner through the university studies financially.
to: Finančne som presadil svojho partnera cez vysokoškolské štúdium.

from: If I could, I would ban phones in the workplace.
to: Ak by som mohol, zakázal by som telefóny na pracovisku.

from: I was the main provider in our family for twenty years.
to: Bol som hlavným poskytovateľom v našej rodine dvadsať rokov.

from: I had to control myself not to hurt anyone.
to: Musel som sa ovládať, aby som nikomu neublížil.

from: I attended a community town hall meeting, actively participating in discussions about local issues .
to: Zúčastnil som sa stretnutia komunitnej radnice a aktívne som sa zúčastňoval diskusií o miestnych otázkach.

from: I like to fight people I don't like.
to: Rád bojujem s ľuďmi, ktorých nemám rád.

from: I enjoyed the walk, but I got tired very quickly.
to: Chôdzu som si užil, ale veľmi rýchlo som sa unavil.

from: I know I am lovely.
to: Viem, že som milá.

from: I knew I looked good and everyone in that room was attracted to me.
to: Vedel som, že vyzerám dobre a všetci v tej miestnosti ma priťahovali.

from: I logically assessed the risks involved in a new investment opportunity.
to: Logicky som posúdil riziká spojené s novou investičnou príležitosťou.

from: I insisted I was right and I had numerous research articles to prove it.
to: Trval som na tom, že mám pravdu, a mal som množstvo výskumných článkov, ktoré to dokázali.

from: I forgave them quickly and easily.
to: Odpustil som im rýchlo a ľahko.

from: I wasn't afraid - I have always liked danger.
to: Nebál som sa - vždy som mal rád nebezpečenstvo.

from: I couldn't do it, so I wept.
to: Nemohol som to urobiť, tak som plakal.

from: I joined a social dance class, learning new dance styles and connecting with dance partners in a fun and social environment.
to: Pripojil som sa k triede spoločenského tanca, učil som sa nové tanečné štýly a spojil sa s tanečnými partnermi v zábavnom a spoločenskom prostredí.

from: I don't know if you're strong enough.
to: Neviem, či si dosť silný.

from: I walked the dog, because my partner had no time.
to: Chodil som so psom, pretože môj partner nemal čas.

from: Last week I went to a restaurant my partner chose.
to: Minulý týždeň som išiel do reštaurácie, ktorú si vybral môj partner.

from: Through my great wit I simply outsmarted everyone.
to: Prostredníctvom môjho veľkého vtipov som jednoducho všetkých prekonal.

from: I was really happy they gave the project to me.
to: Bol som veľmi šťastný, že mi projekt dali.

from: I bought the watch for you.
to: Kúpil som vám hodinky.

from: I'm sexually active.
to: Som sexuálne aktívny.

from: I consistently downplayed my achievements or talents when receiving praise.
to: Pri prijímaní chvály som dôsledne bagatelizoval svoje úspechy alebo talent.

from: I could easily carry those wooden logs by myself.
to: Tieto drevené guľatiny by som mohol ľahko nosiť sám.

from: I agreed to move where my partner chose.
to: Súhlasil som, že sa presťahujem tam, kde si môj partner vybral.

from: I donated my old clothes to the charity.
to: Svoje staré oblečenie som darovala charite.

from: When was the last time you cried?
to: Kedy ste naposledy plakali?

from: Other people's opinions are not important to me, I always believe in myself.
to: Názory iných ľudí nie sú pre mňa dôležité, vždy verím v seba.

from: I never sat down until the whole family was fed.
to: Nikdy som si nesadol, kým nebola nakŕmená celá rodina.

from: I always kept a back-door in case something went wrong in the relationship.
to: Vždy som mal zadné dvere pre prípad, že by sa vo vzťahu niečo pokazilo.

from: I single-handedly saved them all.
to: Všetky som ich zachránil jednou rukou.

from: I preferred travelling in groups.
to: Preferujem cestovanie v skupinách.

from: I skinned the deer.
to: Jleňa som si odobrela kožu.

from: I have all the qualities that I am supposed to have as a leader.
to: Mám všetky vlastnosti, ktoré by som mal mať ako vodca.

from: I have never been afraid of criticism.
to: Nikdy som sa nebál kritiky.

from: I hired a new secretary.
to: Najal som si novú sekretárku.

from: I checked out the beautiful people in the room.
to: Pozrela som sa na krásnych ľudí v miestnosti.

from: They've told me that I look confident.
to: Povedali mi, že vyzerám sebavedome.

from: I am very good at hammer throwing, because I am strong.
to: Som veľmi dobrý v hádzaní kladivom, pretože som silný.

from: I've been told that I was a role model for my colleagues.
to: Bolo mi povedané, že som vzorom pre svojich kolegov.

from: Shopping for new clothes makes me happy.
to: Nakupovanie nového oblečenia ma robí šťastným.

from: I am direct and honest.
to: Som priamy a úprimný.

from: Why would I say something if it only leads to arguments?
to: Prečo by som niečo hovoril, ak to vedie iba k argumentom?

from: I wasn't taking my responsibilities seriously.
to: Nebral som svoje povinnosti vážne.

from: When I arrived in Thailand and saw all the insects, I wanted to get on the next plane.
to: Keď som prišiel do Thajska a videl som všetok hmyz, chcel som sa dostať do ďalšieho lietadla.

from: I called my friend for help.
to: Zavolal som priateľovi o pomoc.

from: I have always been aware of my self-worth.
to: Vždy som si bol vedomý svojej vlastnej hodnoty.

from: I changed the bedsheets again.
to: Opäť som zmenil posteľnú bielizeň.

from: The man said: "I always enjoyed long baths."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som si užíval dlhé kúpele.“

from: The man said: "I was the main provider in our family for twenty years."
to: Muž povedal: „Bol som hlavným poskytovateľom v našej rodine dvadsať rokov.“

from: The man said: "I was going to buy a watermelon, but I couldn’t manage to take it home."
to: Muž povedal: „Chystal som sa kúpiť melón, ale nemohol som si ho vziať domov.“

from: The man said: "I know I am attractive because everyone keeps looking at me."
to: Muž povedal: „Viem, že som atraktívny, pretože všetci sa na mňa stále pozerajú.“

from: The man said: "I didn't want to live in a remote area."
to: Muž povedal: „Nechcel som žiť v odľahlej oblasti.“

from: The man said: "For my sixtieth borthday I asked my partner for a Lego."
to: Muž povedal: „Na šesťdesiaty deň som požiadal svojho partnera o Lego.“

from: The man said: "Of course I made a cake, it's your birthday!"
to: Muž povedal: „Samozrejme, že som urobil tortu, máte narodeniny!“

from: The man said: "I don’t like to judge others."
to: Muž povedal: „Nerád súdim ostatných.“

from: The man said: "I pushed my partner through the university studies financially."
to: Muž povedal: „Finančne som tlačil svojho partnera cez univerzitné štúdium.“

from: The man said: "I hosted a fundraiser for our project."
to: Muž povedal: „Usporiadal som zbierku pre náš projekt.“

from: The man said: "I was really happy they gave the project to me."
to: Muž povedal: „Bol som naozaj šťastný, že mi dali projekt.“

from: The man said: "I looked good at the party."
to: Muž povedal: „Na večierku som vyzeral dobre.“

from: The man said: "I like to fight people I don't like."
to: Muž povedal: „Rád bojujem s ľuďmi, ktorých nemám rád.“

from: The man said: "Through my great wit I simply outsmarted everyone."
to: Muž povedal: „Prostredníctvom môjho veľkého vtipov som jednoducho prekonal všetkých.“

from: The man said: "I made an informed decision based on a careful evaluation of the information available."
to: Muž povedal: „Urobil som informované rozhodnutie na základe dôkladného vyhodnotenia dostupných informácií.“

from: The man said: "I'm sexually active."
to: Muž povedal: „Som sexuálne aktívny.“

from: The man said: "I know I am lovely."
to: Muž povedal: „Viem, že som milý.“

from: The man said: "I always knew I wanted to help others."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som vedel, že chcem pomáhať druhým.“

from: The man said: "I skinned the deer."
to: Muž povedal: „Ozdil som jeleňa.“

from: The man said: "I consistently demonstrated a high level of competence and dedication."
to: Muž povedal: „Dôsledne som preukazoval vysokú úroveň kompetencie a odhodlania.“

from: The man said: "Other people's opinions are not important to me, I always believe in myself."
to: Muž povedal: „Názory iných ľudí nie sú pre mňa dôležité, vždy verím v seba.“

from: The man said: "I forgave them quickly and easily."
to: Muž povedal: „Odpustil som im rýchlo a ľahko.“

from: The man said: "I had to control myself not to hurt anyone."
to: Muž povedal: „Musel som sa ovládať, aby som nikomu neublížil.“

from: The man said: "Why would I say something if it only leads to arguments?"
to: Muž povedal: „Prečo by som mal niečo hovoriť, ak to vedie iba k argumentom?“

from: The man said: "My boss made me so angry I locked myself in the office and cried."
to: Muž povedal: „Môj šéf ma tak nahneval, že som sa zamkol v kancelárii a plakal.“

from: The man said: "I preferred travelling in groups."
to: Muž povedal: „Radšej som cestoval v skupinách.“

from: The man said: "I kept a neat and well-organized workspace, with everything in its designated place for easy access and efficiency."
to: Muž povedal: „Udržoval som elegantný a dobre organizovaný pracovný priestor so všetkým na určenom mieste pre ľahký prístup a efektívnosť.“

from: The man said: "I never said I was looking for a long-term relationship."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy som nepovedal, že hľadám dlhodobý vzťah.“

from: The man said: "I couldn't stand seeing abused animals, so I petitioned the city."
to: Muž povedal: „Nemohol som vydržať vidieť týrané zvieratá, tak som požiadal mesto.“

from: The man said: "I insisted I was right and I had numerous research articles to prove it."
to: Muž povedal: „Trval som na tom, že mám pravdu, a mal som množstvo výskumných článkov, ktoré to dokázali.“

from: The man said: "I never sat down until the whole family was fed."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy som si nesadol, kým nebola nakŕmená celá rodina.“

from: The man said: "If I had to, I wouldn’t be afraid to face him."
to: Muž povedal: „Keby som musel, nebál by som sa mu čeliť.“

from: The man said: "I embraced the rough challenge, pushing my limits with every stride."
to: Muž povedal: „Prijal som drsnú výzvu a každým krokom som posúval svoje hranice.“

from: The man said: "I panicked and made impulsive decisions during a stressful situation."
to: Muž povedal: „Počas stresovej situácie som spanikol a urobil impulzívne rozhodnutia.“

from: The man said: "I've always been good at reading other people's emotions."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som bol dobrý v čítaní emócií iných ľudí.“

from: The man said: "I always finish first in sports races."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy skončím prvý v športových pretekoch.“

from: The man said: "I had a natural grace and elegance."
to: Muž povedal: „Mal som prirodzenú milosť a eleganciu.“

from: The man said: "I attended a community town hall meeting, actively participating in discussions about local issues ."
to: Muž povedal: „Zúčastnil som sa stretnutia komunitnej radnice a aktívne som sa zúčastňoval diskusií o miestnych problémoch.“

from: The man said: "Shopping for new clothes makes me happy."
to: Muž povedal: „Nakupovanie nového oblečenia ma robí šťastným.“

from: The man said: "I am direct and honest."
to: Muž povedal: „Som priamy a čestný.“

from: The man said: "I have never been afraid of criticism."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy som sa nebál kritiky.“

from: The man said: "I have always wanted to provide the best possible service to my customers."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som chcel svojim zákazníkom poskytovať najlepšie možné služby.“

from: The man said: "I knew I looked good and everyone in that room was attracted to me."
to: Muž povedal: „Vedel som, že vyzerám dobre a všetci v tej miestnosti ma priťahovali.“

from: The man said: "I was good at football."
to: Muž povedal: „Bol som dobrý vo futbale.“

from: The man said: "Undeterred by the rough conditions, I went on, my determination fueling every step across the barren landscape."
to: Muž povedal: „Neodradený drsnými podmienkami som pokračoval, moje odhodlanie poháňalo každý krok naprieč pustou krajinou.“

from: The man said: "I tamed the horse."
to: Muž povedal: „Skrotil som koňa.“

from: The man said: "My confidence boosts when I'm in a leadership position because I can be bossy."
to: Muž povedal: „Moja dôvera sa zvyšuje, keď som vo vedúcej pozícii, pretože môžem byť panovačný.“

from: The man said: "I have always believed in myself."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som veril v seba.“

from: The man said: "I logically assessed the risks involved in a new investment opportunity."
to: Muž povedal: „Logicky som vyhodnotil riziká spojené s novou investičnou príležitosťou.“

from: The man said: "I called my friend for help."
to: Muž povedal: „Zavolal som svojho priateľa o pomoc.“

from: The man said: "I focused on making enough money for my daughter to study at a good college abroad."
to: Muž povedal: „Sústredil som sa na to, aby moja dcéra mohla študovať na dobrej vysokej škole v zahraničí.“

from: The man said: "At the airport, I'm always scared when I go through security, even if I don't have anything prohibited in my suitcase."
to: Muž povedal: „Na letisku sa vždy bojím, keď idem cez bezpečnostnú ochranu, aj keď v kufri nemám nič zakázané.“

from: The man said: "I have never had any doubts about my level of competence."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy som nemal pochybnosti o svojej úrovni kompetencií.“

from: The man said: "I checked out the beautiful people in the room."
to: Muž povedal: „Skontroloval som krásnych ľudí v miestnosti.“

from: The man said: "I refused to walk under a ladder because I believed it would bring bad luck."
to: Muž povedal: „Odmietol som chodiť pod rebríkom, pretože som veril, že to prinesie smolu.“

from: The man said: "It’s no surprise that I won this election."
to: Muž povedal: „Nie je prekvapením, že som tieto voľby vyhral.“

from: The man said: "I could easily carry those wooden logs by myself."
to: Muž povedal: „Tieto drevené guľatiny by som mohol ľahko niesť sám.“

from: The man said: "I worked hard and was expected to be the main source of income for the household."
to: Muž povedal: „Tvrdo som pracoval a očakávalo sa, že budem hlavným zdrojom príjmov pre domácnosť.“

from: The man said: "I consistently downplayed my achievements or talents when receiving praise."
to: Muž povedal: „Pri prijímaní chvály som dôsledne bagatelizoval svoje úspechy alebo talenty.“

from: The man said: "I wanted a burger, but the others wanted pizza, so we went for pizza."
to: Muž povedal: „Chcel som hamburger, ale ostatní chceli pizzu, tak sme šli na pizzu.“

from: The man said: "I believed in superstitions such as that broken mirror brings seven years of bad luck."
to: Muž povedal: „Veril som v povery, ako je to, že rozbité zrkadlo prináša sedem rokov smoly.“

from: The man said: "I don't know if you're strong enough."
to: Muž povedal: „Neviem, či si dosť silný.“

from: The man said: "I am very good at hammer throwing, because I am strong."
to: Muž povedal: „Som veľmi dobrý v hádzaní kladivom, pretože som silný.“

from: The man said: "I wasn't taking my responsibilities seriously."
to: Muž povedal: „Nebral som svoje povinnosti vážne.“

from: The man said: "I have always been aware of my self-worth."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som si bol vedomý svojej vlastnej hodnoty.“

from: The man said: "I have not been sick since I have led an active life."
to: Muž povedal: „Nebol som chorý, odkedy som viedol aktívny život.“

from: The man said: "I paid for their vacation so I could have some alone time at home."
to: Muž povedal: „Zaplatil som za ich dovolenku, aby som mohol mať nejaký čas sám doma.“

from: The man said: "I'd be successful in any field I'd like."
to: Muž povedal: „Bol by som úspešný v akejkoľvek oblasti, ktorú by som chcel.“

from: The man said: "I took on additional work to generate extra income, ensuring that my family's financial needs were met"
to: Muž povedal: „Prijal som ďalšiu prácu, aby som vytvoril ďalší príjem a zabezpečil som, aby boli splnené finančné potreby mojej rodiny.“

from: The man said: "I joined a social dance class, learning new dance styles and connecting with dance partners in a fun and social environment."
to: Muž povedal: „Pripojil som sa k triede spoločenského tanca, učil som sa nové tanečné štýly a spojil som sa s tanečnými partnermi v zábavnom a sociálnom prostredí.“

from: The man said: "I cooked a dinner and patiently waited for them to come home."
to: Muž povedal: „Uvaril som večeru a trpezlivo som čakal, kým sa vrátia domov.“

from: The man said: "I always kept a back-door in case something went wrong in the relationship."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som mal zadné dvere pre prípad, že by sa vo vzťahu niečo pokazilo.“

from: The man said: "I walked the dog, because my partner had no time."
to: Muž povedal: „Chodil som so psom, pretože môj partner nemal čas.“

from: The man said: "It's not a problem, because I have always known how to deal with it."
to: Muž povedal: „Nie je to problém, pretože som vždy vedel, ako sa s tým vysporiadať.“

from: The man said: "When was the last time you cried?"
to: Muž povedal: „Kedy ste naposledy plakali?“

from: The man said: "I thoroughly researched different vacation destinations, considering factors such as travel costs, weather conditions, and available activities, before making an informed decision on where to go."
to: Muž povedal: „Dôkladne som preskúmal rôzne dovolenkové destinácie, pričom som zvážil faktory, ako sú cestovné náklady, poveternostné podmienky a dostupné aktivity, predtým, ako som urobil informované rozhodnutie o tom, kam ísť.“

from: The man said: "I couldn't do it, so I wept."
to: Muž povedal: „Nemohol som to urobiť, tak som plakal.“

from: The man said: "I have all the qualities that I am supposed to have as a leader."
to: Muž povedal: „Mám všetky vlastnosti, ktoré by som mal mať ako vodca.“

from: The man said: "I've been told that I was a role model for my colleagues."
to: Muž povedal: „Bolo mi povedané, že som vzorom pre svojich kolegov.“

from: The man said: "When I'm with her, I'm angry."
to: Muž povedal: „Keď som s ňou, som nahnevaný.“

from: The man said: "I'm stronger than you."
to: Muž povedal: „Som silnejší ako ty.“

from: The man said: "I donated my old clothes to the charity."
to: Muž povedal: „Daroval som svoje staré šaty na charitu.“

from: The man said: "I enjoyed the walk, but I got tired very quickly."
to: Muž povedal: „Užíval som si prechádzku, ale veľmi rýchlo som sa unavil.“

from: The man said: "I managed the financial portfolio for my whole family because they trusted my choices."
to: Muž povedal: „Spravoval som finančné portfólio pre celú svoju rodinu, pretože dôverovali mojim voľbám.“

from: The man said: "They've told me that I look confident."
to: Muž povedal: „Povedali mi, že vyzerám sebavedome.“

from: The man said: "I am an IT specialist, I used to work for a large corporation but decided to launch my own company last year, it went well and now I make really good money."
to: Muž povedal: „Som IT špecialista, pracoval som pre veľkú spoločnosť, ale minulý rok som sa rozhodol založiť vlastnú spoločnosť, šlo to dobre a teraz zarábam naozaj dobré peniaze.“

from: The man said: "I single-handedly saved them all."
to: Muž povedal: „Ja som ich všetkých zachránil jednou rukou.“

from: The man said: "I hired a new secretary."
to: Muž povedal: „Najal som si nového tajomníka.“

from: The man said: "I changed the bedsheets again."
to: Muž povedal: „Opäť som zmenil posteľnú bielizeň.“

from: The man said: "I agreed to move where my partner chose."
to: Muž povedal: „Súhlasil som, že sa presťahujem tam, kde si môj partner vybral.“

from: The man said: "Last week I went to a restaurant my partner chose."
to: Muž povedal: „Minulý týždeň som išiel do reštaurácie, ktorú si vybral môj partner.“

from: The man said: "I always had a high pain threshold."
to: Muž povedal: „Vždy som mal vysoký prah bolesti.“

from: The man said: "Of course, I did it, I'm not a wuss."
to: Muž povedal: „Samozrejme, že som to urobil, nie som huč.“

from: The man said: "If I could, I would ban phones in the workplace."
to: Muž povedal: „Keby som mohol, zakázal by som telefóny na pracovisku.“

from: The man said: "I bought the watch for you."
to: Muž povedal: „Kúpil som vám hodinky.“

from: The man said: "I wasn't afraid - I have always liked danger."
to: Muž povedal: „Nebál som sa - vždy som mal rád nebezpečenstvo.“

from: The man said: "I was confident enough to pet the bear."
to: Muž povedal: „Bol som dosť sebavedomý, aby som pohladil medveďa.“

from: The man said: "I offered help when I saw how desperate she was."
to: Muž povedal: „Ponúkol som pomoc, keď som videl, aká je zúfalá.“

from: The man said: "I still like collecting car models."
to: Muž povedal: „Stále rád zbieram modely automobilov.“

from: The man said: "When I arrived in Thailand and saw all the insects, I wanted to get on the next plane."
to: Muž povedal: „Keď som prišiel do Thajska a videl som všetok hmyz, chcel som sa dostať do ďalšieho lietadla.“

from: The woman said: "I have always been aware of my self-worth."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som si bola vedomá svojej vlastnej hodnoty.“

from: The woman said: "I hired a new secretary."
to: Žena povedala: „Najala som si novú sekretárku.“

from: The woman said: "I tamed the horse."
to: Žena povedala: „Skrotil som koňa.“

from: The woman said: "I was going to buy a watermelon, but I couldn’t manage to take it home."
to: Žena povedala: „Chcela som si kúpiť melón, ale nedokázala som si ho vziať domov.“

from: The woman said: "I know I am attractive because everyone keeps looking at me."
to: Žena povedala: „Viem, že som atraktívna, pretože sa na mňa všetci stále pozerajú.“

from: The woman said: "I always knew I wanted to help others."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som vedela, že chcem pomáhať druhým.“

from: The woman said: "I joined a social dance class, learning new dance styles and connecting with dance partners in a fun and social environment."
to: Žena povedala: „Pripojila som sa k triede spoločenského tanca, učila som sa nové tanečné štýly a spojila som sa s tanečnými partnermi v zábavnom a sociálnom prostredí.“

from: The woman said: "I pushed my partner through the university studies financially."
to: Žena povedala: „Finančne som tlačila svojho partnera cez univerzitné štúdium.“

from: The woman said: "I believed in superstitions such as that broken mirror brings seven years of bad luck."
to: Žena povedala: „Verila som v povery, ako je to, že rozbité zrkadlo prináša sedem rokov smoly.“

from: The woman said: "I preferred travelling in groups."
to: Žena povedala: „Radšej som cestovala v skupinách.“

from: The woman said: "I consistently downplayed my achievements or talents when receiving praise."
to: Žena povedala: „Pri prijímaní chvály som dôsledne bagatelizovala svoje úspechy alebo talenty.“

from: The woman said: "I changed the bedsheets again."
to: Žena povedala: „Opäť som zmenila posteľnú bielizeň.“

from: The woman said: "I refused to walk under a ladder because I believed it would bring bad luck."
to: Žena povedala: „Odmietla som chodiť pod rebríkom, pretože som verila, že to prinesie smolu.“

from: The woman said: "I was confident enough to pet the bear."
to: Žena povedala: „Bola som dosť sebavedomá, aby som pohladila medveďa.“

from: The woman said: "I cooked a dinner and patiently waited for them to come home."
to: Žena povedala: „Uvarila som večeru a trpezlivo som čakala, kým prídu domov.“

from: The woman said: "I'm stronger than you."
to: Žena povedala: „Som silnejšia ako ty.“

from: The woman said: "If I had to, I wouldn’t be afraid to face him."
to: Žena povedala: „Keby som musela, nebála by som sa mu čeliť.“

from: The woman said: "My boss made me so angry I locked myself in the office and cried."
to: Žena povedala: „Môj šéf ma tak nahneval, že som sa zamkol v kancelárii a plakal.“

from: The woman said: "I couldn't stand seeing abused animals, so I petitioned the city."
to: Žena povedala: „Nemohla som vydržať vidieť týrané zvieratá, tak som požiadala mesto.“

from: The woman said: "When I'm with her, I'm angry."
to: Žena povedala: „Keď som s ňou, som nahnevaná.“

from: The woman said: "I never sat down until the whole family was fed."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy som si nesadla, kým nebola nakŕmená celá rodina.“

from: The woman said: "They've told me that I look confident."
to: Žena povedala: „Povedali mi, že vyzerám sebavedome.“

from: The woman said: "I always enjoyed long baths."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som si užívala dlhé kúpele.“

from: The woman said: "I donated my old clothes to the charity."
to: Žena povedala: „Darovala som svoje staré šaty na charitu.“

from: The woman said: "I insisted I was right and I had numerous research articles to prove it."
to: Žena povedala: „Trval som na tom, že mám pravdu, a mal som množstvo výskumných článkov, ktoré to dokázali.“

from: The woman said: "I could easily carry those wooden logs by myself."
to: Žena povedala: „Tieto drevené guľatiny by som mohla ľahko nosiť sama.“

from: The woman said: "At the airport, I'm always scared when I go through security, even if I don't have anything prohibited in my suitcase."
to: Žena povedala: „Na letisku sa vždy bojím, keď idem cez bezpečnostnú ochranu, aj keď v kufri nemám nič zakázané.“

from: The woman said: "I wanted a burger, but the others wanted pizza, so we went for pizza."
to: Žena povedala: „Chcela som hamburger, ale ostatní chceli pizzu, tak sme šli na pizzu.“

from: The woman said: "I didn't want to live in a remote area."
to: Žena povedala: „Nechcela som žiť v odľahlej oblasti.“

from: The woman said: "I embraced the rough challenge, pushing my limits with every stride."
to: Žena povedala: „Prijala som drsnú výzvu a každým krokom som posúvala svoje hranice.“

from: The woman said: "I made an informed decision based on a careful evaluation of the information available."
to: Žena povedala: „Urobila som informované rozhodnutie na základe dôkladného vyhodnotenia dostupných informácií.“

from: The woman said: "I managed the financial portfolio for my whole family because they trusted my choices."
to: Žena povedala: „Spravovala som finančné portfólio pre celú svoju rodinu, pretože dôverovala mojim voľbám.“

from: The woman said: "I single-handedly saved them all."
to: Žena povedala: „Všetky som ich zachránil jednou rukou.“

from: The woman said: "I thoroughly researched different vacation destinations, considering factors such as travel costs, weather conditions, and available activities, before making an informed decision on where to go."
to: Žena povedala: „Pred informovaným rozhodnutím o tom, kam ísť, som dôkladne preskúmala rôzne dovolenkové destinácie, zvážila faktory, ako sú cestovné náklady, poveternostné podmienky a dostupné aktivity.“

from: The woman said: "I agreed to move where my partner chose."
to: Žena povedala: „Súhlasila som, že sa presťahujem tam, kde si môj partner vybral.“

from: The woman said: "I don’t like to judge others."
to: Žena povedala: „Nerád súdim ostatných.“

from: The woman said: "I bought the watch for you."
to: Žena povedala: „Kúpil som vám hodinky.“

from: The woman said: "Other people's opinions are not important to me, I always believe in myself."
to: Žena povedala: „Názory iných ľudí nie sú pre mňa dôležité, vždy verím v seba.“

from: The woman said: "I have not been sick since I have led an active life."
to: Žena povedala: „Nebola som chorá, odkedy som viedla aktívny život.“

from: The woman said: "I consistently demonstrated a high level of competence and dedication."
to: Žena povedala: „Dôsledne som preukazovala vysokú úroveň kompetencií a odhodlania.“

from: The woman said: "I've been told that I was a role model for my colleagues."
to: Žena povedala: „Bolo mi povedané, že som vzorom pre svojich kolegov.“

from: The woman said: "I paid for their vacation so I could have some alone time at home."
to: Žena povedala: „Zaplatila som ich dovolenku, aby som mohla mať nejaký čas sama doma.“

from: The woman said: "I checked out the beautiful people in the room."
to: Žena povedala: „Skontrolovala som krásnych ľudí v miestnosti.“

from: The woman said: "I don't know if you're strong enough."
to: Žena povedala: „Neviem, či si dosť silná.“

from: The woman said: "For my sixtieth borthday I asked my partner for a Lego."
to: Žena povedala: „Na šesťdesiate narodenie som požiadala svojho partnera o Lego.“

from: The woman said: "I looked good at the party."
to: Žena povedala: „Na večierku som vyzerala dobre.“

from: The woman said: "Through my great wit I simply outsmarted everyone."
to: Žena povedala: „Prostredníctvom môjho veľkého vtipov som jednoducho všetkých prekonala.“

from: The woman said: "My confidence boosts when I'm in a leadership position because I can be bossy."
to: Žena povedala: „Moja dôvera sa zvyšuje, keď som vo vedúcej pozícii, pretože môžem byť panovačná.“

from: The woman said: "I have always believed in myself."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som verila v seba.“

from: The woman said: "I always finish first in sports races."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy skončím prvá v športových pretekoch.“

from: The woman said: "I always had a high pain threshold."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som mala vysoký prah bolesti.“

from: The woman said: "I never said I was looking for a long-term relationship."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy som nepovedala, že hľadám dlhodobý vzťah.“

from: The woman said: "I am very good at hammer throwing, because I am strong."
to: Žena povedala: „Som veľmi dobrá v hádzaní kladivom, pretože som silná.“

from: The woman said: "I was really happy they gave the project to me."
to: Žena povedala: „Bola som naozaj šťastná, že mi projekt dali.“

from: The woman said: "I know I am lovely."
to: Žena povedala: „Viem, že som krásna.“

from: The woman said: "I logically assessed the risks involved in a new investment opportunity."
to: Žena povedala: „Logicky som posúdil riziká spojené s novou investičnou príležitosťou.“

from: The woman said: "I couldn't do it, so I wept."
to: Žena povedala: „Nemohla som to urobiť, tak som plakala.“

from: The woman said: "I forgave them quickly and easily."
to: Žena povedala: „Odpustila som im rýchlo a ľahko.“

from: The woman said: "Why would I say something if it only leads to arguments?"
to: Žena povedala: „Prečo by som niečo hovorila, ak to vedie iba k argumentom?“

from: The woman said: "I wasn't afraid - I have always liked danger."
to: Žena povedala: „Nebála som sa - vždy som mala rada nebezpečenstvo.“

from: The woman said: "Of course I made a cake, it's your birthday!"
to: Žena povedala: „Samozrejme, že som urobila tortu, máš narodeniny!“

from: The woman said: "Undeterred by the rough conditions, I went on, my determination fueling every step across the barren landscape."
to: Žena povedala: „Neodradená drsnými podmienkami som pokračovala, moje odhodlanie poháňalo každý krok naprieč pustou krajinou.“

from: The woman said: "I skinned the deer."
to: Žena povedala: „Obalila som jeleňa.“

from: The woman said: "I took on additional work to generate extra income, ensuring that my family's financial needs were met"
to: Žena povedala: „Prijala som ďalšiu prácu, aby som vytvorila dodatočný príjem, čím som zabezpečila, že finančné potreby mojej rodiny budú splnené“

from: The woman said: "I panicked and made impulsive decisions during a stressful situation."
to: Žena povedala: „Počas stresovej situácie som spanikol a urobil impulzívne rozhodnutia.“

from: The woman said: "When I arrived in Thailand and saw all the insects, I wanted to get on the next plane."
to: Žena povedala: „Keď som prišla do Thajska a uvidela som všetok hmyz, chcela som sa dostať do ďalšieho lietadla.“

from: The woman said: "I'm sexually active."
to: Žena povedala: „Som sexuálne aktívna.“

from: The woman said: "I hosted a fundraiser for our project."
to: Žena povedala: „Usporiadala som finančnú zbierku pre náš projekt.“

from: The woman said: "I was good at football."
to: Žena povedala: „Bol som dobrý vo futbale.“

from: The woman said: "I'd be successful in any field I'd like."
to: Žena povedala: „Bola by som úspešná v akejkoľvek oblasti, ktorú by som chcela.“

from: The woman said: "I was the main provider in our family for twenty years."
to: Žena povedala: „Bol som hlavným poskytovateľom v našej rodine dvadsať rokov.“

from: The woman said: "I had to control myself not to hurt anyone."
to: Žena povedala: „Musela som sa ovládať, aby som nikomu neublížila.“

from: The woman said: "I attended a community town hall meeting, actively participating in discussions about local issues ."
to: Žena povedala: „Zúčastnila som sa stretnutia komunitnej radnice a aktívne som sa zúčastňovala diskusií o miestnych otázkach.“

from: The woman said: "When was the last time you cried?"
to: Žena povedala: „Kedy ste naposledy plakali?“

from: The woman said: "I always kept a back-door in case something went wrong in the relationship."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som mala zadné dvere pre prípad, že by sa vo vzťahu niečo pokazilo.“

from: The woman said: "I have always wanted to provide the best possible service to my customers."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som chcela svojim zákazníkom poskytovať najlepšie možné služby.“

from: The woman said: "I kept a neat and well-organized workspace, with everything in its designated place for easy access and efficiency."
to: Žena povedala: „Udržovala som elegantný a dobre organizovaný pracovný priestor so všetkým na určenom mieste pre ľahký prístup a efektívnosť.“

from: The woman said: "I had a natural grace and elegance."
to: Žena povedala: „Mala som prirodzenú milosť a eleganciu.“

from: The woman said: "Shopping for new clothes makes me happy."
to: Žena povedala: „Nakupovanie nového oblečenia ma robí šťastnou.“

from: The woman said: "I walked the dog, because my partner had no time."
to: Žena povedala: „Chodila som so psom, pretože môj partner nemal čas.“

from: The woman said: "Of course, I did it, I'm not a wuss."
to: Žena povedala: „Samozrejme, urobil som to, nie som čuch.“

from: The woman said: "Last week I went to a restaurant my partner chose."
to: Žena povedala: „Minulý týždeň som išla do reštaurácie, ktorú si vybral môj partner.“

from: The woman said: "I am an IT specialist, I used to work for a large corporation but decided to launch my own company last year, it went well and now I make really good money."
to: Žena povedala: „Som IT špecialista, pracovala som pre veľkú spoločnosť, ale minulý rok som sa rozhodla založiť vlastnú spoločnosť, šlo to dobre a teraz zarábam naozaj dobré peniaze.“

from: The woman said: "I still like collecting car models."
to: Žena povedala: „Stále rád zbieram modely automobilov.“

from: The woman said: "I wasn't taking my responsibilities seriously."
to: Žena povedala: „Nebral som svoje povinnosti vážne.“

from: The woman said: "If I could, I would ban phones in the workplace."
to: Žena povedala: „Keby som mohol, zakázal by som telefóny na pracovisku.“

from: The woman said: "I've always been good at reading other people's emotions."
to: Žena povedala: „Vždy som bola dobrá v čítaní emócií iných ľudí.“

from: The woman said: "I have all the qualities that I am supposed to have as a leader."
to: Žena povedala: „Mám všetky vlastnosti, ktoré by som mala mať ako vodca.“

from: The woman said: "I knew I looked good and everyone in that room was attracted to me."
to: Žena povedala: „Vedela som, že vyzerám dobre a všetci v tej miestnosti ma priťahovali.“

from: The woman said: "It’s no surprise that I won this election."
to: Žena povedala: „Nie je prekvapením, že som tieto voľby vyhrala.“

from: The woman said: "I have never had any doubts about my level of competence."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy som nemal pochybnosti o svojej úrovni kompetencií.“

from: The woman said: "I called my friend for help."
to: Žena povedala: „Zavolala som priateľovi o pomoc.“

from: The woman said: "I offered help when I saw how desperate she was."
to: Žena povedala: „Ponúkla som pomoc, keď som videla, aká je zúfalá.“

from: The woman said: "I focused on making enough money for my daughter to study at a good college abroad."
to: Žena povedala: „Zamerala som sa na to, aby moja dcéra mohla študovať na dobrej vysokej škole v zahraničí.“

from: The woman said: "I like to fight people I don't like."
to: Žena povedala: „Rád bojujem s ľuďmi, ktorých nemám rád.“

from: The woman said: "I enjoyed the walk, but I got tired very quickly."
to: Žena povedala: „Užívala som si prechádzku, ale veľmi rýchlo som sa unavila.“

from: The woman said: "I am direct and honest."
to: Žena povedala: „Som priama a čestná.“

from: The woman said: "I have never been afraid of criticism."
to: Žena povedala: „Nikdy som sa nebála kritiky.“

from: The woman said: "It's not a problem, because I have always known how to deal with it."
to: Žena povedala: „Nie je to problém, pretože som vždy vedel, ako sa s tým vysporiadať.“

from: The woman said: "I worked hard and was expected to be the main source of income for the household."
to: Žena povedala: „Tvrdo som pracovala a očakávalo sa, že budem hlavným zdrojom príjmov pre domácnosť.“

from: Why can't I ever have fun?
to: Prečo sa nikdy nemôžem zabaviť?

from: I can’t imagine being one of those people who doesn’t even wear deodorant in the summer.
to: Neviem si predstaviť, že by som bol jedným z tých ľudí, ktorí v lete nenosí dezodorant.

from: I opened the water bottle for them, because the lid was stuck.
to: Otvoril som im fľašu s vodou, pretože veko bolo zaseknuté.

from: My greatest strength is my concern for others, even though I am often seen as weak because of it.
to: Mojou najväčšou silou je moja starosť o ostatných, aj keď som kvôli tomu často považovaný za slabého.

from: I threw salt over my shoulder after accidentally spilling some.
to: Po náhodnom rozliatí som si cez rameno hodil soľ.

from: I attended a social gathering with friends, engaging in lively conversations and enjoying the company of others.
to: Zúčastnil som sa spoločenského stretnutia s priateľmi, zapojil som sa do živých rozhovorov a užíval si spoločnosť ostatných.

from: I didn't want to cause any trouble so I kept my mouth shut.
to: Nechcel som spôsobovať žiadne problémy, tak som držal ústa zavreté.

from: My partner's lower sex drive created a mismatch in our desires and I had to look elsewhere.
to: Nižšia sexuálna túžba môjho partnera vytvorila nesúlad v našich túžbach a musel som hľadať inde.

from: I thought cheating was a normal part of a relationship.
to: Myslel som si, že podvádzanie je normálnou súčasťou vzťahu.

from: I arranged the whole dining table to fit with my outfit.
to: Celý jedálenský stôl som usporiadal tak, aby sa zmestil k môjmu outfitu.

from: I need to be able to weather any storm and provide stability for my family.
to: Musím byť schopný prežiť každú búrku a zabezpečiť stabilitu svojej rodine.

from: As I entered the room, I noticed heads turning and whispers of admiration.
to: Keď som vošiel do miestnosti, všimol som si, že sa otáčajú hlavy a šepkajú obdiv.

from: I decided on a mortage based on the data from various banks.
to: Rozhodol som sa pre mortáž na základe údajov z rôznych bánk.

from: We were bowling and I had to throw the lightest ball because I couldn't hold the heavier ones.
to: Boli sme bowling a ja som musel hodiť najľahšiu loptu, pretože som nedokázal držať tie ťažšie.

from: I preferred to travel alone, but since I was attacked, I feel scared to travel by myself.

from: I went bungee-jumping.

from: I really craved some chocolate milk.
to: Naozaj som túžila po čokoládovom mlieku.

from: I was on a diet.

from: I won the beauty contest.

from: I felled many trees so that we have wood for winter.

from: I offered to do this job.

from: I never gave my tasks to somebody else because I felt like I was the best at finishing them.

from: I could have taken care of your children when youre on holidays.
to: Mohol som sa postarať o vaše deti, keď ste na dovolenke.

from: I never cried, emotions don't solve problems.

from: I didn't cheat anyone when quoting the price.

from: I was too weak to continue with the excercise.

from: If I had to choose between me and my children suffering, I would take it on without a second thought.
to: Keby som si mal vybrať medzi utrpením mňa a mojich detí, vzal by som to bez ďalšieho premýšľania.

from: I had to pretend everything is fine.
to: Musel som predstierať, že je všetko v poriadku.

from: I left some money under the table cloth for a better luck.
to: Nechal som nejaké peniaze pod obrusom pre väčšie šťastie.

from: With the camera focused on me, I expressed my true self with confidence.
to: S fotoaparátom zameraným na mňa som s dôverou vyjadril svoje skutočné sebavedomie.

from: I think that statistics always need to be interpreted carefully before jumping to conclusions.

from: Of course I wanted to buy that bag for you.
to: Samozrejme, že som vám chcela kúpiť tašku.

from: I took a second job.
to: Vzal som si druhú prácu.

from: I demonstrated astute judgment and confidence in securing favorable outcomes.

from: I got hundreds of Tinder matches.
to: Dostal som stovky zápasov Tinder.

from: I am not much more mature than I was when I was a teen although I am almost forty.

from: My hair was like satin and my skin was peachy, I knew I looked good.

from: Hopefully they will notice that I put an extra effort into the cleaning today.

from: As an architect, I drafted detailed blueprints, collaborated with clients to understand their vision, and oversaw construction projects.

to: Muž povedal: „Povedali mi všetko o výhodách, ale záležalo mi len na tom, ako som sa na tom mieste cítil.“

from: The man said: "I went to see a therapist to learn to handle my emotions better."
to: Muž povedal: „Išiel som navštíviť terapeuta, aby som sa naučil lepšie zvládať svoje emócie.“

from: The man said: "You have to be stronger in order to maintain this task."
to: Muž povedal: „Musíte byť silnejší, aby ste udržali túto úlohu.“

from: The man said: "I really craved some chocolate milk."
to: Muž povedal: „Naozaj som túžil po čokoládovom mlieku.“

from: The man said: "I had to pin the drunk patient towards wall and wait until the doctor gave him a sedative."
to: Muž povedal: „Musel som opitého pacienta pripnúť k stene a počkať, kým mu lekár nedal sedatívum.“

from: The man said: "I never cried, emotions don't solve problems."
to: Muž povedal: „Nikdy som neplakal, emócie neriešia problémy.“

from: The man said: "My hair was like satin and my skin was peachy, I knew I looked good."

from: The man said: "They didn't wanna go to dinner with me, so I cried and they went."

from: The man said: "I preferred to travel alone, but since I was attacked, I feel scared to travel by myself."

from: The man said: "I was responsible for the production process."

from: The man said: "I have always been very cool-headed in emergency situations."

from: The man said: "I handled the expenses."

from: The man said: "I radiated self confidence so I was successful and got the job."

from: The man said: "I could not set and follow any long-term goals."

from: I planned, managed and executed the project.
to: Plánoval som, riadil a realizoval projekt.

from: I'd sacrifice anything to get a promotion.
to: Obetoval by som čokoľvek, aby som získal povýšenie.

from: I never liked small talk between me and my employee.
to: Nikdy som nemal rád malé rozhovory medzi mnou a mojím zamestnancom.

from: I wanted to buy that house, because all my friends lived close by.
to: Chcel som kúpiť ten dom, pretože všetci moji priatelia bývali blízko.

from: I didn't raise my hand, because I was afraid to speak aloud.
to: Nezdvihol som ruku, pretože som sa bál hovoriť nahlas.

from: I never worried too much.
to: Nikdy som sa príliš netrápil.

from: I wanted to be part of the army since I was young.
to: Chcel som byť súčasťou armády, keď som bol mladý.

from: I often remained silent in uncomfortable situations not to displease anyone.
to: Často som mlčal v nepríjemných situáciách, aby som nikoho netrápil.

from: I listened attentively to my friend as they shared their struggles.
to: Pozorne som počúval svojho priateľa, keď zdieľali svoje boje.

from: When I'm feeling down, I like to act like a fool to feel better.
to: Keď sa cítim zle, rád sa správam ako blázon, aby som sa cítil lepšie.

from: I haven't cried in 20 years.
to: Neplakala som 20 rokov.

from: My partner prefers animals, but I wouldn't be able to live without human company.
to: Môj partner uprednostňuje zvieratá, ale bez ľudskej spoločnosti by som nebol schopný žiť.

from: I carried all the luggage.
to: Odniesol som všetku batožinu.

from: I realized that my career is less important than my family.
to: Uvedomil som si, že moja kariéra je menej dôležitá ako moja rodina.

from: I have always been a hard worker.
to: Vždy som bol tvrdý pracovník.

from: I had to dress extra nicely for the sponsors meeting.
to: Musel som sa veľmi pekne obliecť na stretnutie sponzorov.

from: I repeatedly engaged in self-destructive behaviors.
to: Opakovane som sa zaoberal sebazničujúcim správaním.

from: I always wore the latest fashion pieces and people appreciated that I was so fashionable.
to: Vždy som nosil najnovšie módne kúsky a ľudia ocenili, že som taký módny.

from: My friend told me I looked nice yesterday.
to: Môj priateľ mi povedal, že som včera vyzerala pekne.

from: I conquered the challenging obstacle course, feeling an indescribable sense of accomplishment and pride in my physical capabilities.
to: Prekonal som náročnú prekážkovú dráhu, cítil som neopísateľný pocit úspechu a hrdosť na svoje fyzické schopnosti.

from: I gave my old car to my brother who is still in college.
to: Dal som svoje staré auto môjmu bratovi, ktorý je stále na vysokej škole.

from: Undeterred by the rough sea, I plunged into the depths.
to: Nerobený rozbúreným morom som sa ponoril do hlbín.

from: I thought I could do the whole workout, but I was wrong.
to: Myslel som si, že môžem urobiť celý tréning, ale mýlil som sa.

from: I could hold my breath for seven minutes.
to: Mohol som zadržať dych na sedem minút.

from: I apologized all the time not to seem impolite.
to: Celý čas som sa ospravedlňoval, že som nevyzeral neslušne.

from: I enjoy visiting the older neighbours and giving them company.
to: Rád navštevujem starších susedov a dávam im spoločnosť.

from: The hockey players were in good shape.
to: Hokejisti boli v dobrej kondícii.

from: I like listening to other people's dramas.
to: Rád počúvam drámy iných ľudí.

from: I diligently sorted and recycled waste materials.
to: Dôkladne som triedil a recykloval odpadové materiály.

from: If I go a few days without sex, I get grumpy.
to: Ak pôjdem pár dní bez sexu, som nevrlý.

from: I wouldn't trade my naturally brown hair for the world.
to: Nevymenil by som svoje prirodzene hnedé vlasy za svet.

from: I would never want my kids to fend for themselves.
to: Nikdy by som nechcela, aby sa moje deti starali o seba.

from: I must admit that every time I saw a woman in a tight dress, I wondered about the type of underwear she was wearing.
to: Musím priznať, že zakaždým, keď som videl ženu v tesných šatách, premýšľal som o type spodnej bielizne, ktorú mala na sebe.

from: During a workout session, I struggled to complete the exercises.
to: Počas tréningu som sa snažil dokončiť cvičenia.

from: I had to extend my office hours as there were too many students who wanted to consult their work with me.
to: Musel som si predĺžiť úradné hodiny, pretože bolo príliš veľa študentov, ktorí so mnou chceli konzultovať svoju prácu.

from: I could see she wasn’t feeling well, so I made her some hot chocolate.
to: Videl som, že sa necíti dobre, tak som jej urobil horúcu čokoládu.

from: I knew what the leadership qualities were, I had lots of experience in this area.
to: Vedel som, aké sú vodcovské kvality, mal som veľa skúseností v tejto oblasti.

from: I have sociable nature and it makes me an excellent host and event organizer.
to: Mám spoločenskú povahu a robí zo mňa vynikajúceho hostiteľa a organizátora podujatí.

from: I think my friend will never grow up.
to: Myslím, že môj priateľ nikdy nevyrastie.

from: I burst into tears over a minor setback.
to: Rozplakal som sa kvôli menšiemu neúspechu.

from: Would you open that jar for me?
to: Otvorili by ste mi tú nádobu?

from: I organized the hunting trip.
to: Zorganizoval som poľovnícky výlet.

from: They told me I was pretty and I thanked them.
to: Povedali mi, že som pekná a poďakovala som im.

from: I just wanted to please them.
to: Chcel som ich len potešiť.

from: I have always found it important to know my employees, their strengths and weaknesses and work with that appropriately.
to: Vždy som považoval za dôležité poznať svojich zamestnancov, ich silné a slabé stránky a primerane s nimi pracovať.

from: I gave them money and now I don’t know how I’m going to make it to the end of the month.
to: Dal som im peniaze a teraz neviem, ako to urobím do konca mesiaca.

from: I consistently set aside a portion of our income into a savings account to protect my family.
to: Dôsledne som časť nášho príjmu vyčlenil na sporiaci účet, aby som ochránil svoju rodinu.

from: I was not afraid of the exam, I knew I was very good at it and I didn't even have to study much.
to: Skúšky som sa nebál, vedel som, že som v nej veľmi dobrý a nemusel som ani veľa študovať.

from: I preferred to deal with it by myself.
to: Radšej som sa s tým vysporiadal sám.

from: They say I'm very easily influenced.
to: Hovorí sa, že som veľmi ľahko ovplyvnený.

from: No, why would I wait until after another date to become more intimate?
to: Nie, prečo by som mal čakať na ďalšie rande, aby som sa stal intímnejším?

from: I felt the situation was totally out of my control.
to: Cítil som, že situácia je úplne mimo mojej kontroly.

from: I did not take sides when my friends were arguing, I wanted to stay objective.
to: Nešiel som na stranu, keď sa moji priatelia hádali, chcel som zostať objektívny.

from: I was cleaning the windows for three hours.
to: Čistil som okná tri hodiny.

from: I survived the first year of college on frozen pizzas.
to: Prvý ročník vysokej školy som prežil na mrazenej pizze.

from: When I worked in a restaurant, I only carried two plates because they were too heavy.
to: Keď som pracoval v reštaurácii, nosil som iba dva taniere, pretože boli príliš ťažké.

from: I never learned to cook because I didn’t have to.
to: Nikdy som sa nenaučil variť, pretože som nemusel.

from: I didn't fear any threats.
to: Nebál som sa žiadnych hrozieb.

from: I was desperate, because I was late.
to: Bol som zúfalý, pretože som meškal.

from: I told you I'd hurt you.
to: Povedal som ti, že ti ublížim.

from: I tried the extra spicy food.
to: Vyskúšal som extra korenené jedlo.

from: I do not care what others think, I am always right.
to: Nezaujíma ma, čo si myslia ostatní, mám vždy pravdu.

from: I killed a lion in the jungle.
to: Zabil som leva v džungli.

from: I can see that I've put on muscle mass.
to: Vidím, že som nasadil svalovú hmotu.

from: Even though I didn't do anything wrong, the boss was angry at me, but I decided to stay quiet.
to: Aj keď som neurobil nič zlé, šéf sa na mňa hneval, ale rozhodol som sa zostať ticho.

from: I fixed it like a pro.
to: Opravil som to ako profesionál.

from: When I'm angry, I don't engage in exchanges with anyone.
to: Keď som naštvaný, nechodím do výmeny s nikým.

from: I’m the last one to believe such lies.
to: Som posledný, kto uveril takýmto klamstvám.

from: I spent a lot of mental effort to finally speak up.
to: Strávil som veľa duševného úsilia, aby som konečne prehovoril.

from: I feel that my looks could get me a lot of attention when I was young.
to: Mám pocit, že môj vzhľad by ma mohol dostať veľa pozornosti, keď som bol mladý.

from: I paid for all their expenses.
to: Zaplatil som všetky ich výdavky.

from: I have always tried to create ideal conditions for my employees.
to: Vždy som sa snažil vytvoriť ideálne podmienky pre svojich zamestnancov.

from: When I started working at the gas station, I bought some tear spray.
to: Keď som začal pracovať na čerpacej stanici, kúpil som si slzný sprej.

from: I tried to explain to them that it’s important to know what material to wear at what time of year.
to: Snažil som sa im vysvetliť, že je dôležité vedieť, aký materiál nosiť v akom ročnom období.

from: I don't know how, but my co-worker always inspires me when I feel unmotivated.
to: Neviem ako, ale môj spolupracovník ma vždy inšpiruje, keď sa cítim nemotivovaný.

from: I apologized even when I wasn't at fault.
to: Ospravedlnil som sa, aj keď som nebol na vine.

from: I was so angry I was shaking.
to: Bol som taký nahnevaný, že som sa triasol.

from: I argued with the policeman about the parking ticket.
to: Hádal som sa s policajtom o parkovacom lístku.

from: I walked up to my boss and told him my opinion.
to: Prišiel som k svojmu šéfovi a povedal mu svoj názor.

from: I carried a lucky charm with me at all times.
to: Vždy som so sebou nosil kúzlo šťastia.

from: I found it difficult to focus on work because I think of sex all the time.
to: Bolo pre mňa ťažké sústrediť sa na prácu, pretože stále myslím na sex.

from: I did not know how to handle honest feedback from others.
to: Nevedel som, ako zvládnuť úprimnú spätnú väzbu od ostatných.

from: I gave the order.
to: Dal som rozkaz.

from: I am determined to protect my loved ones.
to: Som odhodlaná chrániť svojich blízkych.

from: I always wanted to try new things in bed.
to: Vždy som chcel vyskúšať nové veci v posteli.

from: I always knew people liked me.
to: Vždy som vedel, že ma ľudia majú radi.

from: I wasn't even nervous before my big presentation.
to: Pred mojou veľkou prezentáciou som nebol nervózny.

from: I took my grandmother to see the flower exhibition.
to: Vzal som svoju babičku na výstavu kvetov.

from: I dusted the apartment at least three times a week.
to: Byt som oprášil najmenej trikrát týždenne.

from: It took me a long time to realise which people are not worth investing energy in.
to: Trvalo mi dlho, kým som si uvedomil, do ktorých ľudí sa neoplatí investovať energiu.

from: I led the team towards victory.
to: Viedol som tím k víťazstvu.

from: I would always listen to everything the teacher said.
to: Vždy som počúval všetko, čo povedal učiteľ.

from: I knew I should have been kinder, because kindness is essential in life.
to: Vedel som, že by som mal byť láskavejší, pretože láskavosť je v živote nevyhnutná.

from: I calmly handled an unexpected setback at work by analysing the situation.
to: Pokojne som zvládol neočakávaný neúspech v práci analýzou situácie.

from: I was constantly involved in some kind of mischief.
to: Neustále som bol zapojený do nejakého druhu neplechy.

from: I engaged in meaningful conversations and provided companionship to the elederly residents.
to: Zapojil som sa do zmysluplných rozhovorov a poskytol som spoločnosť príjemným obyvateľom.

from: I was so clingy and insecure that I drove my partner away.
to: Bola som taká láskavá a neistá, že som svojho partnera odviedla preč.

from: I did not listen because I got distracted easily.
to: Nepočúval som, pretože som sa ľahko rozptýlil.

from: I am a scientist, I specialise in marine biology.
to: Som vedec, špecializujem sa na morskú biológiu.

to: Muž povedal: „Cítil som, že situácia je úplne mimo mojej kontroly.“

from: The man said: "I engaged in meaningful conversations and provided companionship to the elederly residents."

from: The man said: "I realized that my career is less important than my family."

from: The man said: "My partner prefers animals, but I wouldn't be able to live without human company."
to: Muž povedal: „Môj partner uprednostňuje zvieratá, ale bez ľudskej spoločnosti by som nebol schopný žiť.“

to: Nevedel som, ako zavesiť obraz, pretože klinec bol príliš vysoký.

from: I made the best choice based on the available data.
to: Na základe dostupných údajov som urobil najlepšiu voľbu.

from: I felt that I should try to be a good student.
to: Cítil som, že by som sa mal snažiť byť dobrým študentom.

from: I'm proud that I inspire others on their fitness journey with my hard work.
to: Som hrdý na to, že svojou tvrdou prácou inšpirujem ostatných na ich fitness ceste.

from: I enjoyed it when they took their clothes off.
to: Páčilo sa mi, keď sa vyzliekli.

from: Why do you think you are not confident enough?
to: Prečo si myslíte, že nie ste dostatočne sebavedomí?

from: I received special attention at social events, with many individuals expressing their admiration for my good looks.
to: Osobitnú pozornosť mi venovali na spoločenských podujatiach, pričom mnohí jednotlivci vyjadrili obdiv k môjmu dobrému vzhľadu.

from: I received numerous compliments from friends and strangers alike, acknowledging that I was good-looking.
to: Dostal som početné komplimenty od priateľov aj od cudzincov, pričom som uznal, že vyzerám dobre.

from: I wish I had more time to keep this flat clean.
to: Prial by som si, aby som mal viac času na udržanie tohto bytu v čistote.

from: I knew that my contributions were valuable for the company.
to: Vedel som, že moje príspevky sú pre spoločnosť cenné.

from: I bought tickets for the hooligans sector.
to: Kúpil som si lístky pre sektor chuligánov.

from: I communicated effectively with the team, displaying professionalism.
to: Efektívne som komunikoval s tímom a prejavoval profesionalitu.

from: On weekends I worked in a nursing home.
to: Cez víkendy som pracoval v opatrovateľskom dome.

from: I joined the military.
to: Vstúpil som do armády.

from: As I stepped into the room, everyone was looking at me.
to: Keď som vošiel do miestnosti, všetci sa na mňa pozerali.

from: I have often received compliments about my good looks and now I am confident.
to: Často som dostával komplimenty za môj dobrý vzhľad a teraz som si istý.

from: I pushed the huge rock aside so we could pass.
to: Odsunul som obrovskú skalu nabok, aby sme mohli prejsť.

from: I don't like to make rash decisions - they would only harm my reputation.
to: Nerád robím unáhlené rozhodnutia - poškodili by len moju povesť.

from: I didn't like the situation, but I preferred to stay quiet.
to: Nepáčila sa mi situácia, ale radšej som zostala ticho.

from: My friend was having a bad day, so I bought some food and went to see her.
to: Môj priateľ mal zlý deň, tak som si kúpil nejaké jedlo a išiel som za ňou.

from: I knew it was rational to let them go, but I wanted to make it harder for them.
to: Vedel som, že je rozumné nechať ich ísť, ale chcel som im to sťažiť.

from: I donated a lot of money to various charities.
to: Veľa peňazí som venoval rôznym charitatívnym organizáciám.

from: I like to have my coffee on the table at 9.00 AM every day, can you do it?
to: Rád si dám kávu na stole každý deň o 9.00 hod., môžete to urobiť?

from: I am always empathetic to people close to me.
to: Vždy som empatický k ľuďom, ktorí sú mi blízki.

from: I established an emergency fund to cover unexpected expenses, providing a safety net for my family.
to: Založil som núdzový fond na pokrytie neočakávaných výdavkov a poskytoval som záchrannú sieť pre moju rodinu.

from: I didn't panic and immediately gave them first aid.
to: Neprepadol som panike a okamžite som im poskytol prvú pomoc.

from: I toughed it although they told me not to.
to: Sťažoval som sa, aj keď mi povedali, aby som to nerobil.

from: I wanted to smash that cake like a child.
to: Chcel som rozbiť koláč ako dieťa.

from: I single handedly knocked them out.
to: Jednoručne som ich vyrazil.

from: I had a bad feeling about them the second I saw them.
to: Mal som z nich zlý pocit, keď som ich videl.

from: I've always been a friend to my employees rather than a boss.
to: Vždy som bol priateľom svojich zamestnancov, a nie šéfom.

from: I liked when my partner complimented my appearance.
to: Páčilo sa mi, keď môj partner pochválil môj vzhľad.

from: I paid the interns even though I did not have to.

from: I would be the best president this country has ever seen.

from: I assumed nobody wanted to help me with chores.

from: I don't like condoms.

from: I got so angry after they accused me of sexual assault.

from: I had to get rid of the stain immediately.
to: Musel som sa okamžite zbaviť škvrny.

from: I was in the US for a year and people had no problem talking to me even though they didn’t know me.
to: Bol som v USA rok a ľudia nemali problém so mnou hovoriť, aj keď ma nepoznali.

from: It was easy for me to make friends on the first day of university.
to: Bolo pre mňa ľahké nájsť si priateľov v prvý deň na univerzite.

from: I did as they asked me to.
to: Urobil som to, čo ma požiadali.

from: I knew it made my skin look really good.
to: Vedel som, že moja pokožka vyzerá naozaj dobre.

from: They have always praised my gentle spirit, and I tried to live up to it.

from: I didn’t want to break up, but I didn’t want to show my sensitive side either.

from: As soon as my pay check came, I went shopping.

from: I am stunning.

from: I feel that I'm good at solving problems.

from: I chose the car based on the specs, not the looks.

from: I like it when I can clean alone and my partner is relaxing at that time.

from: Why were you paying for the coffee, when I told you I'll pay?

from: I don't need to carry guns with me because I'm strong enough to defend myself.

from: I babysat my sister’s kids last weekend.

from: I played with lego and had fun although I was an adult.

from: I felt like going out that night.

from: When I make a lot of money, I feel happy because I know my family will not suffer.

from: When they told me to act my age, I told them off.

from: They've been telling me that I'm beautiful, but I'm more than that.

from: I was my duty to provide for them materially.

from: I snapped at my friend when they innocently asked a question, even though I knew it was irrational to get angry over such a small matter.

from: I never hid my dirty mind.

from: I could immediately sense something was wrong.

from: Would you like to go to that party with me?

from: I'd like to trade football cards, but I don't have anyone to trade them with.
to: Chcel by som obchodovať s futbalovými kartami, ale nemám s kým ich obchodovať.

from: I made coffee for everyone in our team before we started the team meeting.
to: Pred začatím stretnutia tímu som pripravil kávu pre všetkých v našom tíme.

from: I know it's important to be alone with yourself, but I just couldn't do it.
to: Viem, že je dôležité byť sám so sebou, ale jednoducho som to nedokázal.

from: I had no doubt.
to: Nepochyboval som.

from: I was never good at sports.
to: Nikdy som nebol dobrý v športe.

from: I never interfered in my employees personal lives.
to: Nikdy som nezasahoval do osobného života svojich zamestnancov.

from: I wanted to make more friends.
to: Chcela som si nájsť viac priateľov.

from: I have been taught to smile even when I am sad or angry.
to: Naučili ma usmievať sa, aj keď som smutný alebo nahnevaný.

from: Despite being in a committed relationship, I found it difficult to resist strangers.
to: Napriek tomu, že som v oddanom vzťahu, bolo pre mňa ťažké odolať cudzím ľuďom.

from: I validated my friend's emotions, providing reassurance during a challenging situation.
to: Potvrdil som emócie svojho priateľa a poskytoval som uistenie počas náročnej situácie.

from: As a software engineer, I consistently demonstrated a strong work ethic and attention to detail.
to: Ako softvérový inžinier som dôsledne demonštroval silnú pracovnú morálku a pozornosť k detailom.

from: I always went everywhere ahead of time.
to: Vždy som chodil všade vopred.

from: I was elected as the new mayor of the town.
to: Bol som zvolený za nového starostu mesta.

from: I made a resolution not to buy leather clothes or shoes because it is insensitive to animals.
to: Rozhodol som sa, že nebudem kupovať kožené oblečenie alebo obuv, pretože sú necitlivé na zvieratá.

from: I signed up for a medieval swording workshop.
to: Prihlásil som sa na stredovekú mečovú dielňu.

from: My immature mindset prevented me from commiting in a relationship.
to: Moje nezrelé myslenie mi bránilo vo vzťahu.

from: I couldn’t decide which shirt to buy, so I bought all three.
to: Nevedel som sa rozhodnúť, ktorú košeľu si kúpiť, tak som si kúpil všetky tri.

from: I did what they told me to do to fit in.
to: Urobil som to, čo mi povedali, aby som zapadol.

from: I rented the house for them.
to: Prenajal som im dom.

from: It was comforting for me, that I cooked for my family.
to: Bolo pre mňa príjemné, že som varil pre svoju rodinu.

from: My boss is influential and has a significant impact on others.
to: Môj šéf je vplyvný a má významný vplyv na ostatných.

from: I like to divide the tasks.
to: Rád rozdeľujem úlohy.

from: I am dedicated.
to: Som oddaný.

from: I was nervous, because I had no time to clean the bathroom.
to: Bol som nervózny, pretože som nemal čas upratať kúpeľňu.

from: I frequently deferred to others' opinions and preferences.
to: Často som sa odkladal na názory a preferencie ostatných.

from: I bought a castle to renovate it.
to: Kúpil som si hrad, aby som ho zrekonštruoval.

from: I spent hours in front of the mirror.
to: Strávil som hodiny pred zrkadlom.

from: I was always the one who did most of the work in group assignments.
to: Vždy som bol ten, kto väčšinu práce vykonával v skupinových úlohách.

from: I was scared because there was a spider in my shower.
to: Bál som sa, pretože v mojej sprche bol pavúk.

from: I kept the kitchen area clean to prevent a buildup of dirty dishes
to: Kuchynský kút som udržiaval čistý, aby som zabránil nahromadeniu špinavého riadu

from: I liked to play computer games and lived in my mom's basement although I was an adult.
to: Rád som hral počítačové hry a žil som v suteréne mojej mamy, hoci som bol dospelý.

from: I felt helpful because I could host a party.
to: Cítil som sa užitočný, pretože som mohol usporiadať párty.

from: I presented my innovative idea with unwavering conviction.
to: Svoj inovatívny nápad som predstavil s neochvejným presvedčením.

from: I like it when the hairdresser massages my head.
to: Páči sa mi, keď mi kaderník masíruje hlavu.

from: I didn't feel affected by criticism at all, I didn't take it personal.
to: Vôbec som sa necítil ovplyvnený kritikou, nevzal som to osobne.

from: I evaluated all the costs and benefits before making the decision.
to: Pred rozhodnutím som vyhodnotil všetky náklady a prínosy.

from: I drank very heavily.
to: Veľmi som pil.

from: I have paid a personal trainer to help me with my workouts.
to: Zaplatil som osobnému trénerovi, aby mi pomohol s tréningom.

from: With each step deeper into the haunted house, I explored its eerie corridors, unafraid of the lurking shadows.
to: S každým krokom hlbšie do strašidelného domu som preskúmal jeho strašidelné chodby, nebál som sa číhajúcich tieňov.

from: I locked myself out, so I had to break down the door.
to: Zamkol som sa von, takže som musel rozbiť dvere.

from: I led my team to success.
to: Viedol som svoj tím k úspechu.

from: I could not keep up with their tempo.
to: Nedokázal som držať krok s ich tempom.

from: My friends have told me that I am empathetic, and I have been very touched by that.
to: Moji priatelia mi povedali, že som empatický, a to ma veľmi dotklo.

from: As a lawyer, I meticulously researched case precedents and prepared persuasive arguments for the courtroom
to: Ako právnik som starostlivo skúmal precedensy prípadov a pripravil presvedčivé argumenty pre súdnu sieň

from: I ought to do some summer clean-up.
to: Mal by som urobiť nejaké letné upratovanie.

from: I wanted to focus on my career, family life could wait.
to: Chcel som sa sústrediť na svoju kariéru, rodinný život môže počkať.

from: I had to cheer others up.
to: Musel som rozveseliť ostatných.

from: I had to throw away the hoodie because it had a stain on it that I could not get rid off.
to: Musel som vyhodiť mikinu, pretože na nej bola škvrna, ktorú som sa nemohol zbaviť.

from: I could easily beat you in tennis.
to: V tenise by som ťa mohol ľahko poraziť.

from: I never talked about my feelings with my friends.
to: Nikdy som nehovoril o svojich pocitoch so svojimi priateľmi.

from: I liked speaking in front of a huge audience.
to: Rád som hovoril pred veľkým publikom.

from: I swam naked.
to: Plával som nahý.

from: I attended a photoshoot where the photographer captured my natural beauty, boosting my self-esteem.
to: Zúčastnil som sa fotenia, kde fotograf zachytil moju prírodnú krásu a posilnil moje sebavedomie.

from: I couldn't look, it made me feel sick.
to: Nemohol som sa pozrieť, bolo mi z toho zle.

from: I was thinking about you and me having sex, what do you say?
to: Myslel som na to, že ty a ja máme sex, čo hovoríš?

from: I advocated for causes and initiatives I believed in, inspiring others to join in.
to: Obhajoval som príčiny a iniciatívy, v ktoré som veril, a inšpiroval ostatných, aby sa pripojili.

from: I earned a lot more than my partner, and now my partner is a stay-at-home parent.
to: Zarobil som oveľa viac ako môj partner a teraz je môj partner rodičom, ktorý zostal doma.

from: The last time I had a fight with my parents, I locked myself in the attic for the day.
to: Naposledy, keď som sa pohádal s rodičmi, zamkol som sa na deň v podkroví.

from: I thought I was the most beautiful at the event.
to: Myslel som si, že som na podujatí najkrajšia.

from: I have to look good, even if I'm just going to take out the trash.
to: Musím vyzerať dobre, aj keď sa chystám len vytiahnuť odpadky.

from: Taking care of my children is the least I can do for my family.
to: Starostlivosť o svoje deti je to najmenšie, čo môžem pre svoju rodinu urobiť.

from: I like being in charge.
to: Páči sa mi byť zodpovedný.

from: I was forced to sign up for a self-defence course.
to: Bol som nútený prihlásiť sa na kurz sebaobrany.

from: My partner never truly listens to what I'm saying and I find it childish.
to: Môj partner nikdy skutočne nepočúva, čo hovorím, a považujem to za detinské.

from: I have never left the house messy, I have to clean everything first.
to: Nikdy som neopustil dom chaotický, najskôr musím všetko vyčistiť.

from: I liked the way you walked.
to: Páčilo sa mi, ako ste kráčali.

from: I always thought that life is a game and you have to enjoy it.
to: Vždy som si myslel, že život je hra a musíte si ju užiť.

from: It is stressful to work here at this position, but I'm good at handling it.
to: Je stresujúce pracovať tu na tejto pozícii, ale dobre to zvládam.

from: The muscles in my arms and back flexed as I rowed through the calm waters.
to: Svaly v mojich rukách a chrbte sa ohýbali, keď som vesloval pokojnými vodami.

from: When they called and told me what had happened, I collapsed.
to: Keď mi zavolali a povedali mi, čo sa stalo, zrútila som sa.

from: I hated when my partner was washing the dishes because I knew that I could do it better.
to: Nenávidel som, keď môj partner umýval riad, pretože som vedel, že to zvládnem lepšie.

from: I’d like to be pretty like Hollywood stars.
to: Chcel by som byť pekný ako hollywoodske hviezdy.

from: I put on this new perfume today and everyone is turning around to see me.
to: Dnes som si dal tento nový parfum a všetci sa otočia, aby ma videli.

from: I impulsively quit my job without a backup plan.
to: Impulzívne som opustil svoju prácu bez záložného plánu.

from: I got bitten by a snake but I remained calm.
to: Hryzol ma had, ale zostal som pokojný.

from: I knew that he was acting rude, but it is just because he's had a hard time at work.
to: Vedel som, že sa správa neslušne, ale je to len preto, že mal ťažké časy v práci.

from: I invested my money so that I have some passive income.
to: Investoval som svoje peniaze, aby som mal nejaký pasívny príjem.

from: The man said: "I led my team to success."
to: Muž povedal: „Viedol som svoj tím k úspechu.“
